After you play this upgrade, give attached character 1 shield.
Attached character can have 1 additional shield.
flavor: Mandalorian armor was renowned for its durability.
label: Mandalorian Armor

name: Dangerous Mission
text: Turn a die to a side showing a resource cost.
label: Dangerous Mission

name: Endurance
text:
Play only if one or more of your dice were removed during an opponent's last turn this round.
Roll one of those removed dice into your pool.
label: Endurance

name: Partnership
text: Activate one of your characters and one of your supports. Then you may spend 1 resource to take an additional action.
label: Partnership

name: Recycle
text: Discard one of your supports from play. Then gain resources equal to its cost.
label: Recycle

name: Rend
text: Discard a support or upgrade that costs 0 from play.
flavor: When facing an overpowered adversary, precision often prevails over brute strength.
label: Rend

name: Roll On
text: Reroll one of your dice. You may reroll that die. You may reroll that die again.
flavor: "Come on, BB-8! Hurry!" <cite>Poe Dameron</cite>
label: Roll On

name: Plastoid Armor
text: Attached character gains +1 health.
label: Plastoid Armor

name: B'Omarr Monastery
subtitle: Teth
text: Claim - Resolve one of your dice showing a modifier side (a side with a +) as if it were not modified.
label: B'Omarr Monastery - Teth

name: Fort Anaxes
subtitle: Anaxes
text: While you control this battlefield, each of your characters have the Guardian keyword.
label: Fort Anaxes - Anaxes

name: Garel Spaceport
subtitle: Garel
text: Claim - Remove one of your dice to gain resources equal to half of the value showing on that die, rounded up.
label: Garel Spaceport - Garel

name: Imperial Academy
subtitle: Lothal
text: While you control this battlefield, after you activate a support, you may reroll its die.
label: Imperial Academy - Lothal

name: Main Plaza
subtitle: Vashka
text: Claim - Move 1 damage from a character to this battlefield or move all damage from this battlefield to a character (this ignores shields).
label: Main Plaza - Vashka

name: Medical Center
subtitle: Kaliida Shoals
text: Claim - Heal 1 damage each from up to 2 different characters. Give control of this battlefield to an opponent.
label: Medical Center - Kaliida Shoals

name: Port District
subtitle: Bespin
text: While you control this battlefield, each card you play that costs 3 or more has the Ambush keyword.
label: Port District - Bespin

name: Weapons Factory Alpha
subtitle: Cymoon 1
text: While you control this battlefield, the cost of the first vehicle you play each round is decreased by 1.
label: Weapons Factory Alpha - Cymoon 1

name: Kylo Ren
subtitle: Tormented One
text: After you activate this character, you may choose a color (Blue, Red, Yellow or Gray). Then reveal a random card in an opponent's hand. If that card matches the chosen color, deal 2 damage to a character.
label: Kylo Ren - Tormented One

name: Captain Phasma
subtitle: Ruthless Tactician
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if that character has 6 or more damage on it.
flavor: "You can't be so stupid as to think this will be easy."
label: Captain Phasma - Ruthless Tactician

name: Droid Commandos
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage each to any number of characters.
flavor: Though superior to standard battle droids, this model of droid was too expensive to deploy in large numbers.
label: Droid Commandos

name: Captain Phasma's Blaster
text: While this upgrade is attached to Captain Phasma, it has the Redeploy keyword.
flavor: "My troops will storm this block and kill you all." <cite>Captain Phasma</cite>
label: Captain Phasma's Blaster

name: Praetorian Guard
text: Attached character has the Guardian keyword.
label: Praetorian Guard

name: Dark Counsel
text: [special] - Draw a card. Reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.
label: Dark Counsel

name: Crossguard Lightsaber
text:
After you play this upgrade on Kylo Ren, deal 1 damage to a character.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if that character has 1 or more shields.
label: Crossguard Lightsaber

name: Force Stasis
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Remove a die showing ranged damage ([ranged]). Then deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Force Stasis

name: Jedi Rival
text: After you activate attached character, you may remove 1 shield from a character.
flavor: "I will find them quickly, Master." <cite>Darth Maul</cite>
label: Jedi Rival

name: Armored Support
text: Action - Exhaust this support to reroll one of your Red dice. If that die rolls damage ([ranged] or [melee]), deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Armored Support

name: First Strike
text: Deal damage to a character equal to the value on an opponent's die showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: First Strike

name: I Have You Now
text: Turn a die to a side showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: I Have You Now

name: Imperial Envoy
text: Reveal 2 random cards in an opponent's hand. Then deal 1 damage to a character for each event and support just revealed.
label: Imperial Envoy

name: Mobilize
text: Gain 4 resources.
flavor: "Dispatch all squadrons…" <cite>General Hux</cite>
label: Mobilize

name: Tactical Mastery
text: Spot a Red character to take up to 2 additional actions.
label: Tactical Mastery

name: As I Have Foreseen
text:
Ambush.
Look at each opponent's hand.
label: As I Have Foreseen

name: Clash
text: Turn one of your dice to a side showing melee damage ([melee]). Turn an opponent's die showing melee damage ([melee]) to a blank ([blank]).
label: Clash

name: Intimidate
text: Remove all shields from a character.
label: Intimidate

name: Your Skills Are Complete
text: Turn an upgrade die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).
flavor: "I see you have constructed a new lightsaber." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
label: Your Skills Are Complete

name: Doubt
text: Reroll an opponent's die. Then that opponent either resolves that die or removes it.
label: Doubt

name: Parry
text: Remove a die showing melee damage ([melee]).
label: Parry

name: Subjugate
text: Remove a die.
flavor: "I won't have you question my methods." <cite>General Hux</cite>
label: Subjugate

name: Hangar Bay
subtitle: Imperial Fleet
text: Claim - Reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If that card is an event or support, deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Hangar Bay - Imperial Fleet

name: Rey
subtitle: Finding The Ways
text: After you activate this character, if she has 1 or more shields, you may deal 1 damage to a character.
flavor: "The Force, it's calling you." <cite>Maz Kanata</cite>
label: Rey - Finding The Ways

name: Poe Dameron
subtitle: More Than A Pilot
text: [special] - Give a character 1 shield. You may turn another die to any side.
flavor: "The Resistance will not be intimidated by you."
label: Poe Dameron - More Than A Pilot

name: Medical Droid
text: [special] - Heal 1 damage from a character.
flavor: Unlike biological doctors, medical droids could heal most species due to their extensive databanks.
label: Medical Droid

name: Strike Team
text:
Ambush.
Decrease the cost to play this support by 1 if an opponent has 3 or more resources.
label: Strike Team

name: Teamwork
text: [special] - Give attached character 1 shield. You may give another character 1 shield.
flavor: "Why I should stick my neck out for you is far beyond my opacity!" <cite>C-3P0</cite>
label: Teamwork

name: Poe Dameron's Blaster
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if attached character is Poe Dameron.
label: Poe Dameron's Blaster

name: Rey's Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade, give attached character 1 shield, or 2 shields instead if attached character is Rey.
label: Rey's Lightsaber

name: Inner Strength
text: [special] - Move 1 damage from attached character to an opponent's character with no shields.
label: Inner Strength

name: Luke's Protection
text: Action - Place this support on top of your deck from play to give a Blue character 1 shield.
flavor: "If Skywalker returns, the new Jedi will rise." <cite>Snoke</cite>
label: Luke's Protection

name: Honor Guard
text: Action - Discard this support from play to remove a die showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: Honor Guard

name: Direct Hit
text: Resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]), increasing its value by 2.
label: Direct Hit

name: Logistics
text: Spot a red character to resolve a die with the resource symbol ([resource]), increasing its value by 1.
label: Logistics

name: Recon
text: Choose a symbol showing on a die. Then turn another die to a side showing the same symbol.
label: Recon

name: Strategic Planning
text: Ready a support that has no mods or exhaust a support.
label: Strategic Planning

name: Concentrate
text: Turn one of your dice to any side. You may spend 1 resource to turn another one of your dice to any side.
flavor: "Through the Force, things you will see." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: Concentrate

name: Defensive Stance
text: Give a character 2 shields.
label: Defensive Stance

name: Distraction
text: Choose 2 dice. Then an opponent chooses and removes one of those dice.
flavor: "Maybe it's another drill." <cite>Stormtrooper</cite>
label: Distraction

name: Do Or Do Not
text: Reroll one of your dice. Then you may resolve it, increasing its value by 1. Otherwise, remove it.
flavor: "There is no try." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: Do Or Do Not

name: Fierce Resolve
text: Reroll one of your dice. Then deal damage to a character equal to the value showing on that die.
flavor: "I'll never turn to the dark side." <cite>Luke Skywalker</cite>
label: Fierce Resolve

name: Evade
text: Remove a die showing ranged damage [ranged]
label: Evade

name: Flank
text:
Play only if you have more ready characters than an opponent.
Remove one of that opponent's dice.
label: Flank

name: Sound The Alarm
text: Reroll any number of an opponent's dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: Sound The Alarm

name: Obi-Wan's Hut
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Claim - Give a Blue character 1 shield or spend 1 resource to give a non-Blue character 1 shield.
label: Obi-Wan's Hut - Tatooine

name: Dark Advisor
text: [special] - Draw 3 cards. Then place a card from your hand on the top or bottom of your deck.
label: Dark Advisor

name: Maul
subtitle: Vengeful One
text: After one or more of this character's character or upgrade dice are removed by an opponent's card effect, you may remove one of their dice.
flavor: "Formerly Darth, now just Maul."
label: Maul - Vengeful One

name: Mother Talzin
subtitle: Nightsister Matriarch
text: After you activate this character, you may reveal the top card of a player's deck. If its cost is an odd number, turn one of that player's dice to any side.
flavor: "I use dark magick to achieve power."
label: Mother Talzin - Nightsister Matriarch

name: Palpatine
subtitle: Darth Sidious
text: Power Action - Play an event from your hand, decreasing its cost by the number of different damage symbols ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) showing on your dice.
flavor: "There is no mercy."
label: Palpatine - Darth Sidious

name: Kylo Ren's Starfighter
text: [special] - Choose a color. Then reveal an opponent's hand and deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to them equal to the number of cards in their hand that match the chosen color.
label: Kylo Ren's Starfighter

name: Crystal Ball
text: After you activate attached character, you may look at the top card of a deck.
label: Crystal Ball

name: Force Rend
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Spend resources equal to the cost of a support or upgrade in play to discard it.
label: Force Rend

name: Maul's Lightsaber
text: Blue character only. Power Action - If an opponent has no shields on all of their characters, spend 1 resource to roll this die into your pool.
label: Maul's Lightsaber

name: Battle Droid
text: After you activate this character, if this die just rolled indirect damage ([indirect]), you may activate one of your other Battle Droids ([LEG]9).
flavor: "Roger, Roger."
label: Battle Droid

name: Kallus
subtitle: Agent of the Empire
text: Power Action - Turn this die showing ranged damage ([ranged]) to a side showing melee damage ([melee]), or vice versa.
flavor: "Face me!"
label: Kallus - Agent of the Empire

name: Nute Gunray
subtitle: Separatist Viceroy
text: Each opponent gains 1 fewer resource during the upkeep phase, to a minimum of 1, unless that opponent discards the top 2 cards of their deck.
flavor: "Ah, victory!"
label: Nute Gunray - Separatist Viceroy

name: Tarkin
subtitle: Grand Moff
text: Power Action - Remove 2 of your dice showing the same symbol to deal 4 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
flavor: "Fear will keep the local systems in line."
label: Tarkin - Grand Moff

name: Veteran Stormtrooper
flavor: The elite soldier of the Imperial Military, trained for complete obedience to the command hierarchy, as well as the Galactic Emperor Palpatine.
label: Veteran Stormtrooper

name: Separatist Landing Craft
text: [special] - Spend 2 resources to add a Battle Droid ([LEG]9) to your team. Discard this support from play.
flavor: A heavy transport starship used by the Trade Federation for transporting and deploying droid battalions planet side.
label: Separatist Landing Craft

name: Fragmentation Grenade
text: After this die is resolved, discard this upgrade from play unless you spend 1 resource.
flavor: Commonly used by the Galactic Empire's death troopers and coastal defender stormtroopers.
label: Fragmentation Grenade

name: Grand Moff
text: Unique Red character only. Power Action - Use the "Claim" ability on the battlefield or switch the battlefield with a battlefield that is not being used (but was brought to the game).
label: Grand Moff

name: Kallus' Bo-Rifle
text: Ambush.
label: Kallus' Bo-Rifle

name: Bib Fortuna
subtitle: Majordomo
text: [special] - Roll a character die on one of your other characters into your pool.
flavor: "Nudd Chaa."
label: Bib Fortuna - Majordomo

name: Boba Fett
subtitle: Deadly Mercenary
text: [special] - Deal damage to a character equal to the value showing on a die (yours or an opponent's).
flavor: "Don't get in my way."
label: Boba Fett - Deadly Mercenary

name: Doctor Aphra
subtitle: Artifact Hunter
text: The cost of the first droid you play each round is decreased by 1. After you deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself, you may draw a card.
label: Doctor Aphra - Artifact Hunter

name: Greedo
subtitle: Unlucky Mercenary
text: Before this character is defeated, roll any number of his character dice into your pool. Then resolve any number of his character dice in the order of your choice.
flavor: "Going somewhere, Solo?"
label: Greedo - Unlucky Mercenary

name: Rebel Traitor
text: After you activate this character, you may force an opponent to activate one of their character as their next action this round, if able.
label: Rebel Traitor

name: Ark Angel
text: After you activate this support, activate up to 2 of your other supports in the order of your choice.
flavor: "Welcome aboard the Ark Angel, sir Darth Vader. Big Fan. Huge!" <cite>Dr. Aphra</cite>
label: Ark Angel

name: BT-1
text: After you activate this support, deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself. Then deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
label: BT-1

name: Slave I
text: Power Action - Reroll one of your Yellow dice. Then you may remove an opponent's die showing a value equal to the value showing on the die you just rerolled.
label: Slave I

name: Hunter Instinct
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character, or 2 damage instead if that character has 3 or more damage on it.
label: Hunter Instinct

name: Wrist Rockets
text:
Yellow character only.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. You may spend 1 resource to deal 2 damage to a character.
label: Wrist Rockets

name: BB-9E
text: [special] - Reroll an opponent's die. Reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.
label: BB-9E

name: Aayla Secura
subtitle: Jedi General
text: [special] - Turn one of your Blue or Red dice to any side. Turn an opponent's die to any side.
flavor: "Sometimes it takes courage to stick to one's beliefs."
label: Aayla Secura - Jedi General

name: Jedi Temple Guard
text: Guardian.
label: Jedi Temple Guard

name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Unlikely Hero
text: Power Action - Spend 2 resources to resolve one of this character's character or upgrade dice, increasing its value by 2.
flavor: "I want to learn the ways of the Force and become a Jedi like my father."
label: Luke Skywalker - Unlikely Hero

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
subtitle: Jedi Master
text: After you activate this character, you may give a character 1 shield.
flavor: "Your move."
label: Obi-Wan Kenobi - Jedi Master

name: Yoda
subtitle: Wizened Master
text: [special]- Choose and do two of the following: gain 1 resource, give a character 1 shield, turn one of your dice to any side, or discard the top card of a deck.
flavor: "Do. Or do not. There is not try."
label: Yoda - Wizened Master

name: ETA-2 Interceptor
text: Action - Remove this die or one of your dice showing a shield ([shield]) to exhaust a support.
flavor: The ETA-2 Interceptor was the starfighter of choice of Jedi during the Clone Wars.
label: ETA-2 Interceptor

name: R2-D2
text: [special] - Draw a card. You may turn one of your dice to any side.
flavor: "I've never seen a jam he couldn't beep his way out of." <cite>Leia Organa</cite>
label: R2-D2

name: Force Meditation
text:
To play, spot a Blue character.
[special] - Discard the top 2 cards of a deck.
label: Force Meditation

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi's Lightsaber
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Give attached character 1 shield. Deal unblockable damage to a character equal to the number of shields on attached character.
label: Obi-Wan Kenobi's Lightsaber

name: Clone Trooper
text: After you activate this character, you may reroll this die, or, if you control the battlefield, you may reroll one of your character dice.
flavor: "Someone's out to start a war." <cite>Mace Windu</cite>
label: Clone Trooper

name: Finn
subtitle: Soldier of Necessity
text: [special] - Move 1 damage from a card to another card in play (this ignores shields).
label: Finn - Soldier of Necessity

name: Rose
subtitle: Skilled Mechanic
text: [special] - Gain 1 resource. You may remove 1 damage from a support.
flavor: "I work behind pipes all day."
label: Rose - Skilled Mechanic

name: Wedge Antilles
subtitle: Squad Leader
text: Power Action - Turn one of your vehicle dice to any side.
flavor: "Making my run now."
label: Wedge Antilles - Squad Leader

name: Mortar Team
text: While you control the battlefield, you may resolve the indirect damage ([indirect]) sides of this die as if they were ranged damage ([ranged]).
label: Mortar Team

name: Resistance Bomber
text:
After this die is resolved, place 1 damage on this support.
Discard this support if it has 3 or more damage on it.
label: Resistance Bomber

name: Camouflaged Rifle
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if you control the battlefield.
label: Camouflaged Rifle

name: Rebellion Leader
text: Unique Red character only. Power Action - Remove an opponent's die showing the same symbol as one of your dice.
label: Rebellion Leader

name: Han Solo
subtitle: Savvy Smuggler
text: After you activate this character, you may reroll a die (yours or an opponent's).
flavor: "Hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side, kid."
label: Han Solo - Savvy Smuggler

name: Jar Jar Binks
subtitle: Clumsy Outcast
text:
Any player may take an action to force you to activate this character.
After you activate this character, reroll all dice showing a symbol not showing on his character dice.
flavor: "Dissen ganna be messy!"
label: Jar Jar Binks - Clumsy Outcast

name: Jedha Partisan
text: After you deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent for the first time each round, you may discard the top card of a deck.
label: Jedha Partisan

name: Saw Gerrera
subtitle: Extremist Leader
text: [special] - Discard a random card from a player's hand. Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to its cost.
flavor: "Save the Rebellion! Save the dream."
label: Saw Gerrera - Extremist Leader

name: Zeb Orrelios
subtitle: The Last Lasat
text: You may resolve the melee damage ([melee]) sides of this die as if they were ranged damage ([ranged]).
flavor: "There's just something about the feeling of their helmets on my fists."
label: Zeb Orrelios - The Last Lasat

name: Runaway Boomas
text: Power Action - Spend 1 resource to roll a Runaway Boomas ([LEG]51) die into your pool. Set aside that die after it is resolved or removed.
label: Runaway Boomas

name: Millennium Falcon
text: After you activate this support, you may activate one of your characters.
flavor: "Chewie… we're home." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
label: Millennium Falcon

name: Roguish Charm
text: Yellow character only. [special] - Remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Gain resources equal to the resource cost showing on it (not its value).
label: Roguish Charm

name: Zeb Orrelios' Bo-Rifle
text: Action - Spend 1 resource to resolve this die showing a modifier (a side with a +) as if it did not have a modifier.
flavor: "Only the Honor Guard of Lasan may carry a bo-rifle!" <cite>Zeb Orrelios</cite>
label: Zeb Orrelios' Bo-Rifle

name: Republic Cruiser
text: [special] - Give a unique character 2 shields or give each of your unique characters 1 shield.
flavor: These ships were painted red when used to transport diplomats as a warning not to attack.
label: Republic Cruiser

name: Force Focus
text:
To play, spot a Blue character.
[special] - Turn one of your dice to any side. You may reveal a Blue card from your hand to turn an opponent's die to any side.
label: Force Focus

name: Force Wave
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Deal 3 damage to a character. Deal 2 damage to a another character. Deal 1 damage to a third character.
label: Force Wave

name: Heirloom Lightsaber
text: This upgrade has the Redeploy keyword while it's on a Blue character.
label: Heirloom Lightsaber

name: Hush-98 Comlink
text: Action - Remove this die to activate any number of your characters and/or supports in the order of your choice.
label: Hush-98 Comlink

name: Ground Battalion
text: After you activate this support, you may take control of the battlefield. (This does not claim the battlefield.)
label: Ground Battalion

name: Lookout Post
text: Play only if you control the battlefield.
label: Lookout Post

name: Auto Cannon
flavor: Sometimes the best tactic is to not aim.
label: Auto Cannon

name: E-11 Blaster
text: Redeploy.
flavor: Standard issue for Imperial stormtroopers, the E-11 blaster was often found in rebel hands.
label: E-11 Blaster

name: 74-Z Speeder Bike
text: Action - Resolve this die and one of attached character's character dice in the order of your choice.
label: 74-Z Speeder Bike

name: Hondo Ohnaka
subtitle: Respected Businessman
text: [special] - Deal 3 damage to an opponent's character unless that opponent gives you 1 resource.
flavor: "Well that's just good business."
label: Hondo Ohnaka - Respected Businessman

name: Pirate Speeder Tank
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, give a character 2 shields, and take one additional action.
flavor: "But you know what I always say: speak softly, and drive a big tank." <cite>Hondo Ohnaka</cite>
label: Pirate Speeder Tank

name: Bartering
text: [special] - Gain 1 resource. You may force each player to draw a card.
label: Bartering

name: Gang Up
text: X is equal to the number of Yellow characters you have in play.
label: Gang Up

name: Vibrocutlass
text:
Redeploy.
Decrease the resource cost on this die by 1 while this upgrade is on a Yellow character.
label: Vibrocutlass

name: Modified HWK-290
text:
After you play this support, place 2 damage on it.
After you activate this support, deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself equal to the damage on it.
label: Modified HWK-290

name: Canto Bight Pistol
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if it is a villain.
label: Canto Bight Pistol

name: Hidden Blaster
text:
Ambush.
After you play this upgrade, you may remove 1 shield from a character.
label: Hidden Blaster

name: Hunting Rifle
flavor: Slugthrowers, like the 6-2Aug2, were commonly found on backwater planets like Tatooine.
label: Hunting Rifle

name: Stun Baton
text: After a character takes damage from this die, you may spend 1 resource to remove one that character's character dice.
label: Stun Baton

name: Consumed By The Dark Side
text: Deal 1 damage to one of your blue characters to turn a die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Consumed By The Dark Side

name: Dark Scheme
text: Look at the top 5 cards of an opponent's deck. Discard one of them and place the rest on the top of their deck in the order of your choice.
label: Dark Scheme

name: Double Strike
text: Resolve one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]) without removing it from your pool.
label: Double Strike

name: Frighten
text:
Ambush.
Remove a total of up to 3 shields from any number of characters.
label: Frighten

name: I Am Your Father
text: Resolve an opponent's character die as if it were your own unless that opponent discards all cards from their hand.
label: I Am Your Father

name: Snare
text:
Play only if you have one or more exhausted characters.
Exhaust a character.
label: Snare

name: Spell of Removal
text: Spot a Blue character to discard the top card of a deck. If its cost is an odd number, remove a die.
label: Spell of Removal

name: Witch Magick
text: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck (do not rearrange them). Heal damage from a character equal to the number of cards you just revealed that cost an odd number.
label: Witch Magick

name: Nightsister Coven
text: After a character die rolls a blank ([blank]), you may exhaust this support to reveal the top card of a deck. If its cost is an odd number, deal 1 damage to that character.
label: Nightsister Coven

name: Battle Fatigue
text:
Play only if each of an opponent's characters has one or more damage on them.
Remove one of that opponent's dice.
label: Battle Fatigue

name: Crush the Rebellion
text: Remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to half of the value showing on that die, rounded up.
label: Crush the Rebellion

name: Imperial Might
text: Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 2.
label: Imperial Might

name: Scorched Earth
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of dice in their pool.
label: Scorched Earth

name: Shrapnel Blast
text: Deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. Then you may remove a character die belonging to the character that was just dealt indirect damage ([indirect]).
label: Shrapnel Blast

name: Target Practice
text: Reroll any number of your Red dice. Then reroll any number of your Red dice.
label: Target Practice

name: Three Steps Ahead
text: Take up to 3 additional actions.
label: Three Steps Ahead

name: Command Bridge
text: Action - Exhaust this support to activate 2 of your non-unique characters in the order of your choice.
label: Command Bridge

name: Delve
text: Deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself to play a support or upgrade from your hand for free.
flavor: "That was fun. Let's never do that again." <cite>Doctor Aphra</cite>
label: Delve

name: Free-For-All
text: Remove any number of your dice. Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of dice you just removed.
label: Free-For-All

name: In Pursuit
text:
Play only if an opponent activated one or more characters during their last turn this round.
Activate any number of your Yellow characters in the order of your choice.
label: In Pursuit

name: No Good To Me Dead
text: Heal up to 2 damage from an opponent's character. Gain resources equal to the amount of damage you just healed.
label: No Good To Me Dead

name: Rumors
text: Force an opponent to choose a card in their hand. Then look at all of the other cards in their hand and discard one of them.
label: Rumors

name: Subdue
text: Choose a character that has 3 or more damage on it. Remove one of its character or upgrade dice.
label: Subdue

name: Take Flight
text:
Ambush.
Reroll up to 2 of your Yellow dice.
label: Take Flight

name: Outnumber
text:
Play only if an opponent has fewer characters in play than you.
Remove one of that opponent's dice.
label: Outnumber

name: Adapt
text: Remove 1 shield from one of your characters to gain 1 resource.
label: Adapt

name: Ataru Strike
text: Resolve one of your Blue character dice showing melee damage ([melee]), increasing its value by the number of shields on that character.
label: Ataru Strike

name: Heightened Awareness
text:
Ambush.
Give a character 3 shields.
label: Heightened Awareness

name: Investigate
text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Add one of them to your hand and place the rest on the top of your deck in the order of your choice.
label: Investigate

name: Strength Through Weakness
text: Discard the top 4 cards of a deck.
label: Strength Through Weakness

name: Unbreakable
text: Remove a die showing a value equal to or less than the number of shields on your characters.
label: Unbreakable

name: Defensive Teaching
text: Each of your Blue characters can have 1 additional shield.
label: Defensive Teaching

name: Yoda's Hut
text: Action - Exhaust this support to give a character 1 shield. Gain 1 resource if that character has 3 or more shields.
label: Yoda's Hut

name: Attack Run
text:
Ambush.
Activate one of your supports.
label: Attack Run

name: Equip
text: Move a weapon from one of your characters to another character (return its die to its card).
label: Equip

name: Final Moment
text: Ready each of your characters. After the action phase ends, you lose the game.
label: Final Moment

name: Light 'Em Up
text: Reroll one of your dice. If it just rolled ranged damage ([ranged]), you may resolve that die and another one of your dice showing ranged damaged, increasing one of their values by 2.
label: Light 'Em Up

name: Mend
text: Heal 3 damage from a character or remove 3 damage from a support.
label: Mend

name: Refit
text: Play a vehicle from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1. Then place 1 damage on it.
label: Refit

name: Special Modification
text: Remove 3 damage from a support or turn a support die to any side.
label: Special Modification

name: Suppression Field
text: Discard this support if it has 3 or more damage on it. Action - Exhaust this support to remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Place damage on this support equal to the value showing on that die.
label: Suppression Field

name: Bravado
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove an opponent's die. Then deal 2 damage to a character.
label: Bravado

name: Easy Pickings
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove 2 dice showing the same symbol and value (ignoring modifiers and resource costs).
label: Easy Pickings

name: Explosive Tactics
text: Discard the top card of a deck. Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to its cost.
label: Explosive Tactics

name: Impulsive
text:
Ambush.
Resolve one of your dice.
label: Impulsive

name: Scruffy Looking Nerf-Herder
text: Choose one of the following card types: event, support, or upgrade. Then look at an opponent's hand and discard a card of the chosen type from it.
label: Scruffy Looking Nerf-Herder

name: Smuggler's Run
text: Activate one of your Yellow characters. If one or more of its character or upgrade dice just rolled a resource ([resource]), gain 1 resource.
label: Smuggler's Run

name: Maz's Vault
text: Each player gains 1 additional resource during the upkeep phase.
flavor: Maz Kanata amassed a large collection of curiosities from her many travels throughout the galaxy.
label: Maz's Vault

name: Diplomatic Protection
text: Before attached character is defeated, you may discard this upgrade to give each of your other characters 2 shields.
label: Diplomatic Protection

name: Into The Garbage Chute
text: Exhaust one of your characters to remove up to 2 dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]).
label: Into The Garbage Chute

name: Alter
text: Turn up to 2 dice to the sides of your choice (yours and/or your opponents').
label: Alter

name: Ancient Wisdom
text: Draw 2 cards.
label: Ancient Wisdom

name: Feel The Force
text: Turn a Blue die to any side.
label: Feel The Force

name: Invigorate
text: Spot a Blue character to heal 1 damage from each of your characters.
label: Invigorate

name: Legacies
text: Spot a Blue character to resolve one of your dice showing a modifier (a side with a +) as if it did not have a modifier.
label: Legacies

name: Mislead
text: Remove a character die showing a value of 2 or less.
label: Mislead

name: Respite
text: Exhaust one of your characters to gain 1 resource and draw a card.
label: Respite

name: Stronger You Have Become
text: Count the number of upgrades you have in play. Reroll up to that many dice (yours and/or your opponents').
label: Stronger You Have Become

name: The Force Is With Me
text: Remove a die showing ranged damage ([ranged]) or indirect damage ([indirect]).
label: The Force Is With Me

name: Perseverance
text: Action - Exhaust this support to reroll one of your dice. Then you may reroll it again.
label: Perseverance

name: Resilient
text: After an opponent's card effect removes one of attached character's character dice, you may exhaust this upgrade to roll that die into your pool.
label: Resilient

name: Crackdown
text:
Play only if each of an opponent's characters has one or more damage on them.
Gain 1 resource.
label: Crackdown

name: Crash Landing
text: Remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself equal to the value showing on that die.
label: Crash Landing

name: Law and Order
text: Spot a Red character to discard an upgrade from play.
label: Law and Order

name: Locked and Loaded
text: Spot a Red character to turn up to 2 of your dice to sides showing indirect damage ([indirect]).
label: Locked and Loaded

name: Reinforce
text: Roll a character die on one of your characters into your pool if you have another copy of that character in play.
label: Reinforce

name: Strength in Numbers
text: Deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of exhausted characters you have.
label: Strength in Numbers

name: Sudden Impact
text: Remove one of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]). Then deal damage to each of an opponent's characters equal to half of the value showing on that die, rounded up.
label: Sudden Impact

name: Superior Position
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Remove a die.
label: Superior Position

name: Target Intel
text: Resolve one of your dice showing indirect damage ([indirect]) as if it were ranged damage ([ranged]).
label: Target Intel

name: Bubble Shield
text:
You may distribute indirect damage ([indirect]) to this support as if it were a character with 3 health.
Discard this support if it has 3 or more damage on it.
label: Bubble Shield

name: Cover Team
text: Action – Exhaust this support to resolve one of your dice showing indirect damage ([indirect]), increasing its value by 1.
label: Cover Team

name: Bamboozle
text: Reroll an opponent's die. If it just rolled a blank ([blank]), take 1 resource from them.
label: Bamboozle

name: Cantina Brawl
text: Deal 1 damage to an opponent's character. Then that opponent may discard a card from their hand to repeat this effect.
label: Cantina Brawl

name: Counter Strike
text: Resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged],[melee], or [indirect]), increasing its value by 2 if an opponent resolved one or more dice showing that same damage symbol during their last turn this round.
label: Counter Strike

name: Dangerous Maneuver
text: Heal 2 damage from one of your characters. Deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself.
label: Dangerous Maneuver

name: Entangle
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove up to 2 dice showing a combined value of 3 or less.
label: Entangle

name: Face-Off
text: Reroll one of your character dice and an opponent's character die (you choose). Then deal 2 damage to each character whose die just rolled the lowest value (both characters if it is a tie).
label: Face-Off

name: Hasty Exit
text: Give control of the battlefield to an opponent to remove a die showing damage ([ranged],[melee], or [indirect]).
label: Hasty Exit

name: Lure
text:
Ambush.
Choose an opponent's character or support and force them to activate it, if able.
label: Lure

name: Quick Draw
text: Play a weapon from your hand on one of your characters (paying its cost). You may activate that character.
label: Quick Draw

name: Vandalize
text: Remove a number of your character dice equal to the cost of a support or upgrade in play to discard it.
label: Vandalize

name: Well-Connected
text: Spot a Yellow character to gain 1 resource. Each opponent may draw a card.
label: Well-Connected

name: Defend
text:
Ambush.
Remove up to 3 dice showing melee damage ([melee]).
label: Defend

name: Dive
text:
Ambush.
Remove up to 3 dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
label: Dive

name: Ice Storm
text: Remove 1 shield from each character.
label: Ice Storm

name: No Cheating
text: Deal damage to an opponent's character equal to the number of additional actions that opponent took during their last turn this round.
label: No Cheating

name: Shelter
text: Remove a die showing indirect damage ([indirect]).
label: Shelter

name: Backup Specialist
text: Action - Exhaust this support to reroll up to 2 of your dice.
label: Backup Specialist

name: Remote Stockpile
text: Action - Exhaust this support to place 1 resource on it or take all resources from it.
label: Remote Stockpile

name: Scrap Heap
text: After you discard one or more cards from an opponent's deck, you may exhaust this support to gain 1 resource.
label: Scrap Heap

name: Bodyguard
text:
Non-unique character only.
Attached character has the Guardian keyword.
label: Bodyguard

name: Quickdraw Holster
text: After you activate attached character, you may reroll any number of their weapon dice.
label: Quickdraw Holster

name: Espionage
text: After setup, discard the top card from each deck.
label: Espionage

name: Fortify
text: After setup, give a character 1 shield.
label: Fortify

name: Preemptive Strike
text: After setup, deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
label: Preemptive Strike

name: Profitable Connection
text: You start the game with 1 additional resource.
label: Profitable Connection

name: Stolen Intel
text: After setup, draw a card.
label: Stolen Intel

name: Taking Ground
text: Add 2 to the value of your roll for the battlefield during setup.
label: Taking Ground

name: Arid Wasteland
subtitle: Geonosis
text: Claim - Force an opponent to lose 1 resource.
label: Arid Wasteland - Geonosis

name: Citadel Landing Zone
subtitle: Scarif
text: Claim - Reroll any number of your dice. Then you may resolve one of your dice.
label: Citadel Landing Zone - Scarif

name: Imperial Palace
subtitle: Coruscant
text: Claim - Look at an opponent's hand and discard a card from it.
label: Imperial Palace - Coruscant

name: Launch Deck
subtitle: Home One
text: Claim - Remove one of your dice to deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to half of the value showing on it, rounded up.
label: Launch Deck - Home One

name: Outer Rim Outpost
subtitle: Nal Hutta
text: Claim - Gain 1 resource and draw a card.
label: Outer Rim Outpost - Nal Hutta

name: Petranaki Arena
subtitle: Geonosis
text: Claim - Deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself to deal 1 unblockable damage to a character.
label: Petranaki Arena - Geonosis

name: Power Generator Trench
subtitle: Death Star I
text: Claim - Turn a die to any side.
label: Power Generator Trench - Death Star I

name: Anakin Skywalker
subtitle: Conflicted Apprentice
text:
You cannot have Darth Vader on your team.
[special] - Discard a hero card from your hand to give a character 2 shields or discard a villain card from your hand to deal 2 damage to a character.
label: Anakin Skywalker - Conflicted Apprentice

name: Lobot
subtitle: Cyborg Aide
text:
While you control the battlefield, this character has the Guardian keyword.
[special] - Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 2.
flavor: "I live by my choices."
label: Lobot - Cyborg Aide

name: Ketsu Onyo
subtitle: Black Sun Operative
text: Before one of your characters is defeated, you may move a weapon from them to this character.
flavor: "Friend. That's a generous term considering what happened."
label: Ketsu Onyo - Black Sun Operative

name: Jawa Scavenger
text: After you activate this character, you may discard one of your supports or upgrades that costs 2 or more from play to gain 1 resource.
flavor: "I can't abide those Jawas. Disgusting creatures!" <cite>C-3PO</cite>
label: Jawa Scavenger

name: Hidden Motive
text: Choose a symbol. Then reroll an opponent's die. If that die just rolled the chosen symbol, remove it.
flavor: "To defeat your enemy, you must know your enemy." <cite>Maul</cite>
label: Hidden Motive

name: Crafted Lightsaber
text: Play only on an exhausted character.
label: Crafted Lightsaber

name: Targeting Computer
text: Turn a support or upgrade die to any side.
flavor: "Stay on target!" <cite>Gold Five</cite>
label: Targeting Computer

name: Fang Fighter
text: Ambush.
flavor: Swift and highly maneuverable, this fighter was designed and flown by the Mandalorian Protectors.
label: Fang Fighter

name: Tinker
text: Turn one of your dice to a side showing a value of 1.
label: Tinker

name: Verpine Sniper Rifle
text: [special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
flavor: This projectile weapon uses magnetic field technology, making its operation nearly silent.
label: Verpine Sniper Rifle

name: Emulate
text: Turn a character die to any side if there are 2 or more copies of that character in play.
label: Emulate

name: Fight Back
text: Remove one of your dice to remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]).
label: Fight Back

name: Resourceful
text: Spot a Gray character and remove one of your dice to gain 1 resource.
label: Resourceful

name: Surprise Attack
text: Resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]), increasing its value by 1.
label: Surprise Attack

name: Supply Pack
text: Action - Exhaust this upgrade to reroll any number of attached character's character or upgrade dice.
label: Supply Pack

name: T-21 Repeating Blaster
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. Then you may reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.
label: T-21 Repeating Blaster

name: Vibrosword
text: Redeploy.
flavor: While heavy and cumbersome, some species could wield vibroswords one-handed.
label: Vibrosword

name: Bespin Wing Guard
text: Action - Exhaust this support and spend 1 resource to force an opponent to choose and discard a card from their hand.
flavor: The Bespin Wing Guard patrolled Cloud City to enforce order.
label: Bespin Wing Guard

name: Dry Fields
subtitle: Atollon
text: Claim - Gain 1 resource if you have no resources.
label: Dry Fields - Atollon

name: Sith Temple
subtitle: Malachor
text: Claim - Remove one of your dice to deal 1 unblockable damage to a character.
label: Sith Temple - Malachor

name: Count Dooku
subtitle: Darth Tyranus
text: After you activate this character, you may turn one of his character dice to a side showing melee damage ([melee]). Turn an opponent's die showing melee damage ([melee]) to any side.
flavor: "I sense great fear in you."
label: Count Dooku - Darth Tyranus

name: Fifth Brother
subtitle: Intimidating Enforcer
text: [special] - Resolve one of your non-ability Blue upgrade dice without removing it from your pool.
flavor: "The kill is mine!"
label: Fifth Brother - Intimidating Enforcer

name: Force Sensitive Outcast
text: While this character has 1 or more damage on her, decrease the cost of the first Blue ability you play on her each round by 1.
label: Force Sensitive Outcast

name: Snoke
subtitle: Supreme Leader
text: Power Action - Deal 1 damage to another one of your characters to resolve one of its character dice showing damage, increasing its value by 2.
flavor: "There has been an awakening. Have you felt it?"
label: Snoke - Supreme Leader

name: Crush Hope
text:
Play only if an opponent has one or more dice showing a blank ([blank]).
Discard any number of cards from your hand to deal that much indirect damage ([indirect]) to that opponent.
label: Crush Hope

name: Dark Ritual
text: Return one of your defeated characters to the game exhausted and place damage on it equal to half of its health, rounded down.
label: Dark Ritual

name: Lack of Faith
text: Spot a Blue character that is 15 or more points to remove all of a character's character dice.
label: Lack of Faith

name: No Escape
text:
Play only if an opponent has no cards in their hand.
Deal 2 damage to one of that opponent's characters.
label: No Escape

name: Power From Pain
text: Spot 2 Blue characters or Snoke to deal 1 damage to one of your characters. Then turn one of that character's character or upgrade dice to any side.
label: Power From Pain

name: Triple Threat
text: Reroll 3 character dice. Then turn one of them to any side.
label: Triple Threat

name: Undermine
text: Remove up to 2 dice showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Undermine

name: Dark Empowerment
text: Action - Exhaust this support and remove one of your dice showing a blank ([blank]) to deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
label: Dark Empowerment

name: Count Dooku's Solar Sailer
text: After you activate this support, you may draw a card.
label: Count Dooku's Solar Sailer

name: Bardottan Sphere
text: [special] - Discard the top card of deck. If that card's cost is an odd number, deal 1 damage to a character.
flavor: "I can feel the power of the pure spirit resonating in this orb." <cite>Mother Talzin</cite>
label: Bardottan Sphere

name: Fifth Brother's Lightsaber
text:
While this upgrade is on Fifth Brother, you can resolve this die showing a modifier as if it were not a modifier.
After you resolve this die, you may deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Fifth Brother's Lightsaber

name: Force Fear
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Remove an opponent's character die unless they deal 2 damage to that character.
label: Force Fear

name: Torment
text: After attached character is dealt damage, you may exhaust this upgrade to gain 1 resource.
flavor: "I'm being torn apart. I want to be free of this pain." <cite>Kylo Ren</cite>
label: Torment

name: Arihnda Pryce
subtitle: Unscrupulous Governor
text: [special] - Turn another of your dice to any side. If you control the battlefield, you may resolve that die, increasing its value by 1.
flavor: "They flight so hard to gain so little."
label: Arihnda Pryce - Unscrupulous Governor

name: Executioner
text: After an opponent's character is defeated, you may roll this die into your pool.
label: Executioner

name: Firmus Piett
subtitle: Ambitious Admiral
text: After you activate this character, turn any number of your vehicle and non-unique character dice to sides showing a value of 1.
flavor: "Intensify forward power!"
label: Firmus Piett - Ambitious Admiral

name: General Grievous
subtitle: Fearsome Cyborg
text: Ignore all play restrictions on weapons played on this character. He can have one additional upgrade. Power Action - If 4 of this character's weapon dice are in your pool, deal 4 damage to a character.
label: General Grievous - Fearsome Cyborg

name: Art of War
text: Spot a Red character to reveal an opponent's hand. For each card just revealed, remove a die showing a value that is equal to that card's cost.
label: Art of War

name: Furious Assault
text: Spot 2 Red characters or General Grievous to roll all weapon dice on one of your characters into your pool.
flavor: "How does it feel to die?" <cite>General Grievous</cite>
label: Furious Assault

name: Machine Replacement
text: Play an upgrade from your hand on a character. Then heal 1 damage from that character.
label: Machine Replacement

name: Opening Volley
text: Play only if this is the first action of this round (no player has taken an action). Deal 3 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
label: Opening Volley

name: Overrun
text:
Play only if you have more support dice in your pool than an opponent has characters in play.
Take control of the battlefield. You may use its claim ability.
label: Overrun

name: Testing Procedure
text: Activate up to 2 of your supports. Then, if any of those support dice just rolled damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), gain 1 resource.
label: Testing Procedure

name: Well-armed
text: Choose a weapon from your hand and play it, decreasing its cost by the number of weapons on one of your characters.
flavor: "I have been trained in your Jedi arts" <cite>General Grievous</cite>
label: Well-armed

name: Blockade
text: After setup, force an opponent to lose 1 resource.
label: Blockade

name: Climate Disruption Array
text: Action - Exhaust this support to deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to each player, starting with you.
label: Climate Disruption Array

name: General Grievous' Wheel Bike
text: Power Action - Spend 1 resource or spot General Grievous to ready this support.
flavor: "I'll enjoy crushing you!" <cite>General Grievous</cite>
label: General Grievous' Wheel Bike

name: Imperial Troop Transport
text: The X on this die is equal to the number of non-unique characters you have in play.
label: Imperial Troop Transport

name: Planetary Bombardment
text: Ambush. After you play this support, you may deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of vehicles you spot.
label: Planetary Bombardment

name: Executioner's Axe
text: After an opponent's character is defeated, you may roll this die into your pool.
label: Executioner's Axe

name: DJ
subtitle: Treacherous Rogue
text: After you remove one or more of an opponent's dice, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to that opponent for each die you just removed.
label: DJ - Treacherous Rogue

name: Jabba The Hutt
subtitle: Renowned Gangster
text: [special] - Deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of your dice showing a special ([special]) (including this die).
flavor: "There will be no bargain."
label: Jabba The Hutt - Renowned Gangster

name: Mandalorian Super Commando
text: Power Action - Play an equipment or weapon from your hand on this character. Then deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Mandalorian Super Commando

name: Sebulba
subtitle: Cutthroat Podracer
text: [special] - Place 1 resource on a support in play or remove 1 resource from a support in play.
flavor: "You wan't walk away from this one, you slave scum!"
label: Sebulba - Cutthroat Podracer

name: By Any Means
text: Remove a die showing a value of 2 or more. Then deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself.
label: By Any Means

name: Cocky
text: Spot a Yellow character to have each player choose and discard 2 cards from their hand, starting with you.
label: Cocky

name: Extreme Hubris
text: Spot 2 Yellow characters or Jabba the Hutt to resolve one of your character dice without removing it from your pool.
label: Extreme Hubris

name: Nefarious Deed
text: Ambush. Move 1 damage from an opponent's card to another card in play (this ignores shields).
label: Nefarious Deed

name: Paid Off
text: Give an opponent 2 of your resources to resolve one of their character or upgrade dice as if it were your own.
label: Paid Off

name: Partners in Crime
text: Resolve any number of your dice showing a disrupt ([disrupt]) as if they where showing indirect damage ([indirect]), or vice versa.
label: Partners in Crime

name: Quarrel
text: Force an opponent to choose to either lose 1 resource or discard a card from their hand.
label: Quarrel

name: Rancorous
text:
Play only if you have one or more character dice showing a blank ([blank]).
Remove a die.
label: Rancorous

name: Sebulba Always Wins
text: Discard a support from play that has 1 or more tokens on it.
flavor: "You're Bantha fodder!" <cite>Sebulba</cite>
label: Sebulba Always Wins

name: Sticky Situation
text: Force an opponent to choose a die. Then remove a different die.
label: Sticky Situation

text: After you deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself, you may deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.
flavor: "I'm a protocol droid, specialized in etiquette, customs, translation and torture, ma'am."
label: 0-0-0

name: Sebulba's Podracer
text:
Ambush.
After you resolve this die, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent or, if you spot Sebulba, deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Sebulba's Podracer

name: Formidable
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage to an opponent's character. If that damage was not blocked, you may move an equipment or weapon from that character to another one of that opponent's characters.
label: Formidable

name: Underhanded Tactics
text: [special] - Deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. You may resolve another one of your dice.
label: Underhanded Tactics

name: Way of the Dark
text: Choose one of your defeated character's dice and roll it into your pool. Set that die aside after it is resolved or removed.
flavor: "Peace is a lie. There is only passion." <cite>The Sith Code</cite>
label: Way of the Dark

name: Ezra Bridger
subtitle: Aspiring Jedi
text: Power Action - If this character has one or more upgrades, draw a card, or 2 cards instead if he has 3 or more upgrades.
flavor: "We can fight him together!"
label: Ezra Bridger - Aspiring Jedi

name: Jedi Sentinel
text:
After setup, give a character 1 shield.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if this character has 3 or more shields.
label: Jedi Sentinel

name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Reluctant Instructor
text: You may resolve the shield ([shield]) sides of this die as if they were melee damage ([melee]). Power Action - Move a Blue ability from this character to another Blue character.
label: Luke Skywalker - Reluctant Instructor

name: Plo Koon
subtitle: Jedi Protector
text: This character has the abilities of each non-unique character you have in play.
flavor: "Not everything is what it seems."
label: Plo Koon - Jedi Protector

name: Fond Memories
text: Choose up to 3 cards in a player's discard pile and place them on the bottom of their deck in the order of your choice. Set this card aside.
label: Fond Memories

name: Loth-Wolf Bond
text: Give up to 2 of your Blue characters 1 shield each. You may activate those characters in the order of your choice.
label: Loth-Wolf Bond

name: Luke's Training
text: Spot 2 Blue characters or Luke Skywalker to play a Blue ability from your hand or discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Luke's Training

name: Pacify
text: Remove a character die. Then give that character 2 shields.
label: Pacify

name: Propel
text: Turn a character die to any side. Turn an upgrade die to any side. Turn a support die to any side.
label: Propel

name: Renewed Purpose
text: Spot a plot to draw 3 cards.
flavor: "A clear path if ever there was one." <cite>Plo Koon</cite>
label: Renewed Purpose

name: Steadfast
text: Move 1 damage from one of your Blue characters to another character, or 2 damage instead if no cards are in your discard pile (this ignores shields).
label: Steadfast

name: Plo Koon's Starfighter
text: After you activate this support, you may turn one of your non-unique character dice to any side. If you spot Plo Koon, you may resolve that die.
label: Plo Koon's Starfighter

name: A99 Aquata Breather
text: Before attached character takes indirect damage ([indirect]), you may exhaust this upgrade to block 1 of that damage.
label: A99 Aquata Breather

name: Ezra Bridger's Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to an opponent's character. If this upgrade is on Ezra Bridger, force that opponent to lose 1 resource.
label: Ezra Bridger's Lightsaber

name: Guardian of the Whills
text: Action - Exhaust this upgrade to move it to one of your characters. If that character is Blue, give it 1 shield. If it is Red, deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
label: Guardian of the Whills

name: Luke Skywalker's Lightning Rod
text: While this upgrade is attached to Luke Skywalker, you may resolve the melee damage ([melee]) sides of this die as if they were shields ([shield]).
label: Luke Skywalker's Lightning Rod

name: There Is No Try
text: Action - Reroll this die. Then you may resolve it, increasing its value by 1. Otherwise, remove it.
flavor: "Do. Or do not." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: There Is No Try

name: Boss Nass
subtitle: Bombastic Ruler
text: After you activate a Gungan, you may deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of its character dice that just rolled a blank ([blank]).
flavor: "Be gone with him!"
label: Boss Nass - Bombastic Ruler

name: Gungan Warrior
flavor: Though some regarded them as primitive, the amphibious Gungans were a technologically advanced species from the planet Naboo.
label: Gungan Warrior

name: Leia Organa
subtitle: Heart of the Resistance
text: Power Action - Remove one of your character dice to discard cards from the top of a deck equal to the value showing on that die.
label: Leia Organa - Heart of the Resistance

name: Rex
subtitle: Clone Captain
text: Before you activate this character, you may spend 1 resource or spot a Clone Trooper to take control of the battlefield.
flavor: "In my book, experience outranks everything."
label: Rex - Clone Captain

name: Blaze of Glory
text: Activate one of your characters. Then remove any number of an opponent's dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) and deal damage to that character equal to the combined value of the removed dice.
label: Blaze of Glory

name: Desperate Hour
text:
Play only if the combined remaining health of your characters is 3 or less.
Ready a character.
label: Desperate Hour

name: First Aid
text: Heal 2 damage from a Red character, or 4 damage instead if it is the first round of the game.
label: First Aid

name: Gungan Offensive
text: Turn up to 3 of your Gungan or artillery dice to sides showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).
label: Gungan Offensive

name: Motivate
text: Spot 2 Red characters or Leia Organa to resolve one of your character dice, increasing its value by 1.
label: Motivate

name: Reposition
text: Force an opponent to turn a die to any side. Then you turn a different die to any side.
label: Reposition

name: Long-Term Plan
text: Action - Exhaust this plot to place 1 resource on it or resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by the number of resources on this plot.
label: Long-Term Plan

name: Gungan Catapult
text: After you activate a Gungan, you may reroll this die.
label: Gungan Catapult

name: Resistance Crait Speeder
text: Before you resolve this die, if this support has no damage, you may place 1 damage on this support to increase its value by 1.
label: Resistance Crait Speeder

name: Suppressive Fire
text: After a character is activated, you may spend 1 resource and discard this support from play to remove one of its character dice.
label: Suppressive Fire

name: Electropole
text: Before attached character would be defeated, you may move this upgrade to a Gungan (return this die to this card).
label: Electropole

name: Inspiring Presence
text:
Unique character only.
Your other characters have the Guardian keyword.
label: Inspiring Presence

name: Rex's Blaster Pistol
text:
While this upgrade is on Rex, your copies of it are non-unique.
After you activate attached character, if you control the battlefield, you may activate one of your characters.
label: Rex's Blaster Pistol

name: Anakin Skywalker
subtitle: Podracing Prodigy
text: After you activate this character, you may turn one of your droid or podracer dice to any side.
flavor: "I've built a racer. It's the fastest ever!"
label: Anakin Skywalker - Podracing Prodigy

name: Bo-Katan Kryze
subtitle: Deathwatch Lieutenant
text:
You can include Yellow villain upgrades in your deck.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if this character has 1 or more villain upgrades.
flavor: "You ever use one of these before?"
label: Bo-Katan Kryze - Deathwatch Lieutenant

name: Cassian Andor
subtitle: Rebellion Operative
text: After you resolve this die, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent or discard the top card of a deck.
flavor: "I've been in this fight since I was six years old."
label: Cassian Andor - Rebellion Operative

name: Trusted Informant
text: After you activate this character, you may look at an opponent's hand.
label: Trusted Informant

name: Clandestine Operation
text: Spot 2 Yellow characters or Cassian Andor to resolve any number of your dice showing the same symbol. Then discard cards from the top of a deck equal to the number of dice you just resolved.
label: Clandestine Operation

name: Closing the Deal
text: Gain 5 resources. You must pass all of your future turns this round.
label: Closing the Deal

name: Defensive Racing
text: Play only if one or more of your vehicle dice were removed during an opponent's last turn this round. Spot a Yellow character to roll one of those removed dice into your pool.
label: Defensive Racing

name: Dumb Luck
text: Spot a Yellow character or a Gungan to reroll up to 5 of your dice. Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of dice that just rolled a blank ([blank]).
label: Dumb Luck

name: Mechanical Insight
text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck for a droid or podracer, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Place the rest on the bottom of your deck in the order of your choice.
label: Mechanical Insight

name: Narrow Escape
text:
Play only if you have no other cards in your hand.
Remove a die.
label: Narrow Escape

name: Rigged Detonation
text:
Play only if an opponent controls the battlefield.
Deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to that opponent equal to the number of resources they have, to a maximum of 5.
label: Rigged Detonation

name: Righteous Cause
text: Ambush. Move 1 damage from one of your cards to another one of your cards in play of the same type (this ignores shields).
label: Righteous Cause

name: Scoping the Target
text: If you have 5 or more different symbols showing on your dice, deal 2 damage to a character or, if you have 10 or more different symbols showing on your dice, defeat a character.
label: Scoping the Target

name: Shootout
text: Turn up to 3 of an opponent's dice to sides showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then turn an equal number of your dice to sides showing damage.
label: Shootout

name: Anakin Skywalker's Podracer
text:
Ambush.
After you resolve this die, you may discard the top card of a deck or, if you spot Anakin Skywalker, discard a random card from an opponent's hand.
label: Anakin Skywalker's Podracer

name: N-1 Starfighter
text: [special] - Ready or discard an exhausted vehicle that is not a copy of this support.
flavor: "The N-1 Starfighter represents the pinnacle in Naboo technology." <cite>Captain Quarsh Panaka</cite>
label: N-1 Starfighter

name: CR-2 Heavy Blaster
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 4 damage instead if an opponent has no dice in their pool.
label: CR-2 Heavy Blaster

name: Stealthy
text: Attached character has the trooper subtype. [special] - Discard cards from the top of a deck equal to the value showing on one of your character dice.
label: Stealthy

name: Way of the Light
text: Remove a non-hero die.
label: Way of the Light

name: Dex's Diner
text: Action - Exhaust this support and spend 1 resource to heal 1 damage from a character, or 2 damage instead if there is 6 or more damage on that character.
flavor: The best food this side of the Senate District!
label: Dex's Diner

name: Become One
text: Remove one of your Blue dice. Then resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by the value showing on the die you just removed.
label: Become One

name: Beguile
text: Reroll an opponent's die. Then turn one of their dice to any side. Then remove one of their dice.
label: Beguile

name: Control
text: Turn all dice to sides of your choice.
flavor: "I have brought peace, freedom, justice, and security to my new empire." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
label: Control

name: Division in the Force
text: Resolve one of your Blue dice. Then remove a die showing the same value as the die you just resolved.
label: Division in the Force

name: Flames of the Past
text: Discard a card from play if there is a copy of that card in any discard pile.
label: Flames of the Past

name: Peace and Quiet
text: Turn a die to a side showing a value of 0 <em>(blanks and specials have a value of 0)<em>.
label: Peace and Quiet

name: Turn the Tide
text: Move all shields from an opponent's character to one of your characters.
label: Turn the Tide

name: Built to Last
text:
Each of your unique upgrades has the Redeploy keyword.
After you play a unique upgrade, you may exhaust this plot to gain 1 resource.
label: Built to Last

name: Honed Skills
text: Each of your characters can have one additional upgrade.
label: Honed Skills

name: Dagger of Mortis
text:
Redeploy.
Before you resolve this die showing melee damage ([melee]), you may move 1 shield from a Blue character to attached character.
label: Dagger of Mortis

name: Force Jump
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Turn a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) to a side showing a blank ([blank]). Reroll this die instead of removing it.
label: Force Jump

name: Way of the Force
text: Play only if you spot a Blue character. Attached character is elite (place a second copy of its die on it).
label: Way of the Force

name: Change of Fate
text: Choose any number of dice. Force an opponent to turn each of those dice to sides of their choice.
label: Change of Fate

name: Glancing Shot
text: Resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), decreasing its value by 1. Then remove a die.
label: Glancing Shot

name: Grand Entrance
text: Activate one of your characters. Reroll any number of its character and upgrade dice. Then reroll any number of its character and upgrade dice.
label: Grand Entrance

name: Hostile Takeover
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Choose a symbol showing on one of your dice. Then resolve an opponent's die showing that symbol as if it were your die.
label: Hostile Takeover

name: Overload
text: Place 1 damage on a support in play. Then you may discard that support if it has damage on it equal to or more than its cost.
label: Overload

name: Reconstruct
text: Add a support from your discard pile to your hand.
label: Reconstruct

name: Take the Fight to Them
text: Resolve any number of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) in the order of your choice.
label: Take the Fight to Them

name: Home Turf Advantage
text:
Bring 2 battlefields to the game.
During setup, if your battlefield would be chosen for the game, you choose one of your 2 battlefields instead. Set the other one aside.
label: Home Turf Advantage

name: Ammo Reserves
text: After you play this support, place 3 damage on it. Action - Exhaust this support and remove 1 damage from it to deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
label: Ammo Reserves

name: ARC-170 Starfighter
text: Before this support is discarded from play, you may return it to its owner's hand.
flavor: This Aggressive ReConnaissance-170 starfighter was both armed for battle and equipped for deep-space travel.
label: ARC-170 Starfighter

name: Hailfire Droid Tank
text: After you play a vehicle (including this support), you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. After you play a droid (including this support), you may activate it.
label: Hailfire Droid Tank

name: Weapon Master
text: Action - Remove one of attached character's character or upgrade dice to turn one of its weapon dice to any side.
label: Weapon Master

name: Friend or Foe
text: Reroll a character die. Then, if it just rolled damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), deal 1 damage to that character. Otherwise, give it 1 shield.
label: Friend or Foe

name: In The Crosshairs
text:
Ambush.
Choose a symbol. Then remove any number of dice showing that symbol.
label: In The Crosshairs

name: Podracer Betting
text: Choose a number. Then reroll one of your vehicle dice. If that die just rolled a value equal to the number you chose, gain 2 resources, or 3 resources instead if it was a podracer die.
label: Podracer Betting

name: Reprogram
text: Choose a droid from your hand and play it, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Reprogram

name: Risky Move
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove a die. The next card an opponent plays this round has the Ambush keyword.
label: Risky Move

name: Start Your Engines!
text: Search your deck for a podracer, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Start Your Engines!

name: Calling in Favors
text: Before you play an event that costs 3 or more, you may exhaust this plot to decrease its cost by 1, or by 2 instead if you have exactly one character in play.
label: Calling in Favors

name: Prized Goods
text: Action - Exhaust this support and one of your characters to place 3 resources on this support or to take all resources from it.
label: Prized Goods

name: Streetwise
text: Before you play a Yellow event, you may exhaust this support to decrease its cost by 1.
label: Streetwise

name: XS Stock Light Freighter
text:
Ambush.
[special] - Place 2 resources on this support or take all resources from it. You may take one additional action.
label: XS Stock Light Freighter

name: Darksaber
text:
Redeploy.
Before you resolve this die, increase its value by 1 if attached character is 15 or more points, or by 2 instead if attached character is 20 or more points.
label: Darksaber

name: Mandalorian Vambraces
text: Action - Return this upgrade from play to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Try them on, Grappling line, paralyzing darts, repulsor. All designed to combat the abilities of the Jedi". <cite>Fenn Rau</cite>
label: Mandalorian Vambraces

name: Respected Businessman
text: After you activate attached character, you may gain 1 resource.
flavor: "As my sweet mother always said, 'Son, if one hostage is good, two is better. And three, well, that's good business.'" <cite>Hondo Ohnaka</cite>
label: Respected Businessman

name: V-1 Thermal Detonator
text: [special] - Discard this upgrade from play to deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters.
label: V-1 Thermal Detonator

name: Extract
text: Choose up to 3 cards in a discard pile and set them aside.
label: Extract

name: Free Fall
text:
Ambush.
Force an opponent to remove one of their dice.
label: Free Fall

name: Made to Suffer
text: Each player discards cards from the top of their deck equal to the number of their dice showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Made to Suffer

name: Nature's Charm
text: Reroll up to 2 dice (yours and/or an opponent's).
label: Nature's Charm

name: Quell
text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing indirect damage ([indirect]).
label: Quell

name: Under Attack
text: Remove any number of an opponent's dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself equal to the combined value showing on those dice.
label: Under Attack

name: Lotho Minor Junkers
text: [special] - Set aside a droid, equipment, vehicle, or weapon in your discard pile to gain 2 resources.
label: Lotho Minor Junkers

name: Podracer
text:
Ambush.
After this die rolls a blank ([blank]), return this support from play to its owner's hand.
label: Podracer

name: Macrobinoculars
text: [special] - Look at an opponent's hand. Give a character 1 shield.
label: Macrobinoculars

name: Boonta Eve Classic
text: After you resolve one of your podracer dice, you may place 1 resource on that podracer. If there are 4 or more resources on it, set each copy of this plot aside and gain 4 resources.
label: Boonta Eve Classic

name: Arena of Death
subtitle: Nar Shaddaa
text: Claim - Deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of defeated characters you have, to a maximum of 3.
label: Arena of Death - Nar Shaddaa

name: Bendu's Lair
subtitle: Atollon
text: Power Action - Roll this die into your pool. After you take control of this battlefield, remove its die.
label: Bendu's Lair - Atollon

name: Comm Tower
subtitle: Scarif
text: Claim - Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1 if you spot a plot.
label: Comm Tower - Scarif

name: Mos Espa Arena
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Claim - Force an opponent to choose to either lose 1 resource or have you gain 1 resource. Spot a podracer to force them to do both instead.
label: Mos Espa Arena - Tatooine

name: Rift Valley
subtitle: Dathomir
text: Claim - Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card's cost is an odd number, remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.
label: Rift Valley - Dathomir

name: Darth Vader
subtitle: Terror To Behold
text: Power Action - If one or more of this character's character dice were removed during an opponent's last turn this round, discard a card from your hand to roll those dice into your pool.
flavor: "There is no escape".
label: Darth Vader - Terror To Behold

name: Luce
subtitle: Callous Nightsister
text: Action - Discard a card from your hand that costs an odd number to reroll a die (yours or an opponent's).
flavor: "Doom is upon us."
label: Luce - Callous Nightsister

name: Nightbrother
text: After this die is rerolled by a card effect, you may discard the top 2 cards of your deck to resolve it, increasing its value by 1.
flavor: "Pure warriors." <cite>Darth Maul</cite>
label: Nightbrother

name: Savage Opress
subtitle: Reckless Warrior
text: You must activate this character as your first action each round, if able, unless you spot Maul.
flavor: "Brother, I am an unworthy apprentice. I'm not like you. I never was."
label: Savage Opress - Reckless Warrior

name: Burst Of Lightning
text: Remove all shields from a character. For each shield just removed, you may remove a die.
flavor: "I see the queen has given you a long leash." <cite>Count Dooku</cite>
label: Burst Of Lightning

name: Endow
text: Play any number of Blue upgrades from your hand on one of your Blue characters (paying each of their costs). Then roll each of those upgrades' dice into your pool.
label: Endow

name: Fear and Dead Men
text: Resolve one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]) for free against each of an opponent's characters.
flavor: "All I am surrounded by is fear. And dead men." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
label: Fear and Dead Men

name: I Am The Senate
text:
Play only if you have exactly one character in play.
For each die in your pool, you may remove a die showing the same value as that die.
label: I Am The Senate

name: Let The Hate Flow
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a blank ([blank]).
Turn a die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Let The Hate Flow

name: Darth Vader's Meditation Chamber
text: Action - Exhaust this support to heal 1 damage from a Blue character and place 1 card from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck. Then spot Darth Vader to draw a card.
label: Darth Vader's Meditation Chamber

name: Galactic Deception
text:
Your opponents cannot give shields to characters.
After the action phase ends, discard this support from play.
label: Galactic Deception

name: Stifle
text: Before the effects of an opponent's event would be resolved, discard this support from play to cancel those effects instead.
flavor: "The senate has put a bounty on your horned little head." <cite>Asajj Ventress</cite>
label: Stifle

name: Vader's Fist
text: After you play this support, you may roll this die into your pool. Power Action - Roll this die into your pool. Spot Darth Vader to turn this die to any side.
label: Vader's Fist

name: Bloodlust
text: After you resolve one of attached character's character dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]), you may deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Bloodlust

name: Chain Sickle
text: After a character takes damage from this die, reroll any number of that character's character and upgrade dice.
label: Chain Sickle

name: Darth Vader's Lightsaber
text: After you resolve this die, you may spend 1 resource to roll one of attached character's character dice into your pool. Then, if this upgrade is on Darth Vader, deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Darth Vader's Lightsaber

name: Energy Bow
text: After one of your card effects rerolls one or more character dice, you may reroll this die.
flavor: "We don't like strangers." <cite>Nightsister</cite>
label: Energy Bow

name: Iden Versio
subtitle: Inferno Squad Commander
text: While one or more of this character's character dice are in your pool, your opponents cannot take additional actions.
flavor: "Today, the Rebellion dies."
label: Iden Versio - Inferno Squad Commander

name: "Mauler" Mithel
subtitle: Vader's Wingman
text: After you activate this character, you may remove one of your vehicle dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) to place that damage on a vehicle in play. Then discard that vehicle if it has damage on it equal to or more than its cost.
label: "Mauler" Mithel - Vader's Wingman

name: Super Battle Droid
text: Power Action - Turn one of your droid character dice to a side showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).
flavor: Due to the higher costs, super battle droids where often outnumbered on the battlefield by B1 battle droids 100 to 1.
label: Super Battle Droid

name: Wullf Yularen
subtitle: ISB Colonel
text: Power Action - Look at a player's hand and choose a card from it. Discard that card if there is a copy of it in that player's discard pile.
flavor: "It is said that no traitor escapes the eye of Yularen for long." <cite>Yogar Lyste</cite>
label: Wullf Yularen - ISB Colonel

name: Browbeat
text:
Play only if you have more dice in your pool than an opponent has in their pool.
Remove one of that opponent's dice.
flavor: "Your lightsabers will make a fine addition to my collection." <cite>General Grievous</cite>
label: Browbeat

name: Commence Primary Ignition
text: Activate one of your Red supports. Then you may resolve any number of its support and mod dice in the order of your choice, without removing them from your pool.
label: Commence Primary Ignition

name: Drop 'Em
text: Spot 2 Red characters to choose a weapon on up to 2 different characters. Return those weapons to their owner's hands.
flavor: "I sense a trap." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
label: Drop 'Em

name: Hatching A Plan
text: Turn a die to a side showing a discard ([discard]).
flavor: "Don't worry about Higher Skies. Whatever is there, we'll find it." <cite>Wullf Yularen</cite>
label: Hatching A Plan

name: Imposing Presence
text: Remove an opponent's die if they have 3 or fewer cards in hand or remove 2 of an opponent's dice if they have no cards in hand.
label: Imposing Presence

name: In Tandem
text: Spot a Red character to turn any number of your vehicle dice that have the same title to the sides of your choice.
label: In Tandem

name: Questioned Loyalty
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a discard ([discard]).
Name a card. Then look at an opponent's hand and discard each copy of the named card from it.
label: Questioned Loyalty
