name: Reach The Stars
text:
Ambush.
Reroll up to 2 dice. Then, if you are fighting on your battlefield, reroll up to 2 dice.
label: Reach The Stars

name: Black Two
text: While this die is showing ranged damage ([ranged]), increase its value by 1 if you spot "Mauler" Mithel.
flavor: "We'll have to destroy them ship to ship." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
label: Black Two

name: TIE Fighter
text:
Ambush.
You may include up to 4 copies of this support in your deck.
After you play this support, search your deck for a copy of it, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: TIE Fighter

name: Umbaran Hover Tank
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters, or 3 damage instead if one or more mods are on this support.
label: Umbaran Hover Tank

name: Vigilance
text:
Your opponents cannot turn dice.
After the action phase ends, discard this support from play.
flavor: "I still remember my last orders. The day the real war began." <cite>Iden Versio</cite>
label: Vigilance

name: Inferno Squad ID10 Seeker Droid
text: [special] - Look at an opponent's hand and discard a card from it. That opponent may take one additional action during their next turn this round.
flavor: "VZ-626." <cite>Iden Versio</cite>
label: Inferno Squad ID10 Seeker Droid

name: Dryden Vos
subtitle: Ruthless Crime Lord
text: [special] - Shuffle your deck and look at the top card of it. You may play that card for free.
flavor: Underneath his mask of sophistication resided a brutality that manifested through the Crimson Dawn.
label: Dryden Vos - Ruthless Crime Lord

name: Tobias Beckett
subtitle: Thief For Hire
text: Power Action - Each player gains 1 resource. [special] - Take 1 resource from an opponent. If that opponent has no resources, gain 1 resource.
flavor: "You in?"
label: Tobias Beckett - Thief For Hire

name: Val
subtitle: Headstrong Renegade
text: [special] - Take 1 resource from an opponent. If that opponent has no resources, deal 2 damage to one of their characters.
label: Val - Headstrong Renegade

name: Act Of Cruelty
text: Deal 1 unblockable damage to each of an opponent's damaged characters. Then discard a random card from that opponent's hand for each defeated character they have.
label: Act Of Cruelty

name: Cunning Ruse
text: Reroll a character die. Then deal damage to that character equal to the value showing on that die.
flavor: "Calm down, Artoo! It's just…" <cite>Luke Skywalker</cite>
label: Cunning Ruse

name: Exploit
text:
Play only if an opponent has no resources.
Remove one of that opponent's dice.
label: Exploit

name: First Claim
text: Spot a Yellow character to gain resources equal to the cost of a support or an upgrade in play.
flavor: "I saw this ship first, so I get first claim on anything in it!" <cite>Azmorigan</cite>
label: First Claim

name: Heated Confrontation
text:
Ambush.
Resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then force an opponent to resolve one of their dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).
label: Heated Confrontation

name: In a Bind
text:
Force an opponent to choose 2
  • They remove 2 of their dice.
  • They discard 2 cards from their hand.
  • You deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to them.
label: In a Bind

name: Shakedown
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a disrupt ([disrupt]).
Remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.
label: Shakedown

name: Sidestep
text: Exhaust a support that costs 2 or less. Then you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself to exhaust another support that costs 2 or less.
label: Sidestep

name: Wanton Destruction
text: For each character die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), deal damage equal to its value to its matching character.
label: Wanton Destruction

name: Déjà Vu
text: After you play an event, you may exhaust this support to play that event from your discard pile (paying its cost). You cannot take more than one additional action this turn.
label: Déjà Vu

name: Firespray-31
text: Power Action - Play a mod from your hand on this support, if able, decreasing its cost by 2.
label: Firespray-31

name: Relentless
text:
Your opponents cannot heal characters.
After the action phase ends, discard this support from play.
label: Relentless

name: Donderbus Blaster Pistol
text:
Yellow character only. Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade, you may activate attached character.
flavor: A weapon of choice for the Kanjiklub.
label: Donderbus Blaster Pistol

name: Grappling Boa
text: After a character takes damage from this dice, you may remove one of that character's character dice.
flavor: The bounty hunter Latts Razzi wielded the triple scaled rows of a grappling boa.
label: Grappling Boa

name: Tobias Beckett's Rifle
text:
After you play this upgrade on Tobias Beckett, you may force an opponent to lose 1 resource.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to an opponent's character, or 3 damage instead if that opponent has no resources.
label: Tobias Beckett's Rifle

name: Vow Of Vengeance
text: Increase the value of each of attached character's character dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) by 1 for each defeated character you have.
label: Vow Of Vengeance

name: Retribution
text:
Include only if you have a character that is 20 or more points on your team.
After one or more of your character dice are removed by an opponent, you may deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Retribution

name: Barriss Offee
subtitle: Studious Padawan
text: After another character's character die is turned, you may turn one of this character's character dice to a side showing the same symbol as that die.
flavor: "It pays for one to be prepared." <cite>Luminara Unduli</cite>
label: Barriss Offee - Studious Padawan

name: Force Mystic
text: Each Blue ability on this character has Redeploy. [special] - Roll a die on a Blue ability on this character into your pool.
label: Force Mystic

name: Kit Fisto
subtitle: Shii-cho Master
text: Before this character takes damage, you may remove one of his character or upgrade dice showing melee damage ([melee]) to block damage equal to the value showing on that die.
flavor: "Revenge is not the Jedi way."
label: Kit Fisto - Shii-cho Master

name: Qui-Gon Jinn
subtitle: Defiant Jedi Master
text:
While this character has 2 or more shields, increase the value of his character dice by 1.
While this character has 3 or more shields, increase the value of his upgrade dice by 1.
label: Qui-Gon Jinn - Defiant Jedi Master

name: Bewilder
text: Spot a Blue character to reroll an opponent's character die. Then discard cards from the top of that opponent's deck equal to the value showing on that die.
label: Bewilder

name: Finishing Strike
text: Resolve one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]) as unblockable. Then, if the character just dealt damage has 1 remaining health, defeat it.
label: Finishing Strike

name: Gathering Intelligence
text: Look at each opponent's hand. Look at the top card of each deck.
label: Gathering Intelligence

name: Hold Off
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a shield ([shield]).
Remove a die showing melee damage ([melee]) or give a character 1 shield.
label: Hold Off

name: Insight
text: Draw 2 cards. Place 2 cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order.
label: Insight

name: Into Exile
text:
Play only if you spot 2 ready characters.
Exhaust one of your characters. Then, until the end of the action phase, block all non-indirect damage dealt to that character by your opponents. Set this event aside.
label: Into Exile

name: Repulse
text: Choose 2 dice that are different colors. Then remove those dice.
label: Repulse

name: Safeguard
text: Give a character shields equal to the number of upgrades on one of your characters.
label: Safeguard

name: Immutability
text:
Each of your upgrades has Redeploy.
After the action phase ends, discard this support from play.
label: Immutability

name: Counterstroke
text:
Blue character only.
After an opponent deals damage to attached character, you may resolve this die, increasing its value by 1.
label: Counterstroke

name: Lightsaber Training Staff
flavor: Before younglings are taught to construct a lightsaber, the must first prove themselves against a remote with only a wooden staff.
label: Lightsaber Training Staff

name: Pillio Star Compass
text: Power Action - Turn one of your dice to a side matching the symbol and value showing on this die.
label: Pillio Star Compass

name: Qui-Gon Jinn's Lightsaber
text: After 1 or more shields are removed from attached character, you may exhaust this upgrade to give that character 1 shield. Then, if this upgrade is on Qui-Gon Jinn, you may draw a card.
label: Qui-Gon Jinn's Lightsaber

name: Biggs Darklighter
subtitle: Rebellion Ace
text: After you activate this character, you may activate one of your vehicle supports. Then reroll any number of that vehicle's support and mod dice.
flavor: "They'll never stop us!"
label: Biggs Darklighter - Rebellion Ace

name: Clone Commander Cody
subtitle: Loyal Strategist
text:
While building your team, the point value of each Clone Trooper ([LEG]38) is decreased by 1.
[special] - Take control of the battlefield and use its claim ability or power action, even if it has been used this round.
label: Clone Commander Cody - Loyal Strategist

name: Jyn Erso
subtitle: Daring Infiltrator
text: After you activate this character, you may look at the top 3 cards of an opponent's deck, and rearrange them in any order. You may discard the top card of that deck.
flavor: "Rebellions are built on hope."
label: Jyn Erso - Daring Infiltrator

name: Rebel Engineer
text: After you activate this character, you may look at the top 4 cards of your deck, reveal a mod from among them, and add it to your hand. Place the rest of those cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.
label: Rebel Engineer

name: Aerial Advantage
text: Play only if you control the battlefield. Spot a Red character to turn a die to any side. You may spot a vehicle to remove a die. You may spot a mod to turn a die to any side or remove a die.
label: Aerial Advantage

name: Attack of The Clones
text: Ready any number of your non-unique characters that have the same title.
flavor: "I have to admit that without the clones it would not have been a victory." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
label: Attack of The Clones

name: Dogfight
text: Exhaust an opponent's vehicle. Then you may ready a vehicle.
label: Dogfight

name: Evacuate
text: Defeat one of your non-unique characters. After the action phase ends, return that character to play.
label: Evacuate

name: Inflame
text:
Ambush.
Turn an opponent's die to a side showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).
label: Inflame

name: Outgun
text: Spot any number of mods on your vehicles and spend that many resources to remove that many dice.
label: Outgun

name: Turn The Tables
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a focus ([focus]).
Remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then turn up to 2 of your dice to sides showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).
label: Turn The Tables

name: Armed Escort
text:
Each of your characters has Guardian.
After the action phase ends, discard this support from play.
label: Armed Escort

name: BB-8
text: Action - Spot a vehicle support to attach this card to it as a mod upgrade (discard all upgrades on this card). If that vehicle is Black One, ready it. Use this action only once per game.
label: BB-8

name: Black One
text: Power Action - Spot Poe Dameron to turn this die to any side. [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. If a droid is attached to this support, reroll this die instead of removing it.
label: Black One

name: X-Wing
text:
You can include up to 4 copies of this support in your deck.
The X on this die is equal to the number of copies of this support you have in play.
label: X-Wing

name: Jyn Erso's Blaster
text:
Redeploy.
After you activate attached character, you may reroll this die or discard the top card of a deck. If this upgrade is on Jyn Erso, reroll any number of her character dice.
label: Jyn Erso's Blaster

name: R2 Astromech
text: Modify vehicle support. Action - Exhaust this upgrade and spend 2 resources to ready attached vehicle.
label: R2 Astromech

name: Lando Calrissian
subtitle: Smooth and Sophisticated
text: Power Action - Play a Yellow vehicle from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1 and giving it Ambush. If that vehicle is the Millennium Falcon, you may activate it.
flavor: "Everything you heard about me is true."
label: Lando Calrissian - Smooth and Sophisticated

name: Leia Organa
subtitle: Boushh
text:
You can include up to 5 Yellow villain cards in your deck.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters unless they give you 1 resource, or 2 resources instead if you spot a villain card.
label: Leia Organa - Boushh

name: L3-37
subtitle: Droid Revolutionary
text: Before this character is defeated, spot a vehicle support to attach this card to it as a 0 cost mod upgrade. If that vehicle is the Millennium Falcon, ready it. If this card would leave play as an upgrade, set it aside instead.
label: L3-37 - Droid Revolutionary

name: A Good Investment
text: Play only if you have one or more dice showing a resource ([resource]). Gain 4 resources, or 5 resources instead if you took 2 or more actions this turn (not this round).
label: A Good Investment

name: Aid From Above
text:
Force an opponent to choose 2:
• You draw 2 cards.
• You gain 2 resources.
• You take 2 additional actions.
label: Aid From Above

name: Daring Gambit
text: Reroll all of your dice. Then resolve one of your Yellow dice, increasing its value by the number of other dice in your pool. Remove all of your dice.
label: Daring Gambit

name: Drop In
text: Activate one of your characters or supports. If you are fighting on your battlefield, this event has Ambush.
flavor: "We do it right, they won't even know we're there. Not until it's too late." <cite>Lando Calrissian</cite>
label: Drop In

name: Hijack
text: Spot a Yellow character to take control of an opponent's vehicle support that has no mods and ready it (return its die to its card). After the action phase ends, return that vehicle to its owner's control.
label: Hijack

name: Karabast!
text:
Play only if an opponent has one or more dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).
Move up to 3 damage from one of your characters to another one of your characters.
label: Karabast!

name: Leverage
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).
Remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).
label: Leverage

name: Reluctance
text:
Ambush.
Choose an opponent. That opponent cannot resolve more than one die during their next turn this round.
label: Reluctance

name: Slice And Dice
text: Remove 2 of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]). Then deal unblockable damage equal to the combined value showing on those dice to any number of characters, distributed as you wish.
label: Slice And Dice

name: Through The Pass
text: Activate one of your characters or supports. Then you may spend resources equal to the number of dice you just rolled to ready that character or support.
label: Through The Pass

name: Escape Craft
text: Power Action - Spot the Millennium Falcon to attach this card to it as a mod upgrade (discard all upgrades on this card). Action - If this card is an upgrade, it becomes a support (do not ready it).
label: Escape Craft

name: Millennium Falcon
text: After you play this support, you may search your deck or discard pile for Escape Craft ([AtG]102) and attach it to this support as a mod upgrade (without paying its cost). If you searched your deck, shuffle it.
label: Millennium Falcon

name: On The Mark
text:
You may resolve the indirect damage ([indirect]) sides of your dice as ranged damage ([ranged]).
After the action phase ends, discard this support from play.
label: On The Mark

name: Decoy
text:
Yellow character only.
Before a character would be dealt damage, you may exhaust this upgrade to deal that damage to attached character instead.
label: Decoy

name: Energy Pike
text: [special] - Deal damage to a character equal to the number of resources you have, to a maximum of 3.
label: Energy Pike

name: Token Of Affection
text: After you play a card that has Ambush, you may move this upgrade to another one of your characters (return this die to its card).
label: Token Of Affection

name: At Odds
text: Remove a die showing a value that is an odd number. You may place this event on the bottom of your deck.
label: At Odds

name: Common Cause
text: Spot any number of Blue characters to draw that many cards.
label: Common Cause

name: Conflicted
text: Reroll one of your Blue character dice. Then, if that die just rolled damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), deal 2 damage to a character. Otherwise, give a character 2 shields.
label: Conflicted

name: Deadly Advance
text: Count the number of exhausted characters your opponents have. Turn up to that many of your dice to sides showing melee damage ([melee]).
label: Deadly Advance

name: No Questions Asked
text: Spot a Blue character and give an opponent up to 3 of your resources to remove that many dice. If you are fighting on your battlefield, draw that many cards.
label: No Questions Asked

name: Relinquish
text:
Ambush.
Return an upgrade you own in play to your hand.
label: Relinquish

name: You Were My Friend
text: Turn a character die to any side. If you have more Blue cards in play than an opponent, you may remove that die.
label: You Were My Friend

name: Bitter Rivalry
text: After setup, choose an opponent. That opponent deals 2 unblockable damage to one of your characters and draws a card.
flavor: "Look what has become of you. A rat in the desert." <cite>Maul</cite>
label: Bitter Rivalry

name: Foresight
text: Action - Exhaust this support to look at the top card of a deck. You may place that card on the bottom of that deck.
flavor: "Sense the future, once all Jedi could." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: Foresight

name: Nexus Of Power
text: After you activate this support, you may turn this die to any side.
flavor: "It binds the galaxy together." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
label: Nexus Of Power

name: Force Lift
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character or return a support in play that costs 3 or less to its owner's hand.
label: Force Lift

name: Shatterpoint
text: Blue character only. [special] - Discard an equipment or a weapon from play that costs equal to or less than the number of Blue ability dice in your pool (including this die).
label: Shatterpoint

name: Treasured Lightsaber
text:
After you play this upgrade, you may draw a card.
[special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character, or 3 unblockable damage instead if you have 5 or more cards in your hand.
label: Treasured Lightsaber

name: Attack Formation
text: Spot a Red character to resolve one of your non-character dice, increasing its value by the number of copies of that die in your pool (including that die).
label: Attack Formation

name: Barrel Roll
text: Activate one of your supports. Reroll any number of its support and mod dice. Then reroll any number of its support and mod dice.
label: Barrel Roll

name: Deployment
text: Activate any number of your supports and non-unique characters.
flavor: "Squadron up. Target Eadu." <cite>General Draven</cite>
label: Deployment

name: Fleet Command
text: Spot any number of Red characters to reroll that many dice (yours and/or an opponent's).
flavor: "Green Group, stick close to holding sector MV-7." <cite>Admiral Ackbar</cite>
label: Fleet Command

name: Intense Fire
text: Resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), increasing its value by 1, or by 2 instead if you have more Red cards in play than an opponent.
label: Intense Fire

name: Revised Order
text: Turn a die to a side that has a value 1 higher than the value showing on it. If you control the battlefield, return this event to your hand.
label: Revised Order

name: Snuff Out
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Remove all dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).
label: Snuff Out

name: Transfer
text: Move a mod on one of your vehicle to another one of your vehicle supports.
label: Transfer

name: Armored Reinforcement
text: Action - Set this plot aside to search your deck or discard pile for a Red vehicle support and play it, decreasing its cost by 1. If you search your deck, shuffle it.
label: Armored Reinforcement

name: Senate Chamber
text: Power Action - Remove one of your dice to turn a die to any side.
flavor: Lined with 1,024 repulsorpods, the cavernous Senate Chamber was the meeting hall for the Galactic Senate.
label: Senate Chamber

name: Dorsal Turret
text: Modify vehicle support. After you play this upgrade, you may roll this die into your pool.
label: Dorsal Turret

name: Handheld L-S1 Cannon
text: Attached character's upgrade limit is decreased by 1.
flavor: The Alliance made sure to find a use for every weapon they could, from stun batons to repurposed TIE fighter cannons.
label: Handheld L-S1 Cannon

name: Triple Laser Turret
text: Modify vehicle support. While this die is in your pool, attached support's die cannot be removed by your opponents.
label: Triple Laser Turret

name: Han Solo
subtitle: Independent Hotshot
text: [special] - Deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. You may reveal a villain card from your hand to force that opponents to lose 1 resource. You may reveal a hero card from your hand to gain 1 resource.
label: Han Solo - Independent Hotshot

name: Qi'Ra
subtitle: Street Savvy
text: You can include Yellow hero and Yellow villain events in your deck.
flavor: "We're doing this my way."
label: Qi'Ra - Street Savvy

name: Across The Galaxy
text: Spot a vehicle to switch the battlefield with a battlefield that was brought to the game. If you do not control the battlefield, gain 1 resource.
label: Across The Galaxy

name: Cash Out
text:
Ambush.
Resolve any number of your dice showing a resource ([resource]).
label: Cash Out

name: Dismantle
text: Spot a Yellow character and choose a support in play that has no mods. Then spend resources equal to that support's cost to discard it.
flavor: "That was my best dissecting hand!" <cite>0-0-0</cite>
label: Dismantle

name: Fight Fire With Fire
text: Remove one of your dice showing indirect damage ([indirect]) to remove a die.
label: Fight Fire With Fire

name: Indifferent
text: Spot a neutral character to remove a die.
label: Indifferent

name: Quick Thinking
text: Spot any number of Yellow characters to resolve that many of your Yellow dice in the order of your choice.
label: Quick Thinking

name: Shock Tactic
text:
Ambush.
Remove a non-unique die and all copies of it from each of your opponent's pools.
label: Shock Tactic

name: Double Down
text: You can include one additional copy of up to 2 different cards in your deck (following all other deckbuilding restrictions).
label: Double Down

name: Improvised Defense
text: After a die is turned, you may discard this support from play to remove that die.
label: Improvised Defense

name: Shadow Caster
text: Decrease the resource cost on each side of this die by 1 for each mod on this support.
flavor: "I got the best weapons, best ship, and I'm feared across the galaxy." <cite>Ketsu Onyo</cite>
label: Shadow Caster

name: Arc Caster
text: Modify vehicle support. After you play this upgrade, you may activate attached support. Then you may reroll a die.
label: Arc Caster

name: Black Sun Blaster Pistol
text:
While this upgrade is on a neutral character, it has Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. Then deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Black Sun Blaster Pistol

name: Flame Projector
text: Yellow character only. Action - Resolve this die showing melee damage ([melee]) as indirect damage ([indirect]), incresing its value by 1.
label: Flame Projector

name: Shriek
text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing a value of 0 (blanks and specials have a value of 0).
label: Shriek

name: T-16 Skyhopper
text: Ambush. This support can be activated. After you play this support, search your deck or discard pile for a mod and play it on this support, if able. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.
label: T-16 Skyhopper

name: X-34 Landspeeder
text: This support can be activated. After you activate this support, you may reroll a die (yours or an opponent's).
flavor: "Ever since the XP-38 came out, they just aren't in demand. - Luke Skywalker"
label: X-34 Landspeeder

name: Laser Cannon
text: Modify vehicle support. After you activate attached support, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
label: Laser Cannon

name: Systems Gauge
text: Modify vehicle support. After you activate attached support, you may spend 1 resource to remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).
label: Systems Gauge

name: Targeting Astromech
text: Modify vehicle support. Action - Exhaust this upgrade to turn attached support's die to any side.
label: Targeting Astromech

name: No Allegiance
text:
Include only if you have no hero or villain characters on your team.
Each of your neutral characters has +1 health.
label: No Allegiance

name: Solidarity
text: Include only if each character on your team is the same color and your deck contains no more than one copy of any card.
label: Solidarity

name: Landing Dock
subtitle: Scipio
text: After any player plays a vehicle, that player may take control of this battlefield. Power Action - Reroll a die.
label: Landing Dock - Scipio

name: Occupied City
subtitle: Lothal
text: After an opponent plays a support or an upgrade, you may discard the top card of their deck.
label: Occupied City - Lothal

name: Theed Royal Palace
subtitle: Naboo
text: Power Action - Remove one of your dice to gain 1 resource. Spot a neutral character to take one additional action.
label: Theed Royal Palace - Naboo

name: Training Room
subtitle: Kamino
text: Power Action - Reroll any number of your non-unique character dice.
label: Training Room - Kamino

name: Asajj Ventress
subtitle: Swift And Cunning
text: After a character that has a downgrade on it takes damage from this die, you may discard a card from your hand to remove one of that character's character or upgrade dice.
label: Asajj Ventress - Swift And Cunning

name: Palpatine
subtitle: Unlimited Power
text: This character has +1 health for each ability on it and those abilities do not count toward its upgrade limit. Power Action - Roll a die on an ability on this character into your pool.
flavor: "Experience the full power of the dark side."
label: Palpatine - Unlimited Power

name: Sentinel Messenger
text: You cannot play Blue abilities on this character. After you activate this character, look at the top card of your deck. You may play that card (paying its cost).
flavor: Relayer of the order Operation: Cinder.
label: Sentinel Messenger

name: Sly Moore
subtitle: Aide to the Emperor
text: After you activate this character, you may reroll one of your Sith dice. [special] - Turn a die to a side showing a blank ([blank]) and discard a random card from an opponent's hand.
flavor: Rumors thrived about her mysterious abilities.
label: Sly Moore - Aide to the Emperor

name: Mind Extraction
text: Attached character loses all of its non-special ([special]) abilities. Action - Exhaust attached character to discard this downgrade. Only attached character's controller can use this action.
label: Mind Extraction

name: A Tale of Tragedy
text: Spot a Sith to turn another character's character dice to the sides of your choice.
flavor: "It's not a story the Jedi would tell you. " <cite>Chancellor Palpatine</cite>
label: A Tale of Tragedy

name: Breaking Bonds
text: Choose a character and discard a downgrade from it. If that character is a Sith, you may turn a die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Breaking Bonds

name: Fit of Rage
text: Remove all shields from all opponents' characters.
label: Fit of Rage

name: Forsaken
text:
Play only if a player has exactly one die in their pool.
Remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.
label: Forsaken

name: Isolation
text: Spot a Blue character to remove a character die.
flavor: "You're so lonely... So afraid to leave..." <cite>Kylo Ren</cite>
label: Isolation

name: No Mercy
text: Discard any number of Blue cards from your hand. Then resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]), increasing its value by 1 for each card you discarded.
label: No Mercy

name: Forbidden Lore
text: Before you play a Blue ability, you may discard this support from play to decrease its cost by 1. Then you may spot a Sith to draw a card.
label: Forbidden Lore

name: Imperialis
text:
After you activate Palpatine, you may activate this support.
[special] - Discard this support from play to deal 4 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
flavor: A self destruct mechanism was its fatal flaw
label: Imperialis

name: Force Storm
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Exhaust this upgrade to place 1 resource on it. Deal damage to a character equal to the number of resources on this upgrade. Reroll this die instead of removing it.
label: Force Storm

name: Malice
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 1 damage to any number of characters that have one or more of their character dice showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Malice

name: Palpatine's Lightsaber
text: After you play this upgrade, gain resources equal to the number of ability upgrades on attached character, to a maximum of 2. While this upgrade is on Palpatine, your copies of it are non-unique.
label: Palpatine's Lightsaber

name: Sith Teachings
text: Play only if you spot a Sith. After you play this upgrade, you may remove a die showing a blank. [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character, or 2 damage instead if you removed an opponent's die this round.
label: Sith Teachings

name: Captain Phasma
subtitle: Stormtrooper Commander
text: You may resolve your trooper dice showing damage as if they were melee damage ([melee]). Power Action - Roll 2 set-aside First Order Stormtrooper ([CONV]20) dice into your pool. Set those dice aside after they are resolved or removed.
label: Captain Phasma - Stormtrooper Commander

name: Commando Droid
text: After you activate this character, you may activate one of your droid characters or supports.
flavor: "Those clankers have tough armor!" <cite>Clone Commander Cody</cite>
label: Commando Droid

name: First Order Stormtrooper
flavor: "A real stormtrooper has no room for sympathy. A real stormtrooper is the extension of the First Order, of Supreme Leader Snoke's will. Nothing less." <cite>Captain Phasma</cite>
label: First Order Stormtrooper

name: General Grievous
subtitle: Droid Armies Commander
text: While building your team, the point value of each droid is decreased by 1. Power Action - Reroll any number of your droid dice.
flavor: "Your screams are like music to my audio receptors!"
label: General Grievous - Droid Armies Commander

name: Wat Tambor
subtitle: Techno Union Foreman
text: Power Action - Play a Red support from your hand (paying its cost). Then roll that support's die into your pool.
flavor: "The Techno Union Army is at your disposal."
label: Wat Tambor - Techno Union Foreman

name: A Sinister Peace
text: Discard a card from your hand to remove a die showing a value of 2 or more.
flavor: "KX-series droids are hardened against intrusion." <cite>Cassian Andor</cite>
label: A Sinister Peace

name: Make Demands
text: Spot a leader to choose an opponent's character and deal 2 damage to it unless they give you 1 of their resources.
flavor: "It would seem once again one of your Order has lost his way." <cite>General Grievous</cite>
label: Make Demands

name: Probe
text: Look at 2 random cards in an opponent's hand and discard each of those cards that is an event.
label: Probe

name: Pulverize
text: Resolve up to 3 of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) in the order of your choice, increasing each of their values by 1.
label: Pulverize

name: Roger, Roger
text: Spot a Red character to turn up to 2 of your droid dice to the sides of your choice.
flavor: "Get your head adjusted. It feels great."
label: Roger, Roger

name: The Best Defense...
text: Deal one of your Red characters 3 damage to remove up to 2 of an opponent's dice.
flavor: When you have overwhelming numbers, collateral damage is perfectly acceptable.
label: The Best Defense...

name: Defoliator Tank
text: [special] - Deal 3 damage to each character that is not a droid or General Grievous.
flavor: When surrounded by war, one must eventually choose a side.
label: Defoliator Tank

name: Imperial Officer
text: After you activate this support, you may turn one of your trooper dice to any side.
flavor: When a unit began to underperform, Emperor Palpatine would rectify the matter by sending in an enforcer.
label: Imperial Officer

name: Megablaster Troopers
text: After you activate this support, roll 1 set-aside First Order Stormtrooper ([CONV]20) die into your pool, or 2 First Order Stormtrooper dice instead if you spot a leader. Set those dice aside after they are resolved or removed.
label: Megablaster Troopers

name: Stap Droid
text: Ambush.
flavor: The Single Trooper Aerial Platform was a lightweight repulsorcraft that greratly increased the speed and maneuverability of battle droids in the field.
label: Stap Droid

name: E-5 Blaster Carbine
text: While this upgrade is on a droid, it has Redeploy.
flavor: Droids could easily endure the excessive heat from its powerful bolts.
label: E-5 Blaster Carbine

name: Modular Frame
text: Redeploy. Attached character has +1 health. Discard this upgrade from play if it is not on a droid or on General Grievous.
label: Modular Frame

name: Dengar
subtitle: Ruthless Tracker
text: After you activate this character, you may deal 1 damage to a character that has a bounty on it.
flavor: "I can't believe I'm getting paid for this!
label: Dengar - Ruthless Tracker

name: Jabba The Hutt
subtitle: Influential Kingpin
text: After you activate this character, you may look at the top 4 cards of your deck, reveal a bounty or a Yellow event from among them, and add it to your hand. Place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
label: Jabba The Hutt - Influential Kingpin

name: Quarren Tracker
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character or deal 3 damage to a character that has a bounty on it.
flavor: "These bounty hunters drive a more reasonable bargain than pirates." <cite>Cassiss</cite>
label: Quarren Tracker

name: Watto
subtitle: Stubborn Gambler
text: This character's character dice cannot be removed by opponents' Blue events. Power Action - Spend 1 resource and choose a symbol to reroll a die. If it rolls the chosen symbol, gain 2 resources.
flavor: "Mind tricks don't work on me. Only money."
label: Watto - Stubborn Gambler

name: Death Mark
text: After attached character is defeated, you may draw 3 cards.
flavor: "A death mark is not an easy thing to live with." <cite>General Rieekan</cite>
label: Death Mark

name: Enticing Reward
text: After attached character is defeated, you may play an equipment or a weapon from your hand or discard pile for free.
label: Enticing Reward

name: Barter With Blood
text: Each player hides any number of tokens from the supply in their hand, then reveals them. Each player who revealed the highest number of tokens is dealt that much indirect damage and may play a card from their hand for free.
label: Barter With Blood

name: Conveyex Robbery
text: Spot a scoundrel to choose one die in each opponents' pools. Resolve those dice in the order of your choice as if they were in your pool.
label: Conveyex Robbery

name: Exterminate
text: Each opponent chooses a character subtype. Then remove all opponents' character dice that do not have a chosen subtype.
label: Exterminate

name: Fight Dirty
text: Remove any number of your Yellow dice. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of dice you just removed.
label: Fight Dirty

name: Hard Bargain
text: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. An opponent discards one of those cards, then you may play one of the other cards for free. Discard the remaining cards.
label: Hard Bargain

name: Hunt Them Down
text: Resolve one of your dice showing ranged or melee damage ([ranged] or [melee]) against a character, increasing its value by the number of bounty downgrades on that character.
label: Hunt Them Down

name: Bounty Board
text: Action - Exhaust this support to search your deck for a bounty, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Bounty Board

name: Punishing One
text: After an opponent's character that has a bounty on it is defeated, you may ready this support. If you spot Dengar, you may activate this support.
flavor: It had no holding cells due to Dengar often taking only dead bounties.
label: Punishing One

name: Crime Lord
text:
Yellow Character only.
[special] - Spend 5 resources to choose a character. Before this round ends, defeat that character.
flavor: "There will be no bargain." <cite>Jabba the Hutt</cite>
label: Crime Lord

name: Dengar's Fire Blade
text: After you play this upgrade, you may deal 1 damage to a character that has a bounty on it. Power Action - If this upgrade is on Dengar, turn one of his character dice to a side showing a value of 1.
label: Dengar's Fire Blade

name: Skilled Tracker
text:
Yellow character only.
[special] - Remove a character die.
flavor: "Pain delivered." <cite>Dengar</cite>
label: Skilled Tracker

name: Separatist Conspiracy
text: Action - Exhaust this plot and spot any number of leader characters to draw that many cards, unless an opponent spends 1 resource or discards a card from their hand.
label: Separatist Conspiracy

name: Assassin Droid
text: After you roll this die into your pool, you may deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Assassin Droid

name: Ahsoka Tano
subtitle: Brash Prodigy
text: After you activate a Jedi, you may resolve one of this character's character or upgrade dice. If that die is showing a modifier, resolve it as if it did not have a modifier.
flavor: "Looks like I got here just in time."
label: Ahsoka Tano - Brash Prodigy

name: Lor San Tekka
subtitle: True Believer
text: Power Action - Choose 3 cards from your discard pile. Then an opponent adds one of those cards to your hand. Set the other 2 cards aside.
flavor: "Without the Jedi, there can be no balance in the force."
label: Lor San Tekka - True Believer

name: Mace Windu
subtitle: Inspiring Master
text: Power Action - Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may play an upgrade from among them. Place the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If that upgrade was played on a Jedi, give it 1 shield.
label: Mace Windu - Inspiring Master

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
subtitle: Ardent Avenger
text: Power Action - Resolve one of your dice showing a value of 2 or more, increasing its value by 1.
flavor: "It takes strength to resist the dark side. Only the weak embrace it."
label: Obi-Wan Kenobi - Ardent Avenger

name: Vigilant Jedi
text: [special] - Remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then deal 1 damage to a character.
flavor: When we rescue others, we rescue ourselves.
label: Vigilant Jedi

name: A Friend Lost
text:
Play only if you have one or more defeated unique characters.
Turn up to 2 of your dice to sides showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]).
flavor: "I've loved you always." <cite>Satine Kryze</cite>
label: A Friend Lost

name: Channel the Force
text: Reroll a die. You may spot a leader to turn a die to any side. You may spot a Jedi to remove a die.
label: Channel the Force

name: Defensive Stance
text: Give a character 2 shields.
flavor: The best armor is no match for a keen mind and quick feet.
label: Defensive Stance

name: Disciplined Mind
text: Spot a Jedi to remove a non-Jedi die.
flavor: "Train yourself to let go of everything you fear to lose." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: Disciplined Mind

name: Strong Intuition
text: Draw 3 cards, then discard a card from your hand.
flavor: "I sense there's something here." <cite>Kit Fisto</cite>
label: Strong Intuition

name: Upper Hand
text: Play only if you have one or more dice showing a value of 2 or more. Remove a die showing a value of 0 (blanks and specials have a value of 0).
label: Upper Hand

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi's Interceptor
text: After you activate this support, you may spot Obi-Wan Kenobi to turn one of your dice showing a blank ([blank]) to any side.
flavor: Buzz droids ravaged this interceptor during the Battle of Coruscant.
label: Obi-Wan Kenobi's Interceptor

name: Uneti Force Tree
text: Action - Exhaust this support to choose another player. Then, you and that player each draw a card.
label: Uneti Force Tree

name: Yoda's Spirit
text:
Discard this support from play if you have Yoda in play.
[special] - Shuffle this support into its owner's deck to deal 3 unblockable damage to a character.
flavor: "We are what they grow beyond." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: Yoda's Spirit

name: Jedi Holocron
text: Play only if you spot a Jedi. [special] - Place this upgrade on the bottom of its owner's deck to draw 3 cards. You may play a Blue ability from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Jedi Holocron

name: Lore Hunter
text: After you activate attached character, you may look at the top 2 cards of a player's deck, discard one of those cards, then add the other card to that player's hand.
label: Lore Hunter

name: Mace Windu's Lightsaber
text: Power Action - Spot Mace Windu to move this upgrade to him. [special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character. Then, if that character has 1 remaining health, defeat it.
label: Mace Windu's Lightsaber

name: Republic Jedi Armor
text: After you play this upgrade on a Jedi, give it 1 shield. Attached character has +1 health.
flavor: Courage begins by trusting oneself.
label: Republic Jedi Armor

name: K-2SO
subtitle: Incognito
text: After this character is defeated, you may end the action phase. Power Action - Reroll one of your dice. Then reroll up to a number of dice equal to the value showing on the die just rerolled.
label: K-2SO - Incognito

name: Kes Dameron
subtitle: Courageous Sergeant
text: Action - Resolve any number of your trooper dice in the order of your choice.
flavor: "Light'em up on my mark."
label: Kes Dameron - Courageous Sergeant

name: Naboo Palace Guard
text: While you have a leader in play, this character gains Guardian.
label: Naboo Palace Guard

name: Padmé Amidala
subtitle: Resolute Senator
text: You may resolve your dice showing a focus ([focus]) as if they were indirect damage ([indirect]).
flavor: "To live in fear is no life at all."
label: Padmé Amidala - Resolute Senator

name: Target Acquired
text:
Damaged character only.
Indirect damage ([indirect]) assigned by attached character's controller must be assigned to attached character, if able.
label: Target Acquired

name: Aggressive Negotiations
text: Choose an opponent and have them remove any number of their dice.  Then deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to that opponent for each of their dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]).
label: Aggressive Negotiations

name: Field Medic
text: Heal 2 damage from a character.
flavor: "I need a medic over here!" <cite>Anakin Skywalker</cite>
label: Field Medic

name: Honorable Sacrifice
text: Defeat one of your characters to remove up to 2 dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]).
flavor: "Locking the vault door now. Goodbye." <cite>K-2SO</cite>
label: Honorable Sacrifice

name: Power Surge
text: Resolve one of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]), doubling its value, to a maximum value of 6.
label: Power Surge

name: Unfetter
text: Ready a Red character that has no cards attached to it.
label: Unfetter

name: A-Wing
text: After you activate this support, you may discard a card from your hand to resolve any number of its support and upgrade dice in the order of your choice.
flavor: Superb for hit-and-run missions.
label: A-Wing

name: Concerted Effort
text: After you resolve a die, if you have resolved 3 or more dice this turn, you may exhaust this support to deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Concerted Effort

name: LAAT Gunship
text: [special] - Roll a trooper die on one of your cards in play into your pool and resolve it. Otherwise, remove it. Reroll this support's die instead of removing it.
flavor: In addition to providing heavy fire support, the Low Altitude Assault Transport could deliver up to 30 troopers.
label: LAAT Gunship

name: Padmé Amidala's Royal Starship
text: After you activate this support, you may give a leader character 1 shield. If that leader is Padmé Amidala, activate her.
flavor: Hand-finished by Naboo's finest artisans, this elegant spacecraft was reserved for royalty.
label: Padmé Amidala's Royal Starship

name: Overkill
flavor: "So, who's ready to blast some droids?" <cite>Clone Trooper 99</cite>
label: Overkill

name: Resistance Ring
text: After you play this upgrade, discard the top card of a deck. [special] - Play a Red event from any discard pile as if it were yours (paying its cost), then set that event aside.
label: Resistance Ring

name: Chewbacca
subtitle: The Beast
text: While you have another scoundrel in play, this character has Guardian. Before you resolve one of this character's character dice showing damage, increase its value by 1 if this character has 6 or more damage.
label: Chewbacca - The Beast

name: Ezra Bridger
subtitle: Resourceful Cutpurse
text:
You may play Blue upgrades on this character, ignoring play restrictions.
You may resolve dice in player's pool that has used the Claim the Battlefield action this round as if they were in your pool.
label: Ezra Bridger - Resourceful Cutpurse

name: Maz Kanata
subtitle: Canny Negotiator
text: Power Action - An opponent chooses and does 1. You choose and do 2 others: • Deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to a player. • Turn an opponent's die to any side. • Reroll any number of your dice. • Draw a card.
label: Maz Kanata - Canny Negotiator

name: Satine Kryze
subtitle: Hope of Mandalore
text: After you activate this character, you may reroll one of your dice.
flavor: "War is intolerable. We have been deceived into thinking that we must be a part of it."
label: Satine Kryze - Hope of Mandalore

name: Calculated Risk
text: Reroll a die. Then, if that die is showing a value of 2 or more, gain 1 resource.
flavor: "I expect to be well paid." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
label: Calculated Risk

name: Convergence
text: Spot any number of characters that have the same subtype to discard a support, upgrade, or downgrade that costs that number from play.
label: Convergence

name: Draw Attention
text: Move up to 2 damage from one of your characters to another one of your characters (this ignores shields).
label: Draw Attention

name: Flee the Scene
text: Remove up to 2 dice. You must pass your next 2 turns this round.
label: Flee the Scene

name: Instigate
text:
Ambush.
Activate one of your characters or supports.
label: Instigate

name: Reap the Reward
text: Spot a scoundrel to resolve one of your character or upgrade dice. Then gain resources equal to the value that the die was just resolved for.
label: Reap the Reward

name: Sure Shot
text: Resolve one of your dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) against a character, then remove one of that character's character or upgrade dice.
label: Sure Shot

name: We're Home
text: Activate one of your Yellow vehicles and up to 2 of your scoundrels. You may remove one of your dice showing a resource ([resource]) to ready that vehicle.
label: We're Home

name: Laser Tripwire
text: After a player activates a character, if 2 or more of that character's character or upgrade dice are showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]), discard this support from play to deal 3 indirect damage ([indirect]) to that player.
label: Laser Tripwire

name: Rebel Cache
text: After you roll one or more dice showing a resource ([resource]), you may place 1 resource on this support. [special] - Take up to 2 resources from this support, or 3 resources instead if you spot a scoundrel.
label: Rebel Cache

name: Chewbacca's Blaster Rifle
text: After you play this upgrade, you may deal 1 damage to attached character to roll this die into your pool. Then, if that character is Chewbacca, you may resolve this die.
label: Chewbacca's Blaster Rifle

name: Custom Bandolier
text: Each equipment on attached character does not count towards its upgrade limit Action - Exhaust this upgrade to reroll one of your equipment or weapon dice.
label: Custom Bandolier

name: Moxie
text: [special] - Use a special ability ([special]) or a power action on attached character, even if it was used this round.
flavor: "Maz is a bit of an acquired taste, so let me do the talking." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
label: Moxie

name: Secrets Laid Bare
text: After attached character is activated, reveal 3 random cards from its controller's hand.
flavor: Sly Moore was adept of manipulating the minds of political opponents so that their secrets were gradually revealed.
label: Secrets Laid Bare

name: Attunement
text: If you have a die showing (do all that apply): • Melee ([melee]) - Deal 1 damage to a character. • Shield ([shield]) - Give 1 shield to a character. • Blank ([blank]) - You may turn a die to a blank.
label: Attunement

name: Circle of Shelter
text: Resolve one of your character dice as if it were showing a shield ([shield]). If that character has a card titled Soresu Mastery on it, that die is resolved without removing it from your pool.
label: Circle of Shelter

name: Deflecting Slash
text: Activate one of your Blue characters to remove a die showing ranged or indirect damage ([ranged] or [indirect]). If that character has a card titled Soresu Mastery on it, give it 2 shields.
label: Deflecting Slash

name: Fatal Blow
text: Resolve one of your character dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]), increasing its value by the number of upgrades on that character.
label: Fatal Blow

name: Overqualified
text: Choose one of your dice. Then remove a die showing a value less than the chosen die.
flavor: "Don't you think I'm just a little overqualified for this?" <cite>Ahsoka Tano</cite>
label: Overqualified

name: Twin Strike
text: Resolve up to 2 of your Blue character dice showing melee damage ([melee]) as unblockable.
label: Twin Strike

name: Use The Force
text: Spot a Blue character to turn a die to any side.
flavor: "Clear you mind." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: Use The Force

name: Force Flow
text: Action - Set this plot aside to turn a die to any side.
flavor: "I'm one with the Force, and the Force will guide me." <cite>Padawan Ganodi</cite>
label: Force Flow

name: Lightsaber Mastery
text: Bring up to 2 different move events to the game and place them facedown under this plot (ignoring deckbuilding restrictions). Action - Exhaust this plot to play an event from under it, then set that event aside.
label: Lightsaber Mastery

name: Diatium Power Cell
text: Before you resolve a weapon die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) that has the word "Lightsaber" in its title, you may exhaust this support to increase its value by 1.
label: Diatium Power Cell

name: It Binds All Things
text: Before you play a Blue upgrade, you may exhaust this support to decrease its cost by 1.
flavor: "It's not just about lifting rocks. The Force binds everything together" <cite>Luke Skywalker</cite>
label: It Binds All Things

name: Force Pull
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Choose an opponent's character and force them to activate it. Then you may resolve one of that character's character dice as if it were in your pool.
label: Force Pull

name: Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
label: Lightsaber

name: Soresu Mastery
text: Blue character only. Limit 1 form per character. After you play this upgrade, you may remove a die showing damage. [special] - Remove a die showing damage and give a character 1 shield.
label: Soresu Mastery

name: Soresu Training
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Give a character 2 shields. You may discard this upgrade to play a card titled Soresu Mastery from your hand or discard pile on attached character for free.
label: Soresu Training

name: Hampered
text: No more than one of attached character's character dice can be resolved during each turn and those dice cannot be modified.
label: Hampered

name: Automated Defense
text: Spot a droid to remove a die.
flavor: Exceptional at reconnaissance, probe droids could also be equipped with a blaster-type weapon for defense.
label: Automated Defense

name: Domination
text: Remove any number of dice.
flavor: "The ultimate power in the universe!" <cite>Admiral Motti</cite>
label: Domination

name: Energize
text: Roll a droid die on one of your characters or supports in play into your pool.
label: Energize

name: Forced Compliance
text: Turn an opponent's die to any side. Then turn one of your dice to a side showing the same symbol as that die.
label: Forced Compliance

name: Fresh Supplies
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Gain 1 resource.
label: Fresh Supplies

name: Measure for Measure
text: Remove one of your trooper dice to remove a die.
flavor: It seemed that no matter how many noble sacrifices the rebel troopers made, they could never outmatch the tenacity of the Empire's forces.
label: Measure for Measure

name: No Answer
text: Discard a random card from an opponent's hand. Then, if that opponent has no cards in hand, discard the top 3 cards of their deck.
label: No Answer

name: Rout
text: For every 3 dice in your pool, you may remove a die.
flavor: "An entire legion of my best troops awaits them." <cite>Emperor Palpatine</cite>
label: Rout

name: Seize the Day
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Gain 2 actions.
flavor: "She seems to be on top of things." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
label: Seize the Day

name: Squad Tactics
text: Activate any number of your non-unique characters at once.
flavor: The wise man leads. The strong man follows.
label: Squad Tactics

name: Strike Back
text: If you have a die showing (do all that apply): • Ranged ([ranged]) - Deal 1 damage to a character. • Focus ([focus]) - Turn one of your dice to any side. • Discard ([discard]) - Discard a random card from a player's hand.
label: Strike Back

name: Advanced Training
text: You may resolve your trooper dice showing a blank ([blank]) as if they were indirect damage ([indirect]) that have a value of 1.
label: Advanced Training

name: Conscript Squad
text: After you activate a leader, you may activate this support.
flavor: "Due to their accelerated aging, clone troopers occassionally needed to have their ranks reinforced with non-clone conscripts."
label: Conscript Squad

name: Press the Advantage
text: Action - Exhaust this support to reroll one of your dice. Then, if you have more dice in your pool than an opponent has in their pool, you may reroll a die (yours or an opponent's).
label: Press the Advantage

name: Tech Team
text: Before you play a support, you may exhaust this support to decrease its cost by 1.
label: Tech Team

name: V-Wing
text: While a villain vehicle die is in your pool, decrease the cost on this die by 1. While a hero vehicle die is in your pool, this die cannot be removed by opponents.
label: V-Wing

name: A-300 Blaster
text: Redeploy.
flavor: "A good soldier is always prepared."
label: A-300 Blaster

name: Quicksilver Baton
text: After you play this upgrade, if it is on a leader, roll this die into your pool. If this upgrade is on a trooper, you may spend 1 resource to roll one of that trooper's character dice into your pool.
label: Quicksilver Baton

name: Riot Shield
text: Before attached character takes damage, you may discard this upgrade to block 2 damage, or 3 damage instead if attached character is a trooper.
label: Riot Shield

name: Enfys Nest
subtitle: Fearsome Outlaw
text: You can include up to 2 villain cards and up to 2 hero cards in your deck (following other deckbuilding restrictions). Power Action - Resolve up to 3 of your scoundrel dice showing the same symbol for free.
label: Enfys Nest - Fearsome Outlaw

name: Enfys Nest's Marauder
text: You can include up to 1 villain card and up to 1 hero card in your deck (following other deckbuilding restrictions). After you resolve this die showing a cost, you may deal 1 indirect ([indirect]) damage to an opponent.
label: Enfys Nest's Marauder

name: Wanted
text: After attached character is defeated, you may gain 2 resources.
flavor: "You don't think the Empire is going to want you for your role in their loss?" <cite>General Dodonna</cite>
label: Wanted

name: Electroshock
text: Spot a yellow character to remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.
flavor: Shock weaponry is useful for its versatility, having a stunning effect on organics and droids alike.
label: Electroshock

name: For a Price
text: Turn a character die to a side showing a cost.
flavor: "Well, I am a reasonable man. Name the price." <cite>Hondo Ohnaka</cite>
label: For a Price

name: Prey Upon
text: Choose a character that has a downgrade on it and remove one of its character or upgrade dice.
flavor: "Don't move another inch." <cite>Dengar</cite>
label: Prey Upon

name: Rendezvous
text:
Ambush.
Resolve one of your Yellow dice showing a cost, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Rendezvous

name: Skullduggery
text: If you have a die showing (do all that apply): • Indirect ([indirect]) - Deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent. • Disrupt ([disrupt]) - Force a player to lose 1 resource. • Resource ([resource]) - Gain 1 resource.
label: Skullduggery

name: Truce
text:
Ambush.
Each player gains 1 resource.
flavor: "Jabba agrees. A treaty is in order." <cite>TC-70</cite>
label: Truce

name: Unpredictable
text: Ambush. Reroll a die (yours or an opponent's).
label: Unpredictable

name: Profiteering
text: After one of your scoundrel dice rolls a side showing a resource ([resource]), you may resolve it.
flavor: If you want to get rich quick, you can't ask where the credits come from.
label: Profiteering

name: Entourage
text: After you play this support, you may search your deck for a scoundrel, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. [special] - Spot any number of scoundrels to deal that much damage to a character.
label: Entourage

name: Seeking The Truth
text: Action - Exhaust this support to reroll one of your dice. Then you may spot a leader to reroll a die (yours or an opponent's).
label: Seeking The Truth

name: Smuggling Ring
text: Action - Exhaust this support to gain 1 resource and gain 1 action.
flavor: "This was always a risk. The Empire's been here on Akiva for years." <cite>Owerto Naiucho</cite>
label: Smuggling Ring

name: Starviper
text: Ambush. [special] - Deal 3 damage to a character, or discard a vehicle that costs 3 or less from play.
label: Starviper

name: Enfys Nest's Electroripper
text: [special] - Deal 1 unblockable damage to each of an opponent's characters. If this upgrade is on Enfys Nest, remove one of that opponent's character dice.
label: Enfys Nest's Electroripper

name: Mandalorian Jetpack
text: [special] - Reroll another die. Then deal damage to a character equal to the value showing on that die.
flavor: Thanks to its utility for both evasion and pursuit, the jetpack became a staple of all Mandalorian armor sets.
label: Mandalorian Jetpack

name: Ordnance Launcher
text: Ambush. (After you play this card, gain 1 action.) After you resolve a scoundrel die, you may resolve this die as if it did not have a modifier.
label: Ordnance Launcher

name: Unscrupulous
text: Scoundrel character only. [special] - Discard a random card from an opponent's hand or force an opponent to lose 1 resource.
flavor: "He's holding a thermal detonator!" <cite>C-3PO</cite>
label: Unscrupulous

name: Shock Collar
text: After attached character is activated, deal 1 damage to it.
flavor: The Zygerian Empire maintained control over their numerous slaves with a tool that was as inhumane as it was effective.
label: Shock Collar

name: Wounded
text: Attached character has -1 health.
flavor: It's just a flesh wound.
label: Wounded

name: Bacta Therapy
text: Heal damage from a character equal to the number of upgrades on it, to a maximum of 5. Discard each injury on that character.
label: Bacta Therapy

name: Block
text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing melee damage ([melee]).
flavor: "It's treason, then." <cite>Chancellor Palpatine</cite>
label: Block

name: Dodge
text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
label: Dodge

name: Electromagnetic Pulse
text: Remove a droid or vehicle die.
flavor: A powerful burst of radiation, an electromagnetic pulse (EMP) could overload most electronic systems.
label: Electromagnetic Pulse

name: Near Miss
text: Spot 2 characters that share a subtype to remove a die.
flavor: "Did you know that wasn't me?" <cite>K-2SO</cite>
label: Near Miss

name: Unshackle
text:
Ambush.
Discard a downgrade from play.
flavor: "I'm here to rescue you." <cite>Bo-Katan Kryze</cite>
label: Unshackle

name: Fickle Mercenaries
text: Action - Spend 2 resources to take control of this support (return its die to this card). Any player may use this action.
label: Fickle Mercenaries

name: Grievance Striker
text:
Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade on General Grievous or on Obi-Wan Kenobi, you may deal 1 damage to a character.
flavor: "So uncivilized." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
label: Grievance Striker

name: Protective Suit
text: Non-bounty downgrades cannot be played on attached character. Action - Return this upgrade from play to your hand.
label: Protective Suit

name: Punch Dagger
flavor: The simplest way tu turn a fist into a lethal weapon.
label: Punch Dagger

name: Sonic Detonators
text:
After you play this upgrade, place 6 resources on it.
[special] - Remove any number of resources from this upgrade to choose that many characters and deal 2 damage to each of them.
label: Sonic Detonators

name: Command Center
subtitle: Lothal
text: Claim - Each opponent discards the top 2 cards of their deck.
label: Command Center - Lothal

name: Deathwatch Hideout
subtitle: Concordia
text: Claim - Gain 1 resource. Spot Satine Kryze to place a card from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck.
label: Deathwatch Hideout - Concordia

name: Fighting Pit
subtitle: Mimban
text: Power Action - Reroll an opponent's character die. Reroll one of your character dice. Then deal damage to those characters equal to the value showing on the other character's die.
label: Fighting Pit - Mimban

name: Lair of General Grievous
subtitle: Vassek 3
text: Claim - Deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent unless they give you 1 of their resources, or spot general Grievous to deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Lair of General Grievous - Vassek 3

name: Mean Streets
subtitle: Correlia
text: Claim - You may spot a scoundrel to place 1 resource on this battlefield. You may play an event from your hand, decreasing its cost by the number of resources on this battlefield.
label: Mean Streets - Correlia

name: Military Camp
subtitle: Kaller
text: Power Action - Activate up to 2 of your characters that share a subtype. If one of those characters is a trooper, you may reroll one of its character dice.
label: Military Camp - Kaller

name: Salt Flats
subtitle: Crait
text: Power Action - Turn a die to a side showing a blank ([blank]) or turn one of your leader dice to any side.
label: Salt Flats - Crait

name: Watto's Shop
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Claim - Discard one of your supports or upgrades from play to gain resources equal to its cost.
label: Watto's Shop - Tatooine

name: Count Dooku
subtitle: Corrupted Politician
text: Power Action - Play a Blue card from your hand (paying its cost). Then force an opponent to discard a card from their hand.
flavor: "A wise master does not reveal all his secrets at once."
label: Count Dooku - Corrupted Politician

name: Count Dooku's Lightsaber
text: After you play this upgrade, if it is on a Sith, you may deal 1 damage to a character that has no shields, or, if it is on Count Dooku, you may force an opponent to discard a card from their hand.
label: Count Dooku's Lightsaber

name: Sniper Team
text: Power Action - Discard a card from your hand to turn this die to the side that has a value 1 higher than the value showing on this die.
label: Sniper Team

name: Astrogation
text: After you play an upgrade, you may exhaust this plot and spot a Blue character to discard the top card of a deck.
label: Astrogation

name: Knighthood
text: Blue character only. Attached character gains Jedi. After you play this upgrade, you may give a character 1 shield.
label: Knighthood

name: Fenn Rau
subtitle: Mandalorian Protector
text: Power Action - Play a Red card from your hand (paying its cost). Then deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
flavor: "The Protectors are with you."
label: Fenn Rau - Mandalorian Protector

name: Test of Character
text: Choose 2 dice that share a subtype (yours and/or opponents'). Then turn one of those dice to any side and reroll the other die.
label: Test of Character

name: Grand Design
text: After you play a support, you may exhaust this plot and spot a Red character to draw a card.
label: Grand Design

name: Outer Rim Outlaw
text: Power Action - Play a Yellow card from your hand (paying its cost). Then reroll an opponent's die or reroll up to 3 of your dice.
flavor: "The Outer Rim is a lawless place." <cite>Jennica Pierce</cite>
label: Outer Rim Outlaw

name: Shadowed
text: After attached character uses its action (including power action), you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to its controller.
flavor: "My network is large." <cite>Garindan ezz Zavor</cite>
label: Shadowed

name: Perilous Escapade
text: After you play a downgrade, you may exhaust this plot and spot a Yellow character to deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
label: Perilous Escapade

name: Hired Muscle
flavor: In the Outer Rim, some services were much more valuable than others...
label: Hired Muscle

name: Clawdite Shapeshifter
text: After you activate this character, you may choose a character subtype. Until the end of this round, this character gains the chosen subtype.
flavor: A reptilian-like sentient species, Clawdites could shapeshift into humanoid forms.
label: Clawdite Shapeshifter

name: Chance Encounter
text: Choose and do one: • Spot a leader to turn a die to any side. • Spot a scoundrel to reroll up to 3 dice. • Spot a trooper to remove a die showing a value of 1 or less.
label: Chance Encounter

name: Flank
text:
Play only if you have more ready characters than an opponent.
Remove one of that opponent's dice.
label: Flank

name: Allies of Necessity
text:
Include only if 2 or more characters on your team share a color.
After setup, discard a card from your hand and lose 2 resources.
label: Allies of Necessity

name: LR-57 Combat Droid
text:
After you play this support, place 1 resource on it.
[special] - Place 1 resource on this support. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of resources on this support.
label: LR-57 Combat Droid

name: Electro Sword
text:
Redeploy.
Damage dealt by this die is unblockable.
flavor: The Kage Warriors of the planet Quarzite used this as both an electrified melee weapon and a throwing blade.
label: Electro Sword

name: Chalmun's Cantina
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Power Action - Reroll a character die (yours or an opponent's). Then you may reroll another die that shares a subtype with that die.
label: Chalmun's Cantina - Tatooine

name: Wheeta Palace
subtitle: Nal Hutta
text: Claim - Place 1 resource on this battlefield. Power Action - Place 1 resource on this battlefield or take all resources from it.
label: Wheeta Palace - Nal Hutta

name: Dark Mystic
text: [special] - Play a Blue upgrade from your hand or discard pile (paying its cost). Then roll that upgrade's die into your pool.
label: Dark Mystic

name: Kylo Ren
subtitle: Bound By The Force
text: Power Action - Move 1 shield from this character to another character. Then, if you moved that shield to a hero, deal 1 damage to a character. [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. If any of this damage is blocked, reroll this die instead of removing it.
label: Kylo Ren - Bound By The Force

name: Maul
subtitle: Skilled Duelist
text: Power Action - Reroll one of this character's character or upgrade dice. You may discard a card from your hand to reroll that die again. If that die is showing melee damage ([melee]), you may remove it to deal damage equal to its value to 2 characters.
label: Maul - Skilled Duelist

name: Nightsister Zombie
text: Indirect damage ([indirect]) dealt to you must be assigned to this character last. After you activate this character, you may spot another witch to deal 1 damage to a character that has a curse on them.
label: Nightsister Zombie

name: Old Daka
subtitle: Nightsister Necromancer
text: After this character is defeated, set each Nightsister Zombie you control aside. Power Action - Spend 1 resource to add a set-aside Nightsister Zombie ([SoH]4) to your team exhausted, or 2 Nightsister Zombies exhausted instead if this character is elite.
label: Old Daka - Nightsister Necromancer

name: Chancellor's Edict
text:
After this downgrade is played, remove all shields from attached character.
After attached character is defeated, you may give a character 2 shields.
label: Chancellor's Edict

name: Hex
text: Action - Exhaust this downgrade to remove one of attached character's character die showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Hex

name: Possessed
text: Discard this downgrade from play if you do not control a witch. Action - Exhaust this downgrade to resolve one of attached character's character dice as if it were in your pool.
label: Possessed

name: Uncontrollable Rage
text: Action - Exhaust this downgrade to deal 1 damage to attached character, or 2 damage instead if you spot a witch. Use this action only if attached character is ready and it is not the first turn of the round.
label: Uncontrollable Rage

name: Act of Betrayal
text: Remove an upgrade die. Then deal damage equal to the value showing on that die to a character.
flavor: "And now, foolish child, he ignites it and kills his true enemy." <cite>Snoke</cite>
label: Act of Betrayal

name: Dark Magick
text: Choose a character and reroll any number of its character dice. Deal 1 damage to that character if it has a curse on it.
flavor: "I have studied the ways of the nightsisters to find a spell that suits our needs." <cite>Maul</cite>
label: Dark Magick

name: Sinister Ruse
text: Reveal a random card in an opponent's hand and deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to them equal to the cost of the revealed card.
flavor: "Mine at last!" <cite>Emperor Palpatine</cite>
label: Sinister Ruse

name: Tantrum
text: Discard an equipment or a weapon upgrade you control to remove a die.
flavor: "Alas, you're no Vader." <cite>Snoke</cite>
label: Tantrum

name: Weave the Ichor
text: Spot up to 3 witch characters to heal that much damage from a character.
flavor: "Come. Let us fix what has been broken." <cite>Mother Talzin</cite>
label: Weave the Ichor

name: Order 66
text: Each of your opponents' characters gains Jedi. Before you draw your starting hand, shuffle up to 4 set-aside copies of Execute Order 66 ([SoH]27) into your deck.
label: Order 66

name: Scimitar
text: Before the effects of an opponent's event resolve, you may return this support from play to its owner's hand. Then gain 1 resource, or 2 resources instead if you spot Maul.
flavor: This modified Star Courier's cloaking device enabled it to vanish from sight.
label: Scimitar

name: Ancient Magicks
text: Blue character only. [special] - Deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. You may ready a curse.
flavor: "They must be compensated for the use of ther magick." <cite>Maul</cite>
label: Ancient Magicks

name: Recovered Sith Lightsaber
text: After you play this upgrade, you may remove 1 shield from a character, or 2 shields from a character instead if this upgrade is on a Sith.
label: Recovered Sith Lightsaber

name: Talisman of Resurrection
text: Witch character only. [special] - Gain 2 resources. Then you may spend resources equal to the point value of a defeated character to return it to play under you control.
flavor: "Awaken." <cite>Old Daka</cite>
label: Talisman of Resurrection

name: Conan Motti
subtitle: Overconfident Officer
text: After you resolve this die showing a discard ([discard]), you may discard a card from your hand to remove a die.
flavor: "This station is now the ultimate power in the universe!"
label: Conan Motti - Overconfident Officer

name: Gideon Hask
subtitle: Inferno Squad Commando
text: Power Action - If you control the battlefield, roll a trooper die on a card you control into your pool.
flavor: "Defiance will be the death of you."
label: Gideon Hask - Inferno Squad Commando

name: Mudtrooper
text: After you activate this character or a leader, you may reroll one of your dice showing a blank ([blank]).
flavor: Their suits were designed to protect them from harsh environments, like the swamps of Mimban.
label: Mudtrooper

name: Thrawn
subtitle: Grand Admiral
text: After you activate this character, you may look at the top 4 cards of a deck. Power Action - Reveal the top 4 cards of an opponent's deck. You may play an event revealed this way and spot that opponent's cards as if they were yours.
label: Thrawn - Grand Admiral

name: Priority Target
text: After attached character is defeated, you may take control of the battlefield and use its claim ability or power action, even if it was used this round.
label: Priority Target

name: Counterintelligence
text: Spot a leader to look at an opponent's hand and place an event from it on top of their deck.
label: Counterintelligence

name: Crushing Advantage
text: If you have more character dice in your pool than an opponent has in their pool, remove one of that opponent's character dice. Repeat this for support dice and upgrade dice.
label: Crushing Advantage

name: Execute Order 66
text: Remove all Jedi dice. For each die removed, deal 1 damage to its matching character.
flavor: "Good soldiers follow orders." <cite>CT-5385</cite>
label: Execute Order 66

name: Rally the Troops
text: Choose a character subtype. Then either reroll any number of dice that have that subtype or resolve 2 of your dice that have that subtype.
label: Rally the Troops

name: To Victory
text: Gain resources equal to the number of defeated characters an opponent has.
flavor: "Here's to Inferno Squad. May we live up to our name." <cite>Gideon Hask</cite>
label: To Victory

name: Warning Siren
text: Remove a die showing the same value as one of your dice.
label: Warning Siren

name: Cultural Records
text:
After a player plays a copy of a card set aside by this support, you may gain 1 resource or remove a die.
[special] - Look at an opponent's hand and set a card from it aside. Gain 1 action.
flavor: "I like to know the deeper meanings of the pieces I collect." <cite>Grand Admiral Thrawn</cite>
label: Cultural Records

name: Hostile Territory
text: After the upkeep phase begins, deal 2  indirect damage ([indirect]) to each player that does not control the battlefield.
flavor: "On my command... Fire!" <cite>Captain Phasma</cite>
label: Hostile Territory

name: Separatist Embargo
text:
After you play this support, name a card.
Copies of the named card cannot be played.
label: Separatist Embargo

name: Superlaser Siege Cannon
text: Before you resolve this die, you may remove all resources from this support to increase its value by that amount. Power Action - Place 1 resource on this support. Spend up to 4 resources to place those resources on this support.
label: Superlaser Siege Cannon

name: Crimson Star
text: Play only if an opponent has one or more defeated characters. Action - Exhaust this upgrade to resolve one of attached character's character dice, increasing its value by 1.
label: Crimson Star

name: Mastermind
text: [special] - Name a card. Then reveal an opponent's hand and set each copy of the named card from it aside.
flavor: "Victory and defeat are often determined by the smallest detail." <cite>Grand Admiral Thrawn</cite>
label: Mastermind

name: TL-50 Heavy Repeater
text: Power Action - If this upgrade is on a trooper, turn this die to any side. [special] - Deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. Reroll this die instead of removing it.
label: TL-50 Heavy Repeater

name: 4-LOM
subtitle: Calculating Criminal
text: After a bounty you control is discarded from play, you may add it to your hand.
flavor: Multiple logic glitches and personality software corruption made him considerably deadlier than other protocol droids.
label: 4-LOM - Calculating Criminal

name: IG-88
subtitle: Single-Minded
text: Power Action - Resolve one of your bounty hunter dice showing ranged or melee damage against any number of characters that have a bounty on them.
flavor: "He's good - one of the best in the galaxy." <cite>Leia Organa</cite>
label: IG-88 - Single-Minded

name: Jango Fett
subtitle: Armed To The Teeth
text: Each equipment on this character does not count toward its upgrade limit. After you play an equipment on this character for the first time each round, you may gain 1 resource.
label: Jango Fett - Armed To The Teeth

name: Zuckuss
subtitle: The Uncanny One
text: [special] - Gain 1 resource or trigger the "After attached character is defeated" ability on a bounty you control and discard it.
flavor: "Something isn't right. Zuckuss can sense it."
label: Zuckuss - The Uncanny One

name: Armed To The Teeth
text: Discard any number of upgrades on one of your Yellow characters. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of upgrades you just discarded.
label: Armed To The Teeth

name: Desperate Measures
text: Spot a Yellow character to discard a support from play. Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself equal to the cost of that support.
label: Desperate Measures

name: Misinformation
text: Choose up to 2 cards in an opponent's discard pile and place them on top of their deck in any order.
label: Misinformation

name: Tireless Pursuit
text: Ambush. Move up to 2 damage from an opponent's character to a character that has a bounty on it.
label: Tireless Pursuit

name: Bounty Hunters' Guild
text: Each of your opponents' characters has +1 downgrade limit. After you play a bounty, you may activate one of your bounty hunters.
flavor: "By the authority of the Bounty Hunters' Guild, you are now my acquisition." <cite>Bossk</cite>
label: Bounty Hunters' Guild

name: IG-2000
text: This support gains bounty hunter while you control a bounty hunter. Decrease the cost on this die by 1 while you control IG-88.
label: IG-2000

name: Impound
text: Before an opponent's equipment or weapon upgrade would be discarded from play, you may instead discard this support from play to take control of that upgrade and move it to one of your bounty hunter characters.
label: Impound

name: Mist Hunter
text: After you activate a bounty hunter you may activate this support. Then you may spot 4-LOM to reroll this die. You may spot Zuckuss to resolve this die.
label: Mist Hunter

name: Predatory Banker
text: Action - Exhaust this support to take 1 resource from an opponent that has 3 or more resources. Use this ability only if you do not control the battlefield.
label: Predatory Banker

name: 0-0-0 Protocol Matrix
