text: Modify droid character or support.
flavor: Deemed highly dangerous, placing this matrix in a protocol droid transformed it into an assassin droid.
label: 0-0-0 Protocol Matrix

name: Armor Plating
text: Before attached character takes damage, you may discard this upgrade to block 2 damage.
flavor: The Beskar alloy in Mandalorian armor gives it enough strength to endure even a direct blaster shot.
label: Armor Plating

name: Gauntlet Rockets
text: Bounty hunter only. Action - Choose a character. Turn this die to a side showing a value equal to or less than the number of bounties on that character.
label: Gauntlet Rockets

name: Pulse Cannon
text: Power Action - Resolve this die. Then roll this die into your pool and resolve it, if able. Then roll this die into your pool again and resolve it, if able.
label: Pulse Cannon

name: Acceptable Losses
text: Defeat up to 3 of your characters to gain that many resources.
label: Acceptable Losses

name: R2-D2
subtitle: Loyal Companion
text: You cannot play Blue abilities on this character. After you activate this character, you may turn one of your dice to its first side (the topmost box of its dice reference), or to any side instead if you spot C-3PO.
label: R2-D2 - Loyal Companion

name: Rey
subtitle: Bound By The Force
text: Power Action - Reroll a character die or turn a villain character die to a side showing a value of 0. [special] - Give 2 shields to a character. Then, if that character has 3 or more shields, reroll this die instead of removing it.
label: Rey - Bound By The Force

name: Yoda
subtitle: Mystical Mentor
text: This character has +3 shield limit. The character's shields can be used to block damage dealt to apprentice characters.
flavor: "Sense the Force around you."
label: Yoda - Mystical Mentor

name: Youngling
text: Include only if you have a Jedi on your team. Power Action - Play a Blue upgrade from your hand onto this character, decreasing its cost by 1.
flavor: "Truly wonderful, the mind of a child is." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: Youngling

name: Refusal
text:
Damage symbols ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]) on attached character's character dice are resource symbols ([resource]) instead.
After attached character is dealt damage, discard this downgrade.
label: Refusal

name: Destiny Fulfilled
text: Defeat one of your characters to give 3 shields to your characters, distributed as you wish.
flavor: "Kanan gave his life so that you could live." <cite>Ahsoka Tano</cite>
label: Destiny Fulfilled

name: Exchange Of Information
text: Reveal your hand and gain 1 resource. Each opponent may reveal their hand and gain 1 resource.
label: Exchange Of Information

name: Heroic Stand
text:
Play only if you control exactly one character and an opponent has 3 or more dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]).
Ready a character.
label: Heroic Stand

name: Humble Service
text: Choose up to 4 of your dice and turn each of them to sides showing a different value than each other.
label: Humble Service

name: Jedi Mind Trick
text: Spot a Jedi to choose a dice pool. An opponent splits the dice in that pool into 2 groups of any size. Either remove all dice in a group, or turn any number of dice in a group to sides of your choice.
label: Jedi Mind Trick

name: Moving Rocks
text: Spot an apprentice or a Jedi to move any number of shields to any number of characters.
flavor: "It's not just about lifting rocks." <cite>Luke Skywalker</cite>
label: Moving Rocks

name: Yoda's Protection
text: Give each of your Blue characters 1 shield.
flavor: "A Jedi uses the Force for knownledge and defense." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: Yoda's Protection

name: Caretaker Village
text: After an opponent's effect removes one of your apprentice or Jedi dice, you may exhaust this support to roll that die into your pool.
flavor: "Island natives. They've kept up the Jedi structures since they've been built." <cite>Luke Skywalker</cite>
label: Caretaker Village

name: Professor Huyang
text: After you play a Blue upgrade on an apprentice, you may activate this support. Then, if that upgrade is a weapon, you may roll its die into your pool.
flavor: For a thousand generations he helped Jedi younglings construct their lightsabers.
label: Professor Huyang

name: Qui-Gon Jinn's Spirit
text:
Discard this support from play if you control Qui-Gon Jinn.
[special] - Shuffle this support into its owner's deck to give a character 1 shield. Then remove any number of shields from your characters to deal that much damage to a character.
label: Qui-Gon Jinn's Spirit

name: Three Lessons
text: This support enters play with 3 resources on it. Action - Exhaust this support, remove a resource from it, and spot a Jedi to turn an apprentice die to any side.
label: Three Lessons

name: Jedi Lightsaber
text: After you play this upgrade, you may give attached character 1 shield, or 2 shields instead if this upgrade is on a Jedi.
label: Jedi Lightsaber

name: Sacred Jedi Texts
text: After you resolve this die, you may move this upgrade to one of your apprentice or Jedi characters. [special] - Draw a card.
label: Sacred Jedi Texts

name: Yoda's Lightsaber
text:
After you play this upgrade on Yoda, you may give him 1 shield.
[special] - Deal 1 unblockable damage to a character, or 2 unblockable damage instead if you remove 1 shield from attached character.
label: Yoda's Lightsaber

name: Amilyn Holdo
subtitle: Vice Admiral
text: After this character is defeated, you may ready a vehicle. [special] - Gain 1 resource or play a vehicle from your hand, decreasing its cost by 2.
flavor: "Godspeed, Rebels."
label: Amilyn Holdo - Vice Admiral

name: Bail Organa
subtitle: Alderaanian Senator
text: Decrease the cost of the first title you play each round by 1. [special] - Choose a subtype. Reroll any number of dice with that subtype. You may turn one of those dice to any side.
label: Bail Organa - Alderaanian Senator

name: C-3PO
subtitle: Perfect Gentleman
text: After you activate this character, you may resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1 if you spend 1 resource or spot R2-D2.
flavor: "R2-D2, you know better than to trust a strange computer."
label: C-3PO - Perfect Gentleman

name: Hoth Trooper
text: After you activate this character, you may deal 1 damage to a ready character.
flavor: "Echo Station 3T8, we've spotted Imperial walkers!" <cite>Trey Callum</cite>
label: Hoth Trooper

name: Droids' Day Out
text: Activate any number of your droids. Then, if you just activated 3 or more droids, draw a card.
label: Droids' Day Out

name: Happy Beeps
text: Turn one of your non-droid character dice to any side. Then you may turn one of your droid dice to a side showing the same symbol and value as that character die.
label: Happy Beeps

name: Lightspeed Assault
text: Defeat one of your leader characters and discard a vehicle you control. Then discard an opponent's vehicle from play and deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to them equal to the discarded vehicles' combined cost.
label: Lightspeed Assault

name: Our Situation is Desperate
text: Spot any number of characters that have 3 or less remaining health to remove that many dice.
flavor: "Separatist forces have overrun our position!" <cite>Senator Bail Organa</cite>
label: Our Situation is Desperate

name: Rebel Assault
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
Remove an opponent's die not showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]).
label: Rebel Assault

name: Spark of Hope
text:
Decrease the cost of this event by 1 for each defeated character you have.
Reroll any number of your dice. Then resolve any number of your dice.
flavor: "We are the spark that'll light the fire." <cite>Amilyn Holdo</cite>
label: Spark of Hope

name: Take Control
text: Play a vehicle in an opponent's discard pile for free. After the upkeep phase begins, discard that vehicle from play.
label: Take Control

name: B-Wing
text: After the action phase begins, you may activate this support.
flavor: "This is one of my most advanced designs! Fast, agile, and narrow attack profile. And it packs a punch!" <cite>Quarrie</cite>
label: B-Wing

name: Firm Resolve
text: After one of your characters is defeated or a vehicle you control is discarded, you may place 1 resource on this support. Action - Remove 1 resource from this support to turn a die to any side.
label: Firm Resolve

name: GH-7 Droid
text: [special] - Heal 1 damage from a character and discard a downgrade on it.
flavor: This advanced medical droid was designed to perform blood test and diagnose diseases.
label: GH-7 Droid

name: Resistance Trench Fighters
text: Action - Remove this die to remove a die showing an equal value.
flavor: "Alright ground forces, lay down some fire!" <cite>Poe Dameron</cite>
label: Resistance Trench Fighters

name: EL-16 Heavy Field Blaster
text: Before you resolve this die, you may increase its value by 1 if it modifies a trooper die.
flavor: The weapon of choice for troops in the Resistance.
label: EL-16 Heavy Field Blaster

name: Salvaged Arm
text: Modify droid character or support. Before you resolve one of attached droid's character, support, or upgrade dice, you may exhaust this upgrade to increase its value by 1.
label: Salvaged Arm

name: Tico Pendant
text: Action - Exhaust this upgrade to move 1 damage from another character to attached character, or up to 2 damage instead if the other character has a copy of this upgrade on it.
label: Tico Pendant

name: Chief Chirpa
subtitle: Bright Tree Village Elder
text: After setup, add a set-aside Ewok Warrior ([SoH]95) to your team. [special] - Deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent, or 3 indirect damage instead if you spot 4 Ewoks.
label: Chief Chirpa - Bright Tree Village Elder

name: Chopper
subtitle: Metal Menace
text: Power Action - Play a mod from your hand or discard pile onto this character, decreasing its cost by 1.
flavor: Also known as C1-1OP, "Chop", or Spectre 3.
label: Chopper - Metal Menace

name: Ewok Warrior
text: Include only if you have a unique Ewok on your team. After you activate this character, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
flavor: "Yub nub."
label: Ewok Warrior

name: Han Solo
subtitle: Old Swindler
text: Power Action - Turn one of your scoundrel dice showing a resource ([resource]) to any side. If it is a Wookiee die, you may resolve it for free.
flavor: "Some things never change."
label: Han Solo - Old Swindler

name: Wicket
subtitle: Crafty Scout
text: After you activate this character, you may play a trap from your hand or discard pile.
flavor: "You're a jittery little thing, aren't you?" <cite>Leia Organa</cite>
label: Wicket - Crafty Scout

name: Ensnare
text: After attached character is activated, you may discard this downgrade to deal damage to it equal to the number of its character and upgrade dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]).
label: Ensnare

name: Net Trap
text: After attached character is activated, you may discard this downgrade to remove one of its character or upgrade dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]).
label: Net Trap

name: Rolling Logs
text: After attached character is activated, you may discard this downgrade to reroll any number of its character and upgrade dice.
flavor: Ewoks can take down even large enemies through the clever use of gravity and lumber.
label: Rolling Logs

name: Ewok Ambush
text: Ambush. Activate one of your non-elite characters or up to 3 of your Ewok characters.
label: Ewok Ambush

name: Glider Attack
text: Exhaust one of your Ewok characters to deal 3 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. That opponent may spend up to 3 resources to block that much damage.
label: Glider Attack

name: Jump To Lightspeed
text: Spot a vehicle support to end the action phase. Set this event aside.
flavor: "Watch the thrust, we're goin' out of here at lightspeed." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
label: Jump To Lightspeed

name: Reassemble
text: Play a droid support from your discard pile. Then play up to 3 upgrades that have Modify droid from your discard pile onto that droid support, decreasing each of their costs by 1.
label: Reassemble

name: Chief Chirpa's Hut
text: [special] - Add a set-aside Ewok Warrior ([SoH]95) to your team. Discard this support from play unless you spend 3 resources.
flavor: "Well, short help is better than no help at all." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
label: Chief Chirpa's Hut

name: Mr. Bones
text: After you resolve this die showing melee damage ([melee]), if one or more characters were just defeated, you may ready this support.
flavor: "I PERFORMED VIOLENCE."
label: Mr. Bones

name: Ewok Bow
text: While this upgrade is on an Ewok, it gains Redeploy.
label: Ewok Bow

name: Han Solo's Blaster
text:
Ambush.
After you play this upgrade, you may force an opponent to remove one of their dice showing damage. Then, if this upgrade is on Han Solo, you may activate him.
label: Han Solo's Blaster

name: Han Solo's Dice
text: After one of attached character's character dice rolls a blank ([blank]), you may exhaust this upgrade to reroll it. Then, if this upgrade is on Han Solo, you may ready this upgrade.
label: Han Solo's Dice

name: Support of the Tribe
text: Spot a number of characters that share a subtype to heal that much damage from a character.
flavor: "Ee chee wa maa!"
label: Support of the Tribe

name: Fateful Companions
text: After you activate a character, you may exhaust this plot and either spot R2-D2 and C-3PO or spend 1 resource to trigger that character's "After you activate this character" ability one additional time.
label: Fateful Companions

name: Alter Fate
text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]).
label: Alter Fate

name: Clever Distraction
text: Spot a Blue character to choose one: â€¢ Turn one of your dice to any side. â€¢ Discard the top 2 cards of a deck. â€¢ Remove a trooper die.
label: Clever Distraction

name: Dark Reflections
text: Turn a die to a side showing a value of 1 or more. Then turn up to 2 other dice to sides showing the same symbol and value as that die.
label: Dark Reflections

name: Decisive Blow
text: Resolve one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]) against a character. Then remove all of that character's character and upgrade dice.
label: Decisive Blow

name: Draw Closer
text: Resolve one of your character or upgrade dice showing melee damage ([melee]) without removing it from your pool, increasing its value by 2 if that character has an upgrade titled Niman Mastery on it.
label: Draw Closer

name: Polarity
text:
Ambush.
Spot a hero character to give a character 1 shield. Spot a villain character to deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Polarity

name: Pushing Slash
text: Activate one of your Blue characters. Then you may resolve one of that character's character or upgrade dice. If that character has a card titled Niman Mastery on it, you may turn a die to any side.
label: Pushing Slash

name: Temporary Truce
text: You can only include Kylo Ren and Rey on your team (you can include villain and hero cards in your deck). You cannot include Gray cards in your deck.
label: Temporary Truce

name: Force Connection
text: Action - Exhaust this support and spot 2 Blue characters to turn one of their character dice to a side showing the same symbol as one of the other character's character dice.
label: Force Connection

name: Mysteries of the Force
text: Action - Discard this support from play and remove 5 of your dice showing one of each of the symbols: melee damage ([melee]), shield ([shield]), resource ([resource]), special ([special]), and blank ([blank]). Then play up to 3 upgrades from your hand and/or discard pile for free.
label: Mysteries of the Force

name: Niman Mastery
text: Blue character only. Limit 1 form per character. After you play this upgrade, turn a character or upgrade die to any side. [special] - Turn a character and upgrade die to the sides of your choice.
label: Niman Mastery

name: Niman Training
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Turn an upgrade die to any side. You may discard this upgrade to play a card titled Niman Mastery from your hand or discard pile on attached character for free.
label: Niman Training

name: Untamed Power
text: Apprentice character only. [special] - If this upgrade is on a hero, give a character 1 shield and remove a die showing damage. If it is on a villain, deal 1 damage to a character and remove a die not showing damage.
label: Untamed Power

name: Chain Lightning
text: Deal 1 damage to a character. Then you may spend 1 resource to deal 2 damage to another character that shares a subtype with that character.
label: Chain Lightning

name: Focused Fire
text: Resolve up to 2 of your dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) against the same character, increasing each of their values by 1.
label: Focused Fire

name: Hull Breach
text: Remove one of your dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]) to either discard a support from play that costs equal to or less than the value showing on the removed die, or deal that much indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
label: Hull Breach

name: Off The Sensors
text: Spot a Red character to choose one: â€¢ Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1. â€¢ Activate 2 of your characters or supports. â€¢ Remove a scoundrel die.
label: Off The Sensors

name: Seizing Territory
text: Ambush. Spot a trooper to take control of the battlefield.
label: Seizing Territory

name: Shields Are Down
text: Choose a character that has no shields and remove one of its character dice.
flavor: "Someone has to take that shield gate down." <cite>K-2SO</cite>
label: Shields Are Down

name: Shortcut
text: Spot a vehicle to switch the battlefield with a set-aside battlefield.
label: Shortcut

name: You Are In Command Now
text: Ambush. Play a title from your hand or discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1 and ignoring its play restrictions.
label: You Are In Command Now

name: Aftermath
text: After a character is defeated, you may exhaust this to gain 1 resource.
flavor: "We're not murderers! We got what we needed, the mission was over." <cite>Iden Versio</cite>
label: Aftermath

name: AT-RT
text: The modifier sides of this die can be resolved with one of your trooper dice showing any symbol.
label: AT-RT

name: Coruscant Police
text: After you play this support, you may remove a scoundrel die.
flavor: "Hands where we can see them. You are coming with us."
label: Coruscant Police

name: Admiral
text: Leader character only. After you play this upgrade, you may spend 2 resources to ready a character or vehicle. [special] - Exhaust this upgrade to ready a character or vehicle.
label: Admiral

name: Communication Module
text: Modify droid character or support. After you activate attached droid, if it is a character, you may turn a support die to any side. If it is a support, you may turn a character die to any side.
label: Communication Module

name: Dead Or Alive
text: Play only if you spot a bounty hunter. After attached character is activated, you may gain 1 resource. After attached character is defeated, you may gain 1 resource.
label: Dead Or Alive

name: Bad Credit
text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing a resource ([resource]).
flavor: "Republic credits are no good out there, I need something more real." <cite>Watto</cite>
label: Bad Credit

name: Disassemble
text: Discard a diceless support, upgrade, or downgrade from play.
label: Disassemble

name: Encircle
text: Spot 3 exhausted characters to remove all character dice.
flavor: "The director says their reconditioning process is excruciating, but effective." <cite>L3-37</cite>
label: Encircle

name: I Performed Violence
text: Ambush. Resolve one of your character or droid dice showing melee damage ([melee]) as unblockable, increasing its value by 1, or by 2 instead if it is a Mr. Bones die.
label: I Performed Violence

name: Kinship
text: Spot 3 characters that share a subtype to gain 1 resource, or 2 resources instead if you spot 6 characters that share a subtype.
label: Kinship

name: Outpace
text: Spot a Yellow character to choose one: â€¢ Reroll up to 3 dice. â€¢ Force an opponent to lose 1 resource. â€¢ Remove a leader die.
label: Outpace

name: Practice Makes Perfect
text: Choose a die and reroll it up to 5 times.
flavor: "I'm sure you'll pick it up on the fly." <cite>Sabine Wren</cite>
label: Practice Makes Perfect

name: Reversal
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]). Then deal damage to a character equal to the value showing on that die.
label: Reversal

name: Simple Mistake
text: The player who controls the battlefield chooses a die in their pool. Then remove that die or resolve it as if it were in your pool.
label: Simple Mistake

name: Unify
text: Choose a character subtype on one of your characters. Until the end of the round, your other characters gain the chosen subtype.
label: Unify

name: Any Means Necessary
text: Action - Exhaust this plot and remove one of your bounty hunter dice to deal 1 unblockable damage to a character, or 2 unblockable damage instead if that character has 3 or more bounties on it.
label: Any Means Necessary

name: Canto Bight Security
text: After this support is discarded from your hand by an opponent's effect, you may play it for free.
label: Canto Bight Security

name: Mining Guild TIE Fighter
text: After an opponent's effect causes you to lose 1 or more resources, you may activate this support to deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to them.
flavor: The Mining Guild used a modified yellow Imperial TIE fighter for security purposes.
label: Mining Guild TIE Fighter

name: Bounty Hunter Mask
text: Attached character has +1 health and gains bounty hunter.
flavor: "You certainly have the right... disposition." <cite>Bossk</cite>
label: Bounty Hunter Mask

name: DX-2 Disruptor Blaster Pistol
text: Damage dealt by this die or by a die that it modifies is unblockable.
flavor: This weapon was banned among the Rebel Alliance for its destructive potential. Some operatives carried one anyway.
label: DX-2 Disruptor Blaster Pistol

name: Inflict Pain
text:
Deal 2 damage to one of your characters to deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
After this event is discarded from your deck, you may add it to your hand.
label: Inflict Pain

name: Grappling Arm
text: Modify droid character or support. Action - Remove this die to discard a trap from play.
label: Grappling Arm

name: Rocket Booster
text: Modify droid character or support. Action - Activate attached droid. Then resolve any number of its character, support, and upgrade dice. Discard this upgrade.
label: Rocket Booster

name: Canto Casino
subtitle: Canto Bight
text: Power Action - Spend 1 resource to reroll 2 dice. Then, if those dice are showing the same value, gain 2 resources, or 3 resources instead if they are also showing the same symbol.
label: Canto Casino - Canto Bight

name: Jabba's Palace
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Claim - Gain 1 resource. You may spot a bounty hunter to force an opponent to lose 1 resource.
label: Jabba's Palace - Tatooine

name: Nightsister Lair
subtitle: Dathomir
text: After you play a downgrade for the first time each round, you may gain 1 resource.
label: Nightsister Lair - Dathomir

name: Snoke's Throne Room
subtitle: Supremacy
text: Claim - Spot a hero character to give a character 1 shield. Spot a villain character to remove 1 shield from an opponent's character.
label: Snoke's Throne Room - Supremacy

name: Darth Bane
subtitle: Ancient Master
text: Decrease the cost of the first ability you play on this character each game by 2. [special] - Choose an upgrade on this character and deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to that upgrade's cost.
flavor: "I was the last survivor."
label: Darth Bane - Ancient Master

name: Darth Vader
subtitle: Victor Leader
text: Piloting. [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. Then, if that character was just defeated, discard the vehicle it was piloting.
label: Darth Vader - Victor Leader

name: Pong Krell
subtitle: Deadly Imposter
text:
You can include up to 4 different Blue hero cards in your deck.
After you activate this character, you may place a hero card in any player's discard pile on the bottom of their deck. Then deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Pong Krell - Deadly Imposter

name: Snoke's Praetorian Guard
text: After you activate this character, you may remove one of its character dice showing damage to remove a die showing damage with a value of 2 or less.
label: Snoke's Praetorian Guard

name: Recurring Nightmare
text: This die can only be resolved against attached character.
label: Recurring Nightmare

name: Entropic Blast
text: Deal 2 damage to each character that has one or more of its character dice in a pool.
flavor: "The temple's starting to collapse." <cite>Ezra Bridger</cite>
label: Entropic Blast

name: Legacy of the Sith
text: Play a Blue upgrade from your discard pile, or play it for free instead if you have a defeated character that is 20 or more points.
flavor: "Why do you come to my tomb?" <cite>Darth Bane</cite>
label: Legacy of the Sith

name: Pincer Movement
text: Activate 2 of your Blue characters. Then turn each of a character's character and upgrade dice to sides showing a blank ([blank]).
flavor: Elite Praetorian Guards worked in pairs to neutralize and overwhelm their foes.
label: Pincer Movement

name: Quad Slam
text: Choose up to 4 characters and remove one character die belonging to each of them.
flavor: "You dare to attack a Jedi?" <cite>Pong Krell</cite>
label: Quad Slam

name: Trap the Blade
text: Remove a die showing melee damage ([melee]). If it is an upgrade die, you may spot a Blue character and spend 1 resource to discard its matching card from play.
label: Trap the Blade

name: Treason
text: Spot a Blue character to remove an opponent's character die showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]). Then that opponent deals damage to one of their characters equal to the value showing on that die.
label: Treason

name: Rule of Two
text: If you do not control exactly 2 characters, one that is a Sith and the other an apprentice, set this plot aside an deal 1 indirect damage to yourself. Action - If you have exactly one character die in your pool, exhaust this plot to resolve it, increasing its value by 1.
label: Rule of Two

name: Bloodletting
text: Action - Exhaust this support and deal 1 damage to a character you control to turn one of its character or upgrade dice to any side.
flavor: "I need but a drop for the ritual to begin." <cite>Darth Sidious</cite>
label: Bloodletting

name: Darth Vader's Tie Advanced
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. You may place 1 damage on a vehicle. Then, if Darth Vader is piloting this support, you may discard a vehicle that has 2 or more damage.
label: Darth Vader's Tie Advanced

name: Ancient Sith Armor
text: Redeploy. Before attached character takes damage, you may exhaust this upgrade to block 1 damage. After you play an ability on attached character, you may ready this upgrade.
label: Ancient Sith Armor

name: Death Field
text: Blue character only. Action - Exhaust this upgrade to roll this die into your pool. [special] - Deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters.
label: Death Field

name: Pong Krell's Lightsaber
text: Power Action - Spot Pong Krell or spend 1 resource to roll a set-aside copy of this die ([CM]17) into your pool. Set that die aside after it is resolved or removed. [special] - Deal 2 damage to up to 2 characters.
label: Pong Krell's Lightsaber

name: Sith Lord
text: Sith character only. [special] - Reroll this die instead of removing it. You may exhaust this upgrade to use a special ability ([special]) on attached character or on a blue ability on attached character.
label: Sith Lord

name: Vibro-Arbir Blades
text: Elite character only. After you play this card from your hand, you may play a set-aside copy of it ([CM]19) (paying its cost.).
flavor: A pair of blades could be combined to form a double-bladed sword.
label: Vibro-Arbir Blades

name: Commander Pyre
subtitle: Harsh Negotiator
text: After you claim or take control of the battlefield, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
flavor: "You will come with us, or be destroyed."
label: Commander Pyre - Harsh Negotiator

name: Director Krennic
subtitle: Death Star Mastermind
text: The point value of your Death Star plot is decreased by 1. After you activate this character, you may turn one of your dice to a side showing a value of 1.
flavor: "I will not fail."
label: Director Krennic - Death Star Mastermind

name: Elrik Vonreg
subtitle: Major Baron
text: Piloting. While one or more of this character's character dice are in your pool, its piloted vehicle's support and upgrade dice cannot be removed by opponent's effects.
label: Elrik Vonreg - Major Baron

name: Imperial Death Trooper
text: While you control Director Krennic, this character has Guardian. Power Action - Turn this die to a side showing the same symbol and value as another one of your dice.
flavor: Skilled as elite commandos and bodyguards.
label: Imperial Death Trooper

name: Imperial Pilot
text: Piloting. Power Action - If this character is piloting a Red vehicle, turn its support die to any side.
label: Imperial Pilot

name: Cruel Methods
text: After you claim or take control of the battlefield, you may deal 1 damage to attached character.
flavor: "You have a lovely voice, General Syndulla." <cite>Arindha Pryce</cite>
label: Cruel Methods

name: Call to Action
text: Spot a character that is 15 or fewer points to roll all of its character dice into your pool.
flavor: "Do it." <cite>Orson Krennic</cite>
label: Call to Action

name: Face the Enemy
text: Spot an exhausted character to force an opponent to draw 2 cards. Then look at that opponent's hand and place up to 2 cards from it on top of their deck in any order.
label: Face the Enemy

name: I'll Handle This Myself
text: Turn one of your character dice to any side. If you control exactly one character, you may resolve that die.
label: I'll Handle This Myself

name: Taking Charge
text:
Ambush.
If you control the battlefield, remove a die. If you do not control the battlefield, take control of it and you may reroll a die.
label: Taking Charge

name: Construct the Death Star
text: Action - Remove 2 of your dice each showing a resource ([resource]) to place 2 resources on this plot. Then, if 15 or more resources are on this plot, you win the game.
label: Construct the Death Star

name: Elrik Vonreg's TIE Interceptor
text: Action - If Elrik Vonreg is piloting this support, remove this die to discard an opponent's vehicle from play that costs equal to or less than the value showing on this die.
flavor: "We can't even touch him!" <cite>Mia Gabon</cite>
label: Elrik Vonreg's TIE Interceptor

name: The "Duchess"
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to each of your opponents' characters. Then deal 1 additional damage to each of those characters that are a trooper.
flavor: "You named your weapon after my sister?" <cite>Bo-Katan Kryze</cite>
label: The "Duchess"

name: Tie Bomber
text:
This support enters play with 3 resources on it.
[special] - Remove 1 resource from this support to deal 4 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. You may return this support to your hand.
label: Tie Bomber

name: Viper Probe Droid
text: After a die rolls damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]), you may spot a Red character and spend 1 resource to remove that die. Then discard this support.
label: Viper Probe Droid

name: Commander Pyre's Blaster
text: After you play this upgrade on Commander Pyre, you may take control of the battlefield.
label: Commander Pyre's Blaster

name: Director
text: Leader character only. After you resolve or remove one of your Red dice showing a resource ([resource]), you may exhaust this upgrade to roll that die into your pool.
flavor: "Oh, it's beautiful." <cite>Orson Krennic</cite>
label: Director

name: E-11D Blaster Rifle
text:
While this upgrade is on an elite character, it has Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade on a non-unique character, you may gain 1 resource.
label: E-11D Blaster Rifle

name: Boba Fett
subtitle: Infamous And Ruthless
text: After an opponent's character is defeated, for each bounty on it, you may roll one of this character's character or upgrade dice into your pool.
flavor: "He's no good to me dead."
label: Boba Fett - Infamous And Ruthless

name: Kragan Gorr
subtitle: Pirate Captain
text: After you activate this character, you may activate one of your pirates. If an opponent has an exhausted character and no dice showing damage, you may take 1 resource from them.
flavor: "Tonight, we get paid."
label: Kragan Gorr - Pirate Captain

name: Pyke Sentinel
text: Guardian.
flavor: Their job conditions are so toxic that sentinels must wear sealed, radiation-proof suits.
label: Pyke Sentinel

name: Synara San
subtitle: Opportunistic Infiltrator
text: After you activate this character, if an opponent has an exhausted character and no dice showing damage, you may force them to choose and discard a card from their hand.
flavor: "Let's trash this place!"
label: Synara San - Opportunistic Infiltrator

name: Trandoshan Hunter
text: Power Action - Spot a downgrade to turn one of your bounty hunter dice to a side showing damage.
flavor: Their predatory origins made Trandoshans gifted hunters.
label: Trandoshan Hunter

name: Forced Labor
text: After attached character is defeated, you may roll one of its character dice into its owner's pool. Then either resolve that die for free as if it were in your pool or remove it.
label: Forced Labor

name: Pestering
text: After this die is rerolled, you may reroll one of attached character's character dice.
flavor: "Help me." <cite>Yonak</cite>
label: Pestering

name: Change of Fortune
text: Choose a symbol. Then reroll any number of an opponent's dice. Remove each of those dice that just rolled the chosen symbol.
flavor: "They blow you up today, you wll blow them up tomorrow. It's j-just business." <cite>DJ</cite>
label: Change of Fortune

name: Opportune Strike
text: If each of your opponents has an exhausted character and no dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], [indirect]), deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to each of them.
label: Opportune Strike

name: Plunder
text: Play only if you do not control the battlefield. Spot any number of pirates to take that many resources from an opponent.
flavor: "I smell profit! Nice, juicy, fat, warm profits." <cite>Hondo Ohnaka</cite>
label: Plunder

name: Warning Shot
text: Choose an opponent's die and remove it unless they give you one resource.
label: Warning Shot

name: Pirate Ship
text: After you activate this support, you may remove a die showing damage. You may activate one of your pirates.
flavor: "You heard Kragan. Attack!" <cite>Skreek</cite>
label: Pirate Ship

name: Slave I
text: Your Boba Fett and Jango Fett each have Piloting. After this support becomes piloted by a bounty-hunter, you may deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Slave I

name: Boba Fett's Wrist Laser
text:
After you play this upgrade on Boba Fett, you may gain 1 action.
After you resolve this die, discard this upgrade from play unless you discard a card from your hand.
label: Boba Fett's Wrist Laser

name: Pyke Blaster
text: While this upgrade is on a character that has Guardian, it has Redeploy.
flavor: The Pyke Syndicate favored BlasTech A-300 blaster rifles for their guards.
label: Pyke Blaster

name: Anakin Skywalker
subtitle: Dedicated Mentor
text: After you activate this character, you may discard a card from your hand to move 1 shield from a character to another character. Then draw a card if you moved that shield to an apprentice.
flavor: "There's no time for caution."
label: Anakin Skywalker - Dedicated Mentor

name: Jedi Knight
text:
After setup, you may give this character 2 shields.
[special] - Give a character 1 shield. Then deal 1 damage to a character, or 2 damage instead if this character has 3 or more shields.
label: Jedi Knight

name: Kanan Jarrus
subtitle: Jedi Exile
text: This character's point value is decreased by 1 if your team has another Spectre. After you activate this character, you may choose a symbol and a die. Then an opponent turns that die to a side not showing the chosen symbol.
label: Kanan Jarrus - Jedi Exile

name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Red Five
text: Piloting. The point value of your Death Star plot is decreased by 1. Before you resolve a support die of a vehicle piloted by this character, you may increase its value by 1.
label: Luke Skywalker - Red Five

name: Forestall
text: Turn up to 2 of your dice to sides showing a shield ([shield]).
flavor: "I won't leave you. Not this time." <cite>Ahsoka Tano</cite>
label: Forestall

name: Fresh Start
text: Remove a character die. Then discard cards from the top of a deck equal to the value showing on that die.
flavor: "I have to tell you something... I hate your hair." <cite>Hera Syndulla</cite>
label: Fresh Start

name: Luminous Beings Are We
text: Roll all of your defeated Jedi character dice into your pool. Set those dice aside after they have been resolved or removed.
flavor: "Not this crude matter." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: Luminous Beings Are We

name: Nullify
text: Move 1 shield from one of your characters to an opponent's character. Then remove a die.
label: Nullify

name: Skillful Deterrence
text: For each elite character die in your pool, you may remove a die showing the same symbol as that die.
label: Skillful Deterrence

name: Stand Firm
text: Remove any number of your dice showing a shield ([shield]) to remove that many dice.
flavor: "Around the survivors, a perimeter creat." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: Stand Firm

name: Trust Your Feelings
text: Reroll up to 2 of your dice. Then you may resolve one of your dice. Then you may use the action on your plot titled Destroy the Death Star for free.
label: Trust Your Feelings

name: Valiant Deed
text: Remove an upgrade die. Then you may spot a mission plot to roll an apprentice die on one of your characters into your pool.
label: Valiant Deed

name: Jedi Trials
text: Action - Spot an apprentice character that has 3 Blue abilities, 3 shields, and its character dice are showing a combined value of 3 or more. Then heal 3 damage from it, ready it, it gains Jedi and it gains 1 die (add a set-aside copy of its character die on it). Set this plot aside.
label: Jedi Trials

name: Luke Skywalker's X-Wing
text: Power Action - Reroll this die or, if Luke Skywalker is piloting this support, turn this die to any side.
label: Luke Skywalker's X-Wing

name: Anakin Skywalker's Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
Discard this upgrade from play if you control Rey's Lightsaber.
After you play this upgrade, give a character you don't control 1 shield. Then give a character 2 shields.
label: Anakin Skywalker's Lightsaber

name: Kanan Jarrus' Lightsaber
text: After an opponent's die is turned, you may turn this die to any side. Then, if this upgrade is on Kanan Jarrus, you may exhaust it to turn one of his character dice to any side.
label: Kanan Jarrus' Lightsaber

name: Padawan Braid
text: Blue character only. Attached character gains apprentice and has +1 upgrade limit.
label: Padawan Braid

name: Hera Syndulla
subtitle: Seasoned Captain
text: Piloting. After this character begins piloting a vehicle, you may spend 2 resources to ready that vehicle.
label: Hera Syndulla - Seasoned Captain

name: Kashyyyk Warrior
text: Before you resolve one of this character's character dice showing damage, increase its value by 1 if this character has 6 or more damage.
flavor: Fierce warriors who were not afraid to shed their blood in order to protect their homeland.
label: Kashyyyk Warrior

name: Kazuda Xiono
subtitle: Naive Hotshot
text: Piloting. After you activate this character, you may spend 1 resource to exhaust a vehicle.
flavor: "The best starfighter pilot in the galaxy.
label: Kazuda Xiono - Naive Hotshot

name: Poe Dameron
subtitle: Reckless Aviator
text: Piloting. Power Action - Spot a vehicle that has no damage to place 1 damage on it. Then resolve its support die showing damage, increasing its value by 1, or by 2 instead if this character is piloting it.
label: Poe Dameron - Reckless Aviator

name: Tarfful
subtitle: Chieftain of Kachirho
text: Each other Wookiee character you control has +1 health. Before you resolve one of this character's character dice showing damage, increase its value by 1 if this character has 6 or more damage.
label: Tarfful - Chieftain of Kachirho

name: Feat of Strength
text: Spot a character that has 10 or more health to remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee], [indirect]), or up to 2 dice showing damage instead if that character has 15 or more health.
label: Feat of Strength

name: Imposing Figure
text: Gain 1 resource if you control the character that has the most health (including ties).
label: Imposing Figure

name: Plan of Attack
text: Turn one of your dice to any side. Then you may spot a card titled Death Star Plans to turn another one of your dice to any side.
label: Plan of Attack

name: Run to Safety
text: Heal 1 damage from a character. Then you may heal 2 damage from another character that shares a subtype with that character.
flavor: "We'll make for that ridge." <cite>Ki-Adi-Mundi</cite>
label: Run to Safety

name: Swing In
text: Spot any number of characters that each have 10 or more health to roll one character die on each of them into your pool.
flavor: During the Battle of Kashyyyk, Wookiee troopers ambushed their foes from nearby cliffs.
label: Swing In

name: Trench Run
text: Activate one of your pilots and one of your vehicles. Then you may spot a Death Star plot to play a card titled Trust Your Feelings from your hand or discard pile.
flavor: "Use the Force, Luke." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
label: Trench Run

name: Destroy the Death Star
text: After setup, give this plot 20 shields. You can resolve your pilot and vehicle dice showing ranged damage against this plot. Action - If this plot has no shields, spend 1 resource to reroll 1 of your pilot dice and 1 of your vehicle dice. Then, if both of those dice are showing damage, you win the game.
label: Destroy the Death Star

name: Fireball
text:
After resolve this die, place 1 damage on this support.
After this die rolls a blank ([blank]), if Kazuda Xiono is not piloting this support, remove all damage on it and deal that much indirect damage to yourself.
label: Fireball

name: Ghost
text: Ambush. After this support enters play, you may activate a Spectre you control. After you resolve this die, you may give each character piloting this support 1 shield.
label: Ghost

name: Phantom
text: Power Action - Spot Ghost to attach this support to it as a mod upgrade (it is no longer a support). Action - This upgrade becomes a support (Do not ready it. Return this die to its card).
label: Phantom

name: Rebel Hangar
text: After you play this support, search your deck for up to 2 vehicles with a combined cost of 4 or less and play them for free. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: The rebel base on Yavin 4 was cleverly hidden beneath an old Massassi temple.
label: Rebel Hangar

name: Wookiee Protection
text: Each of your Wookiee characters has Guardian. After you remove a die using Guardian, you may exhaust this support to draw a card.
label: Wookiee Protection

name: Fortitude
text: Attached character has +3 health, or +4 health instead if it is a Wookiee.
flavor: A wound that would kill a human will only make a Wookiee angry.
label: Fortitude

name: Master Smuggler
text: After you activate this character, you may resolve one of your scoundrel dice as if it were showing a resource.
flavor: Smuggling is the easy part. The trick is defending your haul.
label: Master Smuggler

name: Sabine Wren
subtitle: Artistic and Resourceful
text:
Piloting.
[special] - Deal 2 indirect damage to an opponent, or 3 indirect damage instead if you have a Blue die, a Red die, and another Yellow die in your pool.
label: Sabine Wren - Artistic and Resourceful

name: Sinjir Rath Velus
subtitle: Ex-Loyalty Officer
text: After you resolve one of this character's character dice, you may place a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck to remove a die showing the same symbol as that die.
flavor: "I am excellent at causing pain."
label: Sinjir Rath Velus - Ex-Loyalty Officer

name: Torra Doza
subtitle: Energetic Thrill-Seeker
text: Piloting. After this character begins piloting a vehicle, you may resolve one of that vehicle's support or upgrade dice.
label: Torra Doza - Energetic Thrill-Seeker

name: Vengeful Wookiee
text: Before you activate this character, you may reroll a die. Then you may remove a die if this character has 6 or more damage.
flavor: "I know where they're really taking the Wookiees. Have you heard of the spice mines of Kessel?" <cite>Ezra Bridger</cite>
label: Vengeful Wookiee

name: As One
text: Reroll a die. Then resolve up to 3 of your Spectre dice.
flavor: "Stand up together, because that's when we're strongest-as one." <cite>Ezra Bridger</cite>
label: As One

name: Lead from the Front
text:
Decrease the cost of this event by 1 for each different symbol showing on your dice.
Resolve up to 3 of your dice, increasing each of their values by 1.
label: Lead from the Front

name: Loth-Cat and Mouse
text: Force an opponent to remove one of your dice. Then remove one of their dice.
label: Loth-Cat and Mouse

name: Pride and Joy
text: Play only if you control exactly one vehicle support. Resolve one of your vehicle dice without removing it.
label: Pride and Joy

name: Reciprocate
text: Ready an opponent's character. Then gain 1 resource.
label: Reciprocate

name: Blue Ace
text:
Before you resolve this die, remove any number of resources from this support to increase its value by that number.
After you resolve this die, you may place 1 resource on this support.
label: Blue Ace

name: Bucket
text: [special] - Gain 1 resource and either place 1 resource on a support or remove 1 damage fom a support.
flavor: The astromech R1-J5 was a mechanic for Team Fireball and long-time comanion of Jarek Yeager.
label: Bucket

name: Sabine Wren's TIE Fighter
text: Ambush. After this die modifies a Spectre die, you may discard a card from your hand to roll this die into your pool.
flavor: "It's some of my best work" <cite>Sabine Wren</cite>
label: Sabine Wren's TIE Fighter

name: Custom Paint Job
text: Modify vehicle support. After you play this upgrade, choose a color. Attached vehicle and its die become that color. Then reroll up to 2 dice.
label: Custom Paint Job

name: Fling
text: Spot a Wookiee character to exhaust another character that has less health than that Wookiee.
flavor: Only a few possessed the strength necessary to launch a fully grown Trandoshan into the air.
label: Fling

name: Wookiee Rage
text: Ambush. Until the end of the action phase, each "Before" ability on your Wookiee characters that contains "has 6 or more damage" now says "has 1 or more damage" instead..
label: Wookiee Rage

name: Spectre Cell
text: Include only if each character on your team is a Spectre
flavor: "We're a crew. A team. In some ways, a family." <cite>Ezra Bridger</cite>
label: Spectre Cell

name: Valorous Tribe
text: Action - Exhaust this plot to move up to 2 damage from a character to a character you control. Then you may spot a Wookiee to heal 1 damage from a character.
label: Valorous Tribe

name: Acute Awareness
text: If a die was turned during an opponent's last turn this round, turn that die to any side.
flavor: "Your sight cannot be healed, but I can teach you to see if you're willing" <cite>Bendu</cite>
label: Acute Awareness

name: Bestow Wisdom
text: Spot a Jedi or Sith to move up to 2 Blue abilities from that character to an apprentice character.
flavor: "Padawan, terror is not a weapon the Jedi use." <cite>Luminara Undili</cite>
label: Bestow Wisdom

name: Falling Avalanche
text: Resolve one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]), increasing its value by 3, or by 4 instead if it is a character or upgrade die belonging to a character that has a card titled Shien Mastery on it.
label: Falling Avalanche

name: Fluid Riposte
text: Spot a Blue character to remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee], [indirect]). Then, if that character has a card titled Shien Mastery on it, deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Fluid Riposte

name: Infuse the Force
text: Spot a Sith to deal 1 damage to a character. Spot a Jedi to give a character 1 shield. Spot an apprentice to draw a card.
label: Infuse the Force

name: On Guard
text:
Ambush.
Give a character 1 shield or spend 1 resource to ready an upgrade.
label: On Guard

name: Side By Side
text: Reroll a die. Then you may remove a different die showing the same value as the die just rerolled.
flavor: "Hey, when I show off, it is instructive. And inspiring." <cite>Anakin Skywalker</cite>
label: Side By Side

name: Seeking Knowledge
text:
This support enters play with 2 resources on it.
After the action phase begins, remove 1 resource from this support. Then if no resources are on it, discard it to draw 3 cards.
label: Seeking Knowledge

name: Shien Mastery
text: Blue character only. Limit 1 form per character. After you play this upgrade, you may roll this die into your pool. [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. You may remove a die showing damage.
label: Shien Mastery

name: Shien Training
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. You may discard this upgrade to play a card titled Shien Mastery from your hand or discard pile on attached character for free.
label: Shien Training

name: Systems Malfunction
text: Modify opponent's vehicle support. [special] - Discard attached vehicle.
flavor: "Luke, we've got a malfunction in fire control." <cite>Dak Ralter</cite>
label: Systems Malfunction

name: Assail
text: Ambush. Spot a piloted vehicle to remove a die.
label: Assail

name: Command and Conquer
text: Spot a pilot to activate it. Spot a leader to turn one of your character dice to any side. Spot a trooper to resolve one of your dice.
label: Command and Conquer

name: Covert Mission
text: Give a character 1 shield. Spot a mission plot to search your deck for a card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
flavor: "We are not ready for open war." <cite>Mon Mothma</cite>
label: Covert Mission

name: Embark
text: Activate one of your characters or supports. Then, if you have 5 or more dice in your pool, turn one of them to a side with a symbol not showing on any of your dice.
label: Embark

name: Flanked by Wingmen
text: Activate one of your characters to give it 1 shield, or 2 shields instead if you spot 2 pilots.
flavor: "Come with me." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
label: Flanked by Wingmen

name: Joint Maneuver
text: Resolve one of your vehicle dice showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]), increasing its value by the number of characters piloting that vehicle.
label: Joint Maneuver

name: Sneak Attack
text: Ambush. Play a Red vehicle from your hand for free. After the upkeep phase begins, if that vehicle is in play, return it to its owner's hand.
label: Sneak Attack

name: Under Fire
text: Deal 1 damage to a Red character you control. Then remove a die.
label: Under Fire

name: Tactical Delay
text:
This support enters play with 2 resources on it.
After the action phase begins, remove 1 resource from this support. Then if no resources are on it, discard it to gain 2 actions.
label: Tactical Delay

name: Death Star Plans
text: Action - Exhaust this upgrade to place 1 resource on or remove 2 shields from your Death Star plot. After an opponent's effect deals damage to attached character, they may move this card to one of their characters.
label: Death Star Plans

name: Experimental Booster
text: Modify vehicle support. After this die rolles a blank ([blank]), discard attached vehicle unless it is piloted.
flavor: "I don't think the maintenance teams even tested it once." <cite>Jessika Pava</cite>
label: Experimental Booster

name: Licensed to Fly
text: Attached character gains pilot and has Piloting.
label: Licensed to Fly

name: Nar Shaddaa Thief
text: Power Action - If this character is exhausted and an opponent has at least 2 more resources than you, take 1 resource from them.
flavor: Nar Shaddaa was rife with criminals who coveted prized valuables, such as Luke Skywalker's lightsaber.
label: Nar Shaddaa Thief

name: Controlled Chaos
text: Choose a symbol. then reroll up to 5 dice. You may spend 1 resource to reroll any number of those dice again. For each of those dice showing the chosen symbol, deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
label: Controlled Chaos

name: Dangerous Escape
text: Discard all downgrades on a character. Then deal damage to that character equal to the number of downgrades discarded this way.
label: Dangerous Escape

name: Deadlock
text: Place 1 resource on a support you control. Place 1 resource on a support you do not control.
flavor: "I never ask for anything twice." <cite>Dryden Vos</cite>
label: Deadlock

name: Monopolize
text:
Decrease the cost of this event by 1 for each opponent that has no resources.
Remove a die. Then if you have 3 or more resources, gain 1 resource.
label: Monopolize

name: Reap
text:
Ambush.
Turn one of your dice to a side showing a resource ([resource]).
label: Reap

name: Rogue Tendencies
text: Spot a scavenger to gain 1 resource. Spot a scoundrel to reroll up to 3 dice. Spot a bounty hunter to discard a random card from an opponent's hand.
label: Rogue Tendencies

name: Survival Instinct
text: Give control of the battlefield to an opponent. Then remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.
flavor: The Jawaese language contains 27 words for "junk" and not a single one for "cowardice."
label: Survival Instinct

name: Taken by Surprise
text: Deal 1 damage to a ready character or spot a mission plot to deal 2 damage to a diceless character.
flavor: If the electrified net didn't trap the quarry, it would surely slow them down.
label: Taken by Surprise

name: Think on Your Feet
text: Remove 1 resource from a non-plot card you control to remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]).
flavor: You would be surprised how many problems a well-timed rocket can solve.
label: Think on Your Feet

name: Coaxium Heist
text: Include only if you bring a set-aside Pyke Sentinel ([CM]40) to the game. After set-up, add that character to an opponent's team. Action - If no opponent controls a Pyke Sentinel, set this plot aside and remove 4 of your dice each showing different symbols to gain 10 resources.
label: Coaxium Heist

name: Cloud Car
text: Action - Play this vehicle for free from your hand. After the upkeep phase begins, give control of this support to an opponent.
flavor: The twin pods housed both a pilot and a gunner.
label: Cloud Car

name: Double Agent
text: After the upkeep phase begins, deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself. Action - Discard an event from your hand to give control of this support to an opponent.
flavor: Be careful who you hire.
label: Double Agent

name: Improvised Explosive
text:
This support enters play with 2 resources on it.
After the action phase begins, remove 1 resource from this support. Then if no resources are on it, discard it to deal 3 indirect damage ([indirect]) to a player.
label: Improvised Explosive

name: Raiding Party
text: After you activate this support, you may remove 1 resource from a support or upgrade in play. Then gain 1 resource.
flavor: "I do love me a party." <cite>Weequay Pirate</cite>
label: Raiding Party

name: Repurposing
text: Action - Exhaust this support and set aside an equipment or weapon from an opponent's discard pile to play an equipment or weapon from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Repurposing

name: Magna-Glove
text: [special] - Spend resources equal to the cost of an opponent's equipment or weapon upgrade in play to move it to attached character. Then spot a scavenger to roll that upgrade's die into your pool.
label: Magna-Glove

name: Z-6 Jetpack
text:
This upgrade enters play with 1 resource on it.
[special] - Place 1 resource on this upgrade. Then deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the number of resources on this upgrade.
label: Z-6 Jetpack

name: Jawa Junk Dealer
text: After you activate this character, you may play a Gray neutral card from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.
flavor: "Hey, what're you trying to push on us?" <cite>Owen Lars</cite>
label: Jawa Junk Dealer

name: Outdated Tech
text: Modify opponent's vehicle support. Before attached vehicle's support die is resolved, you may reduce its value by 1.
label: Outdated Tech

name: Eject
text: Ambush. Discard a vehicle you control to heal 2 damage from one of its piloting characters and give that character 2 shields.
label: Eject

name: Harmless Trick
text: Spot a Gray character to remove a die.
flavor: There's a fine line between haggling and swindling
label: Harmless Trick

name: Salvaged Parts
text: Set aside 2 non-event cards from a discard pile. Then spot a scavenger to gain 1 resource.
flavor: "Togu togu!"
label: Salvaged Parts

name: Standoff
text:
Ambush.
Give each character 1 shield.
label: Standoff

name: Utinni!
text: Spot up to 4 Jawa characters to discard that many cards from the top of a deck.
label: Utinni!

name: Merchant Freighter
text:
This support enters play with 3 resources on it.
This support can be activated.
After you activate this support, you may remove 1 resource from it to gain 1 resource.
label: Merchant Freighter

name: Sandcrawler
text:
This support enters play exhausted.
[special] - Discard the top 4 cards of your deck to add a set-aside Jawa Junk Dealer ([CM]147) to your team.
flavor: one of these mobile fortresses was large enough to contain an entire Jawa clan.
label: Sandcrawler

name: Wretched Hive
text: Action - Exhaust this support and spot a scavenger to force an opponent to choose and discard a card from their hand unless they give you 1 resource.
label: Wretched Hive

name: Abandoned Refinery
subtitle: Savereen
text: Power Action - Discard a support or upgrade you control to play a support or upgrade from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1. Then draw a card.
label: Abandoned Refinery - Savereen

name: Colossus
subtitle: Castilon
text: After any player's character begins piloting a vehicle, that player may take control of this battlefield. After you take control of this battlefield, you may reroll a die.
label: Colossus - Castilon

name: Pyke Syndicate Mine
subtitle: Kessel
text: Claim - Discard the top card of a deck, or the top 2 cards instead if you spot a diceless character. If a non-event card is discarded this way, gain 1 resource.
label: Pyke Syndicate Mine - Kessel

name: Valley of the Dark Lords
subtitle: Moraband
text: Claim - Remove a non-character die.
label: Valley of the Dark Lords - Moraband

name: Anakin Skywalker
subtitle: Reckless One
text:
Parallel die Anakin Skywalker ([CM]53).
After you activate this character, deal 1 damage to him and 2 damage to another character. Then, if that character was just defeated, flip this character.
label: Anakin Skywalker - Reckless One

name: Darth Vader
subtitle: Driven By Anger
text: Parallel die Darth Vader ([AW]10). Power Action - Either remove all shields from a character, or resolve one of your dice as melee damage, increasing its value by 1. If an opponent has a defeated character, you may do both in any order.
label: Darth Vader - Driven By Anger

name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Seeking The Path
text:
Parallel die Luke Skywalker ([LEG]31).
Team Up 1: Obi-Wan Kenobi, Yoda.
After the upkeep phase begins, if this character has 3 or more shields and 3 or more Blue upgrades with dice, you may spend 2 resources to flip him.
label: Luke Skywalker - Seeking The Path

name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Fulfilling His Destiny
text: Parallel die Luke Skywalker ([AW]35). Power Action - Either give this character 2 shields, or remove 2 shields from him to deal 2 damage to a character. If this character has 3 or more Blue upgrades, you may do both in any order.
label: Luke Skywalker - Fulfilling His Destiny

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
subtitle: Wise Protector
text: Guardian. After this character is defeated, return him to play flipped and ready. Action - Spot another Blue character to remove a die showing damage. Defeat this character and, if he is elite, remove up to 3 dice.
label: Obi-Wan Kenobi - Wise Protector

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi's Spirit
text: Parallel die One With the Force ([AW]42). If this support would leave play, set it aside instead. Power Action - Give a Blue character 1 shield and reroll any number of its character and upgrade dice.
label: Obi-Wan Kenobi's Spirit

name: Sweeper Droid Infiltration
text: After setup, if this plot is elite, add an additional copy of it to your team. Action - Play an event from your hand to reroll a die. Then flip this plot.
label: Sweeper Droid Infiltration

name: Demolition Droid
text: Action - Play a non-event card from your hand to deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent. If 2 or more bomb plots are in play, you may set them all aside and deal 4 indirect damage to an opponent. If you do not, flip this plot.
label: Demolition Droid

name: Send in the Troopers
text: Action - If you control the battlefield and 5 or more dice in your pool are showing damage, force an opponent to name a character. Then flip this plot. If they did not name this character, make it elite.
label: Send in the Troopers

name: Arc Trooper Echo
subtitle: Courageous and Resolute
text: After you activate this character, if it is elite, you may roll a character die on a character into its controler's pool. If you control the battlefield, you may roll a character die on a character into its controller's pool.
label: Arc Trooper Echo - Courageous and Resolute

name: Arc Trooper Fives
subtitle: ARC-5555
text:
After you activate this character, roll a Clone Trooper ([LEG]38) die into your pool, or 2 Clone Trooper dice instead if this character is elite.
After a Clone Trooper die is rolled into your pool, you may reroll it. If you control the battlefield, you may reroll it again.
label: Arc Trooper Fives - ARC-5555

name: Clone Commander Wolffe
subtitle: Staunch Strategist
text: After you activate this character, you may roll a Clone Trooper ([LEG]38) die into your pool and activate one of your Red characters. If this character is elite and you control the battlefield, spot any number of unique Red characters to deal that much indirect damage to an opponent.
label: Clone Commander Wolffe - Staunch Strategist

name: Closing In
text: Team Up 1: Each unique bounty hunter. After you deal melee or ranged damage to a character with a bounty on it, you may exhaust this plot and flip it to attach it to that character.
label: Closing In

name: Captured
text: If this downgrade would leave play, set it aside instead. Attached character cannot be activated. Action - Give the player that controls this downgrade 1 resource to flip it. Any player may use this ability.
label: Captured

name: Rescue Han Solo
text: Team Up 1: Chewbacca, Lando Calrissian, Leia Organa, Luke Skywalker. Action - Play a card from your hand with a cost equal to the number of resources on this plot. Its cost cannot be decreased. Then place 1 resource on this plot and if it has 5 resources, flip it and exhaust it.
label: Rescue Han Solo

name: Han Solo
subtitle: Cool and Confident
text:
Piloting. Parallel die Han Solo ([AW]46).
After you activate this character, remove 1 resource from him to gain 1 resource.
After this character is defeated, lose all of your resources. Each opponent gains that many resources.
label: Han Solo - Cool and Confident

name: Choose Your Destiny
text:
Infinite format only. Choose 3 sets. You can only include other cards on your team and in your deck from those sets.
After you play a card, if you played cards from all 3 sets this round, flip this plot.
label: Choose Your Destiny

name: I Will Not Turn
text:
Your dice cannot be turned by opponents.
Before the round ends, gain 1 resource.
After an opponent plays a card, if they played cards from 3 different sets this round, flip this plot.
label: I Will Not Turn

name: United
text:
Include only if each character on your team is the same color.
After an opponent removes one of your dice, you may roll it into your pool. Then set this plot aside, or if it's elite, flip it instead.
label: United

name: We Stand
text: After an opponent removes one of your character dice, you may spend 2 resources and discard 2 cards from your hand to ready that character. Then set this plot aside.
label: We Stand

name: Mortis (Day)
subtitle: Ethereal Space
text: After the upkeep phase begins, heal 1 damage from each character. Flip this card. Claim - Heal 1 damage from a character. You may flip this card.
label: Mortis (Day) - Ethereal Space

name: Mortis (Night)
subtitle: Ethereal Space
text: After the upkeep phase begins, deal 1 damage to each character. Flip this card. Claim - Deal 1 damage to a character. You may flip this card.
label: Mortis (Night) - Ethereal Space

name: Ninth Sister
subtitle: Brutish Empath
text: [special] - Deal 3 damage to an opponent's character unless they discard 1 card from their hand, or 2 cards instead if that character has no shields.
label: Ninth Sister - Brutish Empath

name: Purge Trooper
text: You cannot play Blue abilities on this character. Before resolving this die, if this character has an upgrade on it, you may remove 1 shield from a character.
label: Purge Trooper

name: Second Sister
subtitle: Expert Duelist
text:
After you activate this character, turn an opponent's die to a symbol showing on one of this character's character dice
[special] - Turn another one of your character dice to any side and resolve it, increasing its value by 1, or by 2 instead if it is showing the same symbol as an opponent's die.
label: Second Sister - Expert Duelist

name: Taron Malicos
subtitle: Fallen Master
text: After you activate this character, if there are no dice showing shields in play, you may spend 1 resource to deal 2 damage to a character. Power Action - Spot up to two other Blue characters to turn that many of an opponent's dice to any side.
label: Taron Malicos - Fallen Master

name: Peace Is a Lie
text: Play only if all of your characters in play are Blue. Spot a Sith or Inquisitor to remove all shields from all characters.
label: Peace Is a Lie

name: Siphoning Anger
text: Turn one of your dice to a side showing a blank. Then, if an opponent has two or more dice showing a blank, gain 1 resource.
label: Siphoning Anger

name: Unending Hate
text: Spot a Sith or Inquisitor to turn an opponent's die to a side showing a blank. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of dice in that opponent's pool showing a blank, to a maximum of 2.
label: Unending Hate

name: Vicious Rebuttal
text: Choose an opponent's die showing damage. That opponent may resolve it for free without removing it from their pool. You may resolve that die.
label: Vicious Rebuttal

name: The Inquisitorius
text: Include only if each character on your team is an Inquisitor. Action - Exhaust this plot to turn an opponent's character die to a side showing a blank.
label: The Inquisitorius

name: Painful Lessons
text: After you play this support, spot any number of Blue characters to place that much damage on this support. Action - Move 1 damage from this support to one of your Blue characters to reroll a die.
label: Painful Lessons

name: Inquisitor Lightsaber
text: After this die rolls a blank, if this upgrade is on an Inquisitor, you may exhaust this upgrade to reroll it. Action - Discard a card to reroll this die. Any player may use this action.
label: Inquisitor Lightsaber

name: Sith Warblade
text:
Redeploy.
Before you resolve this die, deal 1 damage to attached character.
label: Sith Warblade

name: Taron's Lightsaber
text:
While this upgrade is on Taron Malicos, your copies of it are non-unique.
After you play this upgrade, remove all shields from a character. If 3 or more shields are removed this way, deal 1 damage to that character.
label: Taron's Lightsaber

name: ISB Agent
text:
Detect.
Before an opponent discards a card from hand, if it is not detected, you may force them to switch that card with one of their detected cards, if able (the detected card will be discarded).
label: ISB Agent

name: FN-2199
subtitle: Fierce Fighter
text: After setup, you may look at the top 4 cards of your deck, reveal a weapon from among them, and add it to your hand. Power Action - Roll a die on a weapon on this character into your pool and resolve it if able. Otherwise, remove it.
label: FN-2199 - Fierce Fighter

name: Exposing Disloyalty
text: Look at 2 random cards in an opponent's hand. Then, if those cards do not share a color, discard one of them.
label: Exposing Disloyalty

name: Extermination Order
text: Spot a Red trooper to deal 3 indirect damage to an opponent. Then spot a Red leader to gain 2 resources.
label: Extermination Order

name: Raze
text: Spot a Red character to discard an exhausted support or upgrade from play. Then deal indirect damage to its controller equal to half its cost rounded down.
label: Raze

name: TIE Striker
text: Action - If an opponent activated a vehicle during their last turn this round, you may discard another card from your hand to play this vehicle from your hand for free. After the upkeep phase begins, discard this support from play unless you discard the top 4 cards of your deck.
label: TIE Striker

name: FN-2199's Riot Baton
text: After attached trooper character takes damage, you may exhaust this upgrade to roll this die into your pool and resolve it, if able. Otherwise, remove it. [special] - Deal 3 damage to a non-unique character or remove a unique character's character or upgrade die.
label: FN-2199's Riot Baton

name: Bala Tik
subtitle: Reclaiming Debts
text:
Detect.
After the battlefield is claimed, you may give this character shields equal to the number of detected cards in an opponent's hand.
label: Bala Tik - Reclaiming Debts

name: Bazine Netal
subtitle: First Order Informant
text: Detect. After an opponent plays a detected card, you may deal 1 damage to a character. Power Action - Remove this die showing a resource to place or remove up to 2 resources on a non-character card.
label: Bazine Netal - First Order Informant

name: Bing
subtitle: Cybernetic Killer
text:
Detect.
Before you resolve this die showing damage, you may increase its value by one for each detected card in an opponent's hand.
After you activate this character, if an opponent has two or more detected cards in their hand, gain 1 action.
label: Bing - Cybernetic Killer

name: Haxion Brood Droid
text: Power Action - Deal 1 damage to another Haxion Brood Droid to resolve one of this character's character dice for free.
label: Haxion Brood Droid

name: Extort Cooperation
text: When you resolve this die showing a resource, place those resources on this downgrade instead of gaining them. Action - Remove a number of resources equal to the point value of attached character from this downgrade and discard it to take control of attached character.
label: Extort Cooperation

name: Booby Trap
text: Discard a detected card to deal indirect damage equal to its cost to that card's owner.
label: Booby Trap

name: Bounty Averted
text: Spot a bounty hunter and discard any number of bounties from an opponent's character. Then remove that number of that character's character or upgrade dice.
label: Bounty Averted

name: Rotten Deal
text: Force an opponent to look at the top 2 cards of their deck, then reveal one of them. You may play either of those two cards for free. Then the opponent may play the remaining card for free.
label: Rotten Deal

name: Kyuzo Petar
text: If attached character is Yellow, you may resolve this die as if it did not have a modifier.
label: Kyuzo Petar

name: Discord
text: Spot two characters that share a color and deal 1 unblockable damage to each of them to choose up to 2 of your dice. Then turn each of those dice to sides showing a different symbol than each other. You must pass on your next turn this round.
label: Discord

name: Cal Kestis
subtitle: Jedi in Hiding
text: You cannot play non-Blue upgrades on this character. Before you resolve this die, increase its value by 1 if you have an equipment, weapon and ability attached to this character.
label: Cal Kestis - Jedi in Hiding

name: Sifo-Dyas
subtitle: Foreseer of War
text: After you activate this character, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it is Blue, you may draw it. Otherwise, discard it.
label: Sifo-Dyas - Foreseer of War

name: Apt Lesson
text: Turn one of your Blue character dice to any side. Then you may play a move event from your hand or discard pile.
label: Apt Lesson

name: Protect the Younglings
text: Remove one of your Jedi character dice to give one of your apprentice characters 3 shields.
label: Protect the Younglings

name: Pursuit of Perfection
text: Play only if you spot a Jedi. This support enters play exhausted. Action - Exhaust this support, discard it, and remove any number of shields from your characters to resolve that many of your Blue dice in any order.
label: Pursuit of Perfection

name: BD-1
text: Power Action - Spot a Jedi character to move this upgrade to it. [special] - Heal 2 damage from attached character
label: BD-1

name: Cal Kestis' Lightsaber
text: Power Action - If this upgrade is on Cal Kestis, turn this die to any side. If this die is showing a non-damage side, you may roll a set-aside copy of this die into your pool. Set that die aside after it is resolved or removed.
label: Cal Kestis' Lightsaber

name: Force Repulse
text: Jedi character only. [special] - Turn each other character's character dice to sides showing a blank. Then, for each die turned, deal 1 damage to its matching character.
label: Force Repulse

name: Jaro Tapal's Lightsaber
text: Discard this upgrade from play if you control Cal Kestis' Lightsaber. While this upgrade is on Jaro Tapal, it has redeploy. Power Action - Discard this upgrade from play to play Cal Kestis' Lightsaber from your hand on attached character for free.
label: Jaro Tapal's Lightsaber

name: Cassian Andor
subtitle: Efficient Agent
text: Detect. You can include up to 4 different intel cards in your deck, ignoring affiliation and color. Power Action - Play a Yellow card from your hand. Then you may spot a leader to ready a non-character card.
label: Cassian Andor - Efficient Agent

name: Galen Erso
subtitle: Conscripted Physicist
text: Detect. After an opponent chooses to discard a detected card, you may gain 1 resource. Action - Defeat this character to exhaust a character or support.
label: Galen Erso - Conscripted Physicist

name: Jyn Erso
subtitle: Rebellion Operative
text: Detect. Detected cards cannot be played by opponents. Power Action - Discard a card from your hand to discard a detected card from an opponent's hand.
label: Jyn Erso - Rebellion Operative

name: Medic!
text:
Ambush.
Spot any number of Red characters to heal that much damage from a character.
label: Medic!

name: Rebel Schemes
text: Activate a character you control with detect. Then, instead of triggering their detect, reveal an opponent's hand and choose a card from it. That card remains revealed until the end of the action phase. (It is detected)
label: Rebel Schemes

name: Secret Mission
text: Draw cards equal to the number of detected cards in an opponent's hand. Then, if you drew 1 or more cards, set-aside a card from your hand facedown. For the rest of the game, you may play that card as if it were in your hand.
label: Secret Mission

name: Cassian's Blaster
text: Redeploy. Action - Resolve this die showing ranged damage, increasing its value by 1. If this upgrade is on Cassian Andor, that damage is unblockable.
label: Cassian's Blaster

name: Jyn Erso's Blaster
text:
Red character only.
After you play this upgrade choose and do 1, or choose 2 if this upgrade is on Jyn Erso:
- Roll this die into your pool.
- Resolve one of your dice.
- Activate a character.
label: Jyn Erso's Blaster

name: Master of Disguise
text: Spy character only. After you play this upgrade, choose a character in play. Attached character gains the subtypes of the chosen character. [special] - Resolve a character die that shares a subtype with the attached character.
label: Master of Disguise

name: Babu Frik
subtitle: Master Droidsmith
text: This character cannot be dealt melee or ranged damage from vehicle dice. Power Action - Discard a card from your hand to either turn a droid die to any side, or play a droid from any discard pile decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Babu Frik - Master Droidsmith

name: Greez Dritus
subtitle: Cantankerous Pilot
text:
Piloting.
After you activate this character, choose a number. Reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card's cost is the same as the number chosen, turn up to two of your dice to any side. Otherwise, force an opponent to remove one of your dice.
label: Greez Dritus - Cantankerous Pilot

name: Rebel Partisan
text: After the last card in your hand is discarded, discard the top card of your deck to deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.
label: Rebel Partisan

name: Saw Gerrera
subtitle: Ruthless Extremist
text: After this die is rolled or turned during the action phase, if this character is elite, deal 1 indirect damage to yourself.
label: Saw Gerrera - Ruthless Extremist

name: Change of Plans
text: Play only if all of your characters in play are Yellow. Resolve one of your Yellow support dice as if it was showing a different symbol
label: Change of Plans

name: Explosive Cocktail
text: Resolve one of your dice showing indirect damage to remove a die.
label: Explosive Cocktail

name: Hey Hey!
text: Spend any number of resources. Then spot an engineer to resolve one of your support dice, increasing its value by the number of resources you just spent.
label: Hey Hey!

name: Reckless Ambush
text: Spot a scoundrel or partisan to deal 2 indirect damage to yourself and remove a non-character die.
label: Reckless Ambush

name: Scrounging Parts
text: Spot any number of engineers to gain that many resources. Reveal your hand.
label: Scrounging Parts

name: Stinger Mantis
text: After you exhaust this support, you may discard a card from your hand to draw a card. Power Action - Exhaust this support to force an opponent to lose 1 resource, or 2 resources instead if you have fewer characters in play than that opponent.
label: Stinger Mantis

name: DL-18 Blaster
text: You may resolve the ranged sides [ranged] of this die as if they were a modifier with no resource cost.
label: DL-18 Blaster

name: Saw's RPS-6 Rocket Launcher
text: This die cannot modify other dice. Power Action - Resolve this die against yourself, as if it were not showing a modifier. Then deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the number of damaged characters you can spot plus 1.
label: Saw's RPS-6 Rocket Launcher

name: Unity
text: Spot two characters that share a color to remove a die. Then gain 1 resource.
label: Unity

name: Intelligence Operation
text: Include only if each character on your team is a spy. This card does not ready during the upkeep phase. Action - Exhaust this plot to play a detected card.
label: Intelligence Operation

name: Merrin
subtitle: Nightsister Survivor
text: You may include Blue villain curses in your deck. After setup, add a set-aside Nightsister Zombie ([SoH] 4) to your team. Power Action - Exhaust an opponent's character with a curse attached to it. Then roll that character's character and upgrade dice into their pool.
