label: Merrin - Nightsister Survivor

name: Force Affinity
text: Spot up to 2 apprentice, Sith, or Jedi characters to draw that many cards. Spot a Jedi to gain 1 resource. Spot a Sith to deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Force Affinity

name: Form Drills
text: Choose 2 different set-aside move events, reveal them, and shuffle them into your deck.
label: Form Drills

name: Sarlaac Sweep
text: Remove one of your character or upgrade dice showing damage to deal damage equal to half its value rounded up to two characters. Return this card to your hand if that character has an upgrade titled Shii-Cho Mastery on it.
label: Sarlaac Sweep

name: Will of the Force
text: Resolve one of your dice showing a shield without removing it from your pool. Then resolve that die again. Spot a card with the word Mastery in its title to gain 1 resource.
label: Will of the Force

name: Prescient Leap
text: After you resolve 2 or more Blue dice in the same action, you may place 1 resource on this card. Action - Discard this support to discard an opponent's upgrade or downgrade with a cost less than or equal to the number of resources on this support.
label: Prescient Leap

name: Shii-Cho Mastery
text: Blue character only. Limit 1 form per character. After you play this upgrade, you may spend 2 resources to discard a weapon from play. [special] - Turn a die showing damage to a side not showing damage. Then turn a die to a side showing melee damage.
label: Shii-Cho Mastery

name: Shii-Cho Training
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Turn a die showing damage to a side not showing damage. You may discard this upgrade to play a card titled Shii-Cho Mastery from your hand or discard pile on attached character for free.
label: Shii-Cho Training

name: Planned Operation
text: Spot a Red character to heal 2 damage from a character. Spot 2 Red characters to turn a die to any side. Spot 3 Red characters to resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1.
label: Planned Operation

name: Kamino Cloning Facility
text: After you resolve a Red die, you may place 1 resource on this support. Action - If this support has 11 or more resources on it, discard it and spend 2 resources to add a set-aside non-unique trooper character that matches your team's affiliation to your team.
label: Kamino Cloning Facility

name: Tactical Advantage
text: After an opponent takes an action, if you have claimed the battlefield this round, you may set this support aside to gain 1 action that you can take even if you would otherwise be forced to decline.
label: Tactical Advantage

name: Proton Bombs
text: Modify vehicle support. After this die is resolved, place 1 damage on this upgrade. Discard this upgrade from play if it has 2 or more damage on it.
label: Proton Bombs

name: R3 Astromech
text: Modify vehicle support. Action - Exhaust this upgrade and spend 1 resource to add or remove a token on the attached support or on one of the attached support's upgrades. (Damage tokens are always added/removed in increments of 1 damage)
label: R3 Astromech

name: Burned
text: Before this downgrade enters play, any player may spend 2 resources to discard it instead. Discard all titles attached to attached character.
label: Burned

name: Tailed
text: After attached character is activated, force its controller to choose one of attached character's character dice. Then you may spot an exhausted character or discard this downgrade to turn that die to any side.
label: Tailed

name: Demand Tribute
text: Spot a scoundrel to discard a random card from an opponent's hand for each color among characters they control.
label: Demand Tribute

name: Faltering Allegiances
text: Deal 1 damage to a Blue character. Deal 1 damage to a Red character. Deal 1 damage to a Yellow character.
label: Faltering Allegiances

name: Forewarned
text: Remove a die showing a value less than the cost of a detected card in an opponent's hand.
label: Forewarned

name: Selling Intel
text: Choose a detected card in an opponent's hand to gain 1 resource, or 2 resources instead if the chosen card's cost is 3 or more. The chosen card is undetected.
label: Selling Intel

name: Trash to Treasure
text: Play a weapon upgrade or vehicle support from an opponent's discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1 for each Yellow character or scavenger you can spot.
label: Trash to Treasure

name: Extremist Campaign
text:
You can only include Yellow characters on your team.
During setup, you lose the starting character roll.
After setup, lose the game unless you shuffle 2 set-aside copies each of Disable ([EaW] 137), Rebel ([SoR] 112), and Act of Cruelty ([AtG] 38) into your deck.
label: Extremist Campaign

name: Incendiary Stockpile
text: You can resolve your Yellow dice showing resources or disrupt as melee damage against this support, placing damage on this card equal to the damage dealt. Action - Discard this support to deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the amount of damage on it.
label: Incendiary Stockpile

name: Sliced Terminal
text: Before an opponent's card would be resolved after being played, you may discard this support from play to discard that card instead. Then that opponent may play a card from hand for free.
label: Sliced Terminal

name: Vibrosword
text:
Redeploy.
Decrease the cost of this upgrade by 1 if you play it on a Yellow character. Before you resolve this die, increase its value by 1 if attached character is unique and increase its value by 1 if attached character is elite.
label: Vibrosword

name: Restraining Bolt
text: Modify opponent's droid character or support. The attached character or support's dice cannot be turned.
label: Restraining Bolt

name: Sneaky Diversion
text: Choose a detected card to switch it with the top card of its owner's deck. (The card from the deck inherits the effect from detect when switched and will be detected)
label: Sneaky Diversion

name: Pirate Slugthrower
text:
Redeploy.
This upgrade cannot be discarded from play. Decrease the cost of this upgrade by 1 for each character you can spot that shares a color
label: Pirate Slugthrower

name: Stolen Datapad
text: Spy or scoundrel character only. Before one of your dice would be removed by an opponent, discard this upgrade to have that die not be removed instead.
label: Stolen Datapad

name: Darth Zannah
subtitle: Student of the Sith
text: After you activate this character, deal 1 damage to another Sith you control to roll a character die on it into your pool. After a Sith character you control is defeated, this character gains their dice and Sith for the rest of the game.
label: Darth Zannah - Student of the Sith

name: Kylo Ren
subtitle: Driven by Fear
text:
Before drawing your starting hand, you may shuffle 2 copies each of Feel Your Anger ([AW]82) and Anger ([SoR]71) into your deck.
After you activate this character, deal 2 indirect damage to an opponent. Force that opponent to turn this character's character dice to sides of their choice.
label: Kylo Ren - Driven by Fear

name: Maul
subtitle: Consumed by Revenge
text: After you play an event, place 1 resource on this card. If this character has 7 or more resources on it, you may spend 2 resources to flip this card.
label: Maul - Consumed by Revenge

name: Maul
subtitle: Conqueror of Mandalore
text: After you play an event, place 1 resource on this card. Power Action - Play a Blue event with an even cost from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1. [special] - Gain 2 resources or resolve any die. If this character has 7 or more resources on it, you may do both in any order.
label: Maul - Conqueror of Mandalore

name: Savage Opress
subtitle: Loyal Sibling
text: Team Up 1: Maul. Guardian. Power Action - Discard a card from your hand and spend 3 resources. Then flip this character.
label: Savage Opress - Loyal Sibling

name: Savage Opress
subtitle: Dark Acolyte
text:
Guardian.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character or turn a die to a side showing a value of 0. If this character has 6 or more damage, you may do both in any order.
flavor: "Brother, I am an unworthy apprentice."
label: Savage Opress - Dark Acolyte

name: Tenth Brother
subtitle: Tested by the Force
text: [special] - Use a special ability on another card in play (yours or an opponent's).
label: Tenth Brother - Tested by the Force

name: The Haunted
text: Play only if you spot a witch. After attached character is defeated, add a set-aside Nightsister Zombie ([SoH]4) to your team.
label: The Haunted

name: Chant of Resurrection
text: Exhaust one of your witch characters to add 3 set-aside Nightsister Zombies ([SoH]4) to your team. After the action phase ends, defeat those Nightsister Zombies.
label: Chant of Resurrection

name: Force Drain
text:
Before you play this event, decrease its cost by 1 if an opponent's character has a downgrade on it.
Exhaust one of your Blue characters to deal 3 damage to an opponent's character. Then, if that character is defeated, heal 5 damage from one of your Blue characters.
label: Force Drain

name: Your Powers Are Weak
text: Spot an Inquisitor or Sith to choose a symbol. Reroll up to 3 of an opponent's dice. For each of those dice showing the chosen symbol, remove it. Otherwise, turn it to a side showing a blank.
label: Your Powers Are Weak

name: Watch Your Career With Great Interest
text: After you turn or remove a die, place 1 resource on this plot. Action - Defeat one of your Sith or apprentice characters and remove 6 resources from this plot. Then, if the defeated character was elite, this plot becomes elite. Flip this plot.
label: Watch Your Career With Great Interest

name: Darth Vader
subtitle: Unrelenting Apprentice
text: [special] - Play an ability from your hand or discard pile, decreasing its cost by 2. Then roll that ability's die into your pool.
label: Darth Vader - Unrelenting Apprentice

name: Interrogation Chair
text: Action - Spot an Inquisitor and exhaust this support to choose an opponent's character die. Then deal 2 indirect damage to that opponent unless they resolve that die.
label: Interrogation Chair

name: Nightsister Assassins
text: Play only if you spot a witch. After you play this card, you may deal 1 damage to a character with a curse on it.
label: Nightsister Assassins

name: General Veers
subtitle: Death Squadron General
text: After the start of the first round of the game, you may spend 2 resources to add a set-aside Snowtrooper ([RM]15) to your team. Power Action - Take control of the battlefield.
flavor: "General, prepare your troops for a surface attack." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
label: General Veers - Death Squadron General

name: Kendal Ozzel
subtitle: Bumbling Tactician
text: Before the starting character roll, each opponent may choose to lose the starting character roll to give 2 shields to their characters, distributed as they wish.
flavor: "He is as clumsy as he is stupid." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
label: Kendal Ozzel - Bumbling Tactician

name: Snowtrooper
text: While you are fighting on Hoth, this character has +1 health.
flavor: The elite snowtroopers of the Galactic Empire are trained and equipped to operate in frigid environments.
label: Snowtrooper

name: Tseebo
subtitle: Spectre Sympathizer
text:
Detect.
After this character's Detect ability detects a hero card, give an opponent's character two shields.
label: Tseebo - Spectre Sympathizer

name: Enfilading Fire
text: Spend up to 2 resources to resolve that many of your non-unique Red character dice showing damage against each of an opponent's characters.
label: Enfilading Fire

name: Offensive Position
text: If an opponent removed one of your Red dice during their last turn, roll it into your pool. Take control of the battlefield.
label: Offensive Position

name: Reckless Charge
text: Choose any number of your non-unique Red characters and deal 3 damage to each of them. Ready those characters.
label: Reckless Charge

name: Salvage the Assault
text: Exhaust 2 of your non-unique Red characters. Then gain 2 resources.
label: Salvage the Assault

name: Relentless Advance
text: Team Up 1: Each trooper, General Veers. At the end of the round or when you take control of the battlefield, place 1 damage on this plot. Action - Remove any amount of damage on this plot to deal that much indirect damage to an opponent.
label: Relentless Advance

name: 501st Assault Team
text:
This support can be activated.
After you activate this support, you may play a set-aside E-Web Emplacement ([SoR]5) for free. You may take control of the battlefield or give control of the battlefield to an opponent.
label: 501st Assault Team

name: Blizzard 1
text:
This card's cost cannot be decreased.
After you activate this support, you may roll a set-aside copy of this die into your pool. Set that die aside after it is resolved or removed.
label: Blizzard 1

name: XJ9-CS14
text: [special] - Switch the battlefield with a set-aside battlefield and give control of it to an opponent.
label: XJ9-CS14

name: Electrohammer
text: After this die deals damage to a character, you may remove one of that character's character or upgrade dice.
label: Electrohammer

name: Garindan
subtitle: Information Trader
text:
Detect.
After a detected card leaves any player's hand, you may draw a card.
[special] - Choose a card in any player's discard pile and roll its die into your pool. Set that die aside after it is resolved or removed.
label: Garindan - Information Trader

name: Skreek
subtitle: Warbird Enforcer
text:
Piloting.
After you activate this character, if one or more of this character's character dice are showing damage, you may spend 1 resource to remove an opponent's die showing damage.
label: Skreek - Warbird Enforcer

name: Ziro The Hutt
subtitle: Crime Lord
text: Power Action - Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and play a downgrade from among them. Place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then deal 1 damage to an opponent's character with a downgrade on it.
label: Ziro The Hutt - Crime Lord

name: Everybody Profits
text: Give an opponent 1 resource to deal 3 indirect damage to them.
label: Everybody Profits

name: Salvage Run
text: Take 1 resource from an opponent. Spot a scoundrel or pirate to remove an opponent's die showing a value of 2 or less.
label: Salvage Run

name: Triple Dark Attack
text: Ambush. Choose an opponent's character and force them to activate it. Then you may activate one of your pirate characters.
label: Triple Dark Attack

name: Den of Thieves
text:
Discard this support if it has 3 or more damage on it.
Before a Yellow character would be dealt damage, you may place that amount of damage on this card instead.
After an opponent loses 1 or more resources, remove 1 damage from this support.
label: Den of Thieves

name: Painful Losses
text: After your effect causes an opponent to lose 1 or more resources, you may exhaust this support. Then deal damage to an opponent's character equal to half the number of pirates or scavengers you can spot, rounded down.
label: Painful Losses

name: Pirate Crew Member
text: Before you resolve this die showing damage, you may increase its value by 1 if all characters on your team share a color.
label: Pirate Crew Member

name: Burryaga Agaburry
subtitle: Savior of Hetzal
text: Power Action - Remove one of this character's character dice showing damage to play an event from hand, reducing its cost by 1.
label: Burryaga Agaburry - Savior of Hetzal

name: Jaro Tapal
subtitle: Selfless Master
text:
Team Up 1: Cal Kestis.
Guardian.
Before this character takes damage, you may resolve one of its character dice showing damage.
label: Jaro Tapal - Selfless Master

name: Jedi Apprentice
text: Include only if you have a Jedi on your team. Weapons on this character gain redeploy.
flavor: "Mind what you have learned. Save you it can." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: Jedi Apprentice

name: Leia Organa
subtitle: Adept Student
text:
Guardian.
After you activate this character, reveal the top card of your deck. Give a character shields equal to the cost of that card.
flavor: "There is... another." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: Leia Organa - Adept Student

name: Luminara Unduli
subtitle: Patient Master
text: Each apprentice character you control has +1 health. [special] - Choose and do two of the following: Discard a random card from an opponent's hand. Give a character 1 shield. Roll an apprentice die on one of your other cards into your pool.
label: Luminara Unduli - Patient Master

name: Qui-Gon Jinn
subtitle: Venerable Maverick
text: This character has +1 shield limit and +1 upgrade limit. Power Action - Remove 1 shield from one of your characters with 3 or more shields to gain 1 resource.
flavor: "There is always hope, my friend..."
label: Qui-Gon Jinn - Venerable Maverick

name: Force Mirage
text: Spot 2 Blue characters to resolve one of your dice showing a shield as if it were showing a different symbol.
label: Force Mirage

name: Force Reflexes
text: Choose a Blue die in your pool to remove up to 2 dice showing a combined value less than or equal to the chosen die's value plus 1.
label: Force Reflexes

name: Move Along
text: Spot a Blue character that is 17 or more points to either exhaust a non-unique card or remove a non-unique die.
label: Move Along

name: You Will Go to the Dagobah System
text: Give 3 shields to one of your apprentice characters. Add a set-aside Jedi Trials ([CM]65) to your team.
label: You Will Go to the Dagobah System

name: The Jedi Code
text: Include only if each character on your team is a Jedi or apprentice. Action - Remove one of your dice showing a shield and exhaust this plot to remove an opponent's die showing damage.
label: The Jedi Code

name: Force Heal
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Deal 1 damage to one of your characters to heal 2 damage from a different character.
label: Force Heal

name: Leia Organa's Lightsaber
text:
Before you resolve this die increase its value by the number of shields on attached character.
While this upgrade is on Leia Organa, it gains Redeploy.
label: Leia Organa's Lightsaber

name: Admiral Ackbar
subtitle: Brilliant Tactician
text: Piloting. After setup, if this character is elite, you may add a set-aside X-Wing ([AtG]86) to your play area (without paying its cost). After the upkeep phase begins, you may add a set-aside X-Wing ([AtG]86) to your play area (without paying its cost).
label: Admiral Ackbar - Brilliant Tactician

name: Bothan Spy
text:
Detect.
After this character's Detect ability detects a support or upgrade, you may play a set-aside copy of Death Star Plans ([CM]126) on this character for free.
flavor: "Many Bothans died to bring us this information" <cite>Mon Mothma</cite>
label: Bothan Spy

name: Chewbacca
subtitle: Commanding Force
text: Guardian. After a Guardian ability removes an opponent's character die, deal 1 damage to that die's matching character. Power Action - Move two damage among your characters as you wish.
label: Chewbacca - Commanding Force

name: Dak Ralter
subtitle: Rogue Gunner
text:
Piloting.
After you activate this character, move 1 shield from a card you control to another card you control or give 1 shield to one of your characters.
label: Dak Ralter - Rogue Gunner

name: General Rieekan
subtitle: Mastermind
text: Power Action - Draw cards equal to the number of this character's character dice showing shields.
label: General Rieekan - Mastermind

name: Rebel Sniper
text: Power Action - Discard a card from your hand to resolve one of this character's character dice, increasing its value by 1.
label: Rebel Sniper

name: Heroic Protector
text: Activate one of your characters with Guardian. This turn, after that character's Guardian ability removes a die, deal damage to a character equal to the value of the die removed.
label: Heroic Protector

name: K-3PO
text: After an opponent claims the battlefield, you may play this card from your discard pile. Power Action - Discard this card from play to use the claim ability or power action on the battlefield, even if it has been used this round.
label: K-3PO

name: Redemption
text: After you activate this support, roll 2 set-aside Medical Droid ([TP]26) dice into your pool. Set those dice aside after they are resolved or removed.
label: Redemption

name: Rogue One
text: After you activate this support, you may remove 1 shield from a card or, if Luke Skywalker or Dak Ralter are piloting this vehicle, you may remove a die showing a value of 0.
label: Rogue One

name: Rogue Two
text: After you activate this support, spot a unique Red character to reroll a die.
label: Rogue Two

name: Wasaka Berry Plant
text: Action - If all characters on your team share a subtype, exhaust this support to heal 2 damage from a character.
label: Wasaka Berry Plant

name: Wookiee Fluttercraft
text: After you activate this support, if there is no damage on it, you may move 1 damage from a character with Guardian to this card.
label: Wookiee Fluttercraft

name: Veteran of War
text:
Unique Red character only.
After you play this upgrade, you may spend 1 resource to heal 2 damage from attached character.
[special] - Resolve one of your Red dice, increasing its value by 1. Remove an opponent's die.
label: Veteran of War

name: Benthic
subtitle: "Two Tubes"
text: Piloting. After an opponent claims the battlefield, deal 2 damage to a character. Power Action - Deal 1 indirect damage to yourself to remove a die showing damage.
label: Benthic - "Two Tubes"

name: Dash Rendar
subtitle: Outer Rim Hotshot
text: Piloting. Power Action - Play a Yellow card from your hand, giving it Ambush.
flavor: "Han Solo, ha. If I'm around, you don't need that guy."
label: Dash Rendar - Outer Rim Hotshot

name: Lumpawaroo
subtitle: Chewbacca's Pride
text:
Guardian.
After this character is dealt damage during the action phase, deal half that damage to a character, rounded down.
Before you resolve one of this character's character dice showing damage, increase its value by 1 if this character has 6 or more damage.
label: Lumpawaroo - Chewbacca's Pride

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
subtitle: "Rako Hardeen"
text:
You may play Blue upgrades on this character, ignoring play restrictions.
Detect 2.
After you activate this character, if an opponent has a detected event, gain 1 resource.
label: Obi-Wan Kenobi - "Rako Hardeen"

name: Wullffwarro
text: After setup, you may spot another wookiee to add a set-aside wookiee to your team as elite or non-elite. Deal indirect damage to yourself equal to the added character's point value.
label: Wullffwarro

name: Grand Theft Speeder
text: Modify opponent's vehicle support. After attached support is activated, you may discard this downgrade to resolve one of its support or upgrade dice.
label: Grand Theft Speeder

name: Let's Make a Deal
text:
Play only if all characters on your team share a color.
Give an opponent 1 resource to remove up to 3 of their dice showing damage.
label: Let's Make a Deal

name: Rallying Cry
text:
Play only if an opponent dealt damage to one of your characters during their last turn.
Spot a Yellow character to remove an opponent's die showing a value of 2 or less.
label: Rallying Cry

name: Sound the Horn
text: Include only if you have an Ewok on your team. Each time you play a trap, place a resource on this plot. Action - If this plot has 3 resources, you may set it aside and spend 3 resources to add 4 set-aside Ewok Warriors ([SoH]95) to your team. Place 3 damage on each one.
label: Sound the Horn

name: Outrider
text:
After you activate this support, look at the top 2 cards of your deck and place 1 of those cards on the bottom of your deck, then add the other card to your hand.
[special] - Play the bottom card of your deck for free or resolve one of your dice without removing it from your pool.
label: Outrider

name: Defensive Perimeter
subtitle: Hoth
text: Power Action - Remove one of your dice to give a character 2 shields.
label: Defensive Perimeter - Hoth

name: Harness the Force
text: Spot a Blue character to turn one of your dice to a side showing a special ([special]). Then you may resolve that die.
label: Harness the Force

name: Rising Whirlwind
text: Spot a Blue character with 2 weapons on it to reroll 2 dice. Then remove one of those dice with the lowest value (you choose in case of a tie).
label: Rising Whirlwind

name: Force Valor
text:
Play only if you spot a Blue character.
[special] - Choose and do two of the following:
 Deal 1 damage to a character.
 Heal 1 damage from a character.
 Turn a die to a side not showing a special ([special]).
label: Force Valor

name: Jar'Kai
text: Blue character only. Limit 1 form per character. Attached character has +2 upgrade limit. Before you resolve an attached character's weapon die, if attached character has 2 or more weapons on it, increase its value by 1.
label: Jar'Kai

name: Lightsaber Tonfa
text:
After you play this upgrade, you may spend 1 resource to place 1 resource on it.
Increase the value of this die by the number of resources on this upgrade.
label: Lightsaber Tonfa

name: Quilloned Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade or it is moved to a character, if it is on a hero character, heal 1 damage from it. If it is on a villain character, deal 1 damage to an opponent's character.
label: Quilloned Lightsaber

name: Power of the Tribe
text: Remove a die. Then, if all characters on your team share a subtype, you may remove another die showing a different symbol and value.
label: Power of the Tribe

name: Small Battles Won
text: Resolve one of your Red dice showing a value of 1 without removing it from your pool.
label: Small Battles Won

name: Tactical Retreat
text: Give control of the battlefield to an opponent to give shields to your characters equal to the number of Red characters you can spot, distributed as you wish.
label: Tactical Retreat

name: Extra Firepower
text: Action - Set this plot aside to resolve up to 2 of your dice, increasing each of their values by 1.
label: Extra Firepower

name: Tactical Superiority
text: Before you play an opponent's card, exhaust this support to decrease its cost by 1.
label: Tactical Superiority

name: Security Baton
text:
Redeploy.
After you roll this die into your pool, you may reroll it.
Before you resolve this die, you may remove 1 shield from an opponent's character.
label: Security Baton

name: Doctor Aphra
subtitle: Archaeologist
text: After setup, you may shuffle up to 6 set-aside non-character droids into your deck (ignoring deckbuilding restrictions). After you play a droid, you may deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.
label: Doctor Aphra - Archaeologist

name: Hondo Ohnaka
subtitle: Ultimate Pragmatist
text:
After you activate this character, you may roll 2 set-aside Pirate Loyalist ([RM]27) dice into your pool.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to an opponent's character, or 3 damage if one of your effects caused an opponent to lose 1 or more resources this round.
label: Hondo Ohnaka - Ultimate Pragmatist

name: Dark Memories
text:
Redeploy.
After attached character activates, deal 1 damage to it.
label: Dark Memories

name: Headstrong
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove up to 2 dice that were rolled into the pool last turn.
label: Headstrong

name: Unfair Trade
text: Resolve one of your dice showing disrupt. Then switch resources with the opponent that die was resolved against.
label: Unfair Trade

name: The Ultimate Heist
text: Team Up 1: Each pirate. After one of your effects causes an opponent to lose 1 or more resources, place resources on this plot equal to the number of resources lost. If this plot has 4 or more resources, spot a pirate character to flip this card and attach it to that character.
label: The Ultimate Heist

name: Master of Pirates
text: Power Action - Take 1 resource from an opponent. [special] - Give an opponent 1 of your resources. Then resolve any die (yours or an opponent's) and gain 1 action.
label: Master of Pirates

name: Black Market Arm
text: Attached character has +1 health, or +2 health instead if attached character is a pirate or bounty hunter.
label: Black Market Arm

name: Hustling
text: [special] - Gain 1 resource or remove a resource from a non-plot card.
label: Hustling

name: Syndicate Electrostaff
text:
Play only if all characters on your team share a subtype.
Decrease the resource cost on attached character's character and upgrade dice by 1.
label: Syndicate Electrostaff

name: Fury
text: Spot a character that is 17 or more points to remove an opponent's die.
label: Fury

name: Mandalorian Executioner Vibro-Ax
text:
Character with 13 or more health only.
Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
label: Mandalorian Executioner Vibro-Ax

name: Cloud City
subtitle: Bespin
text: Power Action - Look at an opponent's hand and, if you spot a pilot, discard a card from it with a cost of 0. Then that opponent may draw a card.
label: Cloud City - Bespin

name: Cyber Center
subtitle: Anexes
text: Claim - Your hand size is increased by 1 until the end of this round (Draw an additional card during the upkeep phase at the end of this round). Heal 1 damage from a character.
label: Cyber Center - Anexes

name: Perimeter Outpost
subtitle: Hoth
text: Select only if your team has 2 or more Red characters. Power Action - Gain 2 actions. Give control of this battlefield to an opponent.
label: Perimeter Outpost - Hoth

name: Death of CT-4040
text: 40/40 Format Only. You may include one additional plot on your team. Before setup, shuffle 10 additional cards into your draw deck following normal deckbuilding restrictions. Then set this plot aside.
label: Death of CT-4040

name: Alazmec Colonist
text: After you activate this character, set aside a random card from an opponent's discard pile to deal indirect damage to that player equal to that card's cost.
label: Alazmec Colonist

name: Darth Momin
subtitle: Force Savant
text: After this character is defeated, return him to play flipped, ready and attach it to one of your characters. Power Action - Play a Blue ability from your hand, reducing its cost by 1 if an opponent has one or more dice showing a blank.
label: Darth Momin - Force Savant

name: Mask Of Momin
text: This upgrade cannot be replaced. Power Action - Deal 1 damage to attached character. Play a Blue ability from your discard pile, reducing its cost by 1 if an opponent has one or more dice showing a blank.
label: Mask Of Momin

name: Grand Inquisitor
subtitle: Inquisitorius Leader
text: Team Up 1: Each other Inquisitor. [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character and resolve one of your character or upgrade dice showing damage, increasing its value by 2 if an opponent has one or more dice showing a blank.
label: Grand Inquisitor - Inquisitorius Leader

name: No Second Chances
text: Play only if you spot an Inquisitor. Increase damage dealt to attached character by 1. After the upkeep phase begins, attached character's owner may discard this downgrade to deal 5 damage to an opponent's Inquisitor.
label: No Second Chances

name: Dark Contrition
text: Spot two Blue characters to resolve one of your die showing melee damage with a value of 2 or less as if it were showing discard.
label: Dark Contrition

name: Dark Dispatch
text: Spot an Inquisitor to remove a die showing damage. Then turn a die to a side showing a blank. Then roll 1 set-aside Purge Trooper([FA]2) die into your pool.
label: Dark Dispatch

name: Why Take The Chance
text: Spot a Sith or Inquisitor to deal 1 damage to one of your other characters. Then turn a die to a side showing a value of 0.
label: Why Take The Chance

name: Sith Eternal Cultist
text: Power Action - Spot a Sith to remove one of your dice showing a blank. Then turn one of your dice to any side.
label: Sith Eternal Cultist

name: Fortress Vader
text: After you play this support, spot a Sith to force each player to shuffle all cards in their hand back into their deck and draw cards up to their hand size. Action - Exhaust this support to draw a card. Then, if an opponent has one or more dice showing a blank, gain 1 resource.
label: Fortress Vader

name: Force Crush
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Choose an opponent's character or upgrade die. Deal unblockable damage to a character equal to the value showing on that die. Then turn that die to a blank.
label: Force Crush

name: Grand Inquisitor's Lightsaber
text: [special] - If an opponent has a die showing a blank, you may exhaust this upgrade to roll one of attached character's character dice into your pool. Reroll this die instead of removing it.
label: Grand Inquisitor's Lightsaber

name: Sith Wayfinder
text: Action - Exhaust this upgrade to turn one of your dice to a side showing a blank. Then turn another one of your dice to any side.
label: Sith Wayfinder

name: Dr. Pershing
subtitle: Remnant Scientist
text: After you activate this character, place a resource on this character. Power Action - Exhaust this character and remove 4 resources from it to return one of your defeated characters to the game ready and place 5 damage on it.
label: Dr. Pershing - Remnant Scientist

name: Incinerator Trooper
text: After this character is defeated, deal 1 damage to each character you control.
label: Incinerator Trooper

name: Moff Gideon
subtitle: Ruthless Mastermind
text: Detect 2. After you activate this character, you may play an opponent's detected weapon or vehicle for free. Then deal indirect damage to yourself equal to half its cost rounded up. After the action phase ends, if that card is still in play, return it to its owner's hand.
label: Moff Gideon - Ruthless Mastermind

name: Danger Close
text: Deal 1 indirect damage to yourself to play a vehicle or artillery from your discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Danger Close

name: Deserted
text:
Force an opponent to choose one:
 -You remove 2 of their dice.
 -They discard 2 random cards from their hand.
 -They lose 2 resources.
label: Deserted

name: Intel Breach
text: Discard a random card from an opponent's hand. If that card is an event, you may place a card from a discard pile on top of its owner's deck. Then spot a leader to draw a card. Set this card aside.
label: Intel Breach

name: Overwhelming Forces
text:
Play only if you have more ready characters than an opponent.
Deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's ready characters.
label: Overwhelming Forces

name: Rewritten History
text: Reveal the top 3 cards of a player's deck. Choose and discard 2 of the revealed cards. Then shuffle that deck.
label: Rewritten History

name: Dark Trooper
flavor: "These are third-generation design. They are no longer suits. The human inside was the final weakness to be solved. They're droids." <cite>Dr. Pershing</cite>
label: Dark Trooper

name: Outland TIE Fighter
text:
You may include up to 4 copies of this support in your deck.
Ambush.
Before you play this support, decrease its cost by 1 if you spot an Outland TIE Fighter.
label: Outland TIE Fighter

name: MSE-6 Droid
text: Cost X is equal to the number of MSE-6 Droids you control. This Card Does not ready during the upkeep phase. Action - Exhaust this support and spot any number of MSE-6 Droids to turn that many dice to any side.
label: MSE-6 Droid

name: Cruel Tactician
text:
Unique Red character only.
After you play this upgrade, you may deal 1 damage to one of your characters to resolve one of its character or upgrade dice, increasing its value by 1.
label: Cruel Tactician

name: Cad Bane
subtitle: Callous Outlaw
text: Before an opponent's character is defeated, you may move one of their weapon or equipment upgrades to this character.
flavor: "Now all I need's a new hat."
label: Cad Bane - Callous Outlaw

name: Gamorrean Fighter
text: Power Action - Reroll this die and an opponent's character die. Then deal 2 damage to the character whose die just rolled the lowest value (you choose in the case of a tie). If this character was dealt damage from this ability, remove this die to gain 1 resource.
label: Gamorrean Fighter

name: IG-11
subtitle: Programmable Hunter
text: You may include IG-11 on a team that also includes a hero engineer(you can include villain and hero cards in your deck).
flavor: "I will initiate self-destruct."
label: IG-11 - Programmable Hunter

name: Now It's Personal
text: Play only if you have one or more defeated unique characters. After attached character is defeated, you may ready a bounty hunter.
label: Now It's Personal

name: Chemical Strike
text: Spot a Yellow character to deal 2 damage to each character.
label: Chemical Strike

name: Grab
text: Gain resources equal to the number of an opponent's dice you removed during your last turn this round. Choose one of those removed dice that is not in the pool and its owner may roll that die back into their pool.
label: Grab

name: Interdiction Field
text: Exhaust any number of your supports. Then exhaust the same number of an opponent's supports.
label: Interdiction Field

name: Self-Destruct
text: Either discard one of your droid supports from play or defeat one of your droid characters to deal 3 indirect damage to an opponent.
label: Self-Destruct

name: Smash
text: Resolve one of your dice showing damage. Then remove up to a number of dice equal to half that die's value rounded up.
label: Smash

name: Hostage Situation
text: After you play this support, remove one of your dice to remove an opponent's character die and place it here. Return that die to its matching card if this support leaves play. Action - Discard this support from play and its owner gains 1 resource. Only opponents can use this action.
label: Hostage Situation

name: Xanadu Blood
text: Your Cad Bane has Piloting. Power Action - Remove this die to move an upgrade from a character to another character controlled by the same player.
label: Xanadu Blood

name: Gas Bomb
text: After this die rolls a blank, discard this upgrade to play a set-aside Chemical Strike treating it as if you can spot a Yellow character (even if you cannot).
label: Gas Bomb

name: Path Engine
text: Modify vehicle support. After attached support is exhausted by a non-activation effect, you may exhaust this upgrade to ready the attached vehicle.
label: Path Engine

name: Ahsoka Tano
subtitle: Searching The Galaxy
text: Power Action - Exhaust 2 weapons attached to this character to roll those weapons' dice into your pool.
flavor: "There aren't many Jedi left."
label: Ahsoka Tano - Searching The Galaxy

name: Grogu
subtitle: The Child
text: After this character is defeated, return it to play flipped and give control of it to an opponent. After you activate this character, deal 1 damage to it and search your deck for a Blue ability. Discard it and roll its die into your pool. Set that die aside after it is resolved or removed. Shuffle your deck.
label: Grogu - The Child

name: Force Experiments
text: After one of your characters is defeated, flip this card and give control of it to an opponent. Power Action - Set aside a Blue ability from a discard pile to roll its die into your pool. Set that die aside after it is resolved or removed.
label: Force Experiments

name: Guardian Of The Whills
text: Guardian. You cannot play Blue abilities on this character.
label: Guardian Of The Whills

name: Ki-Adi-Mundi
subtitle: Methodical Master
text: After you play a card from your discard pile, you may give a character 1 shield. Power Action - Play a Blue weapon or equipment from your discard pile.
label: Ki-Adi-Mundi - Methodical Master

name: Dissuade
text:
Renew 2. (You may play this card from your discard pile for its Renew cost. Then set it aside.)
Spot a Blue character to remove a non-Blue die.
label: Dissuade

name: I Sense A Trap
text:
Renew 2. (You may play this card from your discard pile for its Renew cost. Then set it aside.)
Discard any number of cards from the top of your deck. Then give a character shields equal to the number of cards discarded.
label: I Sense A Trap

name: Tranquility
text:
Exhaust one of your characters to gain 1 resource.
After this is discarded from your deck, you may play it.
label: Tranquility

name: Protect The Child
text:
Include only if you have Grogu in your team.
Before your Grogu takes damage, you may exhaust this plot to have another character you control take that damage instead.
label: Protect The Child

name: Millennium Falcon
text:
Your Rey has Piloting.
After this support becomes piloted by a Blue character, you may give 1 shield to a character.
flavor: "Garbage will do!" <cite>Rey</cite>
label: Millennium Falcon

name: Renewal
text: After a card is discarded from your deck, you may exhaust this support to gain 1 resource.
label: Renewal

name: Seeing Stone
text: Action - Exhaust this support. Then discard the top card of your deck to reroll any number of your dice.
flavor: "This is the seeing stone, are you seeing anything?" <cite>Din Djarin</cite>
label: Seeing Stone

name: Ahsoka Tano's Lightsaber
text: While this upgrade is on Ahsoka Tano, your copies of it are non-unique. If attached character has exactly two weapon upgrades on it, increase the value of this die by 1.
label: Ahsoka Tano's Lightsaber

name: Ki-Adi-Mundi's Lightsaber
text: After you play this upgrade, you may discard a Blue card from your hand to give attached character 2 shields.
label: Ki-Adi-Mundi's Lightsaber

name: Cara Dune
subtitle: Vengeance Of Alderaan
text: If this character has a weapon on it, you may resolve her damage sides as ranged. Power Action - Resolve one of this character's character dice showing damage and either increase its value by 1 if it is against a villain character or give a character 1 shield if it is against a hero character.
label: Cara Dune - Vengeance Of Alderaan

name: Rebel Pilot
text: Piloting.
label: Rebel Pilot

name: Wedge Antilles
subtitle: Flight Instructor
text:
Piloting.
After you activate a pilot, you may give that character shields equal to the number of character dice that just rolled a blank.
label: Wedge Antilles - Flight Instructor

name: Contraband Seizure
text: Take resources from a player equal to the number of resources they took from you during their last turn this round. Draw a card.
label: Contraband Seizure

name: Coordinated Strike
text: Remove up to 3 shields from your characters to resolve one of your piloted vehicle dice, increasing its value by the number of shields removed.
label: Coordinated Strike

name: Pitch In
text: Spot up to 3 Red upgrades to gain that many resources.
label: Pitch In

name: Roll In The Mud
text: Activate one of your characters and one of an opponent's characters. Then remove one of the dice that just rolled in.
label: Roll In The Mud

name: Strategic Strike
text: Remove any number of your dice to discard a support from play that costs equal to or less than the combined value of those dice.
label: Strategic Strike

name: Armory
text: Action - Discard this support to play a weapon, decreasing its cost by 1. If that weapon was played on a Red character, draw a card.
label: Armory

name: R2-D2
text: [special] - Resolve another side of this die.
label: R2-D2

name: Wedge's X-Wing
text: After this support becomes piloted by Wedge Antilles, you may give him 1 shield. After this die rolls a blank, you may place 1 damage on an opponent's support or upgrade. Power Action - Remove this die to discard a support or upgrade with damage on it equal to or more than its cost.
label: Wedge's X-Wing

name: Cara Dune's Blaster
text: Attached character's weapon dice showing blanks may be resolved as melee damage with a value of 1. If this upgrade is on Cara Dune, it gains Redeploy.
label: Cara Dune's Blaster

name: Din Djarin
subtitle: The Mandalorian
text: Power Action - Play an upgrade on this character, giving it Ambush. After you activate this character, if one or more of its character dice are showing damage, you may gain 1 resource.
label: Din Djarin - The Mandalorian

name: Han Solo
subtitle: Tk-710
text:
Detect.
After you activate this character, you may discard a card from your hand to draw a card. If this character is a elite, roll two Veteran Stormtrooper ([LEG]13) dice into your pool. Set those dice aside after resolved or removed.
label: Han Solo - Tk-710

name: Kuiil
subtitle: Free Of Servitude
text: Power Action - Remove this die to add or remove 1 token from a support or upgrade.
flavor: "I have spoken."
label: Kuiil - Free Of Servitude

name: Fly Casual
text: Resolve one of your vehicle dice to remove a die.
label: Fly Casual

name: I Have Spoken
text:
Ambush.
Your opponent cannot take the resolve dice action or resolve dice through card effects during their next turn this round.
label: I Have Spoken

name: I Like Those Odds
text: Reroll one of your dice. Then, if it rolled damage, gain 1 resource. Otherwise, lose 1 resource.
label: I Like Those Odds

name: I'm Alright Pal
text: Activate one of your characters with Guardian. Then move 2 damage from a character to a character you control.
label: I'm Alright Pal

name: Nimble Fingers
text:
Play only if you have fewer dice showing damage than an opponent.
Turn one of your Yellow character dice to a side showing damage.
label: Nimble Fingers

name: Uprising
text: Ready an opponent's character to discard a support from play that costs 3 or less.
label: Uprising

name: Stay Ahead
text: After you claim the battlefield, you may remove one of your dice to deal 2 damage to a character.
label: Stay Ahead

name: Razor Crest
text: Before this support is discarded by an opponent's effect, place 1 damage on it instead. Then, if this support has 2 damage on it, discard it.
label: Razor Crest

name: Beskar Spear
text:
Redeploy.
Damage dealt by this die is unblockable.
label: Beskar Spear

name: Whistling Birds
text:
This upgrade enters play with 1 resource on it.
Before you resolve this die showing damage, you may remove 1 resource from this upgrade to resolve it against any number of characters.
label: Whistling Birds

name: C-3PO
text: [special] - Resolve up to 2 of your dice, increasing their values by 1 if you spend 1 resource or spot R2-D2.
label: C-3PO

name: Forest Clearing
subtitle: Corvus
text: Claim - Discard the top card of your deck to give each of your Blue characters 1 shield. Then you may spend 1 resource to give a non-Blue character 1 shield.
label: Forest Clearing - Corvus

name: Contentious Opportunity
text: Spot a Blue character that had one of its character or upgrade dice removed during an opponent's last turn this round to roll that die into your pool. If that character has a card titled Makashi Mastery on it, you may resolve that die.
label: Contentious Opportunity

name: Kyber Quest
text: Exhaust one of your elite Blue characters to play a Blue upgrade with a cost of 3 or less on it for free.
label: Kyber Quest

name: Makashi Riposte
text:
Renew 1.
Spot a Blue character to resolve one of its character or upgrade dice showing melee damage as unblockable. Then, if that character has a card titled Makashi Mastery on it, give 2 shields to that character.
label: Makashi Riposte

name: Lightsaber Ignition
text: Action - Reroll one of your Blue dice. If it is showing melee damage, you may resolve it, increasing its value by 2. Set this plot aside.
label: Lightsaber Ignition

name: Force Telekinesis
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Turn up to 3 dice to sides of your choice. Then deal damage to attached character equal to the number of dice turned.
label: Force Telekinesis

name: Learned From My Master
text: Apprentice character only. After you play this upgrade, choose a defeated Jedi or Sith in your set-aside zone. Attached character gains all abilities on the chosen card.
label: Learned From My Master

name: Makashi Mastery
text:
Blue character only. Limit 1 form per character.
After you play this upgrade, you may remove a die showing melee damage.
[special] - Discard a card from your hand to resolve any die showing damage.
label: Makashi Mastery

name: Makashi Training
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Remove a die showing melee damage. You may discard this upgrade to play a card titled Makashi Mastery from your hand or discard pile on attached character for free.
label: Makashi Training

name: Come To Aid
text: Exhaust one of your characters to resolve one of your non-unique character dice, increasing its value by 2.
label: Come To Aid

name: Military Prowess
text: Spot any number of trooper characters and spend that many resources to remove that many dice.
label: Military Prowess

name: Plan Ahead
text: Resolve up to 3 of your Red dice each showing a different symbol.
label: Plan Ahead

name: Target Their Supplies
text: Spot two Red characters to resolve one of your dice showing damage as if it were showing disrupt.
label: Target Their Supplies

name: Fortified Position
text: After setup, give a character 1 shield.
label: Fortified Position

name: Supply Team
text: Action - Exhaust this support. Then remove one of your dice to place 1 resource on this support. Before you resolve a die, you may discard this support to increase its value by the number of resources on this support.
label: Supply Team

name: General
text: Unique character only. Power Action - Resolve one of your character dice as if it were showing a different symbol.
label: General

name: Medal Of Bravery
text: Unique trooper character only. Before you resolve attached character's character die, increase its value by 1.
label: Medal Of Bravery

name: Proton Grenades
text: Before resolving this die, you may deal up to 2 indirect damage to yourself to increase its value by the same amount.
label: Proton Grenades

name: Westar-35 Blaster Pistol
text:
Redeploy.
After you activate attached character, if you control the battlefield, you may deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Westar-35 Blaster Pistol

name: Greef Karga
subtitle: Guild Expeditor
text: Before you draw your starting hand, shuffle up to 2 different set-aside bounty downgrades into your deck. After setup, you may add a set-aside Bounty Board to your play area (without paying its cost).
label: Greef Karga - Guild Expeditor

name: Boring Conversation Anyway
text: Spot a spy to remove a die.
label: Boring Conversation Anyway

name: Fake Your Own Death
text: Resolve one of your dice showing damage against one of your characters to discard all bounties on them. Then draw a card.
label: Fake Your Own Death

name: Rally The Covert
text: Exhaust one of your characters. Then roll four set-aside Mandalorian Super Commando ([WotF]37) dice into your pool. You may resolve any number of those dice. Remove the rest. For each die removed you may remove another die showing the same value.
label: Rally The Covert

name: Slice
text: Force an opponent to remove one of your dice. Then look at their hand and choose a card. That card is detected (it remains revealed until the end of the action phase).
label: Slice

name: High Stakes
text: Each player starts the game with 1 additional resource.
label: High Stakes

name: Ugly
text: After you play this support, discard it unless you attach a set-aside copy of Outdated Tech to it that an opponent of your choice will control. Action - Remove this die to discard all downgrades from this support.
label: Ugly

name: Darksaber
text:
Redeploy.
This card cannot be discarded from play except due to uniqueness.
Before an opponent's effect defeats attached character, they may move this upgrade to one of their characters.
label: Darksaber

name: Amban Blaster
text:
After you play this upgrade, you may remove a character die.
[special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
flavor: "That's one impressive weapon." <cite>Greef Karga</cite>
label: Amban Blaster

name: Vibroblade
text: Power Action - Resolve this die showing melee damage and up to 1 of your other dice showing damage as unblockable.
label: Vibroblade

name: Hangar 3-5
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Claim - Place 1 resource on a non-character card. Remove 1 resource from a non-character card.
label: Hangar 3-5 - Tatooine

name: Krayt Dragon Lair
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Claim - Deal 2 indirect damage to an opponent unless they spend 1 resource.
label: Krayt Dragon Lair - Tatooine

name: Mandalorian Covert
subtitle: Nevarro
text: Claim - Discard the top card of an opponent's deck. Then choose a card in that player's discard pile and shuffle it into their deck.
label: Mandalorian Covert - Nevarro

name: Captain Phasma
subtitle: Ruthless Tactician
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if that character has 6 or more damage on it.
flavor: "You can't be so stupid as to think this will be easy."
label: Captain Phasma - Ruthless Tactician

name: First Order Stormtrooper
flavor: Members of this new generation of stormtroopers are trained from birth and fed a steady diet of First Order propaganda to ensure absolute loyalty.
label: First Order Stormtrooper

name: Greedo
subtitle: Unlucky Mercenary
text: Before this character is defeated, roll any number of his character dice into your pool. Then resolve any number of his character dice in the order of your choice.
flavor: "Going somewhere, Solo?"
label: Greedo - Unlucky Mercenary

name: Guavian Enforcer
text: Action - Remove this die to remove 1 shield from a character.
label: Guavian Enforcer

name: Kylo Ren
subtitle: Tormented One
text: After you activate this character, you may choose a color (Blue, Red, Yellow or Gray). Then reveal a random card in an opponent's hand. If that card matches the chosen color, deal 2 damage to a character.
label: Kylo Ren - Tormented One

name: Mother Talzin
subtitle: Nightsister Matriarch
text: After you activate this character, you may reveal the top card of a player's deck. If its cost is an odd number, turn one of that player's dice to any side.
flavor: "I use dark magick to achieve power."
label: Mother Talzin - Nightsister Matriarch

name: Seventh Sister
subtitle: Agile Inquisitor
text: After you activate this character, you may roll an ID9 Seeker Droid ([EaW]13) die into your pool (its X value is equal to the number of ID9 Seeker Droid dice in your pool). Set aside that die after it is resolved or removed.
label: Seventh Sister - Agile Inquisitor

name: Thrawn
subtitle: Master Strategist
text: After you activate this character, you may choose a number. Then look at an opponent's hand and discard a card from it that costs the chosen number.
flavor: "I study the art of war."
label: Thrawn - Master Strategist

name: Tobias Beckett
subtitle: Thief For Hire
text: Power Action - Each player gains 1 resource. [special] - Take 1 resource from an opponent. If that opponent has no resources, gain 1 resource.
flavor: "You in?"
label: Tobias Beckett - Thief For Hire

name: Aayla Secura
subtitle: Jedi General
text: [special] - Turn one of your Blue or Red dice to any side. Turn an opponent's die to any side.
flavor: "Sometimes it takes courage to stick to one's beliefs."
label: Aayla Secura - Jedi General

name: Anakin Skywalker
subtitle: Podracing Prodigy
text: After you activate this character, you may turn one of your droid or podracer dice to any side.
flavor: "I've built a racer. It's the fastest ever!"
label: Anakin Skywalker - Podracing Prodigy

name: Cassian Andor
subtitle: Rebellion Operative
text: After you resolve this die, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent or discard the top card of a deck.
flavor: "I've been in this fight since I was six years old."
label: Cassian Andor - Rebellion Operative

name: Clone Trooper
text: After you activate this character, you may reroll this die, or, if you control the battlefield, you may reroll one of your character dice.
flavor: "Someone's out to start a war." <cite>Mace Windu</cite>
label: Clone Trooper

name: Hired Gun
flavor: "You needn't worry about your reward. If money is all that you love, then that's what you'll receive." <cite>Leia Organa</cite>
label: Hired Gun

name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Reluctant Instructor
text: You may resolve the shield ([shield]) sides of this die as if they were melee damage ([melee]). Power Action - Move a Blue ability from this character to another Blue character.
label: Luke Skywalker - Reluctant Instructor

name: Poe Dameron
subtitle: More Than A Pilot
text: [special] - Give a character 1 shield. You may turn another die to any side.
flavor: "The Resistance will not be intimidated by you."
label: Poe Dameron - More Than A Pilot

name: Rey
subtitle: Finding The Ways
text: After you activate this character, if she has 1 or more shields, you may deal 1 damage to a character.
flavor: "The Force, it's calling you." <cite>Maz Kanata</cite>
label: Rey - Finding The Ways

name: Rose
subtitle: Skilled Mechanic
text: [special] - Gain 1 resource. You may remove 1 damage from a support.
flavor: "I work behind pipes all day."
label: Rose - Skilled Mechanic

name: Doubt
text: Reroll an opponent's die. Then that opponent either resolves that die or removes it.
label: Doubt

name: Endless Ranks
text: Return one of your defeated non-unique Red characters to the game with no damage on it.
flavor: Battle droids are less effective than flesh and blood soldiers, but they are also much cheaper to replace.
label: Endless Ranks

name: Enrage
text: Deal 1 damage to one of your Blue characters to gain 1 resource.
label: Enrage

name: Fight Dirty
text: Remove any number of your Yellow dice. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of dice you just removed.
label: Fight Dirty

name: Isolation
text: Spot a Blue character to remove a character die.
label: Isolation

name: Loose Ends
text:
Ambush.
Remove one of your dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) to discard the top 4 cards of an opponent's deck.
label: Loose Ends

name: Probe
text: Look at two random cards from your opponent's hand and discard any of those cards that are events.
label: Probe

name: Rise Again
text: Heal 5 damage from a unique Blue character. You may play an upgrade from your discard pile on it for free.
label: Rise Again

name: Take Prisoner
text: Choose an opponent. Discard 2 random cards from that opponent's hand for each defeated character they have.
label: Take Prisoner

name: The Best Defense...
text: Deal one of your Red characters 3 damage to remove up to 2 of an opponent's dice.
flavor: "There they are! Blast them!"
label: The Best Defense...

name: Twin Shadows
text: Spot 2 characters with the same title to remove up to 2 dice.
label: Twin Shadows

name: Witch Magick
text: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck (do not rearrange them). Heal damage from a character equal to the number of cards you just revealed that cost an odd number.
label: Witch Magick

name: Against The Odds
text: Reroll one of your dice. Then, if it just rerolled the same symbol, you may resolve it, increasing its value by 2.
label: Against The Odds

name: Commando Raid
text: Resolve one of your Red dice showing discard ([discard]), increasing its value by 2. Then draw a card.
label: Commando Raid

name: Defensive Racing
text: Play only if one or more of your vehicle dice were removed during an opponent's last turn this round. Spot a Yellow character to roll one of those removed dice into your pool.
label: Defensive Racing

name: Do Or Do Not
text: Reroll one of your dice. Then you may resolve it, increasing its value by 1. Otherwise, remove it.
flavor: "There is no try." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: Do Or Do Not

name: Draw Attention
text: Move up to 2 damage from one of your characters to another one of your characters (this ignores shields).
label: Draw Attention

name: Field Medic
text: Remove 2 damage from a character.
label: Field Medic

name: First Aid
text: Heal 2 damage from a Red character, or 4 damage instead if it is the first round of the game.
label: First Aid

name: Krayt Dragon Howl
text: Spot a Blue character to choose an opponent's die. That opponent chooses to either remove that die or discard the top 2 cards of their deck.
label: Krayt Dragon Howl

name: Loth-Wolf Bond
text: Give up to 2 of your Blue characters 1 shield each. You may activate those characters in the order of your choice.
label: Loth-Wolf Bond

name: Negotiate
text: Remove one of your character dice to force an opponent to choose and remove 2 of their dice.
label: Negotiate

name: Pacify
text: Remove a character die. Then give that character 2 shields.
label: Pacify

name: Way of the Light
text: Remove a non-hero die.
label: Way of the Light

name: At Odds
text: Remove a die showing a value that is an odd number. You may place this event on the bottom of your deck.
label: At Odds

name: Automated Defense
text: Spot a droid to remove a die.
flavor: Exceptional at reconnaissance, probe droids could also be equipped with a blaster-type weapon for defense.
label: Automated Defense

name: Beguile
text: Reroll an opponent's die. Then turn one of their dice to any side. Then remove one of their dice.
label: Beguile

name: Block
text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing melee damage.
label: Block

name: Crash Landing
text: Remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself equal to the value showing on that die.
label: Crash Landing

name: Dodge
text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing ranged damage ([ranged])
label: Dodge

name: Electroshock
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove a die showing a value of 2 or lower.
label: Electroshock

name: Flank
text:
Play only if you have more ready characters than an opponent.
Remove one of that opponent's dice.
label: Flank

name: Hasty Exit
text: Give control of the battlefield to an opponent to remove a die showing damage ([ranged],[melee], or [indirect]).
label: Hasty Exit

name: High Ground
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Remove an opponent's die showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]). Then, if it was a character die, deal 1 damage to that character.
label: High Ground

name: Lightsaber Pull
text: Spot a Blue character to search your deck for a Blue weapon, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Lightsaber Pull

name: Sabotage
text: Discard cards from your hand equal to the cost of a support in play to discard that support.
label: Sabotage

name: Truce
text:
Ambush.
Each player gains 1 resource.
label: Truce

name: Armored Reinforcement
text: Action - Set this plot aside to search your deck or discard pile for a Red vehicle support and play it, decreasing its cost by 1. If you search your deck, shuffle it.
label: Armored Reinforcement

name: Espionage
text: After setup, discard the top card from each deck.
label: Espionage

name: No Allegiance
text:
Include only if you have no hero or villain characters on your team.
Each of your neutral characters has +1 health.
label: No Allegiance

name: Solidarity
text: Include only if each character on your team is the same color and your deck contains no more than one copy of any card.
label: Solidarity

name: Hound's Tooth
text: After you activate this support, you may remove one of your Yellow character dice to gain 1 resource.
flavor: Bossk's ship was a YV-666 light freighter modified to serve the bounty hunter's needs.
label: Hound's Tooth

name: Separatist Landing Craft
text: [special] - Spend 2 resources to add a Battle Droid ([LEG]9) to your team. Discard this support from play.
flavor: A heavy transport starship used by the Trade Federation for transporting and deploying droid battalions planet side.
label: Separatist Landing Craft

name: Slave I
text: Power Action - Reroll one of your Yellow dice. Then you may remove an opponent's die showing a value equal to the value showing on the die you just rerolled.
label: Slave I

name: Anakin Skywalker's Podracer
text:
Ambush.
After you resolve this die, you may discard the top card of a deck or, if you spot Anakin Skywalker, discard a random card from an opponent's hand.
label: Anakin Skywalker's Podracer

name: Awakening
text: Action - Exhaust this support to resolve one of your dice showing a modified side (a side with a +) as if it was not modified (did not have the +).
label: Awakening

name: BB-8
text: Action - Spot a vehicle support to attach this card to it as a mod upgrade (discard all upgrades on this card). If that vehicle is Black One, ready it. Use this action only once per game.
label: BB-8

name: Black One
text: Power Action - Spot Poe Dameron to turn this die to any side. [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. If a droid is attached to this support, reroll this die instead of removing it.
label: Black One

name: Millennium Falcon
text: After you activate this support, you may activate one of your characters.
flavor: "Chewie… we're home." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
label: Millennium Falcon

name: Suppressive Fire
text: After a character is activated, you may spend 1 resource and discard this support from play to remove one of its character dice.
label: Suppressive Fire

name: Bubble Shield
text:
You may distribute indirect damage ([indirect]) to this support as if it were a character with 3 health.
Discard this support if it has 3 or more damage on it.
label: Bubble Shield

name: Hailfire Droid Tank
text: After you play a vehicle (including this support), you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. After you play a droid (including this support), you may activate it.
label: Hailfire Droid Tank

name: It Binds All Things
text: Before you play a Blue upgrade, you may exhaust this support to decrease its cost by 1.
label: It Binds All Things

name: Modified HWK-290
text:
After you play this support, place 2 damage on it.
After you activate this support, deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself equal to the damage on it.
label: Modified HWK-290

name: Crime Lord
text:
Yellow Character only.
[special] - Spend 5 resources to choose a character. Before this round ends, defeat that character.
flavor: "There will be no bargain." <cite>Jabba the Hutt</cite>
label: Crime Lord

name: Crossguard Lightsaber
text:
After you play this upgrade on Kylo Ren, deal 1 damage to a character.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if that character has 1 or more shields.
label: Crossguard Lightsaber

name: Energy Bow
text: After one of your card effects rerolls one or more character dice, you may reroll this die.
flavor: "We don't like strangers." <cite>Nightsister</cite>
label: Energy Bow

name: F-11D Rifle
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Force an opponent to deal 2 damage to their characters, distributing the damage as they wish.
label: F-11D Rifle

name: Grand Moff
text: Unique Red character only. Power Action - Use the "Claim" ability on the battlefield or switch the battlefield with a battlefield that is not being used (but was brought to the game).
label: Grand Moff

name: ID9 Seeker Droid
text: The X on this die is equal to the number of ID9 Seeker Droid dice in your pool (when resolving dice, resolve them one at a time).
label: ID9 Seeker Droid

name: On The Hunt
text: [special] - Remove all shields from a character. You may spend 1 resource to remove one of its character or upgrade dice.
label: On The Hunt

name: Handcrafted Light Bow
text:
[special] - Deal 3 damage to a character.
[special] - Remove all shields from a character. Then deal 2 damage to that character.
label: Handcrafted Light Bow

name: Lone Operative
text: [special] - Heal 2 damage from attached character, or 3 damage instead if attached character is your only character in play.
label: Lone Operative

name: Overkill
flavor: The most hardened soldiers already know they're dead.
label: Overkill

name: Rey's Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade, give attached character 1 shield, or 2 shields instead if attached character is Rey.
label: Rey's Lightsaber

name: Arc Caster
text: Modify vehicle support. After you play this upgrade, you may activate attached support. Then you may reroll a die.
label: Arc Caster

name: Dorsal Turret
text: Modify vehicle support. After you play this upgrade, you may roll this die into your pool.
label: Dorsal Turret

name: Force Wave
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Deal 3 damage to a character. Deal 2 damage to a another character. Deal 1 damage to a third character.
label: Force Wave

name: Heirloom Lightsaber
text: This upgrade has the Redeploy keyword while it's on a Blue character.
label: Heirloom Lightsaber

name: Hidden Agenda
text: Action - Play an event from your hand, decreasing its cost by 2. Discard this upgrade from play.
label: Hidden Agenda

name: Holdout Blaster
text: Ambush. Redeploy.
label: Holdout Blaster

name: Hunker Down
text: If attached character takes melee damage ([melee]), discard this upgrade. Action - Exhaust this upgrade to give attached character 1 shield.
label: Hunker Down

name: Mandalorian Vambraces
text: Action - Return this upgrade from play to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Try them on, Grappling line, paralyzing darts, repulsor. All designed to combat the abilities of the Jedi". <cite>Fenn Rau</cite>
label: Mandalorian Vambraces

name: Mind Probe
text:
Blue Character only.
[special] - Deal an opponent's character 1 damage for each card in that opponent's hand.
label: Mind Probe

name: Promotion
text:
Red character only.
After you play this upgrade, you may draw a card.
label: Promotion

name: Riot Shield
text: Before attached character takes damage, you may discard this upgrade to block 2 damage, or 3 damage instead if attached character is a trooper.
label: Riot Shield

name: Carbon-freezing Chamber
subtitle: Bespin
text: Claim - Choose a character die. That die cannot be rolled during the next round.
label: Carbon-freezing Chamber - Bespin

name: Comm Tower
subtitle: Scarif
text: Claim - Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1 if you spot a plot.
label: Comm Tower - Scarif

name: Command Center
subtitle: Lothal
text: Claim - Each opponent discards the top 2 cards of their deck.
label: Command Center - Lothal

name: Emperor's Throne Room
subtitle: Death Star II
text: Claim - Turn one of your dice to a side showing a special ability ([special]). Then you may resolve that die.
label: Emperor's Throne Room - Death Star II

name: Rebel War Room
subtitle: Yavin IV
text: Claim - Resolve one of your dice. If it has a resource cost, you do not have to pay it.
label: Rebel War Room - Yavin IV

name: Rift Valley
subtitle: Dathomir
text: Claim - Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card's cost is an odd number, remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.
label: Rift Valley - Dathomir

name: Asajj Ventress
subtitle: Sister Returned
text: Power Action - Spend 1 resource or spot another witch to roll a weapon die on this character into your pool.
label: Asajj Ventress - Sister Returned

name: Count Dooku
subtitle: Makashi Master
text: After you remove, turn, or resolve one or more of an opponent's character dice, deal 1 damage to each opponent's character whose dice you just manipulated. "The Sith control everything, You just don't know it."
label: Count Dooku - Makashi Master

name: Nightsister Acolyte
text: Action - Play a card from your hand that costs an odd number to reroll a die. "When you face one Nightsister of Dathomir... you face us all!" - Merrin
label: Nightsister Acolyte

name: Ren
subtitle: Alluring Ideologue
text: After this character takes damage for the first time each round, you may discard a card from your hand to roll a set-aside Servant of the Dark Side ([EaW]9) die into your pool.
label: Ren - Alluring Ideologue

name: Influence
text: Action - Spot a witch and exhaust this downgrade to force an opponent to either remove an attached character's character die or have you gain 1 resource.
label: Influence

name: Expunge Weakness
text: Spot a Blue character to remove one of your dice showing a blank. Then remove an opponent's die.
label: Expunge Weakness

name: Through Power, Gain Strength
text: Remove a die. Then you may resolve one of your dice showing damage, increasing its value by 2.
label: Through Power, Gain Strength

name: Vile Machinations
text: You may spot a Yellow character to remove a die not showing damage. You may spot a Blue character to turn a die showing damage to a side showing a blank.
label: Vile Machinations

name: Asajj's Ginivex-Class Starfighter
text: Power Action - Spot Asajj Ventress to roll one of her character dice into your pool.
label: Asajj's Ginivex-Class Starfighter

name: Force Concealment
text: After you turn or remove an opponent's die, place 1 resource on this support. Action - Discard this support to play a Blue ability or Blue event, decreasing its cost by the number of resources on this support, up to a maximum of 3.
label: Force Concealment

name: Asajj's Lightsaber
text:
After you play this upgrade on a Blue character, you may spend 1 resource to make this upgrade elite.
While this upgrade is on Asajj Ventress, decrease this die's costs by 1.
label: Asajj's Lightsaber

name: Dark Rage
text:
Blue character only.
While attached character has 6 or more damage on it, increase this die's value by 1, or by 2 instead if attached character has 9 or more damage on it.
label: Dark Rage

name: Deny Death
text: Before attached character would be defeated, instead discard one of your Blue abilities to heal damage equal to that ability's cost from this attached character. Discard this upgrade.
label: Deny Death

name: Sith Master
text: Sith character only. After you play this upgrade, you may remove a die showing a blank. Power Action - Roll a character or upgrade die on the attached character into your pool.
label: Sith Master

name: Water Of Life
text: [special] - Heal 1 damage from a character. Spot a witch to reroll this die instead of removing it.
label: Water Of Life

name: Droideka
text:
After setup, give this character 1 shield.
While this character has 1 or more shields, increase the value of its character dice by 1.
While this character has no shields, increase damage dealt to this character by 1.
label: Droideka

name: General Grievous
subtitle: Kaleesh Warlord
text: Before you resolve this die showing focus, you may increase its value by 1. If you do, its effect can only turn droid dice. Power Action - Deal 1 indirect damage to yourself to roll a droid die on a card you control into your pool.
label: General Grievous - Kaleesh Warlord

name: Iden Versio
subtitle: Imperial Ace
text: You may include Iden Versio on a team that also includes a Red hero leader. Piloting. While this die is in your pool, increase the value of your piloted vehicle dice by 1.
label: Iden Versio - Imperial Ace

name: Tarkin
subtitle: Uncompromising Tactician
text: Power Action - Reveal an opponent's hand. You may discard a card from your hand to discard a card of your choice from that opponent's hand with the same cost. "Charming. To the last."
label: Tarkin - Uncompromising Tactician

name: Inhibitor Chip
text: Action - Exhaust this downgrade to place 1 resource on it. Then, If this card has 2 or more resources on it, force an opponent to remove one of attached character's character dice. Then roll that die into your pool.
label: Inhibitor Chip

name: At All Costs
text: Turn one of your dice to a side showing a cost.
label: At All Costs

name: Casualties Of War
text: Set aside a card from a discard pile to remove a die with a value equal to that card's cost.
label: Casualties Of War

name: Defensive Effort
text: Give control of the battlefield to an opponent and spot up to 2 Red characters to remove that many dice showing damage.
label: Defensive Effort

name: Good Soldiers Follow Orders
text: Turn a trooper die to any side. Then, if it was your die, you may spot a Blue character to resolve it.
label: Good Soldiers Follow Orders

name: Crucial Intel
text: Team Up 1: Each leader. After a card is discarded from an opponent's hand by a card effect, place 1 resource on this plot. Power Action - Remove 3 resources from this plot to gain 2 actions.
label: Crucial Intel

name: Armored Assault Tank
text: Power Action - Spot a leader to roll this die into your pool. "A fearsome sight on any battlefield, the AAT is one of the Trade Federation's most formidable weapons." - Captain Panaka
label: Armored Assault Tank

name: Separatist Supply Ship
text: Action - Exhaust this support to play a Red support with a matching die from your discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Separatist Supply Ship

name: Tactical Droid
text: Power Action - Resolve one of your dice showing a cost. Then turn one of your dice to a side showing a different symbol than that die. "I assure you he will succeed where you have failed." - Count Dooku
label: Tactical Droid

name: Uncompromising
text: While this upgrade is on a leader, it gains Redeploy. After you resolve this die, look at an opponent's hand and discard the card from it with the lowest cost (you choose in the case of a tie).
label: Uncompromising

name: Aurra Sing
subtitle: Merciless Hunter
text: Action - Remove one of your dice to resolve one of this character's character dice, increasing its value by 1. "I never ask for permission to do anything, my darling."
label: Aurra Sing - Merciless Hunter

name: Bossk
subtitle: Apex Predator
text: Piloting. Power Action - Move up to 2 damage from an opponent's character to another character.
label: Bossk - Apex Predator

name: Death Watch Mandalorian
text: While you control a leader, this character has Guardian. After you remove this die, deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.
label: Death Watch Mandalorian

name: Pre Vizsla
subtitle: Death Watch Commander
text: After setup, play a set-aside copy of Darksaber ([HS]103) on this character for free. Power Action - Remove one of your dice to give this character 1 shield.
label: Pre Vizsla - Death Watch Commander

name: Data Heist
text: Play only if you spot a spy or a bounty hunter. After attached character is defeated, reveal the top 4 cards of an opponent's deck. You may play a card revealed for free, spotting that opponent's cards as if they were yours.
label: Data Heist

name: Alternative Methods
text: Spot a bounty hunter to deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the difference in the number of cards in your hands, to a maximum of 5.
label: Alternative Methods

name: For Mandalore!
text: Remove a character or upgrade die. Then roll one of your elite character's character or upgrade dice into your pool.
label: For Mandalore!

name: Lawless
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove an opponent's die. Then force an opponent to choose and remove their dice until they have 3 or fewer dice in their pool.
label: Lawless

name: Trick
text: Spot a Yellow character and reveal a card from your hand to force an opponent to remove one of their dice showing a value equal to the cost of the revealed card.
label: Trick

name: Hunt And Eliminate
text: Include only if each character on your team is a unique bounty hunter. After you deal damage to a character with a bounty on it, exhaust this plot to force an opponent to choose and discard a card from their hand.
label: Hunt And Eliminate

name: Black Stall Station
text:
After you remove one or more of your dice, you may spot a Yellow character to deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.
A renowned hideout by Bounty Hunters with an elite security system.
label: Black Stall Station

name: Gauntlet Fighter
text:
Ambush.
After you activate this support, you may remove one of your other dice to resolve this die.
label: Gauntlet Fighter

name: Cad Bane's Ll-30
text:
After you play this upgrade on Cad Bane, you may spend 1 resource to make this upgrade elite.
[special] - Deal 1 unblockable damage to a character.
label: Cad Bane's Ll-30

name: Modified Relby V-10
text: Power Action - Remove one of your dice to roll this die into your pool.
label: Modified Relby V-10

name: Vicious Tactics
text: Resolve one of your dice showing a cost, increasing its value by the cost showing on it.
label: Vicious Tactics

name: Elite Mercenary
text:
The X on this die is equal to the number of resources you have, to a maximum of 3.
If you want the best, you're going to need the credits.
label: Elite Mercenary

name: Chirrut Îmwe
