subtitle: Spiritual Warrior
text: You cannot play Blue abilities on this character. Power Action - Turn one of your character dice showing a blank to a side with a value of 1, or to any side instead if you spot Baze Malbus.
label: Chirrut Îmwe - Spiritual Warrior

name: Mace Windu
subtitle: Fearsome Duelist
text: Damage dealt by this die is unblockable. Power Action - Resolve one of this character's character dice showing damage. If a character is defeated this way, you may return that die to your pool showing the same side and resolve it again for free.
label: Mace Windu - Fearsome Duelist

name: Patient Padawan
text:
After you resolve this die showing a shield, you may discard the top card of a deck.
"Pass on what you have learned. Strength. Mastery. But weakness, folly, failure also." - Yoda
label: Patient Padawan

name: Plo Koon
subtitle: Jedi Ace
text: Piloting. Power Action - Remove 1 shield from one of your pilots to play a vehicle from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Plo Koon - Jedi Ace

name: As The Force Wills It
text:
Renew 1.
Spot a Blue character to choose a die showing a blank. That die cannot be rerolled this round.
label: As The Force Wills It

name: Deep Meditation
text: Turn an opponent's die to any side. Then discard cards from the top of a deck equal to the value showing on that die.
label: Deep Meditation

name: Echo Three To Echo Seven
text:
Choose a character die. Turn another character die to a side showing the same symbol and value as that die. Then spot a Yellow character to give a character 1 shield.
"Han old buddy, do you read me?" - Luke Skywalker
label: Echo Three To Echo Seven

name: Fear Nothing
text:
Renew 1.
Give a Blue character 1 shield. If this card was played from the discard pile, draw a card.
label: Fear Nothing

name: I Don't Need Luck
text: Spot 2 of your dice showing a blank to turn each of those dice to any side.
label: I Don't Need Luck

name: I Have You
text: Activate 2 of your characters that do not share a color. Then give one of those characters 2 shields.
label: I Have You

name: Restore
text:
Renew 1.
Remove one of your Blue character dice to heal 2 damage from that character.
label: Restore

name: Plo Koon's Starfighter
text: After this support is piloted for the first time each round, you may give 1 shield to a Red character, or if it is piloted by Plo Koon, you may give 1 shield to any character instead.
label: Plo Koon's Starfighter

name: Sentinel Lightsaber
text:
After you play this upgrade, you may give a character 1 shield.
[special] - Exhaust this upgrade to resolve one of your dice showing a shield without removing it from your pool. Reroll this die instead of removing it.
label: Sentinel Lightsaber

name: Yoda's Teachings
text:
Play only if you spot a Blue character.
[special] - Choose and do 2 of the following:
-Gain 1 resource.
-Give a character 1 shield.
-Discard the top card of a deck
-Turn one of your dice to any side.
label: Yoda's Teachings

name: Baze Malbus
subtitle: Devoted Guardian
text: Guardian. Power Action - Spend 1 resource or spot Chirrut Îmwe to resolve one of your dice showing a modifier as if it did not have a modifier.
label: Baze Malbus - Devoted Guardian

name: Clone Commander Cody
subtitle: Ardent Leader
text: After the start of the round or when the battlefield changes control, if you control the battlefield, draw a card. Power Action - Discard a card from your hand to turn a trooper die to any side.
label: Clone Commander Cody - Ardent Leader

name: Republic Senator
text: Power Action - Play an event from your hand to discard a random card from an opponent's hand. "There is no civility. Only politics." - Sheev Palpatine
label: Republic Senator

name: Rex
subtitle: Bastion Of The Republic
text: After the first time you play a Red weapon, equipment, or vehicle this round, you may take control of the battlefield. "This war left its scars on all of us."
label: Rex - Bastion Of The Republic

name: Hold The Line
text:
Play only if an opponent has more dice in their pool than you have in yours.
Remove an opponent's die.
label: Hold The Line

name: Maintain Position
text: Give up to 2 of your characters 1 shield each. If you have a copy of Hold the Line ([UH]64) in your discard pile, you may give control of the battlefield to an opponent to give up to 2 of your characters 1 shield each.
label: Maintain Position

name: This Is War!
text: Spot a Blue character and activate one of your Red characters to remove a die not showing damage with a value of 1 or less.
label: This Is War!

name: AT-TE
text: Power Action - Resolve this die, rerolling it instead of removing it. [special] - Deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's characters
label: AT-TE

name: The Bad Batch
text: After you activate this support, choose and do one of the following. If you spot a leader, you may choose and do one of the following again: -Roll 1 set-aside Clone Trooper ([LEG]38) die into your pool -Roll 1 set-aside Rebel Engineer ([AtG]75) die into your pool.
label: The Bad Batch

name: Dc-15a Blaster Carbine
text: Action - Return this upgrade to your hand to use a claim ability or power action on the battlefield, even if it has been used this round.
label: Dc-15a Blaster Carbine

name: Medpack
text: After attached character is activated, heal 1 damage from a character, or 2 damage instead if that character has 11 or more damage on it.
label: Medpack

name: Meebur Gascon
text: Modify droid character or support. Power Action - Resolve one of your droid dice as if it were showing a different symbol.
label: Meebur Gascon

name: Bo-Katan Kryze
subtitle: Rightful Ruler
text: Power Action - Choose an opponent's die showing damage and force them to resolve it. Then you may resolve one of your dice showing damage, increasing its value by 1. [special] - Deal 3 unblockable indirect damage to an opponent.
label: Bo-Katan Kryze - Rightful Ruler

name: Padmé Amidala
subtitle: Political Idealist
text: Power Action - Remove 3 resources from this card to play a set-aside Diplomatic Immunity ([AW]50) for free. [special] - Discard the top 2 cards of a deck. Place 1 resource on this card.
label: Padmé Amidala - Political Idealist

name: Rebel Smuggler
text: Piloting. After you resolve a vehicle die piloted by this character for the first time each round, gain 1 resource.
label: Rebel Smuggler

name: Zeb Orrelios
subtitle: Honorable Warrior
text:
After you resolve this die showing damage, you may draw a card.
"Karabast!"
label: Zeb Orrelios - Honorable Warrior

name: A Gift
text:
Play a support with a matching die from your hand, decreasing its cost by 2. Choose an opponent. That opponent may roll that support's die into their pool.
"Both are hard working, and will serve you well." - Luke Skywalker
label: A Gift

name: Strike A Deal
text: Remove a die showing a value of 1 or more. Then each opponent gains resources equal to half that die's value rounded up.
label: Strike A Deal

name: Swift
text: Gain 2 actions. You cannot take the resolve dice action this turn.
label: Swift

name: Defiant Uprising
text: After you activate a Blue or Red character, you may activate this support.
label: Defiant Uprising

name: Mandalorian Vault
text: Discard this support if it has 2 or more damage on it. Action - Spot a Blue character, exhaust this support and place 1 damage on it to remove a character die.
label: Mandalorian Vault

name: New Base
text: Action - Exhaust this support to turn a die to a side showing the same symbol as another die showing a modifier.
label: New Base

name: Partisan Recruit
text:
You may distribute indirect damage dealt to yourself to this support as if it were a character with 3 health.
Discard this support if it has 3 or more damage on it.
label: Partisan Recruit

name: XS Freighter
text: Before this support becomes activated by Piloting, you may search your deck for a mod and play it on this support, if able, decreasing its cost by 1. Shuffle your deck. [special] - Roll a die on an attached mod into your pool.
label: XS Freighter

name: Smuggling Compartment
text: Modify vehicle support. Attached vehicle's support and upgrade dice cannot be removed while they are showing a resource.
label: Smuggling Compartment

name: Unlikely Heroes
text: You can only include non-unique characters on your team.
label: Unlikely Heroes

name: BB-8
text:
After you play this support, you may spend 1 resource to make it elite.
[special] - Draw a card.
label: BB-8

name: Chirrut's Staff
text: After you play this upgrade, you may reroll a die showing a blank, or turn it to any side instead if this upgrade is on Chirrut Îmwe.
label: Chirrut's Staff

name: Bendu's Foresight
text: Choose a number. Reroll a die. If that die's value is the chosen number, remove it. Otherwise, you may repeat this effect once.
label: Bendu's Foresight

name: Grow Beyond
text: Renew 2. Spot a Jedi or Sith character to play a Blue ability from your discard pile onto another character, decreasing its cost by 1. If this card was played from the discard pile, roll that ability's die into your pool.
label: Grow Beyond

name: Hawk-Bat Swoop
text: Resolve one of your character or upgrade dice showing a shield as melee damage, increasing its value by the number of shields on the attached character, if it has an upgrade titled Ataru Mastery on it.
label: Hawk-Bat Swoop

name: Saber Swarm
text: Resolve one of your character or upgrade dice showing melee damage to remove a die. If that resolved die belongs to a character that has an upgrade titled Ataru Mastery on it, give it 2 shields.
label: Saber Swarm

name: Path To Mastery
text: After setup, set this plot aside to play a set-aside upgrade with "Training" in its title on one of your characters, decreasing its cost by 1, if able.
label: Path To Mastery

name: Ataru Mastery
text:
Blue character only. Limit 1 form per character.
After you play this upgrade, give a character 2 shields.
[special] - Give a character 2 shields. Deal damage equal to the number of shields on that character to a character.
label: Ataru Mastery

name: Ataru Training
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Give a character 1 shield. Deal damage equal to half the number of shields on that character, rounded up, to a character. You may discard this upgrade to play a card titled Ataru Mastery from your hand or discard pile on attached character for free.
label: Ataru Training

name: Palace Of The Jedi
subtitle: Coruscant
text: After you take control of this battlefield, remove its die. Power Action - Roll this die into your pool. [special] - Move 1 damage from a character to another character.
label: Palace Of The Jedi - Coruscant

name: I Am No Jedi
text: Spot a Blue character to resolve one of your Red character dice as if it were showing a different symbol. Spot a Red character to draw a card.
label: I Am No Jedi

name: Ace Pilots
text: Team Up 1: Each unique pilot Action - Set this plot aside and spend resources equal to the cost of a unique vehicle in play to make it elite (place a second copy of its die on it).
label: Ace Pilots

name: The Mission That Never Ends
text: Team Up 1: Each trooper After one of your trooper characters is defeated, set this plot aside to roll that character's character dice into your pool. You may resolve those dice, if able. Otherwise, remove them.
label: The Mission That Never Ends

name: Security Droid
text: After you resolve this die showing damage, you may spend 1 resource to remove a die showing damage.
label: Security Droid

name: Deflector Shield
text: Modify vehicle support. Before attached vehicle would be discarded from play, discard this upgrade from play instead. After you activate attached support, give a character 1 shield.
label: Deflector Shield

name: Utility Belt
text: Attached character has +1 upgrade limit.
label: Utility Belt

name: Tipoca City
subtitle: Kamino
text: Power Action - Reroll one of your dice. Then you may resolve it. Claim - Reroll an opponent's die. Then you may force them to resolve it, if able.
label: Tipoca City - Kamino

name: Fennec Shand
subtitle: Adept Mercenary
text: After you play a Yellow event, you may reroll one of your dice. Power Action - Reroll a weapon die. Then, if that die is showing damage, deal 1 damage to a character. Otherwise, give this character 1 shield.
label: Fennec Shand - Adept Mercenary

name: Tracked Target
text: Play only if you spot a bounty hunter. After attached character is activated or defeated, you may draw a card.
label: Tracked Target

name: Black Market Connection
text: If there is another copy of this card in your discard pile, search your deck for an upgrade and play it, decreasing its cost by 3. If you searched your deck, shuffle it. Then set aside all copies of this card in your discard pile and set this card aside.
label: Black Market Connection

name: Complicated Profession
text: Spot a bounty hunter and a bounty to remove a die showing a value of 2 or less. Gain 1 resource. "Bounty hunting is a complicated profession. Wouldn't you agree?" - The Client
label: Complicated Profession

name: Greed
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove one of your dice. Then gain 1 resource. Spot a Red character to take one additional action.
label: Greed

name: Bo-Rifle
text:
Redeploy.
You may resolve the damage sides of this die as if they were ranged damage.
label: Bo-Rifle

name: Undercity
subtitle: Coruscant
text: Power Action - Draw a card. Then place a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. Claim - Draw a card.
label: Undercity - Coruscant

name: Hold Fast
text: Remove one of your non-unique character dice to remove a die.
label: Hold Fast

name: Unique Perspectives
text: Spot 2 characters that share a subtype and not a color to deal 2 damage to a character. Spot 2 characters that share a color and no subtypes to heal 2 damage from a character.
label: Unique Perspectives

name: Gozanti Cruiser
text: Power Action - Remove one of your dice showing a shield to discard a random card from an opponent's hand.
label: Gozanti Cruiser

name: Z-95
text: Before you activate this support, deal 1 indirect damage to yourself. Action - Discard 2 cards from your hand to take control of this support. Any player may use this action.
label: Z-95

name: EE-3 Carbine Rifle
text: While this upgrade is on a bounty hunter or trooper, it gains Redeploy. Power Action - Remove this die showing damage to deal 3 indirect damage to an opponent.
label: EE-3 Carbine Rifle

name: High Valley
subtitle: Ryloth
text: Power Action - Resolve one of your non-unique character dice, increasing its value by 1.
label: High Valley - Ryloth

name: Palpatine
subtitle: Ruling The Galaxy
text: [special] - Deal damage to a character equal to the number of support dice in your pool or play a support from your hand, decreasing its cost by 2.
flavor: "Witness the final destruction of the Alliance, and the end of your insignificant Rebellion."
label: Palpatine - Ruling The Galaxy

name: Imperial Navy Squad Leader
text: Piloting.
flavor: Imperial pilots required fearlessness and undying loyalty to achieve the rank of squad leader.
label: Imperial Navy Squad Leader

name: Emperor
text: Unique Red or Blue leader character only. After you play this upgrade, give attached character 3 shields. After you resolve one of attached character's character dice, you may deal 2 indirect damage to an opponent.
label: Emperor

name: TIE Fighter Squadron
text: After this die is resolved or removed, you may discard a card from your hand to roll this die into your pool.
label: TIE Fighter Squadron

name: XX-9 Heavy Turbolaser
text: [special] - Remove a support die showing damage.
label: XX-9 Heavy Turbolaser

name: TIE Interceptor
text: Before you resolve this die showing damage, you may increase its value by 1 if this vehicle is piloted.
label: TIE Interceptor

name: Devious
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. Then turn one of that character's character dice to any side.
label: Devious

name: Resupply
text: Action - Exhaust this support to resolve one of your dice showing a resource, increasing its value by 1.
label: Resupply

name: Fully Operational
text: Spot a leader to activate any number of your Red supports in the order of your choice. Then you may resolve any number of those supports' support dice showing damage.
label: Fully Operational

name: Defensive Fire
text: Spot an artillery or vehicle to remove a die showing damage.
flavor: "Your fleet has lost. And your friends on the Endor moon will not survive." <cite>Emperor Palpatine</cite>
label: Defensive Fire

name: Command
text: Spot up to 2 leader characters to remove that many dice.
flavor: Crix Madine led a commando unit for the Galactic Empire's military until he defected to the Rebel Alliance.
label: Command

name: I Have Been Expecting You
text: Reroll 2 of an opponent's dice. Then force that opponent to choose and resolve one of those dice, if able. Remove all of those dice they did not resolve.
label: I Have Been Expecting You

name: I Have Foreseen It
text: Choose a number. Reroll an opponent's die. If that die's value is the chosen number, remove it and deal 1 damage to a character.
label: I Have Foreseen It

name: I Am Unarmed
text:
Play only if you have no dice showing damage.
Resolve up to 3 of your dice in the order of your choice.
label: I Am Unarmed

name: Strike Me Down
text: Force an opponent to choose and resolve one of their character dice showing damage. Then turn each of that character's character and upgrade dice to sides showing a blank.
label: Strike Me Down

name: Lack Of Vision
text: Reroll a die. Then if that die is showing a blank, you may repeat this effect.
flavor: "If you will not be turned, you will be destroyed." <cite>Emperor Palpatine</cite>
label: Lack Of Vision

name: It Is Your Destiny
text: Turn an opponent's die to a side showing damage. Then turn another die to any side.
label: It Is Your Destiny

name: Emperor's Tower
subtitle: Death Star II
text: Power Action - Turn one of your dice to a side showing a blank to turn an opponent's die to a side showing a blank.
label: Emperor's Tower - Death Star II

name: Lando Calrissian
subtitle: Joining The Rebellion
text: Before you draw your starting hand, you may search your deck for a card titled Millennium Falcon ([GS]21) and play it, decreasing its cost by 3. Shuffle your deck.
label: Lando Calrissian - Joining The Rebellion

name: Nien Nunb
subtitle: Gold Squadron Pilot
text: Piloting. After this character begins piloting a vehicle, you may reroll one of your pilot dice.
label: Nien Nunb - Gold Squadron Pilot

name: Millennium Falcon
text: [special] - Remove 1 shield from a card. Then resolve another side of this die.
flavor: "She's the fastest ship in the fleet." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
label: Millennium Falcon

name: T-65 X-Wing
text: Action - Return this card from play to its owner's hand to gain 1 resource.
flavor: Renowned for its speed and maneuverability in battle, it became the backbone of the Rebel Alliance Starfighter Corps.
label: T-65 X-Wing

name: Y-Wing
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's characters.
flavor: Gold Squadron, Gray Squadron, and Red Squadron each consisted of numerous BTL Y-wing starfighters.
label: Y-Wing

name: Lando Calrissian's Blaster
text:
Ambush.
[special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character or gain 1 resource.
label: Lando Calrissian's Blaster

name: DH-17 Blaster Pistol
text: While this upgrade is on a Red character, it gains Redeploy.
label: DH-17 Blaster Pistol

name: Co-Pilot
text: Play only if you spot a pilot. Attached character gains pilot and has Piloting. Your pilots have +1 health.
label: Co-Pilot

name: Lavish Cape
text: After you play this upgrade, give attached character 1 shield and you may draw a card.
label: Lavish Cape

name: Divert
text: Resolve one of your dice showing a shield to remove a die.
label: Divert

name: Break Off The Attack
text: Remove one of your dice to remove a die showing an equal or lesser value.
flavor: "The shield is still up!" <cite>Lando Calrissian</cite>
label: Break Off The Attack

name: Accelerate To Attack Speed
text: Spot any number of piloted vehicles and spend that many resources to turn that many dice to any side.
label: Accelerate To Attack Speed

name: Pull Up!
text: Spot a pilot to remove a die showing ranged or indirect damage.
flavor: "I get no reading. Are you sure?" <cite>Wedge Antilles</cite>
label: Pull Up!

name: Point Blank
text: Spot a scoundrel to resolve one of your dice showing ranged damage, increasing its value by 1, or by 2 instead if you have no other dice in your pool.
label: Point Blank

name: Smuggling Job
text: Spot a Yellow character to resolve one of your vehicle support dice as if it were showing a resource (it keeps its value).
label: Smuggling Job

name: Fastest Hunk O' Junk
text: Activate one of your vehicle supports. Then if that support's die is not showing damage, you may remove a die.
label: Fastest Hunk O' Junk

name: Rebel Alliance
text: Heal 1 damage from a Blue character (yours or an opponent's). Heal 1 damage from a Red character. Heal 1 damage from a Yellow character.
label: Rebel Alliance

name: Reactor Shaft
subtitle: Death Star II
text: Claim - Deal 1 indirect damage to yourself to choose one of your vehicle supports with a cost of 3 or less and roll its die into your pool, if able. Then resolve that die.
label: Reactor Shaft - Death Star II

name: Captain Phasma
subtitle: Ruthless Tactician
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if that character has 6 or more damage on it.
flavor: "You can't be so stupid as to think this will be easy."
label: Captain Phasma - Ruthless Tactician

name: First Order Stormtrooper
flavor: Members of this new generation of stormtroopers are trained from birth and fed a steady diet of First Order propaganda to ensure absolute loyalty.
label: First Order Stormtrooper

name: Greedo
subtitle: Unlucky Mercenary
text: Before this character is defeated, roll any number of his character dice into your pool. Then resolve any number of his character dice in the order of your choice.
flavor: "Going somewhere, Solo?"
label: Greedo - Unlucky Mercenary

name: Guavian Enforcer
text: Action - Remove this die to remove 1 shield from a character.
label: Guavian Enforcer

name: Kylo Ren
subtitle: Tormented One
text: After you activate this character, you may choose a color (Blue, Red, Yellow or Gray). Then reveal a random card in an opponent's hand. If that card matches the chosen color, deal 2 damage to a character.
label: Kylo Ren - Tormented One

name: Mother Talzin
subtitle: Nightsister Matriarch
text: After you activate this character, you may reveal the top card of a player's deck. If its cost is an odd number, turn one of that player's dice to any side.
flavor: "I use dark magick to achieve power."
label: Mother Talzin - Nightsister Matriarch

name: Seventh Sister
subtitle: Agile Inquisitor
text: After you activate this character, you may roll an ID9 Seeker Droid ([EaW]13) die into your pool (its X value is equal to the number of ID9 Seeker Droid dice in your pool). Set aside that die after it is resolved or removed.
label: Seventh Sister - Agile Inquisitor

name: Thrawn
subtitle: Master Strategist
text: After you activate this character, you may choose a number. Then look at an opponent's hand and discard a card from it that costs the chosen number.
flavor: "I study the art of war."
label: Thrawn - Master Strategist

name: Tobias Beckett
subtitle: Thief For Hire
text: Power Action - Each player gains 1 resource. [special] - Take 1 resource from an opponent. If that opponent has no resources, gain 1 resource.
flavor: "You in?"
label: Tobias Beckett - Thief For Hire

name: Aayla Secura
subtitle: Jedi General
text: [special] - Turn one of your Blue or Red dice to any side. Turn an opponent's die to any side.
flavor: "Sometimes it takes courage to stick to one's beliefs."
label: Aayla Secura - Jedi General

name: Anakin Skywalker
subtitle: Podracing Prodigy
text: After you activate this character, you may turn one of your droid or podracer dice to any side.
flavor: "I've built a racer. It's the fastest ever!"
label: Anakin Skywalker - Podracing Prodigy

name: Cassian Andor
subtitle: Rebellion Operative
text: After you resolve this die, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent or discard the top card of a deck.
flavor: "I've been in this fight since I was six years old."
label: Cassian Andor - Rebellion Operative

name: Clone Trooper
text: After you activate this character, you may reroll this die, or, if you control the battlefield, you may reroll one of your character dice.
flavor: "Someone's out to start a war." <cite>Mace Windu</cite>
label: Clone Trooper

name: Hired Gun
flavor: "You needn't worry about your reward. If money is all that you love, then that's what you'll receive." <cite>Leia Organa</cite>
label: Hired Gun

name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Reluctant Instructor
text: You may resolve the shield ([shield]) sides of this die as if they were melee damage ([melee]). Power Action - Move a Blue ability from this character to another Blue character.
label: Luke Skywalker - Reluctant Instructor

name: Poe Dameron
subtitle: More Than A Pilot
text: [special] - Give a character 1 shield. You may turn another die to any side.
flavor: "The Resistance will not be intimidated by you."
label: Poe Dameron - More Than A Pilot

name: Rey
subtitle: Finding The Ways
text: After you activate this character, if she has 1 or more shields, you may deal 1 damage to a character.
flavor: "The Force, it's calling you." <cite>Maz Kanata</cite>
label: Rey - Finding The Ways

name: Rose
subtitle: Skilled Mechanic
text: [special] - Gain 1 resource. You may remove 1 damage from a support.
flavor: "I work behind pipes all day."
label: Rose - Skilled Mechanic

name: Doubt
text: Reroll an opponent's die. Then that opponent either resolves that die or removes it.
label: Doubt

name: Endless Ranks
text: Return one of your defeated non-unique Red characters to the game with no damage on it.
flavor: Battle droids are less effective than flesh and blood soldiers, but they are also much cheaper to replace.
label: Endless Ranks

name: Enrage
text: Deal 1 damage to one of your Blue characters to gain 1 resource.
label: Enrage

name: Fight Dirty
text: Remove any number of your Yellow dice. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of dice you just removed.
label: Fight Dirty

name: Isolation
text: Spot a Blue character to remove a character die.
label: Isolation

name: Loose Ends
text:
Ambush.
Remove one of your dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) to discard the top 4 cards of an opponent's deck.
label: Loose Ends

name: Probe
text: Look at two random cards from your opponent's hand and discard any of those cards that are events.
label: Probe

name: Rise Again
text: Heal 5 damage from a unique Blue character. You may play an upgrade from your discard pile on it for free.
label: Rise Again

name: Take Prisoner
text: Choose an opponent. Discard 2 random cards from that opponent's hand for each defeated character they have.
label: Take Prisoner

name: The Best Defense...
text: Deal one of your Red characters 3 damage to remove up to 2 of an opponent's dice.
flavor: "There they are! Blast them!"
label: The Best Defense...

name: Twin Shadows
text: Spot 2 characters with the same title to remove up to 2 dice.
label: Twin Shadows

name: Witch Magick
text: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck (do not rearrange them). Heal damage from a character equal to the number of cards you just revealed that cost an odd number.
label: Witch Magick

name: Against The Odds
text: Reroll one of your dice. Then, if it just rerolled the same symbol, you may resolve it, increasing its value by 2.
label: Against The Odds

name: Commando Raid
text: Resolve one of your Red dice showing discard ([discard]), increasing its value by 2. Then draw a card.
label: Commando Raid

name: Defensive Racing
text: Play only if one or more of your vehicle dice were removed during an opponent's last turn this round. Spot a Yellow character to roll one of those removed dice into your pool.
label: Defensive Racing

name: Do Or Do Not
text: Reroll one of your dice. Then you may resolve it, increasing its value by 1. Otherwise, remove it.
flavor: "There is no try." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: Do Or Do Not

name: Draw Attention
text: Move up to 2 damage from one of your characters to another one of your characters (this ignores shields).
label: Draw Attention

name: Field Medic
text: Remove 2 damage from a character.
label: Field Medic

name: First Aid
text: Heal 2 damage from a Red character, or 4 damage instead if it is the first round of the game.
label: First Aid

name: Synchronicity
text:
Play only if you have dice showing melee damage ([melee]) and shields ([shield]).
Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
label: Synchronicity

name: Loth-Wolf Bond
text: Give up to 2 of your Blue characters 1 shield each. You may activate those characters in the order of your choice.
label: Loth-Wolf Bond

name: Local Patrol
text: Force an opponent to choose to either lose 1 resource or discard the top 2 cards of their deck.
label: Local Patrol

name: Pacify
text: Remove a character die. Then give that character 2 shields.
label: Pacify

name: Way of the Light
text: Remove a non-hero die.
label: Way of the Light

name: At Odds
text: Remove a die showing a value that is an odd number. You may place this event on the bottom of your deck.
label: At Odds

name: Automated Defense
text: Spot a droid to remove a die.
flavor: Exceptional at reconnaissance, probe droids could also be equipped with a blaster-type weapon for defense.
label: Automated Defense

name: Beguile
text: Reroll an opponent's die. Then turn one of their dice to any side. Then remove one of their dice.
label: Beguile

name: Block
text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing melee damage.
label: Block

name: Crash Landing
text: Remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]). Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself equal to the value showing on that die.
label: Crash Landing

name: Dodge
text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing ranged damage ([ranged])
label: Dodge

name: Electroshock
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove a die showing a value of 2 or lower.
label: Electroshock

name: Flank
text:
Play only if you have more ready characters than an opponent.
Remove one of that opponent's dice.
label: Flank

name: Hasty Exit
text: Give control of the battlefield to an opponent to remove a die showing damage ([ranged],[melee], or [indirect]).
label: Hasty Exit

name: High Ground
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Remove an opponent's die showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]). Then, if it was a character die, deal 1 damage to that character.
label: High Ground

name: Lightsaber Pull
text: Spot a Blue character to search your deck for a Blue weapon, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
label: Lightsaber Pull

name: Sabotage
text: Discard cards from your hand equal to the cost of a support in play to discard that support.
label: Sabotage

name: Truce
text:
Ambush.
Each player gains 1 resource.
label: Truce

name: Armored Reinforcement
text: Action - Set this plot aside to search your deck or discard pile for a Red vehicle support and play it, decreasing its cost by 1. If you search your deck, shuffle it.
label: Armored Reinforcement

name: Unshackle
text:
Ambush.
Discard a downgrade from play.
flavor: "I'm here to rescue you." <cite>Bo-Katan Kryze</cite>
label: Unshackle

name: No Allegiance
text:
Include only if you have no hero or villain characters on your team.
Each of your neutral characters has +1 health.
label: No Allegiance

name: Solidarity
text: Include only if each character on your team is the same color and your deck contains no more than one copy of any card.
label: Solidarity

name: Hound's Tooth
text: After you activate this support, you may remove one of your Yellow character dice to gain 1 resource.
flavor: Bossk's ship was a YV-666 light freighter modified to serve the bounty hunter's needs.
label: Hound's Tooth

name: Separatist Landing Craft
text: [special] - Spend 2 resources to add a Battle Droid ([LEG]9) to your team. Discard this support from play.
flavor: A heavy transport starship used by the Trade Federation for transporting and deploying droid battalions planet side.
label: Separatist Landing Craft

name: Slave I
text: Power Action - Reroll one of your Yellow dice. Then you may remove an opponent's die showing a value equal to the value showing on the die you just rerolled.
label: Slave I

name: Anakin Skywalker's Podracer
text:
Ambush.
After you resolve this die, you may discard the top card of a deck or, if you spot Anakin Skywalker, discard a random card from an opponent's hand.
label: Anakin Skywalker's Podracer

name: Awakening
text: Action - Exhaust this support to resolve one of your dice showing a modified side (a side with a +) as if it was not modified (did not have the +).
label: Awakening

name: BB-8
text: Action - Spot a vehicle support to attach this card to it as a mod upgrade (discard all upgrades on this card). If that vehicle is Black One, ready it. Use this action only once per game.
label: BB-8

name: Black One
text: Power Action - Spot Poe Dameron to turn this die to any side. [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. If a droid is attached to this support, reroll this die instead of removing it.
label: Black One

name: Millennium Falcon
text: After you activate this support, you may activate one of your characters.
flavor: "Chewie we're home." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
label: Millennium Falcon

name: Suppressive Fire
text: After a character is activated, you may spend 1 resource and discard this support from play to remove one of its character dice.
label: Suppressive Fire

name: Bubble Shield
text:
You may distribute indirect damage ([indirect]) to this support as if it were a character with 3 health.
Discard this support if it has 3 or more damage on it.
label: Bubble Shield

name: Lightsaber Throw
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing melee damage ([melee]).
Deal 2 damage to a character.
label: Lightsaber Throw

name: It Binds All Things
text: Before you play a Blue upgrade, you may exhaust this support to decrease its cost by 1.
label: It Binds All Things

name: Modified HWK-290
text:
After you play this support, place 2 damage on it.
After you activate this support, deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself equal to the damage on it.
label: Modified HWK-290

name: Blackmail
text: After you roll this die, any opponent may give you 1 resource to remove this die.
label: Blackmail

name: Crossguard Lightsaber
text:
After you play this upgrade on Kylo Ren, deal 1 damage to a character.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if that character has 1 or more shields.
label: Crossguard Lightsaber

name: Energy Bow
text: After one of your card effects rerolls one or more character dice, you may reroll this die.
flavor: "We don't like strangers." <cite>Nightsister</cite>
label: Energy Bow

name: F-11D Rifle
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Force an opponent to deal 2 damage to their characters, distributing the damage as they wish.
label: F-11D Rifle

name: Grand Moff
text: Unique Red character only. Power Action - Use the "Claim" ability on the battlefield or switch the battlefield with a battlefield that is not being used (but was brought to the game).
label: Grand Moff

name: ID9 Seeker Droid
text: The X on this die is equal to the number of ID9 Seeker Droid dice in your pool (when resolving dice, resolve them one at a time).
label: ID9 Seeker Droid

name: On The Hunt
text: [special] - Remove all shields from a character. You may spend 1 resource to remove one of its character or upgrade dice.
label: On The Hunt

name: Handcrafted Light Bow
text:
[special] - Deal 3 damage to a character.
[special] - Remove all shields from a character. Then deal 2 damage to that character.
label: Handcrafted Light Bow

name: Lone Operative
text: [special] - Heal 2 damage from attached character, or 3 damage instead if attached character is your only character in play.
label: Lone Operative

name: Overkill
flavor: The most hardened soldiers already know they're dead.
label: Overkill

name: Shoto Lightsaber
text: After you activate attached character, if it has another Blue weapon, you may give it 1 shield or remove 1 shield from a character.
label: Shoto Lightsaber

name: Arc Caster
text: Modify vehicle support. After you play this upgrade, you may activate attached support. Then you may reroll a die.
label: Arc Caster

name: Dorsal Turret
text: Modify vehicle support. After you play this upgrade, you may roll this die into your pool.
label: Dorsal Turret

name: Force Wave
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Deal 3 damage to a character. Deal 2 damage to a another character. Deal 1 damage to a third character.
label: Force Wave

name: Heirloom Lightsaber
text: This upgrade has the Redeploy keyword while it's on a Blue character.
label: Heirloom Lightsaber

name: Hidden Agenda
text: Action - Play an event from your hand, decreasing its cost by 2. Discard this upgrade from play.
label: Hidden Agenda

name: Holdout Blaster
text: Ambush. Redeploy.
label: Holdout Blaster

name: Hunker Down
text: If attached character takes melee damage ([melee]), discard this upgrade. Action - Exhaust this upgrade to give attached character 1 shield.
label: Hunker Down

name: Mandalorian Vambraces
text: Action - Return this upgrade from play to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Try them on, Grappling line, paralyzing darts, repulsor. All designed to combat the abilities of the Jedi". <cite>Fenn Rau</cite>
label: Mandalorian Vambraces

name: Mind Probe
text:
Blue Character only.
[special] - Deal an opponent's character 1 damage for each card in that opponent's hand.
label: Mind Probe

name: Promotion
text:
Red character only.
After you play this upgrade, you may draw a card.
label: Promotion

name: Riot Shield
text: Before attached character takes damage, you may discard this upgrade to block 2 damage, or 3 damage instead if attached character is a trooper.
label: Riot Shield

name: Carbon-freezing Chamber
subtitle: Bespin
text: Claim - Choose a character die. That die cannot be rolled during the next round.
label: Carbon-freezing Chamber - Bespin

name: Comm Tower
subtitle: Scarif
text: Claim - Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1 if you spot a plot.
label: Comm Tower - Scarif

name: Command Center
subtitle: Lothal
text: Claim - Each opponent discards the top 2 cards of their deck.
label: Command Center - Lothal

name: Emperor's Throne Room
subtitle: Death Star II
text: Claim - Turn one of your dice to a side showing a special ability ([special]). Then you may resolve that die.
label: Emperor's Throne Room - Death Star II

name: Rebel War Room
subtitle: Yavin IV
text: Claim - Resolve one of your dice. If it has a resource cost, you do not have to pay it.
label: Rebel War Room - Yavin IV

name: Rift Valley
subtitle: Dathomir
text: Claim - Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card's cost is an odd number, remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.
label: Rift Valley - Dathomir

name: Retribution
text:
Include only if you have a character that is 20 or more points on your team.
After one or more of your character dice are removed by an opponent, you may deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Retribution

name: Wanted
text: After attached character is defeated, you may gain 2 resources.
flavor: "You don't think the Empire is going to want you for your role in their loss?" <cite>General Dodonna</cite>
label: Wanted

name: Armor Plating
text: Before attached character takes damage, you may discard this upgrade to block 2 damage.
flavor: The Beskar alloy in Mandalorian armor gives it enough strength to endure even a direct blaster shot.
label: Armor Plating

name: Hunt Them Down
text: Resolve one of your dice showing ranged or melee damage ([ranged] or [melee]) against a character, increasing its value by the number of bounty downgrades on that character.
label: Hunt Them Down

name: Qui-Gon Jinn's Spirit
text:
Discard this support from play if you control Qui-Gon Jinn.
[special] - Shuffle this support into its owner's deck to give a character 1 shield. Then remove any number of shields from your characters to deal that much damage to a character.
label: Qui-Gon Jinn's Spirit

name: Luke Skywalker's Lightning Rod
text: While this upgrade is attached to Luke Skywalker, you may resolve the melee damage ([melee]) sides of this die as if they were shields ([shield]).
label: Luke Skywalker's Lightning Rod

name: Motivate
text: Spot 2 Red characters or Leia Organa to resolve one of your character dice, increasing its value by 1.
label: Motivate

name: Indifferent
text: Spot a neutral character to remove a die.
label: Indifferent

name: Jetpack
text: [special] - Remove a die showing melee damage ([melee]) and give attached character 1 shield.
label: Jetpack

name: Jabba's Palace
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Claim - Gain 1 resource. You may spot a bounty hunter to force an opponent to lose 1 resource.
label: Jabba's Palace - Tatooine

name: Profitable Connection
text: You start the game with 1 additional resource.
label: Profitable Connection

name: Extract
text: Choose up to 3 cards in a discard pile and set them aside.
label: Extract

name: Overload
text: Place 1 damage on a support in play. Then you may discard that support if it has damage on it equal to or more than its cost.
label: Overload

name: Hex
text: Action - Exhaust this downgrade to remove one of attached character's character die showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Hex

name: Dead Or Alive
text: Play only if you spot a bounty hunter. After attached character is activated, you may gain 1 resource. After attached character is defeated, you may gain 1 resource.
label: Dead Or Alive

name: Kylo Ren
subtitle: Bound By The Force
text: Power Action - Move 1 shield from this character to another character. Then, if you moved that shield to a hero, deal 1 damage to a character. [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. If any of this damage is blocked, reroll this die instead of removing it.
label: Kylo Ren - Bound By The Force

name: Rey
subtitle: Bound By The Force
text: Power Action - Reroll a character die or turn a villain character die to a side showing a value of 0. [special] - Give 2 shields to a character. Then, if that character has 3 or more shields, reroll this die instead of removing it.
label: Rey - Bound By The Force

name: A99 Aquata Breather
text: Before attached character takes indirect damage ([indirect]), you may exhaust this upgrade to block 1 of that damage.
label: A99 Aquata Breather

name: Darth Vader's Lightsaber
text: After you resolve this die, you may spend 1 resource to roll one of attached character's character dice into your pool. Then, if this upgrade is on Darth Vader, deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Darth Vader's Lightsaber

name: Jedi Lightsaber
text: After you play this upgrade, you may give attached character 1 shield, or 2 shields instead if this upgrade is on a Jedi.
label: Jedi Lightsaber

name: Yoda's Lightsaber
text:
After you play this upgrade on Yoda, you may give him 1 shield.
[special] - Deal 1 unblockable damage to a character, or 2 unblockable damage instead if you remove 1 shield from attached character.
label: Yoda's Lightsaber

name: "Fair" Trade
text: Resolve one of your dice showing a resource ([resource]). Then switch all of your resources with all of an opponent's resources.
label: "Fair" Trade

name: Force Strike
text: Turn one of your Blue dice to the side showing melee damage ([melee]). Then you may resolve that die.
label: Force Strike

name: Jedi Mind Trick
text: Spot a Jedi to choose a dice pool. An opponent splits the dice in that pool into 2 groups of any size. Either remove all dice in a group, or turn any number of dice in a group to sides of your choice.
label: Jedi Mind Trick

name: Polarity
text:
Ambush.
Spot a hero character to give a character 1 shield. Spot a villain character to deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Polarity

name: Scorched Earth
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of dice in their pool.
label: Scorched Earth

name: Steadfast
text: Move 1 damage from one of your Blue characters to another character, or 2 damage instead if no cards are in your discard pile (this ignores shields).
label: Steadfast

name: Temporary Truce
text: You can only include Kylo Ren and Rey on your team (you can include villain and hero cards in your deck). You cannot include Gray cards in your deck.
label: Temporary Truce

name: New Orders
text: Switch the battlefield with a battlefield that is not being used (but was brought to the game) and use its claim ability.
label: New Orders

name: Refit
text: Play a vehicle from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1. Then place 1 damage on it.
label: Refit

name: Ezra Bridger
subtitle: Aspiring Jedi
text: Power Action - If this character has one or more upgrades, draw a card, or 2 cards instead if he has 3 or more upgrades.
flavor: "We can fight him together!"
label: Ezra Bridger - Aspiring Jedi

name: Sentinel Messenger
text: You cannot play Blue abilities on this character. After you activate this character, look at the top card of your deck. You may play that card (paying its cost).
flavor: Relayer of the order Operation: Cinder.
label: Sentinel Messenger

name: Salvaged Arm
text: Modify droid character or support. Before you resolve one of attached droid's character, support, or upgrade dice, you may exhaust this upgrade to increase its value by 1.
label: Salvaged Arm

name: Grappling Arm
text: Modify droid character or support. Action - Remove this die to discard a trap from play.
label: Grappling Arm

name: Chopper
subtitle: Metal Menace
text: Power Action - Play a mod from your hand or discard pile onto this character, decreasing its cost by 1.
flavor: Also known as C1-1OP, "Chop", or Spectre 3.
label: Chopper - Metal Menace

name: Mortis (Day)
subtitle: Ethereal Space
text: After the upkeep phase begins, heal 1 damage from each character. Flip this card. Claim - Heal 1 damage from a character. You may flip this card.
label: Mortis (Day) - Ethereal Space

name: Mortis (Night)
subtitle: Ethereal Space
text: After the upkeep phase begins, deal 1 damage to each character. Flip this card. Claim - Deal 1 damage to a character. You may flip this card.
label: Mortis (Night) - Ethereal Space

name: Rule of Two
text: If you do not control exactly 2 characters, one that is a Sith and the other an apprentice, set this plot aside an deal 1 indirect damage to yourself. Action - If you have exactly one character die in your pool, exhaust this plot to resolve it, increasing its value by 1.
label: Rule of Two

name: Darth Bane
subtitle: Ancient Master
text: Decrease the cost of the first ability you play on this character each game by 2. [special] - Choose an upgrade on this character and deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to that upgrade's cost.
flavor: "I was the last survivor."
label: Darth Bane - Ancient Master

name: Trap the Blade
text: Remove a die showing melee damage ([melee]). If it is an upgrade die, you may spot a Blue character and spend 1 resource to discard its matching card from play.
label: Trap the Blade

name: Commander Pyre
subtitle: Harsh Negotiator
text: After you claim or take control of the battlefield, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
flavor: "You will come with us, or be destroyed."
label: Commander Pyre - Harsh Negotiator

name: Commander Pyre's Blaster
text: After you play this upgrade on Commander Pyre, you may take control of the battlefield.
label: Commander Pyre's Blaster

name: Taking Charge
text:
Ambush.
If you control the battlefield, remove a die. If you do not control the battlefield, take control of it and you may reroll a die.
label: Taking Charge

name: Cruel Methods
text: After you claim or take control of the battlefield, you may deal 1 damage to attached character.
flavor: "You have a lovely voice, General Syndulla." <cite>Arindha Pryce</cite>
label: Cruel Methods

name: Forced Labor
text: After attached character is defeated, you may roll one of its character dice into its owner's pool. Then either resolve that die for free as if it were in your pool or remove it.
label: Forced Labor

name: Kanan Jarrus
subtitle: Jedi Exile
text: This character's point value is decreased by 1 if your team has another Spectre. After you activate this character, you may choose a symbol and a die. Then an opponent turns that die to a side not showing the chosen symbol.
label: Kanan Jarrus - Jedi Exile

name: Nullify
text: Move 1 shield from one of your characters to an opponent's character. Then remove a die.
label: Nullify

name: Fresh Start
text: Remove a character die. Then discard cards from the top of a deck equal to the value showing on that die.
flavor: "I have to tell you something... I hate your hair." <cite>Hera Syndulla</cite>
label: Fresh Start

name: Hera Syndulla
subtitle: Seasoned Captain
text: Piloting. After this character begins piloting a vehicle, you may spend 2 resources to ready that vehicle.
label: Hera Syndulla - Seasoned Captain

name: Ghost
text: Ambush. After this support enters play, you may activate a Spectre you control. After you resolve this die, you may give each character piloting this support 1 shield.
label: Ghost

name: As One
text: Reroll a die. Then resolve up to 3 of your Spectre dice.
flavor: "Stand up together, because that's when we're strongest-as one." <cite>Ezra Bridger</cite>
label: As One

name: Sabine Wren
subtitle: Artistic and Resourceful
text:
Piloting.
[special] - Deal 2 indirect damage to an opponent, or 3 indirect damage instead if you have a Blue die, a Red die, and another Yellow die in your pool.
label: Sabine Wren - Artistic and Resourceful

name: Spectre Cell
text: Include only if each character on your team is a Spectre
flavor: "We're a crew. A team. In some ways, a family." <cite>Ezra Bridger</cite>
label: Spectre Cell

name: Fluid Riposte
text: Spot a Blue character to remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee], [indirect]). Then, if that character has a card titled Shien Mastery on it, deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Fluid Riposte

name: On Guard
text:
Ambush.
Give a character 1 shield or spend 1 resource to ready an upgrade.
label: On Guard

name: Assail
text: Ambush. Spot a piloted vehicle to remove a die.
label: Assail

name: Flanked by Wingmen
text: Activate one of your characters to give it 1 shield, or 2 shields instead if you spot 2 pilots.
flavor: "Come with me." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
label: Flanked by Wingmen

name: Think on Your Feet
text: Remove 1 resource from a non-plot card you control to remove a die showing damage ([ranged], [melee], or [indirect]).
flavor: You would be surprised how many problems a well-timed rocket can solve.
label: Think on Your Feet

name: Improvised Explosive
text:
This support enters play with 2 resources on it.
After the action phase begins, remove 1 resource from this support. Then if no resources are on it, discard it to deal 3 indirect damage ([indirect]) to a player.
label: Improvised Explosive

name: Eject
text: Ambush. Discard a vehicle you control with a matching die to heal 2 damage from one of its piloting characters and give that character 2 shields.
label: Eject

name: Jawa Junk Dealer
text: After you activate this character, you may play a Gray neutral card from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.
flavor: "Hey, what're you trying to push on us?" <cite>Owen Lars</cite>
label: Jawa Junk Dealer

name: Dryden Vos
subtitle: Ruthless Crime Lord
text: [special] - Shuffle your deck and look at the top card of it. You may play that card for free.
flavor: Underneath his mask of sophistication resided a brutality that manifested through the Crimson Dawn.
label: Dryden Vos - Ruthless Crime Lord

name: One With The Force
text:
Blue character only.
Before attached character is defeated, this upgrade becomes a support for the rest of the game (it starts ready).
label: One With The Force

name: Slave I
text: Your Boba Fett and Jango Fett each have Piloting. After this support becomes piloted by a bounty-hunter, you may deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Slave I

name: Salvaged Parts
text: Set aside 2 non-event cards from a discard pile. Then spot a scavenger to gain 1 resource.
flavor: "Togu togu!"
label: Salvaged Parts

name: Imperialis
text:
After you activate Palpatine, you may activate this support.
[special] - Discard this support from play to deal 4 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
flavor: A self destruct mechanism was its fatal flaw
label: Imperialis

name: Enfys Nest's Electroripper
text: [special] - Deal 1 unblockable damage to each of an opponent's characters. If this upgrade is on Enfys Nest, remove one of that opponent's character dice.
label: Enfys Nest's Electroripper

name: Dangerous Maneuver
text: Heal 2 damage from one of your characters. Deal 2 indirect damage ([indirect]) to yourself.
label: Dangerous Maneuver

name: Resistance Trench Fighters
text: Action - Remove this die to remove a die showing an equal value.
flavor: "Alright ground forces, lay down some fire!" <cite>Poe Dameron</cite>
label: Resistance Trench Fighters

name: EL-16 Heavy Field Blaster
text: Before you resolve this die, you may increase its value by 1 if it modifies a trooper die.
flavor: The weapon of choice for troops in the Resistance.
label: EL-16 Heavy Field Blaster

name: Ancient Magicks
text: Blue character only. [special] - Deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. You may ready a curse.
flavor: "They must be compensated for the use of ther magick." <cite>Maul</cite>
label: Ancient Magicks

name: Canto Bight Security
text: After this support is discarded from your hand by an opponent's effect, you may play it for free.
label: Canto Bight Security

name: AT-RT
text: The modifier sides of this die can be resolved with one of your trooper dice showing any symbol.
label: AT-RT

name: Kashyyyk Warrior
text: Before you resolve one of this character's character dice showing damage, increase its value by 1 if this character has 6 or more damage.
flavor: Fierce warriors who were not afraid to shed their blood in order to protect their homeland.
label: Kashyyyk Warrior

name: Fortitude
text: Attached character has +3 health, or +4 health instead if it is a Wookiee.
flavor: A wound that would kill a human will only make a Wookiee angry.
label: Fortitude

name: Valorous Tribe
text: Action - Exhaust this plot to move up to 2 damage from a character to a character you control. Then you may spot a Wookiee to heal 1 damage from a character.
label: Valorous Tribe

name: Finishing Strike
text: Resolve one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]) as unblockable. Then, if the character just dealt damage has 1 remaining health, defeat it.
label: Finishing Strike

name: Nexus Of Power
text: After you activate this support, you may turn this die to any side.
flavor: "It binds the galaxy together." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
label: Nexus Of Power

name: Shakedown
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a disrupt ([disrupt]).
Remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.
label: Shakedown

name: Laser Cannon
text: Modify vehicle support. After you activate attached support, you may deal 1 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent.
label: Laser Cannon

name: Inferno Squad ID10 Seeker Droid
text: [special] - Look at an opponent's hand and discard a card from it. That opponent may take one additional action during their next turn this round.
flavor: "VZ-626." <cite>Iden Versio</cite>
label: Inferno Squad ID10 Seeker Droid

name: Outgun
text: Spot any number of mods on your vehicles and spend that many resources to remove that many dice.
label: Outgun

name: LR-57 Combat Droid
text:
After you play this support, place 1 resource on it.
[special] - Place 1 resource on this support. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of resources on this support.
label: LR-57 Combat Droid

name: Rearm
text: Play a Red upgrade from your discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Rearm

name: Twin Strike
text: Resolve up to 2 of your Blue character dice showing melee damage ([melee]) as unblockable.
label: Twin Strike

name: Sith Teachings
text: Play only if you spot a Sith. After you play this upgrade, you may remove a die showing a blank. [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character, or 2 damage instead if you removed an opponent's die this round.
label: Sith Teachings

name: Diatium Power Cell
text: Before you resolve a weapon die showing damage ([ranged], [melee] or [indirect]) that has the word "Lightsaber" in its title, you may exhaust this support to increase its value by 1.
label: Diatium Power Cell

name: Convergence
text: Spot any number of characters that have the same subtype to discard a support, upgrade, or downgrade that costs that number from play.
label: Convergence

name: Chewbacca's Blaster Rifle
text: After you play this upgrade, you may deal 1 damage to attached character to roll this die into your pool. Then, if that character is Chewbacca, you may resolve this die.
label: Chewbacca's Blaster Rifle

name: Custom Bandolier
text: Each equipment on attached character does not count towards its upgrade limit Action - Exhaust this upgrade to reroll one of your equipment or weapon dice.
label: Custom Bandolier

name: Punishing One
text: After an opponent's character that has a bounty on it is defeated, you may ready this support. If you spot Dengar, you may activate this support.
flavor: It had no holding cells due to Dengar often taking only dead bounties.
label: Punishing One

name: Conveyex Robbery
text: Spot a scoundrel to choose one die in each opponents' pools. Resolve those dice in the order of your choice as if they were in your pool.
label: Conveyex Robbery

name: Grievance Striker
text:
Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade on General Grievous or on Obi-Wan Kenobi, you may deal 1 damage to a character.
flavor: "So uncivilized." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
label: Grievance Striker

name: Hampered
text: No more than one of attached character's character dice can be resolved during each turn and those dice cannot be modified.
label: Hampered

name: Stap Droid
text: Ambush.
flavor: The Single Trooper Aerial Platform was a lightweight repulsorcraft that greratly increased the speed and maneuverability of battle droids in the field.
label: Stap Droid

name: Z-6 Jetpack
text:
This upgrade enters play with 1 resource on it.
[special] - Place 1 resource on this upgrade. Then deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the number of resources on this upgrade.
label: Z-6 Jetpack

name: Wretched Hive
text: Action - Exhaust this support and spot a scavenger to force an opponent to choose and discard a card from their hand unless they give you 1 resource.
label: Wretched Hive

name: Tie Bomber
text:
This support enters play with 3 resources on it.
[special] - Remove 1 resource from this support to deal 4 indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent. You may return this support to your hand.
label: Tie Bomber

name: Insidious
text: Action - Exhaust this support to gain 1 resource if an opponent's character die is showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Insidious

name: Deadly
text: Action - Exhaust this upgrade and remove one of attached character's dice to deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
label: Deadly

name: Drop Zone
text: After you claim the battlefield, you may place 1 damage on this support. Action - Exhaust this support to move any amount of damage from it to a character (this ignores shields).
label: Drop Zone

name: Free-For-All
text: Remove any number of your dice. Then deal indirect damage ([indirect]) to an opponent equal to the number of dice you just removed.
label: Free-For-All

name: Chancellor's Edict
text:
After this downgrade is played, remove all shields from attached character.
After attached character is defeated, you may give a character 2 shields.
label: Chancellor's Edict

name: Bounty Hunters' Guild
text: Each of your opponents' characters has +1 downgrade limit. After you play a bounty, you may activate one of your bounty hunters.
flavor: "By the authority of the Bounty Hunters' Guild, you are now my acquisition." <cite>Bossk</cite>
label: Bounty Hunters' Guild

name: DX-2 Disruptor Blaster Pistol
text: Damage dealt by this die or by a die that it modifies is unblockable.
flavor: This weapon was banned among the Rebel Alliance for its destructive potential. Some operatives carried one anyway.
label: DX-2 Disruptor Blaster Pistol

name: Counterintelligence
text: Spot a leader to look at an opponent's hand and place an event from it on top of their deck.
label: Counterintelligence

name: Mastermind
text: [special] - Name a card. Then reveal an opponent's hand and set each copy of the named card from it aside.
flavor: "Victory and defeat are often determined by the smallest detail." <cite>Grand Admiral Thrawn</cite>
label: Mastermind

name: Cultural Records
text:
After a player plays a copy of a card set aside by this support, you may gain 1 resource or remove a die.
[special] - Look at an opponent's hand and set a card from it aside. Gain 1 action.
flavor: "I like to know the deeper meanings of the pieces I collect." <cite>Grand Admiral Thrawn</cite>
label: Cultural Records

name: Air Superiority
text: After you play this support, place 3 shields on it. Action - Exhaust this support to move 1 shield from it to a character.
label: Air Superiority

name: Undermine
text: Remove up to 2 dice showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Undermine

name: Bardottan Sphere
text: [special] - Discard the top card of deck. If that card's cost is an odd number, deal 1 damage to a character.
flavor: "I can feel the power of the pure spirit resonating in this orb." <cite>Mother Talzin</cite>
label: Bardottan Sphere

name: Second Sister
subtitle: Expert Duelist
text:
After you activate this character, turn an opponent's die to a symbol showing on one of this character's character dice
[special] - Turn another one of your character dice to any side and resolve it, increasing its value by 1, or by 2 instead if it is showing the same symbol as an opponent's die.
label: Second Sister - Expert Duelist

name: The Inquisitorius
text: Include only if each character on your team is an Inquisitor. Action - Exhaust this plot to turn an opponent's character die to a side showing a blank.
label: The Inquisitorius

name: Cal Kestis' Lightsaber
text: Power Action - If this upgrade is on Cal Kestis, turn this die to any side. If this die is showing a non-damage side, you may roll a set-aside copy of this die into your pool. Set that die aside after it is resolved or removed.
label: Cal Kestis' Lightsaber

name: BD-1
text: Power Action - Spot a Jedi character to move this upgrade to it. [special] - Heal 2 damage from attached character
label: BD-1

name: Apt Lesson
text: Turn one of your Blue character dice to any side. Then you may play a move event from your hand or discard pile.
label: Apt Lesson

name: Incendiary Stockpile
text: You can resolve your Yellow dice showing resources or disrupt as melee damage against this support, placing damage on this card equal to the damage dealt. Action - Discard this support to deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the amount of damage on it.

name: Garsa Fwip
subtitle: Respected Twi'lek
text: Charm. (After you activate this character, you may place 1 charm token on a character). Power Action - Remove 1 charm token from a character to turn one of that character's character dice to any side.
label: Garsa Fwip - Respected Twi'lek

name: Cheap Shot
text:
Ambush.
Resolve one of your dice showing a value of 1 as if it were showing ranged damage.
label: Cheap Shot

name: Sabacc
text: Force all players to reveal the top 3 cards of their deck. The players whose revealed cards total the highest combined cost without exceeding 7 gain 2 resources. %(If all players exceed 7, no players gain resources).%
label: Sabacc

name: Tusken Camp
text:
Play only if you spot a Yellow character.
After you activate this support, roll 2 set-aside Tusken Raider ([AW]22) dice into your pool. Then you may remove those dice to gain 1 resource.
label: Tusken Camp

name: Gaderffii
text:
While this upgrade is on a Yellow character, it gains Redeploy.
[special] - Remove an opponent's die.
label: Gaderffii

name: The Dune Sea
subtitle: Tatooine
text: After an opponent takes the reroll dice action for the first time each round, you may force them to choose and discard another card from their hand.
label: The Dune Sea - Tatooine

name: Figrin D'an
subtitle: Bith For Hire
text: Charm. (After you activate this character, you may place 1 charm token on a character). Power Action - Remove 2 charm tokens from a character to resolve one of that character's character dice without removing it from the pool.
label: Figrin D'an - Bith For Hire

name: Anticipation
text:
Spot a character that is 18 or more points to roll one of its character dice into your pool.
Before this card is revealed or discarded from your hand by an opponent's effect, you may play this card for free.
label: Anticipation

name: Charm Offensive
text: Remove 1 charm token from a character to remove a character die.
label: Charm Offensive

name: Dank Farrik
text:
Play only if an opponent removed 1 or more of your dice during their last turn this round.
Renew 0.
Reroll all dice.
label: Dank Farrik

name: Harvest
text: Spot a location to claim the battlefield, even if an opponent has claimed it this round. Then gain 2 resources.
label: Harvest

name: Mad About Me
text: Ambush. Spot a musician to place 1 charm token on a character.
label: Mad About Me

name: Solitary
text:
Play only if you have exactly one character in play.
Remove an opponent's die. Then, if you control the character with the least remaining health, you may remove a die not showing damage.
label: Solitary

name: Krayt Dragon Bones
text: Action - Exhaust this support to reveal a random card in an opponent's hand. If that card's cost is: 0: Turn a die; 1: Discard the top card of a deck; 2: Gain 1 resource; 3: Remove a die.
label: Krayt Dragon Bones

name: Moisture Farm
text: Action - Exhaust this support and resolve one of your dice showing a resource to draw a card.
label: Moisture Farm

name: The Modal Nodes
text: Charm. (After you activate this support, you may place 1 charm token on a character.) Power Action - Spot Figrin D'an to turn one of your dice to a side showing a resource.
label: The Modal Nodes

name: IB-94 Blaster Pistol
text: Ambush. Action - Exhaust this upgrade to give attached character 1 shield.
label: IB-94 Blaster Pistol

name: Substrata
subtitle: Glavis
text: Power Action - Reroll an opponent's character die. Reroll one of your character dice. Then deal 1 damage to the character whose die just rolled the lowest value (you choose in the case of a tie).
label: Substrata - Glavis

name: Darth Vader
subtitle: Driven By Revenge
text: After an opponent removes one or more of this character's character dice, discard a random card from that opponent's hand. Power Action - Deal 1 damage to an opponent's character if that opponent has 3 or fewer cards in hand, or 2 damage instead if they have no cards in hand.
label: Darth Vader - Driven By Revenge

name: Fifth Brother
subtitle: Jedi Hunter
text:
After you activate this character, choose a character die in an opponent's pool. Then force that opponent to turn that die to a blank. If they cannot, turn one of this character's character dice to a side showing a special.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. You may remove a die showing a blank.
label: Fifth Brother - Jedi Hunter

name: Reva
subtitle: Third Sister
text:
After setup, choose an opponent's character.
After the chosen character is activated, you must activate this character as your next action, if able.
After you activate this character, you may resolve one of this character's character dice.
label: Reva - Third Sister

name: The Son
subtitle: The Dark Side
text: After you play a Blue ability on this character, place one resource on this card. Action - If this character has 2 or fewer character dice, remove 3 resources from it. Then it gains 1 die (add a set-aside copy of this die on this card).
label: The Son - The Dark Side

name: Weak Mind
text:
Play only if you spot a Blue character.
The focus sides on this die can only be resolved to turn attached character's controller's dice.
label: Weak Mind

name: Display Of Power
text: Spot a Blue character and exhaust an upgrade you control to roll that upgrade's die into your pool.
label: Display Of Power

name: Force Destruction
text: Remove one of your Blue dice showing damage to discard a support from play that costs equal to or less than the value showing on that die.
label: Force Destruction

name: Hate Grows In You
text:
Play only if you have dice showing melee damage and discard.
Turn a die to a side showing a blank and force an opponent to choose and discard a card from their hand.
label: Hate Grows In You

name: Mercy Doesn't Defeat The Enemy
text: Remove one of your Blue dice showing damage to remove up to 2 dice showing a combined value of 3 or less.
flavor: "Which is why you're gonna lose. " <cite>Anakin Skywalker</cite>
label: Mercy Doesn't Defeat The Enemy

name: Sanction
text: Spot a Blue character to choose a character die in any player's pool. Remove all copies of that die from all pools.
label: Sanction

name: Shroud Of Darkness
text: After an opponent takes the discard to reroll action, you may spot an Inquisitor or a Sith and exhaust this plot to deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Shroud Of Darkness

name: Scythe
text: [special] - Turn a die to a side showing a blank. Turn an Inquisitor or Sith die to any side.
label: Scythe

name: Double-Bladed Lightsaber
text: While this upgrade is on an Inquisitor, it has Redeploy. After you resolve this die showing damage, exhaust this upgrade to roll this die into your pool. Then you may resolve it. Otherwise, remove it.
label: Double-Bladed Lightsaber

name: Force Retaliation
text:
Blue character only.
After an opponent removes this die or one or more of attached character's character dice, you may exhaust this upgrade to deal damage to a character equal to the number of dice that were just removed.
label: Force Retaliation

name: Gar Saxon
subtitle: Imperial Mandalorian
text: After you play a Red event with a cost of 1 or more, deal 1 unblockable indirect damage to an opponent.
flavor: "Every lie you tell holds a shred of truth."
label: Gar Saxon - Imperial Mandalorian

name: General Kalani
subtitle: Super Tactical Droid
text: Team Up 1: Each other droid. After an opponent draws 1 or more cards during the action phase, deal 1 damage to a character. I calculate that you have less than a 1 chance of staging a successful rebellion against the Empire.
flavor: "I calculate that you have less than a 1 chance of staging a successful rebellion against the Empire."
label: General Kalani - Super Tactical Droid

name: Nute Gunray
subtitle: Deceitful Viceroy
text: After the start of the upkeep phase, each opponent's hand size is decreased by 1 until the end of the upkeep phase unless that opponent deals 1 damage to a character they control, or 2 damage instead if this character is elite.
label: Nute Gunray - Deceitful Viceroy

name: Tiaan Jerjerrod
subtitle: Moff
text: Power Action - Remove one of your dice showing a resource to either discard the top card of a deck or discard a random card from an opponent's hand. Then, if a non-event card was discarded this way, draw a card.
label: Tiaan Jerjerrod - Moff

name: Fire Across The Galaxy
text: Remove an opponent's die showing a value of 1. Then that opponent may draw a card.
label: Fire Across The Galaxy

name: Imperial Justice
text: Spot a Red character to choose a symbol. Then deal 1 indirect damage to each opponent for each die showing the chosen symbol, to a maximum of 4.
label: Imperial Justice

name: Sinister Motives
text: Discard a card from your hand to remove a die showing a value equal to that card's cost, or up to 2 dice showing a combined value equal to that card's cost if you spot 2 characters that share no subtypes.
label: Sinister Motives

name: Admiral's Orders
text: Action - Set this plot aside to activate any number of your supports in the order of your choice. Action - Spot a leader and exhaust this plot to reroll one of your support dice.
label: Admiral's Orders

name: Executor
text: After you resolve a Red leader die, you may exhaust this support to roll a set-aside Planetary Bombardment ([WotF]33) die into your pool. Power Action - Roll a set-aside Planetary Bombardment die into your pool or spend 2 resources to discard a support from play.
label: Executor

name: Imperial Checkpoint
text: After an opponent activates a character, you may activate this support.
flavor: "It's a standard inspection. Don't worry, I know these fellows. " <cite>Freck</cite>
label: Imperial Checkpoint

name: Seeker Droid
text: Action - Exhaust this support and resolve one of your dice showing a discard to deal 1 damage to a character. If a non-event card was discarded this way, ready this support.
label: Seeker Droid

name: Stranded
text: After the upkeep phase begins, choose a character. Deal damage to that character equal to the number of dice that character's controller has in their pool, to a maximum of 2.
label: Stranded

name: Light Repeating Blaster
text:
Redeploy.
After you activate attached character, you may resolve this die, rerolling it instead of removing it.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. Then you may deal 1 damage to another character.
label: Light Repeating Blaster

name: Military Strategist
text: Red character only. Power Action - Deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the number of different damage symbols showing on your dice.
label: Military Strategist

name: Ig-Rm Thug Droid
text: Guardian. Before this character is defeated, spot a scoundrel to have that card gain this character's character dice for the rest of the game.
label: Ig-Rm Thug Droid

name: Jabba The Hutt
subtitle: Feared And Respected
text: Power Action - Remove one of your dice to roll a bounty hunter or scoundrel die on one of your cards in play into your pool.
flavor: "You will soon learn to appreciate me."
label: Jabba The Hutt - Feared And Respected

name: Maul
subtitle: From The Shadows
text: After setup, this character gains the color Blue. After you deal damage to one of your characters for the first time each action phase, you may draw a card. Power Action - Deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the difference in the number of cards in your hands, to a maximum of 4.
label: Maul - From The Shadows

name: Qi'ra
subtitle: Crimson Dawn Lieutenant
text: Charm. After you deal damage to one of your Yellow characters for the first time each action phase, gain 1 resource. Power Action - Remove 1 charm token from a character to deal 1 damage to that character.
label: Qi'ra - Crimson Dawn Lieutenant

name: Rook Kast
subtitle: Super Commando
text: While you control a Sith, this character has Guardian. After you activate this character, roll a set-aside Mandalorian Super Commando ([WotF]37) die into your pool. If this character is elite, roll a set-aside Maul ([SoH]3) die into your pool.
label: Rook Kast - Super Commando

name: Xi'an
subtitle: Blade Expert
text: After you activate this character, you may remove one of this character's character or upgrade dice showing melee damage to deal 1 unblockable damage to a character.
flavor: "Crazy Twi. " <cite>Migs Mayfield</cite>
label: Xi'an - Blade Expert

name: No Witnesses
text:
Play only if you spot a Yellow character.
After attached character is defeated, you may resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 2.
label: No Witnesses

name: Await The Dawn
text: Spot a Yellow character and choose an opponent's die showing a value of 2 or more. Then deal indirect damage to yourself equal to the value showing on that die to remove it.
label: Await The Dawn

name: Infamy
text:
Play only if you have exactly one character die in your pool.
Deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the number of dice in their pool.
label: Infamy

name: The Upper Hand
text:
Play only if you have more cards in your hand than an opponent (including this card).
Deal 1 unblockable damage to a character. Look at an opponent's hand and discard a card from it.
label: The Upper Hand

name: First Light
text: After this support enters play, discard a random card from an opponent's hand and draw a card. Power Action - Spot Qi'ra to roll one of her character dice into your pool.
label: First Light

name: Hylobon Enforcers
text:
After you activate this support, you may reroll an opponent's die showing damage.
[special] - Remove an opponent's die.
label: Hylobon Enforcers

name: Dauntless
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 2 unblockable damage instead if an opponent has a die showing damage in their pool.
label: Dauntless

name: Vambrace Flame Thrower
text:
You may resolve this die showing damage as if it were indirect damage, increasing its value by 1.
[special] - Discard a card from play if there is a copy of that card in any discard pile. Then discard this upgrade from play.
label: Vambrace Flame Thrower

name: Kanan Jarrus
subtitle: Focused Jedi
text: [special] - Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may play a card revealed this way (paying its cost). If that card was Blue, give a character 2 shields. If that card was Red, deal 2 damage to a character. If that card was Yellow, you may turn a die to any side.
label: Kanan Jarrus - Focused Jedi

name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: One With The Force
text:
After you activate this character, if there is a die showing damage in any player's pool, turn an opponent's die to any side.
[special] - Exhaust an upgrade attached to this character to either deal 2 damage to a character or give a character 2 shields. You may reroll this die instead of removing it
label: Luke Skywalker - One With The Force

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
subtitle: Jedi Guardian
text: Guardian 2. You may resolve the discard sides of this die as if they were melee damage. Power Action - Give a character 1 shield and reroll any number of its character and upgrade dice.
label: Obi-Wan Kenobi - Jedi Guardian

name: The Daughter
subtitle: The Light Side
text: Charm. After you play a Blue ability, you may heal 1 damage from a character. Power Action - Remove 1 charm token from a character to discard the top card of that character's controller's deck. You may heal 1 damage from that character.
label: The Daughter - The Light Side

name: Tera Sinube
subtitle: Jedi Investigator
text: Power Action - Resolve one of your Blue dice as if it were showing a reroll. You may reroll any number of the rerolled dice 1 additional time.
label: Tera Sinube - Jedi Investigator

name: Binary Force
text:
Renew 1.
Activate one of your Blue characters. Then you may turn one of that character's character dice to a side showing the same symbol as another character die.
label: Binary Force

name: May The Force Be With You
text: Resolve one of your dice showing a reroll. Then choose one of the dice you just rerolled and remove it.
flavor: "Remember. The Force will be with you. Always. " <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
label: May The Force Be With You

name: Wield The Force
text:
Ambush.
Reroll a die. Then give a character shields equal to the value showing on that die.
