flavor: "Now I know there is something stronger than fear - far stronger. The Force. " <cite>Kanan Jarrus</cite>
label: Wield The Force

name: Guardians Of Peace
text: After you resolve a die showing a reroll, you may exhaust this support to give a character 1 shield, or 2 shields instead if you rerolled 3 or more dice this turn.
label: Guardians Of Peace

name: Morai
text:
Charm.
Before one of your Blue characters is dealt damage, you may activate this support. Then you may resolve this die.
label: Morai

name: Jedi Cloak
text:
Attached character has +1 upgrade limit.
After you play this upgrade, give attached character 1 shield.
label: Jedi Cloak

name: Luke's Teachings
text:
Blue character only.
After you activate attached character, draw a card.
You may resolve the shield sides of this die as if they were melee damage.
label: Luke's Teachings

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi's Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
After you resolve this die, if this upgrade is on Obi-Wan Kenobi, you may exhaust this upgrade to heal 1 damage from a character.
label: Obi-Wan Kenobi's Lightsaber

name: Aayla Secura
subtitle: General
text: After setup, this character gains the color Blue. Power Action - Roll a set-aside Clone Trooper (LEG38) die into your pool. You may reroll that die.
label: Aayla Secura - General

name: Jun Sato
subtitle: Phoenix Cell Commander
text: After any player activates a capital ship, you may activate this character. Power Action - Choose a capital ship and force its controller to activate it. Give a character 1 shield.
flavor: "Welcome to the Rebellion."
label: Jun Sato - Phoenix Cell Commander

name: Fenn Rau
subtitle: Protector Of Concord Dawn
text:
Piloting.
After an opponent claims the battlefield, give this character 1 shield.
After the action phase begins, if you control the battlefield, deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.
label: Fenn Rau - Protector Of Concord Dawn

name: Hera Syndulla
subtitle: Revolutionary Leader
text: Piloting. After you activate this character, you may place 1 damage on a support in play. Power Action - Remove one of your vehicle dice to discard a support with damage on it equal to or more than its cost.
label: Hera Syndulla - Revolutionary Leader

name: Tala Durith
subtitle: Imperial Defector
text:
After this character is defeated, deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's characters.
[special] - Reveal 2 random cards in an opponent's hand and discard each of those cards that is an event.
label: Tala Durith - Imperial Defector

name: Reckless Advance
text: Choose a symbol and activate one of your Red characters. Then resolve any number of that character's character or upgrade dice showing the chosen symbol. Each opponent gains 1 additional action on their next turn.
label: Reckless Advance

name: This Is Our Rebellion
text: Remove one of your Red dice not showing damage. Then remove up to 2 of an opponent's dice showing the same symbol as that die.
label: This Is Our Rebellion

name: Vision Of Hope
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Remove an opponent's die. Then heal 2 damage from a character if there is another copy of this event in your discard pile.
label: Vision Of Hope

name: Echo Base
text: Action - Exhaust this support to reroll a vehicle die. Then give a character shields equal to the value showing on that die. It took the Alliance 18 months to construct Echo Base, but it was abandoned after less than a month.
label: Echo Base

name: Hera's Prototype B6
text: Ambush. After you resolve this die, place 1 damage on a support in play. Power Action - Remove any amount of damage on this support to deal that much indirect damage to an opponent.
label: Hera's Prototype B6

name: Phoenix Nest
text: Action - Set this support aside to deal 3 indirect damage to an opponent. Built by the Galactic Empire, stolen by the Rebellion, and sacrificed in the Battle of Atollon.
flavor: Built by the Galactic Empire, stolen by the Rebellion, and sacrificed in the Battle of Atollon.
label: Phoenix Nest

name: Aayla Secura's Lightsaber
text: After you use the power action on attached character, you may exhaust this upgrade to give attached character 1 shield, or deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent instead if this upgrade is on Aayla Secura.
label: Aayla Secura's Lightsaber

name: LO-LA59
text: After you play this upgrade on Leia Organa, you may give a character 2 shields. Action - Exhaust this upgrade to look at the top card of an opponent's deck. You may place that card on the bottom of that deck.
label: LO-LA59

name: Cham Syndulla
subtitle: The Hammer Of Ryloth
text: After an opponent gains 1 or more resources during the action phase, place 1 resource on this card. Power Action - Remove up to 3 resources from this character to deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the number of resources removed.
label: Cham Syndulla - The Hammer Of Ryloth

name: Ezra Bridger
subtitle: Freedom Fighter
text: After setup, this character gains the color Blue. Power Action - Resolve one of your dice showing a reroll, rerolling it instead of removing it. Then force an opponent to discard a random card from their hand.
label: Ezra Bridger - Freedom Fighter

name: Han Solo
subtitle: Charming Smuggler
text: Charm. Piloting. Power Action - Remove 2 charm tokens from a character to reveal that character's controller's hand. Then you may choose a card in that player's hand with a cost of 3 or less and roll its die into your pool and resolve it, if able. Otherwise remove it.
label: Han Solo - Charming Smuggler

name: Kawlan Roken
subtitle: Jedi Protector
text: While you control an apprentice or Jedi character, this character has Guardian. Power Action - Heal 1 damage from one of your characters. Deal 1 indirect damage to yourself.
label: Kawlan Roken - Jedi Protector

name: A Step Ahead
text: Spot a die showing a resource cost to gain 1 resource. Spot a die showing an indirect damage cost to give a character 1 shield.
label: A Step Ahead

name: Asteroid Sanctuary
text: Ambush. Remove one of your vehicle dice to heal 2 damage from one of your characters.
flavor: Smugglers and other criminals sometimes hide in asteroids to avoid capture.
label: Asteroid Sanctuary

name: Fight For The Cause
text: Give an opponent 1 resource. Then you may turn one of your Yellow leader dice to a side showing damage and resolve it without paying its cost.
label: Fight For The Cause

name: Quite The Mercenary
text: Play only if an opponent dealt damage to one of your scoundrel characters during their last turn. Heal 2 damage from that character and turn one of that character's character or upgrade dice to any side.
label: Quite The Mercenary

name: Chopper
text: Power Action - Spot another Spectre and spend 1 resource to remove a die showing a value equal to or less than the value showing on this die.
label: Chopper

name: Twi'lek Resistance Fighter
text: You may play or move weapon upgrades to or from this support as if it were a non-unique non-elite character with an upgrade limit of 1.
label: Twi'lek Resistance Fighter

name: Beskar Hammer
text:
Redeploy.
After you resolve this die showing damage, you may turn a character die to any side.
label: Beskar Hammer

name: Renowned
text:
Unique character only.
The modifier sides of this die can be resolved with one of attached character's character dice showing any symbol.
label: Renowned

name: Street Smart
text:
Yellow character only.
After an opponent resolves a die, you may exhaust this upgrade to resolve one of attached character's character or upgrade dice showing the same symbol, increasing its value by 1.
label: Street Smart

name: The Path
text: Include only if you have a Jedi on your team. After setup you may choose a non-Jedi character. That character has Guardian. Action - Exhaust this plot to heal 1 damage from an apprentice or Jedi.
label: The Path

name: NED-B
text: Action - Set this support aside to give a character 2 shields. A stalwart loader droid that sacrificed himself to buy time for the other members of the Path.
flavor: A stalwart loader droid that sacrificed himself to buy time for the other members of the Path.
label: NED-B

name: Balance The Force
text:
Play only if an opponent has more dice in their pool than you.
Remove an opponent's die. If an opponent has more cards in play than you, give a character 2 shields.
label: Balance The Force

name: Lightsaber Reflection
text: Exhaust an upgrade you control with "Lightsaber" in its title to remove a die. Then, if that die was showing damage, deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Lightsaber Reflection

name: Suppress Your Fears
text: Spot a Blue character to turn a die showing damage to a side not showing damage. Then you may spot an exhausted upgrade to take one additional action.
label: Suppress Your Fears

name: The Father
text: You can only include The Son and The Daughter on your team. (You may include Villain, Neutral and Hero cards in your deck.) After you resolve a character die showing damage, you may exhaust this plot to turn a character die to a side not showing damage, or vice versa.
label: The Father

name: Absorb Energy
text:
Blue character only.
After attached character is dealt damage, you may resolve this die, increasing its value by 1.
label: Absorb Energy

name: Force Sense
text:
Blue character only.
After you play this upgrade, you may remove a die.
[special] - Resolve a die as if it were showing a reroll (yours or an opponent's). You may exhaust this upgrade to reroll this die instead of removing it.
label: Force Sense

name: Training Lightsaber
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. You may set this upgrade aside to play a card with "Lightsaber" in its title from your hand or discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1. Then you may roll its die into your pool, if able.
label: Training Lightsaber

name: Jedi Temple
subtitle: Lothal
text: Power Action - Play a card from your hand to reroll a number of dice equal to that card's cost. Give a character 1 shield.
label: Jedi Temple - Lothal

name: Battle Tactic
text:
Ambush.
Remove an opponent's die showing the same symbol as another die in that opponent's pool.
label: Battle Tactic

name: Name The System
text: Spot a leader to reveal an opponent's hand. Turn a character die to a side showing the same value as the cost of a card in that opponent's hand.
label: Name The System

name: Kuat Drive Yards
text: Before you play a capital ship, you may remove up to 2 resources from this plot to gain that many resources. Then set this plot aside. After you resolve a Red die showing a resource, place 1 resource on this plot.
label: Kuat Drive Yards

name: Surprise Tactics
text: After the upkeep phase begins, you may set this support aside to take control of the battlefield.
label: Surprise Tactics

name: Tydirium
text: After you activate this support, choose a unique character and a character subtype. That character gains the chosen subtype until the end of the action phase.
flavor: "We have stolen a small Imperial shuttle. " <cite>General Crix Madine</cite>
label: Tydirium

name: Chain Of Command
text: Redeploy. Attached character gains leader. Before attached character is defeated, this upgrade gains one of attached character's character dice.
label: Chain Of Command

name: Se-14r Light Blaster
text: Redeploy. Action - Exhaust this upgrade and remove this die showing damage to deal 1 unblockable damage to a character.
label: Se-14r Light Blaster

name: Hangar Bay
subtitle: Jabiim
text: After you activate a character, you may give control of the battlefield to an opponent to deal 1 indirect damage to that opponent.
label: Hangar Bay - Jabiim

name: Cikatro Vizago
subtitle: Devaronian Crime Lord
text: After you activate this character, you may reroll a die not showing a cost. Power Action - Force an opponent to pay the cost showing on one of this character's character dice. Then you may resolve that die without paying its cost.
label: Cikatro Vizago - Devaronian Crime Lord

name: Embo
subtitle: Stoic Kyuzo
text: Before this character takes damage, you may resolve one of his character dice as if it were showing a shield. Power Action - Resolve this die showing damage against a character with a bounty on it, increasing its value by 1.
label: Embo - Stoic Kyuzo

name: Public Enemy
text: Play only if you spot a bounty hunter. After attached character's controller plays a neutral card, you may exhaust this downgrade and remove one of your dice to deal 2 damage to attached character.
label: Public Enemy

name: Dejarik
text:
You and an opponent each choose and do one of the following, starting with you:
- Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1.
- Force an opponent to remove one of their dice. 
- Reroll any number of dice.
label: Dejarik

name: Broken Horn
text: Power Action - Spot Cikatro Vizago or discard a card from your hand to resolve this die, increasing its value by the cost showing on it.
label: Broken Horn

name: Oola
text:
Charm.
This support can be activated.
After you activate this support, reroll 2 dice.
label: Oola

name: E-851 Blaster Pistol
text: Redeploy. While this upgrade is on a scoundrel, you may resolve the indirect damage sides of this die as if they were ranged damage.
label: E-851 Blaster Pistol

name: Daiyu City
subtitle: Daiyu
text: Power Action - Reveal a card from your hand to turn an opponent's die to a side showing the same value as the cost of the revealed card.
label: Daiyu City - Daiyu

name: Max Rebo
subtitle: Popular Ortolan
text: Charm. Power Action - Remove 1 charm token from a character to resolve one of that character's character dice as if it were showing a shield without removing it from the pool.
label: Max Rebo - Popular Ortolan

name: Guarded
text: Activate a guard you control to reroll an opponent's die. Then remove an opponent's die showing damage.
label: Guarded

name: Mimic
text:
Ambush.
Choose a subtype on a card you have in play. Then remove an opponent's die with the chosen subtype.
label: Mimic

name: Outwit
text: Activate one of your characters. Then discard a downgrade on that character to take one additional action.
label: Outwit

name: Base Of Operation
text: After you use a power action on a card you control, you may exhaust this plot to reroll a die. Then, if you control the battlefield, give a character 1 shield.
label: Base Of Operation

name: Kalikori
text: After you activate a Twi'lek or Kanan Jarrus, place 1 shield on this support. Action - Exhaust this support to move up to 2 shields from this support to a character.
label: Kalikori

name: Wuher
text: Charm. [special] - Choose and do two of the following: - Heal 1 damage from a character. - Remove a droid die. - Gain 1 resource.
label: Wuher

name: MK Sniper Rifle
text:
While this upgrade is on a unique character, it has Redeploy.
After this die is rerolled by die or card effects, give attached character 1 shield.
label: MK Sniper Rifle

name: Jawa Trade Route
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Claim - Roll a set-aside Jawa Scavenger (RIV4) die into your pool and resolve it, if able. Otherwise, remove it to take 1 resource from an opponent.
label: Jawa Trade Route - Tatooine

name: Allya
subtitle: The First Witch
text: Team Up 1: Each other witch. Resilience. After you play a curse, you may roll a set-aside Nightsister ([AWK]12) die into your pool. [special] - Deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the total number of curses and Blue abilities you can spot, to a maximum of 5.
label: Allya - The First Witch

name: Barriss Offee
subtitle: Fallen Friend
text: You can include up to 4 different hero events in your deck (following all other deckbuilding restrictions). Power Action - Play a card. Then, if it was a hero card, deal 1 damage to a character. If it was a villain card, turn a die to a side showing a blank.
label: Barriss Offee - Fallen Friend

name: The Hunter
subtitle: Ruthless Pursuer
text: While an opponent has a die showing a blank in their pool, decrease the cost on this die by 1.
flavor: "Looks like I shall be rewarded."
label: The Hunter - Ruthless Pursuer

name: Sith Acolyte
text: Before one of your other Blue characters is defeated, you may move a Blue ability from that character to this character. Before this character is defeated, you may move a Blue ability on this character to another Blue character.
label: Sith Acolyte

name: Life Drain
text: After attached character's controller resolves a character die showing a value that is an odd number, you may exhaust this downgrade to deal 1 damage to attached character. Then heal 1 damage from a witch you control.
label: Life Drain

name: Anger And Power
text: Deal up to 3 damage to one of your characters. Then resolve one of your character or upgrade dice showing a blank as if it were showing melee damage with a value equal to the damage just taken.
label: Anger And Power

name: Dark Forces
text: Spot a Blue character to remove a die showing damage. You may spend 1 resource to turn a die to a side showing a blank. Then, if you just turned your die, you may remove another die showing a value of 2 or less.
label: Dark Forces

name: Just Reward
text:
Play only if you spot a Blue character.
Choose a die showing a value of 3 or less and force your opponent to resolve it for free. Then deal damage to a character equal to the value that die was just resolved for.
label: Just Reward

name: Corruption
text: After an opponent activates a character, you may discard this support from play to turn one of that character's character dice to a side showing a blank.
label: Corruption

name: Nightsister Fortress
text: Before a witch you control is defeated, you may spot a curse to set this support aside. Then add a set-aside Nightsister Zombie ([SoH]4) to your team. It gains one of the defeated witch's character dice.
label: Nightsister Fortress

name: Dark Devastation
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. Then you may turn a character or upgrade die to a side showing a blank or, if you have more dice in your pool than an opponent has in theirs, turn it to any side instead.
label: Dark Devastation

name: Darth Vader's Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
After a card is discarded from an opponent's hand during the action phase, if this upgrade is on Darth Vader, you may exhaust this upgrade to give him 1 shield.
label: Darth Vader's Lightsaber

name: Pyrokinesis
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Reroll a die and resolve it as if it were showing indirect damage, if able. Otherwise, remove it.
label: Pyrokinesis

name: Crosshair
subtitle: Expert Marksman
text: When you resolve this die showing a discard for the first time each round, you may look at an opponent's hand and choose the cards to be discarded.
flavor: "You want to know why they put me in charge? It's because I'm willing to do what needs to be done."
label: Crosshair - Expert Marksman

name: Dedra Meero
subtitle: Ambitious Agent
text: After you activate this character, reveal the top 2 cards of an opponent's deck and rearrange them in any order. Look at the top 2 cards of your deck and rearrange them in any order. Then choose a deck and discard its top card. If you chose your deck, deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Dedra Meero - Ambitious Agent

name: Linus Mosk
subtitle: Pre-Mor Enforcement
text:
Add 2 to the value of your roll for the battlefield during setup.
Before drawing your starting hand, you may shuffle up to 2 copies each of Measure for Measure ([CONV]127), Fresh Supplies ([CONV]126) and Seizing Territory ([SoH]129) into your deck.
label: Linus Mosk - Pre-Mor Enforcement

name: Major Partagaz
subtitle: ISB Major
text: After a card is discarded from a hand or deck by a card effect for the first time each round, you may draw 1 card. Power Action - Reveal the top card of a deck. Then you may turn a die to a side showing a value equal to the cost of the revealed card.
label: Major Partagaz - ISB Major

name: Palpatine
subtitle: Master Of Manipulation
text: After setup, this character gains the color Blue. Power Action - Play a card. Then you may turn a character die to a side showing a value equal to that card's cost.
flavor: "Everything that has transpired has done so according to my design."
label: Palpatine - Master Of Manipulation

name: Effective Intelligence
text: Reveal an opponent's hand and force them to discard a card with a cost equal to the cost of another card in their hand.
flavor: "There comes a time when the risk of doing nothing becomes the greatest risk of all." <cite>Syril Karn</cite>
label: Effective Intelligence

name: Reserve Attack
text:
Ambush.
Play only if you have no other cards in your hand and no player has claimed the battlefield this round.
Deal 2 damage to a character.
label: Reserve Attack

name: Uncharted Tactics
text: Spot a Red character to reveal the top card of your deck. Then discard that card to remove a die showing a value equal to or less than that card's cost.
label: Uncharted Tactics

name: Surveillance And Seizure
text: After you remove an opponent's die or reveal a card in an opponent's hand, you may exhaust this plot to reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If that card is a hero or villain card, you may deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Surveillance And Seizure

name: Aldhani Outpost
text:
This support can be dealt melee or ranged damage as if it were a character. 
While this support has less than 6 damage on it, it cannot be discarded from play.
Discard this support from play if it has 6 or more damage on it.
label: Aldhani Outpost

name: Arrestor Cruiser
text: After you play this support, you may exhaust an opponent's support and force an opponent to lose 1 resource. [special] - Play a vehicle from your hand or discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1. Roll its die into your pool, if able. [special] - Give a leader character 3 shields.
label: Arrestor Cruiser

name: ISB Central Office
text: After a card is revealed from a player's hand or deck, you may exhaust this support to roll a set-aside ISB Agent ([FA]14) die into your pool. Then deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.
label: ISB Central Office

name: Pre-Mor Enforcers
text: After you activate this support, you may roll 1 set-aside Conscript Squad ([CONV]134) die into your pool for each resource on this support, to a maximum of 2. Power Action - Spot a leader to place 1 resource on this support.
label: Pre-Mor Enforcers

name: Imperial Rule
text:
Redeploy.
After you resolve this die, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a villain card, deal 1 damage to a character. If it is a Red card, you may draw 1 card.
label: Imperial Rule

name: Tyrant
text: Action - Exhaust this upgrade and remove 2 of your dice showing the same symbol to deal 4 indirect damage to an opponent.
label: Tyrant

name: Bib Fortuna
subtitle: Cunning Twi'lek
text: After you remove this die, you may draw a card. [special] - Turn a scoundrel or bounty hunter die to any side. Then, if that is your die, you may resolve it.
flavor: "Die wanna wanga."
label: Bib Fortuna - Cunning Twi'lek

name: Dryden Vos
subtitle: Crimson Dawn
text:
Before you resolve this die showing damage, if an opponent has a defeated character, you may increase its value by 1.
After you deal damage to one of your characters for the first time each action phase, you may deal 1 damage to a character.
flavor: In memory of Chris Knepper, 1987-2023
label: Dryden Vos - Crimson Dawn

name: Jango Fett
subtitle: Expert Fighter
text: Resilience. After an opponent activates a character, you may reroll a character die. Power Action - Play a bounty from your hand or discard pile on an opponent's character. Then deal 1 damage to that character or give this character 1 shield.
label: Jango Fett - Expert Fighter

name: Moralo Eval
subtitle: Criminal Mastermind
text:
After setup, place 1 resource on this character.
Before you resolve a die showing a cost, you may remove 1 resource from this character to decrease that die's cost by 1.
[special] - Deal 2 indirect damage to an opponent and place 1 resource on this character.
label: Moralo Eval - Criminal Mastermind

name: Zam Wesell
subtitle: Shapeshifter For Hire
text: After setup, choose a character subtype. This character gains the chosen subtype. Power Action - Resolve this die showing a value equal to or less than the value showing on another character die as if it were showing the same symbol as that die. Treat any damage dealt as unblockable.
label: Zam Wesell - Shapeshifter For Hire

name: Clear Target
text: Action - Exhaust this downgrade to choose one of your bounty hunter dice not showing damage. Then you may resolve it against attached character as if it were showing ranged damage.
label: Clear Target

name: Raise The Stakes
text: Choose a character. Force an opponent to choose a character. Reroll a die. Then deal damage to each of the chosen characters equal to the value showing on that die. Remove that die.
label: Raise The Stakes

name: Scum And Villainy
text: Spot a scoundrel or a bounty hunter to remove an opponent's die showing damage. Then, if there is another copy of this event in your discard pile, you may discard a card from your hand to remove a die showing a value of 2 or less.
label: Scum And Villainy

name: Unlucky For Some
text: Remove one of your Yellow character dice showing a blank to deal 2 indirect damage to an opponent.
flavor: "Insolence? We are pirates! We don't even know what that means!" <cite>Hondo Ohnaka</cite>
label: Unlucky For Some

name: Annihilator Droid
text: After you resolve this die, place 1 damage on this support. Deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the number of damage tokens on this support, to a maximum of 3. Power Action - Roll this die into your pool.
label: Annihilator Droid

name: C-21 Highsinger
text:
After you roll this die into your pool, deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.
[special] - Give a character 1 shield or play a Yellow event from your discard pile (paying its cost). If you played an event, set it aside.
label: C-21 Highsinger

name: Salacious B. Crumb
text:
This support can be activated.
After you activate this support, you may spot 2 of your dice showing the same symbol to gain 1 resource. Then you may deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent, or deal 1 damage to a character instead if you spot Jabba the Hutt.
label: Salacious B. Crumb

name: The Khetanna
text: After this die is removed, you may reroll a die. Power Action - Resolve one of your dice showing a modifier as if it did not have a modifier.
label: The Khetanna

name: Jango Fett's Westar-34
text:
Redeploy.
While this upgrade is on Jango Fett, your copies of it are non-unique and do not count towards his upgrade limit.
After you play this upgrade, you may remove one of your Yellow dice to gain 1 resource.
label: Jango Fett's Westar-34

name: Projectile Rifle
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 3 unblockable damage to a character.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. Give a character 1 shield.
[special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. Remove a die.
label: Projectile Rifle

name: Deceit
text: Resolve up to 2 of your dice showing a discard as if they were showing indirect damage.
flavor: "Perhaps it is time for a change." <cite>Palpatine</cite>
label: Deceit

name: Anakin Skywalker
subtitle: Overconfident Student
text: After an opponent activates a character, you must activate this character as your next action, if able. After the Guardian ability on one of your characters removes a die, you may resolve one of this character's character or upgrade dice showing damage, increasing its value by 1.
label: Anakin Skywalker - Overconfident Student

name: Gungi
subtitle: Protective Friend
text:
[special] - Choose and do two of the following:
- Deal 1 unblockable damage to a character.
- Give a character 1 shield.
- Reroll a die.
label: Gungi - Protective Friend

name: Shaak Ti
subtitle: Skilled Combatant
text: After setup, this character gains the color Red. After you resolve a trooper die showing damage, you may resolve one of this character's character dice showing damage, increasing its value by 1.
flavor: A Togruta hailing from the planet Shili, Master Ti was in charge of training the clone troopers for combat against the Separatist army.
label: Shaak Ti - Skilled Combatant

name: Yaddle
subtitle: Valiant Master
text: Guardian. [special] - Resolve another side of this die, or use a special ability (special-symbol) on an ability on this character.
label: Yaddle - Valiant Master

name: Desperate Power
text: Deal 1 damage to one of your Blue characters. Then roll 1 set-aside Force Retaliation ([DoP]14) die into your pool.
flavor: "Fear leads to anger. Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to suffering." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: Desperate Power

name: Healing Touch
text:
Renew 1.
Spot a Blue character to heal 1 damage from an opponent's character. Then remove one of that character's character dice.
label: Healing Touch

name: Sanctuary
text:
Renew 3.
Give a character shields equal to the value showing on a die. Then remove that die.
label: Sanctuary

name: DC0052 Speeder
text: After you activate this support, you may activate a Jedi.
flavor: An airspeeder utilized by the Jedi Order in the waning days of the Galactic Republic.
label: DC0052 Speeder

name: Jedi Archives
text: After you resolve one of your dice showing a shield, you may exhaust this support to reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Then you may add a card revealed this way to your hand. Place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.
label: Jedi Archives

name: Consular Teachings
text: Redeploy. After you play this upgrade or it is moved to a character, you may either roll this die into your pool or spend 1 resource to roll an ability die on attached character into your pool.
label: Consular Teachings

name: Morichro
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Remove 2 shields from an opponent's character and deal 2 unblockable damage to a character. If this upgrade is on Yaddle, you may exhaust this upgrade to draw a card.
label: Morichro

name: Obi-Wan's Teachings
text:
Attached character has the Guardian keyword.
After you deal damage to attached character, you may exhaust this upgrade to give them 1 shield.
flavor: "It's over, Anakin; I have the high ground." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
label: Obi-Wan's Teachings

name: Shaak Ti's Lightsaber
text: [special] - Deal 1 unblockable damage to a character or turn one of your trooper dice to any side and resolve it.
label: Shaak Ti's Lightsaber

name: Hunter
subtitle: Commanding Officer
text: After you play a Red upgrade or support for the first time each round, you may draw a card. Power Action - Remove this die to defeat a character with 2 or less remaining health.
flavor: "A real leader protects his squad."
label: Hunter - Commanding Officer

name: Luthen Rael
subtitle: Axis
text: After you resolve a die showing a cost, place 1 resource on this character. Power Action - Remove 2 resources from this card to resolve a partisan or weapon die, rerolling it instead of removing it.
flavor: "I'm condemned to use the tools of my enemy to defeat them."
label: Luthen Rael - Axis

name: Mon Mothma
subtitle: Revolutionary Leader
text: Charm. You may include up to 4 Yellow supports in your deck (following all other deckbuilding restrictions). Power Action - Play a trooper support or support with "partisan" in its title from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Mon Mothma - Revolutionary Leader

name: Wrecker
subtitle: Demolitions Expert
text: After you play a Red upgrade or support, you may resolve one of this character's character dice showing damage, increasing its value by 1. Power Action - Resolve one of your dice as if it were showing indirect damage.
label: Wrecker - Demolitions Expert

name: Endure
text: Spot a Red character to choose up to 2 dice showing damage that do not have a cost. Then force an opponent to resolve them, decreasing each of their values by 1.
label: Endure

name: Resurgence
text:
After you heal damage from a character, you may play this card from your hand for free.
Turn one of your dice not showing damage to a side showing damage. Turn an opponent's die showing damage to a side not showing damage.
label: Resurgence

name: Troopers' Advance
text: Resolve one of your trooper dice showing damage, increasing its value by the number of troopers you can spot, to a maximum of 2.
label: Troopers' Advance

name: Home One
text: This card's cost cannot be decreased. Power Action - Attach a non-elite vehicle support you control to this card as a mod upgrade. Power Action - Choose a vehicle attached to this support. It becomes a support.
label: Home One

name: Jetpack Trooper
text:
Ambush.
While an opponent has no ready characters, that opponent cannot remove this die.
flavor: A variant of clone trooper trained for aerial combat through the use of the JT-12 jetpack.
label: Jetpack Trooper

name: Luthen's Haulcraft
text:
Your Luthen Rael has Piloting.
After you resolve this die, place 1 resource on this support. Then you may remove a die showing a value equal to the number of resources on this support.
label: Luthen's Haulcraft

name: Marauder
text: After you resolve this die, you may place a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck to draw a card.
flavor: The Marauder was a modified Omicron-class attack shuttle that served as the personal starship of Clone Force 99.
label: Marauder

name: DC-17M Blaster Rifle
text:
Redeploy.
While all your characters are Red, increase the value of this die by 1.
label: DC-17M Blaster Rifle

name: Bix Caleen
subtitle: Ferrix Mechanic
text: You may include Red mods in your deck. Power Action - Play a mod from your hand or discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.
flavor: An experienced mechanic trading out of Ferrix with offworld connections, namely Luthen Rael.
label: Bix Caleen - Ferrix Mechanic

name: Cassian Andor
subtitle: Alliance Loyalist
text: Piloting. After a card is discarded from an opponent's hand during the action phase, place 1 resource on this character. Power Action - Remove 2 resources from this card to play a Yellow card from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Cassian Andor - Alliance Loyalist

name: Enfys Nest
subtitle: Infamous Marauder
text:
Resilience.
After an opponent removes one of your character dice, you may remove an opponent's die.
[special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character, or 3 unblockable damage instead if none of that character's character dice are in any pool.
flavor: "We're not marauders. We're allies. And the war has just begun."
label: Enfys Nest - Infamous Marauder

name: Karis Nemik
subtitle: Freedom Fighter
text: After you activate this character, you may add or remove a resource from a Gray, Red, or Yellow non-plot card in play.
flavor: "The Imperial need for control is so desperate because it is so unnatural. Tyranny requires constant effort."
label: Karis Nemik - Freedom Fighter

name: Maarva Andor
subtitle: Fighting The Empire
text: After you activate this character, you may roll a partisan or scoundrel die on a card you control into your pool. You may spot Cassian Andor or B2EMO to reroll that die.
flavor: "The Empire is a disease that thrives in darkness. It is never more alive than when we sleep."
label: Maarva Andor - Fighting The Empire

name: For The Greater Good
text: Reroll one of your dice to reroll 2 of an opponent's dice. Then you may remove one of those dice with the lowest value (you choose in the case of a tie).
label: For The Greater Good

name: Nobody's Listening!
text: Remove an opponent's die. Then you may draw a card, heal 1 damage from a character, and place 1 resource on a card in play.
label: Nobody's Listening!

name: The Axe Forgets
text:
Play only if an opponent dealt damage to one of your characters during their last turn this round.
Discard a random card from that opponent's hand and discard the top card of their deck.
label: The Axe Forgets

name: Aldhani Heist
text:
Include only if you have a partisan on your team.
After setup, add a set-aside Aldhani Outpost ([RES]23) to an opponent's play area.
After the start of the upkeep phase, if you control the battlefield and no opponent controls an Aldhani Outpost, set this plot aside to gain 4 resources.
label: Aldhani Heist

name: Alliance Pathfinders
text: After you resolve this die, place 1 resource on this support. Power Action - Remove 2 resources from this support to ready it.
label: Alliance Pathfinders

name: B2EMO
text: After you remove 1 or more resources from a card in play, you may deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent. Then you may spot Cassian Andor or Maarva Andor and exhaust this support to give a character 1 shield.
label: B2EMO

name: Cloud-Riders
text:
After you activate this support, if you have more dice in your pool than an opponent has in theirs or if you can spot Enfys Nest, you may remove a die.
[special] - Roll a character die and an upgrade die on cards you control into your pool.
label: Cloud-Riders

name: Partisan X-Wing
text: After you activate this support, you may deal 1 damage to a character if this support has one or more upgrades.
label: Partisan X-Wing

name: Courage
text:
Attached character has +1 health.
Before you resolve this die, increase its value by 1 if an opponent has a die showing damage in their pool.
label: Courage

name: Nemik's Manifesto
text:
Redeploy.
Attached character has partisan and +1 upgrade limit.
After you play a hero card, exhaust this upgrade to heal 1 damage from a character.
label: Nemik's Manifesto

name: Partisan Rifle
text: Redeploy. This upgrade enters play with 1 resource on it. Action - Remove 1 resource from this upgrade to resolve this die, increasing its value by 1.
label: Partisan Rifle

name: Daughters of Ferrix
text: Action - Exhaust this support to choose and do one of the following: - Resolve one of your dice showing a discard as if it were showing ranged damage. - Give a partisan 1 shield. - Remove one of your dice showing a blank to discard the top card of a deck.
label: Daughters of Ferrix

name: Asajj Ventress
subtitle: Relentless Hunter
text: You may include up to 4 downgrades of any affiliation or color in your deck. After setup, this character gains the color Yellow. Power Action - Reroll 2 dice. Then, if those dice are showing different symbols, deal 1 unblockable damage to a character with a downgrade on it.
label: Asajj Ventress - Relentless Hunter

name: Count Dooku
subtitle: Determined Idealist
text:
Resilience.
You may include up to 4 Blue upgrades of any affiliation in your deck.
[special] - Turn a die to any side. If it was a villain die, discard 2 random cards from a player's hand. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to a character.
label: Count Dooku - Determined Idealist

name: Force Advantage
text: Play only if an opponent rerolled 1 or more dice during their last turn this round. Exhaust a Blue ability you control to remove a die showing a value equal to or less than that ability's cost.
label: Force Advantage

name: Vergence
text: You may play or move Blue ability upgrades to or from this support as if it were a Blue character with an upgrade limit of 1. [special] - Choose an upgrade attached to this support and roll its die into your pool. You may move a Blue ability upgrade on a character you control to this support.
label: Vergence

name: Battle Meditation
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Choose an opponent's die and force them to resolve it, decreasing its value by 1. Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1.
label: Battle Meditation

name: Count Dooku's Lightsaber
text: After you resolve one of attached character's character dice, if this upgrade is on Count Dooku, you may exhaust this upgrade to deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.
label: Count Dooku's Lightsaber

name: The Tower
subtitle: Coruscant
text:
After the action phase begins, choose a number. 
After an opponent plays a card with a cost equal to the chosen number for the first time this round, turn a die to a side showing a value equal to that number.
label: The Tower - Coruscant

name: Cost Of War
text: Remove one of your dice showing a cost or a modifier to remove an opponent's die.
flavor: "People will suffer." <cite>Mon Mothma</cite>
label: Cost Of War

name: Tactical Sacrifice
text: Discard a Red support you control with a cost of 3 or less from play to discard a support, upgrade, or downgrade with an equal or lower cost from play.
label: Tactical Sacrifice

name: The Long Game
text: Turn 2 of your trooper or vehicle dice to sides showing a blank. Then play a card from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: The Long Game

name: Flexible Leadership
text: Before one of your characters is defeated, you may exhaust this plot to move one of their non-unique Red titles or abilities to another character you control.
flavor:
"The supreme leader is dead." <cite>Kylo Ren</cite>
"Long live the supreme leader." <cite>Armitage Hux</cite>
label: Flexible Leadership

name: Preemptive Defense
text:
After you play this support, give a character 1 shield.
After you claim or take control of the battlefield, you may spend 1 resource and discard this support from play to remove an opponent's die.
label: Preemptive Defense

name: Automated Turret
text: Modify vehicle support. After an opponent activates a character, exhaust this upgrade to deal 1 damage to that character.
label: Automated Turret

name: Commander
text: Attached character gains leader. After you activate attached character, you may activate a Red support you control and turn a vehicle or trooper die to a side showing a value of 1.
label: Commander

name: Imperial Prison Complex
subtitle: Narkina 5
text: Claim - Deal 1 damage to each character that has one or more of their character dice in any pool.
label: Imperial Prison Complex - Narkina 5

name: Droopy McCool
subtitle: Snit
text: Charm. Power Action - Remove 2 charm tokens from a character to turn one of that character's character dice to a side showing a blank. If it was your character die, gain 1 resource.
flavor: A male Kitonak and the lead horn player of the Max Rebo Band.
label: Droopy McCool - Snit

name: Asteroid Field
text: Play only if you have a vehicle die in your pool. Each player deals 1 indirect damage to themselves for each die showing a blank in their pool, to a maximum of 4.
label: Asteroid Field

name: As You Wish
text: Spot a bounty to roll one of your bounty hunter dice into your pool.
flavor: IG-88, Bossk, Dengar, Zuckuss, 4-LOM and Boba Fett were all tasked with finding The Millennium Falcon.
label: As You Wish

name: Going Somewhere, Solo?
text: Spot a scoundrel to remove an opponent's die showing a value of 1 or less. Then you may spot a villain character to roll a set-aside Greedo ([LEG]21) die into your pool or spot a hero character to roll a set-aside Han Solo ([SoH]96) die into your pool instead.
label: Going Somewhere, Solo?

name: One Last Trick
text: After one of your characters is defeated, you may set this plot aside to play a Yellow card from your hand, decreasing its cost by 2.
label: One Last Trick

name: Skyblade Swoop Bike
text: Ambush. Power Action - If this card is a support, attach it to a character you control as an upgrade (discard all upgrades on this card).
label: Skyblade Swoop Bike

name: Bryar Pistol
text: Redeploy. Action - Exhaust this upgrade to resolve one of your dice, decreasing the cost showing on it by 1.
label: Bryar Pistol

name: Garsa's Sanctuary
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Power Action - Choose a symbol to reroll a die. If that die is showing the chosen symbol, you may turn a different die to the same symbol showing a value of 2 or less.
label: Garsa's Sanctuary - Tatooine

name: Lekku Warning
text: Spot a Twi'lek to remove a die. Then you may spot another Twi'lek to gain 1 resource.
flavor: Lekku are long, fleshy appendages that protrude from the head of all Twi'leks, Togruta, and male Ozrelanso.
label: Lekku Warning

name: Mechanical Efficiency
text: Resolve one of your droid or mod dice, increasing its value by 1.
flavor: "Sometimes, I just don't understand human behavior." <cite>C-3PO</cite>
label: Mechanical Efficiency

name: Suspicion
text: Remove all charm tokens from a character. Then, if you removed 2 or more charm tokens this way, deal 2 damage to a character.
flavor: "The Empire has been choking us so slowly we're starting not to notice." <cite>Luthen Rael</cite>
label: Suspicion

name: Leverage
text: Action - Exhaust this plot to draw a card.
flavor: "A friendly piece of advice: assume that I know everything." <cite>Moff Gideon</cite>
label: Leverage

name: Blaster Rifle
text: You may play or move this upgrade to a trooper support as if that card were a non-unique character with an upgrade limit of 1. Power Action - Move this upgrade to a trooper you control.
label: Blaster Rifle

name: Cluster Missiles
text: Modify vehicle support. Action - Remove one of attached vehicle's vehicle or upgrade dice to deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's characters.
label: Cluster Missiles

name: Heavy Laser Cannon
text: Modify vehicle support. After you activate attached vehicle, you may exhaust this upgrade to reroll a vehicle or upgrade die.
label: Heavy Laser Cannon

name: Resilience
text:
Character that is 18 or more points only.
Attached character has + 1 upgrade limit and Resilience (no more than one of this character's character dice can be removed in the same action).
label: Resilience

name: Rix Road
subtitle: Ferrix
text: Claim - Force each opponent to choose to either remove one of their dice or choose and discard a card from their hand.
label: Rix Road - Ferrix

name: Baylan Skoll
subtitle: Seeking Higher Power
text: Resilience. After you resolve this die showing damage, you may turn an opponent's character die to any side. Power Action - Resolve this die. Then roll this die into your pool and resolve it, if able, decreasing its value by 1. Otherwise, remove it.
label: Baylan Skoll - Seeking Higher Power

name: Dagan Gera
subtitle: Jedi Knight Marauder
text: Power Action - Reveal 2 cards from your hand that share a cost. Then, if the cost of those cards is: 0: Draw a card; 1: Deal 1 damage to a character; 2: Turn a die to any side; 3 or more: Gain 1 resource. "You're still chained by the past. It will be your grave."
label: Dagan Gera - Jedi Knight Marauder

name: Darth Plagueis
subtitle: The Wise
text: Power Action - Spot a die showing a cost to heal damage equal to its cost from a character. Then you may spot a different die showing a cost to heal damage equal to its cost from a different character.
label: Darth Plagueis - The Wise

name: Marrok
subtitle: Mysterious Warrior
text: Guardian. Power Action - Remove one of your Blue dice to play a downgrade from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1. If that downgrade was a curse, gain 1 action. Marrok once served in the Inquisitorius of the Galactic Empire.
label: Marrok - Mysterious Warrior

name: Shin Hati
subtitle: Force Sensitive Mercenary
text:
Piloting.
[special] - Give a character 1 shield or deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the number of dice in any pool showing a value of 0, to a maximum of 3.
?One parting lesson, Shin. Impatience for victory will guarantee defeat.? - Baylan Skoll
label: Shin Hati - Force Sensitive Mercenary

name: Emergence
text: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the number of cards you just revealed that cost an odd number.
label: Emergence

name: Exploit Weakness
text: Choose a player and turn 2 of their dice to sides showing a blank. Then you may choose a different player and resolve 1 of their dice as if it were showing a focus.
label: Exploit Weakness

name: The Chosen One
text:
Play only if you have exactly one Blue character die in your pool.
Resolve that character die, increasing its value by 1.
label: The Chosen One

name: Your Thoughts Betray You
text: Spot a Blue character to choose a color. Then discard a random card in a player's hand. If that card matches the chosen color, deal 2 damage to a character.
label: Your Thoughts Betray You

name: Awaiting Fate
text: After the upkeep phase begins, place 1 resource on this card. Action - Set this plot aside and remove up to 3 resources from this plot to turn that many dice to sides showing a blank. Then gain 1 action.
label: Awaiting Fate

name: Great Mothers
text: After you play a card with an odd cost, you may exhaust this support to heal 1 damage from a character.After you play a curse, you may ready this support. "The thread of destiny demands it."
label: Great Mothers

name: Power
text: After you resolve a die showing melee damage, place 1 resource on this card. Action - Discard this support from play to remove a die showing a value less than the number of resources on this support.
label: Power

name: RP82 Fiend Fighter
text: After this vehicle is piloted by Shin Hati, you may turn a character die to a side showing a value of 0. [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if there is a die showing a blank in any player's pool.
label: RP82 Fiend Fighter

name: Dagan Gera's Lightsaber
text: Redeploy.Action - Exhaust this upgrade. Then reveal 2 cards from your hand that share a cost to roll one of attached character's character dice into your pool. If this upgrade is on Dagan Gera, gain 1 action.
label: Dagan Gera's Lightsaber

name: Force Choke
text:
Blue character only.
Before a die is turned to a side showing a blank, you may exhaust this upgrade to remove that die instead.
flavor: "My lady, is that any way to treat your rightful ruler?" <cite>Maul</cite>
label: Force Choke

name: Enoch
subtitle: Captain Of The Guard
text:
After one of your effects defeats an opponent's character, this character gains one of its character dice. 
[special] - Gain 1 resource or roll a die on a Red upgrade or support you control with a cost of 3 or less into your pool.
label: Enoch - Captain Of The Guard

name: Moff Gideon
subtitle: Remnant Warlord
text: Resilience. After a card is discarded from an opponent?s hand by a die or card effect, deal 1 indirect damage to that opponent. Power Action - Resolve one of your dice showing damage, increasing its value by 1 if you have more cards in hand than an opponent.
label: Moff Gideon - Remnant Warlord

name: Morgan Elsbeth
subtitle: Vindictive Witch
text: After setup, this character gains the color Blue. You may include Blue villain cards in your deck. After you resolve a die showing an odd value, place 1 resource on this character. Power Action - Remove 4 resources from this card to roll a set-aside Thrawn ([SoH]23) die into your pool.
label: Morgan Elsbeth - Vindictive Witch

name: Thrawn
subtitle: Strategic Mind
text: After you activate this character, you may look at an opponent's hand and place 1 card from their hand on top of their deck. Then that opponent may deal 2 indirect damage to themselves to draw a card.
label: Thrawn - Strategic Mind

name: Assume I Know Everything
text: Spot a Red character to discard cards from an opponent's hand equal to the number of different damage symbols showing on your dice.
label: Assume I Know Everything

name: Long Live The Empire
text:
Choose and do one of the following:
- Discard an event from your hand to remove a die not showing damage.
- Discard a non-event card from your hand to remove a die showing damage.
label: Long Live The Empire

name: Imperial Security
text: Reveal the top card of a deck. Then you may spend resources up to that card's cost to remove that many dice, to a maximum of 2.
label: Imperial Security

name: Oppress Freedom
text: Remove a die showing a value of 2 or less. Then you may give control of the battlefield to an opponent to discard a random card from their hand. If that card was an event, deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Oppress Freedom

name: Chimaera
text: After you activate this support, if this die did not roll damage, discard a random card from an opponent's hand. Power Action - Reveal the top card of your deck, or any deck instead if you can spot Thrawn. You may play that card, if able.
label: Chimaera

name: Night Troopers
text: After a trooper character you control is defeated, this support gains 1 of that character's character dice. "The blessing of the Great Mothers shall protect you in battle against the Jedi." - Morgan Elsbeth
label: Night Troopers

name: Electrostaff
text:
Ambush.Redeploy.
While this upgrade is on Moff Gideon or on a guard, you may resolve this die as if it did not have a modifier.
label: Electrostaff

name: Imperial Control
text: After a card is discarded from a player's hand by a die or card effect, you may exhaust this upgrade to resolve one of your dice showing damage, increasing its value by 1.
label: Imperial Control

name: Dengar
subtitle: The Demolisher
text:
After setup, if this character is elite, defeat it unless you spend 1 resource.
After you activate this character, if any of this character's character dice just rolled a blank, deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Dengar - The Demolisher

name: Gorian Shard
subtitle: Pirate King
text:
After you resolve a die showing a cost, deal 1 indirect damage to an opponent.
After you activate this character, if an opponent has an exhausted character and no dice showing damage, you may resolve one of your dice showing a cost decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Gorian Shard - Pirate King

name: Rayvis
subtitle: Gen'dai Jedi Slayer
text:
After the upkeep phase begins, heal 1 damage from this character.
After you deal damage to one of your characters for the first time each action phase, you may exhaust an upgrade on this character to roll that upgrade's die into your pool.
label: Rayvis - Gen'dai Jedi Slayer

name: Vane
subtitle: Nikto Captain
text:
Piloting.
After you activate this character, you may choose one of your character dice and an opponent's character die. Turn each of them to a side showing the value showing on the other die.
label: Vane - Nikto Captain

name: 4-LOM
text: While you control Zuckuss, this card has Redeploy. 4-LOM was an ambitious protocol droid who overrode his programming and became a galactic thief and later a bounty hunter.
label: 4-LOM

name: No Escape
text: After attached character is activated, you may exhaust this downgrade to resolve one of your bounty hunter dice. After attached character is defeated, you may roll a die on a bounty hunter you control into your pool.
label: No Escape

name: Detonation
text: Resolve up to 2 of your dice as if they were showing indirect damage, increasing each of their values by 1 if one or more of those dice were showing damage.
label: Detonation

name: Influenced
text:
Deal 1 indirect damage to yourself to choose and do one of the following:
- Deal 1 damage to a character.
- Turn a die to any side.
- Draw a card.
label: Influenced

name: Thrifty
text: Resolve one of your dice showing a cost to remove a die.
label: Thrifty

name: Cumulus-Class Corsair
text: After you activate this support, you may activate a pirate, scoundrel, or vehicle you control. Power Action - Roll a set-aside Pirate Snub Fighter ([AF]38) die in to your pool.
label: Cumulus-Class Corsair

name: Pirate Snub Fighter
text: Ambush. Power Action - Resolve a die showing a disrupt to turn a die to any side.
label: Pirate Snub Fighter

name: Zuckuss
text: Power Action - Spot 4-LOM to ready this support. [special] - Gain 1 resource or deal damage to a character equal to the number of downgrades on that character.
label: Zuckuss

name: Swindler
text:
Yellow character only.
[special] - Choose a player and either force them to gain 1 resource or force them to lose 1 resource. Then choose an opponent and deal indirect damage to them equal to the difference in the number of resources you have, to a maximum of 4.
label: Swindler

name: Nihil Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
After you deal damage to attached character for the first time each action phase, you may reroll a die.
label: Nihil Lightsaber

name: HK-87 Assassin Droid
text:
Guardian.
After you deal damage to one of your characters, place 1 resource on this card.
[special] - Gain 1 resource or remove up to 4 resources from this character to deal that much unblockable indirect damage to an opponent.
label: HK-87 Assassin Droid

name: A350 Blaster Rifle
text:
Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade on a non-unique character, you may search your deck or discard pile for another copy of this upgrade and play it, decreasing its cost by 1. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.
label: A350 Blaster Rifle

name: Ahsoka Tano
subtitle: Jedi Remnant
text: Resilience. Decrease the cost of the first upgrade with "Lightsaber" in its title you play on this character each game by 1. Power Action - Resolve one of your weapon dice showing damage, either increasing its value by 1 or resolving it against 2 different characters.
label: Ahsoka Tano - Jedi Remnant

name: Bokken Jedi
text: After this character is activated, if there is an ability attached to them, you may turn one of your dice to a side showing the same symbol as this die. If there is a weapon attached to this character, you may resolve this die, increasing its value by 1 if it is showing the same symbol as one of your other dice.
label: Bokken Jedi

name: Professor Huyang
subtitle: Architect Droid
text: You cannot play Blue abilities on this character. After you resolve a die with "Lightsaber" in its title, you may place 1 resource on this character. Power Action - Remove 3 resources from this character to make a unique upgrade with "Lightsaber" in its title elite (it gains another copy of its die).
label: Professor Huyang - Architect Droid

name: Cal Kestis
subtitle: Jedi Survivor
text:
After setup, this character gains the color Yellow.
You may include Yellow upgrades in your deck (following other deck building restrictions).
[special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. You may reveal a Yellow card from your hand to deal 1 damage to a character. You may reveal a Blue card from your hand to heal 1 damage from a character.
label: Cal Kestis - Jedi Survivor

name: Cere Junda
subtitle: Keeper Of The Archives
text: Guardian. After setup, add a set-aside Jedi Archives ([RES]53) to your play area. [special] - Turn a die to any side. If that die is showing a value of: 0: Draw a card; 1: Heal 1 damage from a character; 2 or more: give a character 1 shield.
label: Cere Junda - Keeper Of The Archives

name: Anakin Skywalker's Teachings
text:
Activate one of your characters. Then, if you just rolled a die showing damage, deal 1 unblockable damage to a character.
?One is never too old to learn, Snips." - Anakin Skywalker
label: Anakin Skywalker's Teachings

name: Clarity Of Purpose
text:
Ambush.
Turn up to 2 of your dice to sides showing a shield.
Ezra's out there somewhere, and it's time to bring him home." - Sabine Wren
label: Clarity Of Purpose

name: Shielding Stance
text:
Activate a Blue character you control to remove a die. Then if the die removed was showing damage give that character 1 shield.
"This little one's not worth the effort." - Obi-Wan Kenobi
label: Shielding Stance

name: Stay Together
text:
Renew 1.
Reroll one of your character dice and another die. Then, if neither die is showing a blank, give a character 1 shield.
label: Stay Together

name: Ahsoka Tano's T-6 Jedi Shuttle
text:
Your Ahsoka Tano and Professor Huyang have Piloting.
[special] - Heal 1 damage from a character or play a card with "Lightsaber" in its title from your hand or discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Ahsoka Tano's T-6 Jedi Shuttle

name: Bokken Saber
text: While this upgrade is on an apprentice or a non-unique Blue character, you may resolve this die showing a modifier as if it were not showing a modifier. Bokken sabers were wooden swords used for combat training.
label: Bokken Saber

name: Luke Skywalker's Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
While this upgrade is on Luke Skywalker, he has Resilience.
After you exhaust this upgrade, you may roll this die into your pool.
label: Luke Skywalker's Lightsaber

name: Carson Teva
subtitle: New Republic Captain
text: Piloting. After one of your pilot dice is removed, you may place 1 damage on a support or give a character 1 shield. [special] - Move 2 damage from a support to a character or vice versa.
label: Carson Teva - New Republic Captain

name: Greef Karga
subtitle: High Magistrate
text: Charm. After an opponent draws a card during the action phase for the first time each round, you may resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1. Power Action - Remove 1 charm token from a character to force that character's controller to draw a card.
label: Greef Karga - High Magistrate

name: Jan Dodonna
subtitle: General
text: Resilience. After setup, add a set-aside Rebel Trooper ([AWK]30) to your team, or two Rebel Troopers instead if this character is elite. Power Action - Resolve one of your support dice for free without removing it from your pool.
label: Jan Dodonna - General

name: Tech
subtitle: Intellectual Soldier
text: Piloting. Power Action - Draw a card. Then place a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck. [special] - Search your deck or discard pile for a Red weapon or vehicle and play it, decreasing its cost by 1. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.
label: Tech - Intellectual Soldier

name: New Republic Bureaucracy
text: After one of attached character's character dice is resolved or removed, place 1 resource on this downgrade. Action - Exhaust this downgrade and remove 2 resources from it to play a Red card, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: New Republic Bureaucracy

name: Bacta Spray
text: Heal 1 damage from a character. Then, if all of your characters share a color or subtype, heal 1 damage from another character.
label: Bacta Spray

name: Opportunistic Offense
text: Play an upgrade from your hand (paying its cost) to either remove a die or deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to that upgrade's cost.
label: Opportunistic Offense

name: Warfare
text:
After you play a Red support, you may exhaust this plot to deal 1 damage to an exhausted character.
"It is one thing to sacrifice yourself. To sacrifice others is something else entirely?"
-Jan Dodonna
label: Warfare

name: A-Wing
text: Ambush. Power Action - Spot another copy of this support to roll this die into your pool. The RZ-1 A-wing Interceptor was a wedge-shaped starfighter manufactured by Kuat Systems Engineering.
label: A-Wing

name: Hammerhead Corvette
text: Power Action - Discard this support from play to either discard a support from play or remove up to 2 dice. Draw a card.
label: Hammerhead Corvette

name: Hunter's Knife
text:
Damage dealt by this die is unblockable.
After you resolve this die, you may use an action on a card you control. (You may not use a power action if it has already been used this round).
label: Hunter's Knife

name: Medic
text:
After you heal damage from a character, you may exhaust this upgrade to heal 1 damage from a character. 
[special] - Heal 1 damage from a character.
label: Medic

name: Bo-Katan Kryze
subtitle: Ruler Of Mandalore
text: After you resolve this die showing damage, you may give a character 1 shield. Power Action - Remove 1 shield from a non-plot card you control to resolve one of your dice showing damage, increasing its value by 1.
label: Bo-Katan Kryze - Ruler Of Mandalore

name: Chewbacca
subtitle: Loyal Companion
text: Guardian. Piloting. After you activate a scoundrel, if one or more of its dice just rolled a resource, place 1 charm token on a card in play. Power Action - Resolve one of your dice showing a resource as if it were showing ranged damage, increasing its value by 1.
label: Chewbacca - Loyal Companion

name: Din Djarin
subtitle: Mandalorian Peacemaker
text:
After this character gains 1 or more shields, you may exhaust an upgrade on this character to reroll a die.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if this character has an exhausted upgrade.
label: Din Djarin - Mandalorian Peacemaker

name: Paz Vizsla
subtitle: Last Man Standing
text:
Guardian.
Before this character would be defeated by damage, instead defeat it after this round ends.
label: Paz Vizsla - Last Man Standing

name: Sabine Wren
subtitle: Spectre Prodigy
text:
Team Up 1: Ahsoka Tano.
After setup, this character gains the color Blue.
After you activate this character, you may reroll a die. Then, if that die is showing damage, deal 1 unblockable damage to a character.
label: Sabine Wren - Spectre Prodigy

name: Battle Confidence
text:
Ambush.
Choose one of the following card types: support or upgrade. Give a character shields equal to the number of cards of the chosen type you can spot.
label: Battle Confidence

name: Digging For Answers
text: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Then place them on the top or bottom of your deck in any order. You may discard a card from your hand to draw a card.
label: Digging For Answers

name: Honor And Loyalty
text:
Play only if all characters on your team share a color.
Remove a die. Then you may turn a die to any side. If the die you just turned was in your pool, you may resolve it.
label: Honor And Loyalty

name: Walking Carpet
text: If you control the character with the highest point value, roll one of its character dice into your pool. If an opponent controls the character with the highest point value, remove a character die.
label: Walking Carpet

name: Grogu
text:
You may spot this support as if it were a Blue character.
[special] - Remove an opponent's die and heal 1 damage from a character. Spot Din Djarin to give him 1 shield.
label: Grogu

name: Kom'rk-Class Fighter
text: This support enters play with 3 shields on it. Power Action - Move 1 shield from this support to a non-plot card in play.
label: Kom'rk-Class Fighter

name: Partisan Pistol
text:
This upgrade enters play with 2 resources on it.
After you resolve this die, remove 1 resource from this upgrade. Discard this upgrade from play if there are no resources on it.
label: Partisan Pistol

name: Sabine's Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
After you play this upgrade on Sabine Wren, gain 1 action.
You may resolve attached character's character dice showing ranged damage as if they were showing melee damage.
label: Sabine's Lightsaber

name: Far, Far Away
text: After you resolve a vehicle die, place 1 resource on this plot. Action - Remove 12 resources from this plot and set this plot aside. Then spot a hero character to add a set-aside Ezra Bridger ([DoP]70) to your team. He gains the color Blue. If this plot is elite, make him elite.
label: Far, Far Away

name: Noti Villager
text: After a character die is rerolled by a die or card effect, you may exhaust this support to turn it to a side showing a value of 2 or less.
label: Noti Villager

name: Agility
text:
Ambush.
Turn one of your dice to a side showing a blank to turn an opponent's die to any side.
label: Agility

name: The Force
text: Action - Spot a Blue character and exhaust this plot to reroll a die.
label: The Force

name: Anakin Skywalker's Spirit
text:
Discard this support from play if you control Anakin Skywalker or Darth Vader.
[special] - Roll a set-aside Darth Vader ([AtG]1) die into your pool.
label: Anakin Skywalker's Spirit

name: Unconventional Form
text:
This support enters play with 2 shields on it.
After one of your dice rolls a side showing melee damage, you may remove 1 shield token from this support and exhaust it to turn one of your other dice to a side showing ranged damage.
label: Unconventional Form

name: Bygone Lightsaber
text: Redeploy. [special] - Deal 2 damage to a character, or 3 damage instead if attached character is a Jedi or Sith.
label: Bygone Lightsaber

name: Strong With The Force
text: Blue character only. Action - Exhaust this upgrade to reroll any number of attached character's upgrade dice. Then you may resolve one of the dice you just rerolled, increasing its value by 1.
label: Strong With The Force

name: Astral Henge
subtitle: Seatos
text: Power Action - Turn an opponent's character die to any side. Then choose one of your character dice and turn it to a side showing the same symbol and value, if possible.
label: Astral Henge - Seatos

name: Senate Guard
text:
Guardian.
After this character is defeated, give a character 2 shields.
After you activate this character, if this character is elite, roll a set-aside Stun Baton ([LEG]74) die into your pool.
label: Senate Guard

name: Collateral Damage
text: Deal 1 indirect damage to yourself to resolve one of your Red dice, increasing its value by 1.
flavor: "But. I. Just. Got. Promoted..." <cite>Battle Droid</cite>
label: Collateral Damage

name: Last Resort
text: Defeat a character you control or discard an upgrade or support you control from play to remove a die and heal 1 damage from a character.
label: Last Resort

name: Stand Down!
text:
Decrease the cost of this event by 1 for each different damage symbol showing on your dice.
Remove a die.
Mandalorian warriors loyal to the Empire, Imperial Super Commandos were deadly and efficient enforcers.
label: Stand Down!

name: Tides Of Battle
text:
Ambush.
If you control the battlefield, deal 1 damage to a character. Otherwise, give a character 1 shield.
label: Tides Of Battle

name: Z-6 Rotary Blaster Cannon
text: After you play this upgrade, if it is on a trooper, you may roll this die into your pool. [special] - Deal 2 damage to up to 2 different characters.
label: Z-6 Rotary Blaster Cannon

name: Remnant Headquarters
subtitle: Mandalore
text: Claim - Remove one of your dice to choose an opponent. Then discard a random card from that player's hand. If that player has no cards in their hand, deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Remnant Headquarters - Mandalore

name: Merrin
subtitle: Adaptive Nightsister
text: After setup, this character gains the color Blue. After you play a card with an odd cost, you may place 1 shield on a non-plot card in play. Power Action - Remove 1 shield from a non-plot card you control to turn a hero or villain die to a side showing a value of 0.
label: Merrin - Adaptive Nightsister

name: Mok Shaiz's Majordomo
subtitle: Negotiator
text: Charm. Power Action - Remove a charm token from a character to force its controller to choose and discard a card from their hand. Then that player may deal 1 damage to a character. A richly attired Twi?lek who handles much of the Mos Espa mayor?s personal affairs.
label: Mok Shaiz's Majordomo - Negotiator

name: Long Shot
text: Choose a symbol and a value to reroll a die. Then, if that die rolled the chosen symbol or value, you may spend 1 resource to remove a different die.
label: Long Shot

name: Outmaneuver
text:
Ambush.
Resolve one of your character dice showing damage to remove a die.
label: Outmaneuver

name: Prospering Galaxy
text: Resolve any number of your dice each showing a different symbol. Then, if you just resolved 5 or more dice, draw 2 cards and heal 2 damage from a character.
label: Prospering Galaxy

name: Smuggler's Run
text: Ambush. Resolve one of your scoundrel, vehicle, or pilot dice showing a resource, rerolling it instead of removing it.
label: Smuggler's Run

name: Salvaged Legacy
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the value showing on a die.
label: Salvaged Legacy

name: Boba Fett's Bacta Chamber
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Power Action - Remove one of your character dice to heal 1 damage from that character, or 2 damage instead if that die was showing damage.
label: Boba Fett's Bacta Chamber - Tatooine

name: Jawa Reclaim
text: Discard a support you control from play to play a support from your hand, decreasing its cost by the cost of the discarded card.
flavor: "I've got a tribe to feed." <cite>Teeka</cite>
label: Jawa Reclaim

name: Neutralize
text:
Ambush.
Exhaust an upgrade you control to remove a die.
label: Neutralize

name: Plan B
text:
Spot a plot to remove a die.
Navarro is a very fine planet. And now that the scum and villainy have been washed away, it?s very respectable again.? - Greef Karga
label: Plan B

name: Pretty Gutsy Move, Kid!
text:
Choose and do one of the following, or both in any order instead if you have another copy of this card in your discard pile:
- Deal indirect damage to an opponent equal to the number of dice showing a modifier.
- Turn up to 2 dice to a side showing a modifier.
label: Pretty Gutsy Move, Kid!

name: What Do You Sacrifice?
text: Remove 1 resource from a non-plot card in play to either gain 1 resource or place 1 resource on a different non-plot card in play.
label: What Do You Sacrifice?

name: Dangerous Gambit
text: After the upkeep phase begins, if you control 2 or more characters, force an opponent to deal 2 unblockable damage to a character you control.
label: Dangerous Gambit

name: GNK Droid
text:
After you resolve this die, you may turn a die to its first side (the topmost box of its dice reference).
"Gonk, gonk! Gonk! GONK. Gonk Gonk! GONK."
label: GNK Droid

name: Amban Sniper Rifle
text:
Redeploy.
After this upgrade is exhausted, you may either draw a card or force an opponent to discard a random card from their hand.
